original: yojetvā yo pana na ramateti sambandho.

analyzed: samaṇa bhāvato ti vuttam hoti

analyzed: idāni ṭhānā cāveti ce dassitam ṭhānā cāvanam vibhāvetum āha

analyzed: kare nilīyati iti pasārita hattha tale nisīdati

original: Ettāvatā –

analyzed: phuṭṭha ṭṭhānam ti cīvara abhimukham ṭhitassa vāma passe cīvara antena phuṭṭham cīvara ṭṭhita ppadesam

analyzed: labbha mānatte kāraṇam dasseti nāvam kaḍḍhataḥ tassa pārājikanti sambandho puna api

original: kiṃ karontoti āha “ekenantena samphuṭṭha”ntiādi. Taṃ nāvaṃ atikkāmayatoti sambandho.
analyzed: kim karontaḥ iti āha ekena antena samphuṭṭhanti ādi tam nāvam atikkāmayato iti sambandhaḥ

original: Etthāpi “kaḍḍhitavato atikkamitavato”ti bhūtavasena attho yojetabbo. Yamettha vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: ettha api kaḍḍhitavataḥ atikkamitavataḥ iti bhūta vasena atthaḥ yojetabbaḥ yam ettha vattabbam

original: taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
analyzed: tat heṭṭhā vutta nayam eva

original: 121. Evaṃ catupassākaḍḍhane vinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni uddhaṃ, adho ca ukkhipanaosīdāpanesu
analyzed: evam catu passa ākaḍḍhane vinicchayam dassetvā idāni uddham adho ca ukkhipana osīdāpanesu

original: vinicchayaṃ dassetumāha “tathā”tiādi. Tathāti “tassa pārājika”nti ākaḍḍhati. Kasmiṃ
analyzed: vinicchayam dassetum āha tathā atiādi tathā ati tassa pārājikam ti ākaḍḍhati kasmin

original: kāleti āha “uddhaṃ kesaggamattampī”tiādi. Adhonāvātalanti nāvātalassa adho adhonāvātalaṃ,
analyzed: kāla iti āha uddham adhas nāvātalam

original: tasmiṃ uddhaṃ kesaggamattampi udakamhā vimociteti iminā sambandho. Tena phuṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: tasmin uddham kesagga mattam pi udakamhā vimocitā iti iminā sambandhaḥ tena phuṭṭham

original: kesaggamattampi mukhavaṭṭiyā vimociteti yojanā. Tenāti adhonāvātalena phuṭṭhe udake
analyzed: mukhavaṭṭiyā vimocitā iti yojanā tena ati adhonāvātalena phuṭṭhe udake

original: mukhavaṭṭiyā karaṇabhūtāya kesaggamattampi vimociteti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: mukhavaṭṭiyā karaṇa bhūtāya kesagga mattam pi vimocitā iti gahetabbam

original: 122. Tīre bandhitvā pana niccale jale ṭhapitā yā nāvā, tassā nāvāya ṭhānaṃ bandhanañca ṭhitokāso cāti dvidhā matanti yojanā.
analyzed: tīre bandhitvā pana niccale jale ṭhapitā yā nāvā tassā nāvāya ṭhānam bandhanam ca ṭhita ukāsaḥ ca ati dvidhā yojanā

original: 123. Pubbaṃ paṭhamaṃ bandhanassa vimocane thullaccayaṃ hotīti yojanā. Kenacupāyenāti
analyzed: pubbam paṭhamam bandhanassa vimocane thullaccayam hoti iti yojanā kenaci upāyena ati

original: “purato pacchato vāpī”tiādikkamena yathāvuttopāyachakkesu yena kenaci upāyenāti attho. Ṭhānā cāveti nāvaṃ.
analyzed: puratas pacchatas vāpī iti ādi kkamena yathā vutta upāya chakkesu yena kenaci upāyena ati atthaḥ ṭhānā cāveti nāvam

original: 124. Paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvāti “purato pacchato vā”tiādinā yathāvuttesu chasu ākāresu
analyzed: paṭhamam ṭhānā ca āvetvā ati puratas pacchatas vā iti ādinā yathā vuttesu chasu ākāresu

analyzed: aññatarena ākārena nāvam ṭhapita ṭṭhānato paṭhamam cāvetvā ca nayoti nāvāya

original: paṭhamaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato cāvane thullaccayaṃ, pacchā bandhanamocane pārājikanti eseva
analyzed: paṭhamam ṭhita ṭṭhānato cāvane thullaccayam pacchā bandhana mocane pārājikan ti esā eva

original: nayo netabboti attho. Ettha ca “tīre bandhitvā niccale udake ṭhapitanāvāya bandhanañca
analyzed: nayaḥ netabbo ti atthaḥ ettha ca tīre bandhitvā niccale udake ṭhapita nāvāya bandhanam ca

original: ṭhitokāso cāti dve ṭhānāni, taṃ paṭhamaṃ bandhanā moceti, thullaccayaṃ. Pacchā channaṃ
analyzed: ca ati dve ṭhānāni tam paṭhamam thullaccayam pacchā channam

original: ākārānaṃ aññatarena ṭhānā cāveti, pārājikaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvā pacchā bandhanamocanepi
analyzed: ākārānam aññatarena ṭhānā cāveti pārājikam paṭhamam ṭhānā cāvetvā pacchā bandhana mocane pi

original: eseva nayo”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavinicchayo saṅgahito. Āmasanaphandāpanesu dukkaṭathullaccayāni
analyzed: esā iva nayo ti aṭṭhakathā ayam vutta vinicchayo saṅgahitaḥ āmasana phandāpanesu dukkaṭa thullaccayāni

original: heṭṭhā kumbhiyaṃ vuttanayeneva ñātuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā na vuttānīti veditabbaṃ. Evamuparipi.
analyzed: heṭṭhā kumbhiyam vutta nayena iva ñātum sakkuṇeyya ttā na vuttāni iti veditabbam evam upari pi

original: 125. Ussāretvāti udakato thalaṃ āropetvā. Nikujjitvāti adhomukhaṃ katvā. Thale ṭhapitāya
analyzed: ussāretvā iti udakataḥ thalam āropetvā nikujjitvā iti adhomukham katvā thale ṭhapitāya

original: nāvāya mukhavaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhokāso eva ṭhānanti yojanā. Hīti viseso, tena jalaṭṭhato
analyzed: nāvāya mukha vaṭṭiyā phuṭṭha ukāsaḥ eva ṭhānanti yojanā hi iti visesaḥ tena jalaṭṭhato

original: thalaṭṭhāya nāvāya vuttaṃ visesaṃ joteti.
analyzed: thala ṭṭhāya nāvāya vuttam visesam joteti

original: 126. Ettha adho osīdāpanassa alabbhamānatāya taṃ vinā itaresaṃ pañcannaṃ ākārānaṃ
analyzed: ettha adhas osīdāpanassa a labbhamāna tāya tam vinā itaresam pañcannam

original: vasena ṭhānācāvanaṃ dassetumāha “ñeyyo”tiādi. Yato kutocīti tiriyaṃ catassannaṃ,
analyzed: vasena ṭhāna ācāvanam dassetum āha ñeyyā iti ādi yatas kutoci iti tiriyam

original: uparidisāya ca vasena yaṃ kiñci disābhimukhaṃ kesaggamattampi atikkamento.
analyzed: uparidisāya ca vasena yam kiñci disa abhimukham kesagga mattam pi atikkamento

original: 127. Ukkujjitāyapīti uddhaṃmukhaṃ ṭhapitāyapi. Ghaṭikānanti dārukhaṇḍānaṃ. “Tathā”ti
analyzed: ukkujjitāya api iti tathā ati

original: iminā “ñeyyo ṭhānaparicchedo”tiādinā vuttanayaṃ atidisati. So pana ukkujjitvā bhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: iminā ñeyyaḥ ṭhāna paricchedaḥ ti ādinā vutta nayam atidisati saḥ pana ukkujjitvā bhūmiyam

original: ṭhapitanāvāya yujjati. Ghaṭikānaṃ upari ṭhapitāya pana nāgadantesu ṭhapitakunte vuttavinicchayo yujjati.
analyzed: ṭhapita nāvāya yujjati ghaṭikānam upari ṭhapitāya pana nāga dantesu ṭhapita kunte vutta vinicchayaḥ yujjati

original: 128. “Theyyā”ti idaṃ “pājentassā”ti visesanaṃ. Tittheti titthāsannajale. Arittenāti
analyzed: theyyā ti idam visesanam titthe ti tittha āsanna jale arittena ati

original: kenipātena. Phiyenāti pājanaphalakena. Pājentassāti pesentassa. “Taṃ pājetī”tipi
analyzed: kenipātena phiyena ati pājana phalakena pājentassa ati pesentassa tam pājeti iti pi

original: pāṭho dissati, taṃ nāvaṃ yo pājeti, tassa parājayoti attho.
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ dissati tam nāvam yaḥ pājeti tassa parājayo ti attho

original: 129-30. Chattanti ātapavāraṇaṃ. Paṇāmetvāti yathā vātaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā paṇāmetvā.
analyzed: chattanti ātapa vāraṇam paṇāmetvā iti yathā vātam gaṇhāti tathā paṇāmetvā

original: Ussāpetvāva cīvaranti cīvaraṃ uddhaṃ uccāretvā vā. Gāthāchandavasena ‘va’iti rassattaṃ.
analyzed: cīvaranti cīvaram uddham uccāretvā vā gāthā chanda vasena vā eti

original: Laṅkārasadisanti pasāritapaṭasarikkhakaṃ. Samīraṇanti mālutaṃ. Na doso tassa vijjatīti
analyzed: laṅkāra sadisanti pasārita paṭa sarikkhakam na doso tassa vijjati iti

original: idaṃ vātassa avijjamānakkhaṇe evaṃ karoto pacchā āgatena vātena nītanāvāya vasena
analyzed: idam vātassa a vijjamāna kkhaṇe evam karoto pacchā āgatena vātena nīta nāvāya vasena

original: 131-2. Sayameva upāgatanti sambandho. Gāmasamīpe titthaṃ gāmatitthaṃ. Tanti nāvaṃ.
analyzed: sayam eva sambandhaḥ gāma samīpe tittham gāma tittham nāvam

original: Ṭhānāti chattena vā cīvarena vā gahitavātena gantvā gāmatitthe ṭhitaṭṭhānā. Acālentoti
analyzed: ṭhānā ati chattena vā cīvarena vā gahita vātena gantvā gāma titthe ṭhita ṭṭhānā

original: phandāpanampi akaronto, iminā thullaccayassāpi abhāvaṃ dasseti. “Acāvento”tipi pāṭho,
analyzed: phandāpanam pi a karontaḥ iminā thullaccayassa api abhāvam dasseti a cāventā iti pi pāṭhaḥ

original: ṭhitaṭṭhānato kesaggamattampi anapanentoti attho, iminā pārājikābhāvaṃ dasseti. Kiṇitvāti
analyzed: ṭhita ṭṭhānato kesagga mattam pi an apanento ti attho iminā pārājika abhāvam dasseti kiṇitvā iti

original: mūlena vikkiṇitvā. Sayameva ca gacchantinti ettha ca-kāro vattabbantarasamuccaye.
analyzed: mūlena vikkiṇitvā sayam eva ca ettha cakāraḥ vattabba antara samuccaye

original: Tathā paṇāmitachattena vā ussāpitacīvarena vā gahitavātena attanā gacchantiṃ. Ṭhānā
analyzed: tathā paṇāmita chattena vā ussāpita cīvarena vā gahita vātena attanā gacchantim

original: cāvetīti attanā icchitadisābhimukhaṃ katvā pājanavasena gamanaṭṭhānā cāveti.
analyzed: cāveti iti attanā icchita disa abhimukham katvā pājana vasena gamana ṭhānā cāveti

original: Nāvaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: nāvaṭṭhakathā vaṇṇanā

original: 133-4. Yanti etenāti yānaṃ. Ramayatīti ratho. Vahati, vuyhati, vahanti etenāti vā
analyzed: yanti etena ati yānam ramayati iti rathaḥ vahati vuyhati vahanti etena ati vā

analyzed: upari maṇḍapa sadisam padara channam vā chādetvā ati aṭṭhakathāyam

analyzed: vutta nayena katam sakaṭam vayham nāma sandamānikā ati ubhosu passesu suvaṇṇa rajata ādi mayā

original: katayānaviseso. Ṭhānā cāvanayogasminti ṭhānā cāvanappayoge.
analyzed: kata yāna visesaḥ ṭhānā cāvana yogasmin ti ṭhānā cāvana ppayoge

original: 135-6. Dasaṭṭhānācāvanavasena pārājikaṃ vadantehi paṭhamaṃ ṭhānabhedassa ñātabbattā
analyzed: dasa ṭṭhāna ācāvana vasena pārājikam vadantehi paṭhamam ṭhāna bhedassa ñātabba ttā

analyzed: tam dassetvā āpatti bhedam dassetum āha yānassa duka yuttassa atiādi duka yuttassa ati

analyzed: dukam go yugam yuttassa yassa ati yutte yasmin ti vā viggahaḥ dasa ṭhānāni iti

original: ṭhānāni vadeyyāti attho. Eteneva nayena catuyuttādiyāne aṭṭhārasāti ṭhānabhedassa
analyzed: ṭhānāni vadeyyāti attho etena iva nayena catu yutta ādi yāne aṭṭhārasā ati ṭhāna bhedassa

original: nayo dassito hoti. Yānaṃ pājayatoti sakaṭādiyānaṃ pesayato. “Dhureti yugāsanne”ti
analyzed: nayaḥ dassitaḥ hoti yānam pājayatoti sakaṭa ādi yānam pesayataḥ dhurā iti yuga āsanna iti

analyzed: sandhāya vuttam viloma kāle sambhavantam visesam jotetum thullaccayam tu

analyzed: tu saddena sace pana goṇā na ayam amhākam sāmikā iti ñatvā dhuram chaḍḍetvā

original: ākaḍḍhantā tiṭṭhanti vā phandanti vā, rakkhati tāva. Goṇe puna ujukaṃ paṭipādetvā

analyzed: pāduddhārena thullaccayanti vutta viseso saṅgahito ti daṭṭhabbo cakkānam hi iti ettha

original: adhikena hi-saddena “sacepi sakaddame magge ekaṃ cakkaṃ kaddame laggaṃ hoti, dutiyaṃ
analyzed: adhikena hi saddena sace pi sa kaddame magge ekam cakkam kaddame laggam hoti dutiyam

analyzed: pārājikam ti aṭṭhakathā ayam vutta visesaḥ dassitaḥ hoti iti daṭṭhabbam

original: 137-9. Ettāvatā yuttayānavinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni ayuttayānavinicchayaṃ dassetumāha
analyzed: ettāvatā yutta yāna vinicchayam dassetvā idāni ayutta yāna vinicchayam dassetum āha

analyzed: vuttam hoti upatthambhaniyanti sakaṭa sīsa upatthambhaniyā upari ṭhitassa upatthambhayati

original: pacchimopatthambhanī nāma, purimabhāgassa dīyamānassa upatthambhanī purimopatthambhanī
analyzed: pacchimopatthambhanī nāma purima bhāgassa dīyamānassa upatthambhanī purimopatthambhanī

original: nāmāti ayamupatthambhanīnaṃ viseso. Idha purimopatthambhanī adhippetā. “Upatthambhanicakkakānaṃ
analyzed: nāma ati ayam upatthambhanīnam visesaḥ idha purimā upatthambhanī adhippetā upatthambhani cakkakānam

original: vasena tīṇeva ṭhānānī”ti idaṃ heṭṭhā akappakatāya upatthambhaniyā vasena vuttaṃ,
analyzed: vasena tīṇi eva ṭhānāni iti idam heṭṭhā akappaka tāya upatthambhaniyāḥ vasena vuttam

original: kappakatāya pana vasena “cattārī”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: kappaka tāya pana vasena cattāri iti vattabbam

original: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Bhūmiyampi dhureneva, tatheva ṭhapitassa cā”ti iminā tīṇiyeva
analyzed: gahaṇam veditabbam bhūmiyam pi dhurena iva tathā iva ṭhapitassa ca ati iminā

original: ṭhānānīti atidisati. Ettha dhuracakkānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsavasena tīṇi ṭhānāni. Ettha

original: vuttattā āha. Kasmā pana aṭṭhakathācariyena “apaññattaṃ na paññapessāma, paññattaṃ
analyzed: vutta ttā āha kasmā pana aṭṭhakathā cariyena a paññattam na paññapessāma paññattam

original: na samucchindissāmā”ti pāḷipāṭhaṃ jānantenapi pāḷiyaṃ avuttapārājikaṃ niddiṭṭhanti?
analyzed: na samucchindissāma iti pāḷi pāṭham jānantena api pāḷiyam a vutta pārājikam niddiṭṭhanti

original: Ettha vinicchayaṃ bhikkhūhi puṭṭhena bhagavatā vuttanayassa mahāaṭṭhakathāya āgatattā
analyzed: ettha vinicchayam bhikkhūhi puṭṭhena bhagavatā vutta nayassa mahā aṭṭhakathāya āgata ttā

original: tasseva nayassa samantapāsādikāyaṃ niddiṭṭhabhāvaṃ jānantena imināpi ācariyena idha
analyzed: tassa iva nayassa samanta pāsādi kāyam niddiṭṭha bhāvam jānantena iminā api ācariyena idha

original: “satthunā”ti vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: satthunā iti vuttam ti gahetabbam

original: Atha vā “suṅkaṃ pariharati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vatvā ārakkhaṭṭhānavinicchaye avacanaṃ
analyzed: atha vā suṅkam pariharati āpatti dukkaṭassa ati vatvā ārakkha ṭṭhāna vinicchaye avacanam

original: yathāvuttavisayassa adiṭṭhabhāvena vā siyā, imassa tathā anavajjatā vā siyā, vuttānusārena
analyzed: yathā vutta visayassa a diṭṭha bhāvena vā siyā imassa tathā anavajja tā vā siyā vutta anusārena

original: suviññeyyatā vā siyāti tayo vikappā. Tesu paṭhamavikappo sabbaññubhāvabādhanato dubbikappamattaṃ
analyzed: su viññeyya tā vā siyāti tayaḥ vikappā tesu paṭhama vikappaḥ sabbaññu bhāva bādhanataḥ dubbikappamattam

original: hoti. Dutiyavikappo lokavajjassa imassa anavajjabhāvo nāma anupapannoti anādātabbo.
analyzed: hoti dutiya vikappaḥ loka vajjassa imassa anavajja bhāvaḥ nāma anupapannaḥ ti an ādātabbaḥ

original: Pārisesato tatiyavikappo yujjati.
analyzed: pārisesataḥ tatiya vikappaḥ yujjati

original: Tattha “vuttānusārenā”ti kimettha vuttaṃ nāma, tadanusārena imassāpi suviññeyyatā
analyzed: tattha vutta anusārena ati kim ettha vuttam nāma tad anusārena imassa api su viññeyya tā

original: kathanti ce? Paṭhamaniddiṭṭhe araññaṭṭhaniddese sāmaññena “ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassā”ti
analyzed: kathanti ce paṭhama niddiṭṭhe arañña aṭṭha niddese sāmaññena ṭhānā ca āveti āpatti pārājikassa ati

original: idaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana theyyacittena ārakkhaṭṭhānapariharaṇañca. “Gamanakāle ‘mūlaṃ
analyzed: idam vuttam na pana theyya cittena ārakkha ṭṭhāna pariharaṇam ca gamana kāle mūlam

original: datvā gamissāmī’ti pubbaparikappitaniyāmena adatvā gacchato parikappāvahārova hotī”ti
analyzed: datvā gamissāmi iti pubba parikappita niyāmena a datvā gacchataḥ parikappa avahāraḥ va hoti iti

original: ca “taṃ pana yena kenaci ākārena parikappitaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya gamanaṃ ṭhānācāvanaṃ nāma
analyzed: ca tam pana yena kenacid ākārena parikappita ṭṭhānam pahāya gamanam ṭhānācāvanam nāma

original: hotevāti tena vatthunā pārājikameva hotī”ti ca “ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassā’ti
analyzed: hotā iva ati tena vatthunā pārājikam eva hoti iti ca ṭhānā āpatti pārājikassa ati

original: iminā ca viññātatthameva hotī”ti ca visuṃ na vuttaṃ. Suṅkaṭṭhānapariharaṇaṃ pana
analyzed: iminā ca viññāta ttham eva hoti iti ca visum na vuttam suṅka ṭṭhāna pariharaṇam pana

analyzed: ṭhāna pariharaṇa sabhāva ttā sabhāvataḥ īdisam va santam pi idam viya parikappita ṭṭhānam

original: na hotīti vakkhamānarājasammataṭṭhānato aññaṃ parikappitaṭṭhānaṃ samānampi theyyacittuppattimattena

original: taṃ pariharitvā gacchantassa theyyacittena attano pattaṃ gaṇhantassa viya pārājikāya
analyzed: tam pariharitvā gacchantassa theyya cittena attano pattam gaṇhantassa viya pārājikāya

original: avatthutañca dukkaṭasseva vatthubhāvañca viññāpetuṃ “suṅkaṃ pariharati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
analyzed: a vatthutaṃ ca dukkaṭassa iva vatthu bhāvañca viññāpetum suṅkam pariharati āpatti dukkaṭassa ati

analyzed: vuttanti bhagavataḥ adhippāyaññunā aṭṭhakathā cariyena pārājikam eva ati vutta ttā tena

analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam vutta nīhāram eva dassetum ayam ācariyaḥ api satthunā pārājikam an uddiṭṭhanti

analyzed: āha iti niṭṭham ettha gantabbam

analyzed: piya sīlena ati ca bhikkhunā iti etassa visesanam a sikkhā kāmassa bhikkhuno imassa ovādassa

original: saraṇāsambhavā imassa abhājanatāya taṃ vajjetumāha “satisampannacetasā”ti.
analyzed: saraṇa asambhavāḥ imassa abhājana tāya tam vajjetum āha sati sampanna cetasā iti

original: Araññaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: arañña aṭṭhakathā vaṇṇanā

original: 175-6. Toyadullabhakālasminti toyaṃ dullabhaṃ yasmiṃ so toyadullabho, toyadullabho
analyzed: toya dullabha kālasmin ti toyam dullabham yasmin saḥ toya dullabhaḥ toya dullabhaḥ

analyzed: ca saḥ kālo toya dullabha kālo tasmin āvajjetvā vāti udaka bhājanam vā

original: Pavesetvā vāti attano bhājanaṃ tasmiṃ pakkhipitvā vā. Chiddaṃ katvāpi vāti udakabhājane
analyzed: pavesetvā vāti attanaḥ bhājanam tasmim pakkhipitvā vā chiddam katvā api vāti udaka bhājane

original: Tathāti yathā toyadullabhakālasmiṃ bhājane rakkhitagopitaṃ udakaṃ avaharantassa pārājikaṃ
analyzed: tathā ti yathā toya dullabha kālasmim bhājane rakkhita gopitam udakam avaharantassa pārājikam

analyzed: vuttam tena iva nīhārena vāpiyam vāti parasantakāya sārakkhāya vāpiyam vā taḷāke

analyzed: bhājana gata jale ca ca tela bhājane mukhena vā vaṃsa ādīhi vā ākaḍḍhitvā theyya cittena

original: pivantassa yathāvatthukamāpattividhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: pivantassa yathā vatthukam āpatti vidhānam veditabbam

original: 177. Mariyādanti vāpiādīnaṃ pāḷivaṭṭabandhaṃ. Chindatoti kudālādīhi paṃsuādīni uddharitvā

analyzed: dvidhā karontassa mariyādam chinditvā dubbalam

analyzed: aññe manusse vā kīḷante dārake vā otāretvā vā attanaḥ dhamma tāya otiṇṇe tāsetvā vā

analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti adinnādāna pubbataḥ ti adinnādānassa pubba payoga ttā bhūtagāmena

analyzed: saddhim api saddena patha vikhaṇanam sampiṇḍeti mariyādam chindantaḥ

analyzed: chindati pathavi khaṇana pācittiyena saddhim dukkaṭam āpajjati iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 178. Kātabboti ettha “bhaṇḍagghena āpattiyā”ti pāṭhaseso. Antobhūtahetvatthavasena
analyzed: kātabbaḥ iti ettha bhaṇḍagghena āpattiyā iti pāṭha sesaḥ antar bhūta hetvattha vasena

analyzed: kāretabbo ti gahetabbaḥ antar ṭhatvā chindantaḥ bahi antena bahi ṭhatvā chindantaḥ anto antena

original: Ayaṃ panettha attho – antovāpiyaṃ ṭhatvā mariyādaṃ chinditvā udake bahi nikkhamite
analyzed: ayam pana ittha atthaḥ antovāpiyam ṭhatvā mariyādam chinditvā udake bahi nikkhamite

original: nikkhantaudakagghena dukkaṭathullaccayapārājikāsu yathāpannāya āpattiyā kāretabbo.

original: Bahi ṭhatvā mariyādaṃ chinditvā antovāpiyaṃ pavisantodakassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato cāvitakkhaṇe

analyzed: nikkhanta audakagghena āpattiyā kāretabbaḥ kadāci antar kadāci bahi ṭhatvā mariyādam

original: majjhe ṭhapetvā chindanto majjhe ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā udakassa nīhaṭakkhaṇe nīhaṭaudakassa

original: agghena āpattiyā kāretabboti.
analyzed: agghena āpattiyā kāretabbā uti

original: Udakaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: udaka ṭṭhakathā vaṇṇanā

original: 179-80. Vārenāti vārena vārena sāmaṇerā araññato yaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ saṅghassatthāya
analyzed: vārena ati vārena vārena sāmaṇerāḥ araññataḥ yam dantakaṭṭham saṅghaḥ satthāya

original: ānetvā sace ācariyānampi āharanti, yāva te dantakaṭṭhaṃ pamāṇena chinditvā saṅghassa
analyzed: ānetvā sace ācariyānam pi āharanti yāva te danta kaṭṭham pamāṇena chinditvā saṅghassa

original: ca ācariyānañca na niyyādenti, tāva araññato ābhatattā taṃ sabbaṃ saṅghassa ca sakasakaācariyānañca
analyzed: ca ācariyānam ca na niyyādenti tāva araññataḥ tam sabbam saṅghassa ca saka saka ācariyānam ca

original: ābhataṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ tesameva ca dantakaṭṭhahārakānaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ santakaṃ hotīti atthayojanā.
analyzed: ābhatam dantakaṭṭham tesam eva ca dantakaṭṭha hārakānam sāmaṇerānam santakam hoti iti attha yojanā

original: 181. Tasmāti yasmā tesameva sāmaṇerānaṃ santakaṃ hoti, tasmā. Taṃ araññato ābhataṃ
analyzed: tasmā iti yasmā tesam eva sāmaṇerānam santakam hoti tasmā tam araññataḥ ābhatam

original: dantakaṭṭhañca saṅghassa garubhaṇḍañca dantakaṭṭhanti sambandho. Saṅghikāya bhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: dantakaṭṭham ca saṅghassa garubhaṇḍam ca dantakaṭṭhanti sambandhaḥ saṅghikāya bhūmiyam

original: uppannaṃ saṅghena rakkhitagopitattā garubhaṇḍabhūtaṃ dantakaṭṭhañcāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: uppannam saṅghena rakkhita gopita ttā garu bhaṇḍa bhūtam danta kaṭṭham ca ati vuttam hoti

original: Gaṇhantassa cāti adhikaca-kārena ihāvuttassa aṭṭhakathāgatassa gaṇapuggalagihiparibaddha
analyzed: gaṇhantassa ca ati adhika cakārena iha āvuttassa aṭṭhakathā gatassa gaṇa puggala gihi paribaddha

original: ārāmuyyānasañjātachinnāchinnarakkhitagopitadantakaṭṭhassa samuccitattā tañca theyyacittena
analyzed: ārāma uyyāna sañjāta chinna achinna rakkhita gopita danta kaṭṭhassa samuccita ttā tat ca theyya cittena

original: gaṇhantassa avahaṭadantakaṭṭhassa agghavasena āpattiyo vattabbāti ayamattho dīpito hoti.
analyzed: gaṇhantassa avahaṭa danta kaṭṭhassa aggha vasena āpattiyaḥ vattabbā ti ayam atthaḥ dīpitaḥ hoti

original: 182. Tehi dantakaṭṭhahārakehi sāmaṇerehi. Niyyāditanti mahāsaṅghassa paṭipāditaṃ.
analyzed: tehi danta kaṭṭha hārakehi sāmaṇerehi niyyāditanti mahā saṅghassa paṭipāditam

original: 183. Saṅghikakālato paṭṭhāya theyyacittena gaṇhatopi avahārābhāve kāraṇaṃ dassetumāha
analyzed: saṅghika kālataḥ paṭṭhāya theyya cittena gaṇhataḥ api avahāra abhāve kāraṇam dassetum āha

original: “arakkhattā”tiādi. Tattha arakkhattāti saṅghikabhāvena laddhepi rakkhitagopitadantakaṭṭhe
analyzed: tattha arakkhattā ati saṅghika bhāvena laddhe api rakkhita gopita danta kaṭṭhe

original: viya saṅghena katārakkhāyābhāvā. Yathāvuḍḍhamabhājetabbatoti saṅghikattassāpi sato
analyzed: viya saṅghena kata ārakkhāya abhāvā saṅghikattassa api sataḥ

original: yathāvuḍḍhaṃ paṭipāṭimanatikkamma bhājetabbaphalapupphādīnaṃ viya bhājetabbatābhāvato.
analyzed: yathāvuḍḍham paṭipāṭim an atikkamma bhājetabba phala puppha ādīnam viya bhājetabba tā abhāvataḥ

original: Sabbasādhāraṇattā cāti saṅghapariyāpannānaṃ sabbesameva sādhāraṇattā.
analyzed: sabba sādhāraṇa ttā ca ati saṅgha pariyāpannānam sabbesam eva sādhāraṇa ttā

original: Idanti saṅghassa niyyāditadantakaṭṭhaṃ. Aññaṃ viyāti aññaṃ gaṇapuggalādisantakaṃ
analyzed: idam ti saṅghassa niyyādita danta kaṭṭham aññam viyāti aññam gaṇa puggala ādi santakam

original: rakkhitagopitadantakaṭṭhaṃ viya. Evaṃ corikāya gaṇhato avahārābhāve kāraṇena sādhitepi
analyzed: rakkhita gopita danta kaṭṭham viya evam corikāya gaṇhataḥ avahāra abhāve kāraṇena sādhite api

original: theyyacittena sakaparikkhārampi gaṇhato dukkaṭassa vuttattā tathā gaṇhanto dukkaṭā
analyzed: theyya cittena saka parikkhāram pi gaṇhataḥ dukkaṭassa vuttattā tathā gaṇhantaḥ dukkaṭā

original: na muccatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vattaṃ pana jānitabbaṃ – saṅghikadantakaṭṭhaṃ gaṇhantena
analyzed: na muccati iti daṭṭhabbam vattam pana jānitabbam saṅghika danta kaṭṭham gaṇhantena

original: padhānagharādīsu pavisitvā cirena osarantena bahi vītināmetabbadivase gaṇetvā taṃpamāṇena
analyzed: padhāna ghara ādīsu pavisitvā cirena osarantena bahi gaṇetvā taṃpamāṇena

original: gahetabbaṃ, maggaṃ gacchantena ekaṃ dve dantakaṭṭhāni thavikāya pakkhipitvā gantabbaṃ,
analyzed: gahetabbam maggam gacchantena ekam dve dantakaṭṭhāni thavikāya pakkhipitvā gantabbam

original: tattheva vasantena divase khāditabbadantakaṭṭhaṃ gahetabbanti.
analyzed: tattha iva vasantena divase khāditabba danta kaṭṭham gahetabbanti

original: Dantakaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā.
184. “Aggiṃ vā detī”tiādīsu “rukkhe”ti pakaraṇato labbhati “rukkho vinassatī”ti vakkhamānattā,
analyzed: aggim vā deti iti ādīsu rukkha iti pakaraṇataḥ labbhati rukkhaḥ vinassati iti

original: rukkho ca “vanappati nāma yo manussānaṃ pariggahito hoti rukkho paribhogo”ti pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: rukkhaḥ ca vanappati nāma yaḥ manussānam pariggahitaḥ hoti rukkhaḥ paribhogaḥ ti pāḷiyam

original: āgatattā ca aṭṭhakathāya ca vuttanayena ambalabujapanasādiko manussānaṃ paribhogāraho
analyzed: āgata ttā ca aṭṭhakathāya ca vutta nayena ambala buja panasa ādikaḥ manussānam paribhoga arahaḥ

original: manussāyatto rakkhitagopitoyeva gahetabbo. Aggiṃ vā detīti corikāya aggiṃ ālimpeti
analyzed: manussa āyattaḥ rakkhita gopitaḥ yā iva gahetabbaḥ aggim vā deti iti corikāya aggim ālimpeti

original: vā. Satthena rukkhe samantato ākoṭetīti vāsipharasuādisatthena rukkhatacaṃ chindanto
analyzed: vā satthena rukkhe samantataḥ ākoṭeti iti vā asi pharasu ādi satthena rukkha tacam chindantaḥ

original: samantato āvāṭaṃ dasseti. Maṇḍūkakaṇṭakanāmakaṃ visaṃ vā rukkhe ākoṭetīti corikāya
analyzed: samantataḥ āvāṭam dasseti maṇḍūkakaṇṭaka nāmakam visam vā rukkhe ākoṭeti iti corikāya

original: rukkhaṃ nāsetukāmo rukkhe maṇḍūkakaṇṭakanāmakaṃ visaṃ paveseti.
analyzed: rukkham nāsetu kāmaḥ rukkhe maṇḍūkakaṇṭaka nāmakam visam paveseti

original: 185. Yena vā tena vāti yathāvuttena vā avuttena vā yena kenaci upāyena. Rukkho vinassatīti
analyzed: yena vā tena vā ati yathāvuttena vā avuttena vā yena kenacid upāyena rukkhaḥ vinassati iti

original: aggiṃ datvā jhāpito dhaññakalāpo viya, telakumbhī viya ca vināva ṭhānācāvanena yathāṭṭhitamevanassati.
analyzed: aggim da tvā jhāpitaḥ dhañña kalāpaḥ viya tela kumbhī viya ca vinā āva ṭhāna ācāvanena

original: “Ḍayhatī”ti idaṃ “aggiṃ detī”ti idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vinassatīti maṇḍūkakaṇṭakākoṭanādiavasesapayogaṃ
analyzed: ḍayhati iti idam aggim deti iti idam sandhāya vuttam vinassati iti maṇḍūka kaṇṭaka ākoṭana ādi avasesa payogam

original: sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ “theyyacitto chindati, pahāre pahāre āpatti dukkaṭassa,
analyzed: sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbam theyya cittaḥ chindati pahāre pahāre āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: ekaṃ pahāraṃ anāgate āpatti thullaccayassa, tasmiṃ pahāre āgate āpatti pārājikassā”ti
analyzed: ekam pahāram anāgate āpatti thullaccayassa tasmin pahāre āgate āpatti pārājikassa ati

original: ṭhānācāvanena pārājikassa āgatattā. Pakāsitanti ettha “aṭṭhakathāya”nti labbhati.
analyzed: ṭhāna ācāvanena pārājikassa āgata ttā pakāsitanti ettha aṭṭhakathāyanti labbhati

original: Pāṭhāgataṃ pārājikaṃ pana pārisesato ca sūcīyatīti tabbācakassa vā saṅgāhakassa vā
analyzed: pāṭhāgatam pārājikam pana pārisesato ca sūcīyati iti tad bācakassa vā saṅgāhakassa vā

original: vacanassa ihāvijjamānattā tattha vinicchayo pāsaṃsikopi ihāvutto.
analyzed: vacanassa iha āvijjamāna ttā tattha vinicchayo pāsaṃsikaḥ api iha āvutto

original: Vanappatikathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: vanappati kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 186-7. “Haraṇakaṃ nāma aññassa haraṇakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ. Theyyacitto āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: haraṇakam nāma aññassa haraṇakam bhaṇḍam theyya cittaḥ āmasati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Phandāpeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassā”ti vuttaharaṇakaniddese
analyzed: phandāpeti āpatti thullaccayassa ṭhānā cāveti āpatti pārājikassa ati vutta haraṇaka niddese

original: “ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassā”ti pāṭhe “ṭhāna”nti gahitasīsādiṭṭhānappabhedavasena
analyzed: ṭhānā āpatti pārājikassa ati pāṭhe ṭhānam ti gahita sīsa ādi ṭṭhāna ppabheda vasena

original: aṭṭhakathāya āgatavinicchayaṃ dassetumāha “chinditvā mocetvā gaṇhato”ti. Kiriyānaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyaḥ āgata vinicchayam dassetum āha chinditvā mocetvā gaṇhato ti

original: sakammakattā “alaṅkāra”nti pāṭhaseso. Chinditvāti gīveyyakādiṃ. Mocetvāti kaṇṇapiḷandhanādiṃ.
analyzed: sa kamma kattā alaṅkāranti chinditvā ati gīveyyaka ādim mocetvā ati kaṇṇa piḷandhana ādim

original: Sīsādīhi mocitamattasminti etthāpi visesitabbadassanatthaṃ “alaṅkārasmi”nti tameva
analyzed: sīsa ādīhi mocita mattasmin ti ettha api visesitabba dassana attham alaṅkārasmin ti tam eva

original: bhummekavacanantavasena gahetabbaṃ. Ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhananti ettha abhimukhaṃ kaḍḍhanaṃ
analyzed: bhumma ekavacana anta vasena gahetabbam ākaḍḍhana vikaḍḍhananti ettha abhimukham kaḍḍhanam

original: ākaḍḍhananti katvā attano samīpamāviñchanaṃ ākaḍḍhanaṃ, viparītaṃ kaḍḍhanaṃ vikaḍḍhananti
analyzed: ākaḍḍhananti katvā samīpam āviñchanam ākaḍḍhanam viparītam kaḍḍhanam vikaḍḍhananti

original: katvā tabbiparītaṃ vikaḍḍhanaṃ.
analyzed: katvā tad biparītam vikaḍḍhanam

original: 188-9. Valayanti avaṅkaṃ maṭṭhahatthūpagaṃ. Kaṭakampi vāti anekavaṅke yojetvā bubbuḷādīni
analyzed: valayanti avaṅkam maṭṭha hatthu upagam kaṭakam pi vā ti aneka vaṅke yojetvā bubbuḷa ādīni

original: dassetvā vā adassetvā vā kataṃ hatthūpagaṃ. Aggabāhunti kapparato paṭṭhāya aggahatthaṃ.
analyzed: dassetvā vā a dassetvā vā katam hattha upagam agga bāhum ti kappa rataḥ paṭṭhāya agga hattham

original: Aparāparaṃ cāretīti ito cito ca sañcāreti. “Sāretī”ti vā pāṭho, soyeva attho. Taṃ
analyzed: apara aparam cāreti iti itas citas ca sañcāreti sāreti iti vā pāṭhaḥ taṃ

original: valayaṃ vā kaṭakaṃ vā. Ākāsagataṃ karotīti sabbadisāhi yathā hatthaṃ na phusati,
analyzed: valayam vā kaṭakam vā ākāsa gatam karoti iti sabba disāhi yathā hattham na phusati

original: tathā ākāsagataṃ karoti. Nidhivalayassa pavesitarukkhamūle sabbadisāhi aphusantaṃ
analyzed: tathā ākāsa gatam karoti nidhi valayassa pavesita rukkha mūle sabba disāhi a phusantam

original: ākāsagatakaraṇe pārājikaṃ hoti, idha “rakkhatī”ti kasmā vuttanti āha “saviññāṇakato”tiādi.
analyzed: ākāsa gata karaṇe pārājikam hoti idha rakkhati iti kasmā vuttan ti āha sa viññāṇakato tiādi

original: Idanti valayaṃ kaṭakañca.
analyzed: idanti valayam kaṭakam ca

original: 190. “Nivatthaṃ vattha”nti iminā cīvarampi gayhati. Parassa vatthasāmikassa. Paropīti
analyzed: nivattham vatthanti iminā cīvaram pi gayhati parassa vattha sāmikassa paraḥ api iti

original: vatthasāmikopi. Tanti corena acchijjamānaṃ attanā nivatthavatthaṃ. Lajjāya sahasā
analyzed: vattha sāmikaḥ upi tanti corena a chijjamānam attanā nivattha vattham lajjāya sahasā

original: na muñcatīti lajjāya sīghataraṃ na pariccajati.
analyzed: na muñcati iti lajjāya sīghataram na pariccajati

original: 191. Coropi ākaḍḍhati, so paropi ākaḍḍhatīti yojanā. So paro corato añño, vatthasāmikoti attho. Parassāti vatthasāmikassa.
analyzed: coraḥ api ākaḍḍhati saḥ paraḥ api ākaḍḍhati iti yojanā saḥ paraḥ corataḥ aññaḥ vattha sāmiko ti attho parassa ati vattha sāmikassa

original: 192. “Ṭhānā cāveyyā”ti pāṭhe ṭhāna-saddena saṅgahitasīsādiṭṭhānato harīyateti haraṇakanti
analyzed: ṭhānā cāveyyā iti pāṭhe ṭhāna saddena saṅgahita sīsa ādi ṭṭhānataḥ harīyate iti haraṇakam ti

original: vuttālaṅkārādibhaṇḍassa cāvanena pārājikaṃ dassetvā idāni tadeva haraṇakaṃ hārakena
analyzed: vutta alaṅkāra ādi bhaṇḍassa cāvanena pārājikam dassetvā idāni tat eva haraṇakam hārakena

original: saha harantassa hārakassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato apanayanena ṭhānācāvanañca “ṭhānā cāveyyā”ti
analyzed: saha harantassa hārakassa ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ apanayanena ṭhānācāvanañca ṭhānā cāveyya ati

original: imināva saṅgayhatīti tatthāpi vinicchayaṃ dassetumāha “sabhaṇḍahāraka”ntiādi. Bhaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: iminā ava saṅgayhati iti tattha api vinicchayam dassetum āha bhaṇḍam

original: harati netīti bhaṇḍahārako, purisādiko, tena sahāti sabhaṇḍahārakaṃ, alaṅkāravatthādīni
analyzed: harati na iti iti bhaṇḍa hārakaḥ purisa ādiko tena saha ati sa bhaṇḍa hārakam alaṅkāra vattha ādīni

original: ādāya gacchantehi itthipurisādipāṇehi saheva. Bhaṇḍanti tehi hariyamānattā haraṇakasaṅkhātavatthābharaṇādibhaṇḍaṃ.
analyzed: ādāya gacchantehi itthi purisa ādi pāṇehi saha iva bhaṇḍanti tehi hariyamānattā haraṇaka saṅkhāta vattha ābharaṇa ādi bhaṇḍam

original: Nentassāti “nento assā”ti padacchedo. Nentoti ṭhitaṭṭhānato cāvetvā attanā icchitadisābhimukhaṃ
analyzed: nentassa ati nentaḥ assa ati padacchedaḥ nentaḥ ati ṭhita ṭhānato cāvetvā attanā icchita disa abhimukham

original: pāpento. Assa paṭhame pāde atikkante thullaccayaṃ āpajjitvāti pāṭhasesayojanā. Assāti
analyzed: pāpentaḥ assa paṭhame pāde atikkante thullaccayam āpajjitvā ati pāṭha sesa yojanā assa ati

original: imassa bhaṇḍahārakassa. Paṭhamapāde atikkante attanā paṭhamaṃ gantabbadisato corassābhimatadisaṃ
analyzed: imassa bhaṇḍa hārakassa paṭhama pāde atikkante attanā paṭhamam gantabba disataḥ corassa abhimata disam

original: gate thullaccayaṃ āpajjitvā dutiye atikkante cuto siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: gate thullaccayam āpajjitvā dutiye atikkante cutaḥ siyā iti yojanā

original: 193. Theyyacetano sace tajjetvā parassa hatthato bhaṇḍaṃ pātāpeti, parassa hatthato
analyzed: theyya cetano sace tat jetvā parassa hatthataḥ bhaṇḍam pātā apeti parassa hatthataḥ

original: bhaṇḍe muttamatte tajjetvā pātāpakassa parājayoti yojanā. Bhaṇḍe muttamatteti bhaṇḍe
analyzed: bhaṇḍe mutta matte tat jetvā pātāpakassa yojanā bhaṇḍe mutta mattā iti bhaṇḍe

original: hatthato kesaggamattampi muttakkhaṇe.
analyzed: hatthataḥ kesagga mattam pi mutta kkhaṇe

original: 194. Athāpīti atha vā. Parikappetvā pātāpeti vāti ettha “yaṃ mayhaṃ ruccati, taṃ
analyzed: atha api iti atha vā parikappetvā vā ati ettha yam mayham ruccati tam

original: gaṇhissāmī”ti vā “evarūpaṃ ce hoti, gaṇhissāmī”ti visesetvā vā parikappetvā tajjetvā
analyzed: gaṇhissāmi iti vā evarūpam ce hoti gaṇhissāmi iti visesetvā vā parikappetvā tajjetvā

original: pāteti, dukkaṭaṃ. Evaṃ pātitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ tassa corassa āmasane dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti yojanā.
analyzed: pātā iti dukkaṭam evam pātitam bhaṇḍam tassa corassa āmasane dukkaṭam vuttan ti yojanā

original: 195. Yathāvatthunti bhaṇḍassa agghānurūpaṃ, thullaccayaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. Chaḍḍitepīti
analyzed: yathāvatthum ti bhaṇḍassa aggha anurūpam thullaccayam hoti iti adhippāyaḥ chaḍḍite pi iti

original: tassa corabhāvaṃ jānitvā bhītatasitena attanā nīyamāne bhaṇḍe chaḍḍitepi sati. Teneva
analyzed: tassa cora bhāvam jānitvā bhīta tasitena attanā nīyamāne bhaṇḍe chaḍḍite api sati tena iva

original: ṭhānācāvanaṃ kārāpitanti pārājikanti na gahetabbanti āha “na doso”ti. “Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā”ti
analyzed: ṭhāna ācāvanam kārāpitanti pārājikanti na gahetabbanti āha na doso ti tiṭṭha tiṭṭha ati

original: vutte pana uttasitvā chaḍḍanaṃ tassa āṇattiyā vinā hotīti tattha tassa anāpattīti
analyzed: vutte pana uttasitvā chaḍḍanam tassa āṇattiyā vinā hoti iti tattha tassa anāpatti iti

original: adhippāyo. Tathā vadato pana adinnādānapubbapayogattā dukkaṭameva.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ tathā vadataḥ pana adinnādāna pubba payoga ttā dukkaṭam eva

original: 196. Tanti taṃ chaḍḍitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ. Taduddhāreti tassa chaḍḍitassa bhaṇḍassa uddhāre
analyzed: tam ti tam chaḍḍitam bhaṇḍam tad uddhāra iti tassa chaḍḍitassa bhaṇḍassa uddhāre

original: pārājikaṃ. Pārājikaṃ kadā siyāti āha “sāmike sālaye gate”ti. Nirālayaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ
analyzed: pārājikam pārājikam kadā siyāt iti āha sāmike sa ālaye gatā iti nirālayam chaḍḍitam

original: pana gaṇhato asati theyyacitte na dosoti byatirekato dasseti.
analyzed: pana gaṇhataḥ asati theyya citte na doso ti byatirekataḥ dasseti

original: 197. Sāmikassa sālayakāle gaṇhantassāpi pārājikābhāvappakāraṃ dassetumāha “gaṇhato”ti.
analyzed: sāmikassa sa ālaya kāle gaṇhantassa api pārājika abhāva ppakāram dassetum āha gaṇhataḥ ti

original: Pubbagāthāya “ta”nti idhānuvattate. Sakasaññāyagaṇhatoti “tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā”ti vacanato
analyzed: pubba gāthāya tat ti idha anuvattate saka saññāya gaṇhato ti tiṭṭha tiṭṭha ati vacanataḥ

original: uttasitvā sālayaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ taṃ vatthuṃ sakasaññāya gaṇhantassa. Gahaṇeti sakasaññāya
analyzed: uttasitvā sa ālayam chaḍḍitam tam vatthum saka saññāya gaṇhantassa gahaṇeti saka saññāya

original: gahaṇahetu, sakasaññāya gahitabhaṇḍaṃ attano gahaṇakāraṇā bhikkhuṃ avahārāpattito
analyzed: gahaṇa hetu saka saññāya gahita bhaṇḍam attanaḥ gahaṇa kāraṇā bhikkhum avahāra āpattitaḥ

original: rakkhatīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “gahaṇe pana rakkhatī”ti. Bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: rakkhati iti adhippāyaḥ tena āha gahaṇe pana rakkhati iti bhaṇḍa deyyam pana hoti iti yojanā

original: “Tathā”ti iminā gahaṇe rakkhatīti atidisati.
analyzed: tathā iti iminā gahaṇe rakkhati iti atidisati

original: 198-9. Dhuranikkhepaṃ katvāti “mayhaṃ kimetena bhaṇḍena, jīvitarakkhanameva varatara”nti
analyzed: dhura nikkhepam katvā ati mayham kim etena bhaṇḍena jīvita rakkhanam eva varataranti

original: nirālayo hutvā. Tenāha “bhīto corā palāyatī”ti. Corāti ettha ca hetumhi nissakkaṃ.
analyzed: nirālayaḥ hutvā tena āha bhīto corā palāyati iti corā ti ettha ca hetumhi nissakkam

original: Gaṇhatoti ettha “ta”nti pāṭhaseso, tathā chaḍḍitaṃ taṃ bhaṇḍanti attho. Uddhāre dukkaṭanti
analyzed: gaṇhatoti ettha tanti pāṭha seso tathā chaḍḍitam tam bhaṇḍanti attho uddhāre dukkaṭa nti

original: vatthumhi anavajjepi theyyacittavasena dukkaṭaṃ hoti, asati theyyacitte dukkaṭampi
analyzed: vatthumhi anavajje pi theyya citta vasena dukkaṭam hoti asati theyya citte dukkaṭam pi

original: na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Āharāpenteti ettha bhāvalakkhaṇe bhummaṃ, tasmiṃ bhaṇḍasāmini
analyzed: na hoti iti vuttam hoti āhara apenta iti ettha bhāva lakkhaṇe bhummam tasmim bhaṇḍa sāmini

original: āharāpente satīti attho.
analyzed: āhara apente sati iti attho

original: 200. Nirālayena chaḍḍitavatthuno gahaṇe bhaṇḍadeyyañca adentassa parājayo ca kasmāti āha “tassā”tiādi. Aññāsūti mahāpaccariyādīsu itarāsu aṭṭhakathāsu.
analyzed: nirālayena chaḍḍita vatthuno gahaṇe bhaṇḍa deyyam ca a dentassa parājayaḥ ca kasmā iti āha tassa atiādi aññāsu iti mahāpaccariya ādīsu itarāsu aṭṭhakathāsu

original: Haraṇakakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: haraṇaka kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 201. Upanidhikathāya “na gaṇhāmī”ti sampajānamusāvādaṃ bhāsatoti yojanā. Yena kenaci
analyzed: upanidhi kathāya na gaṇhāmi iti yojanā yena kenacid

original: rahasi “idaṃ mayhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā dehī”ti niyyāditaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ pacchā sāmikena
analyzed: rahasi idam bhaṇḍam paṭisāmetvā dehi iti niyyāditam bhaṇḍam pacchā sāmikena

original: “dehi me taṃ bhaṇḍa”nti vutte accantamupagantuṃ “nāhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti sampajānamusāvādaṃ
analyzed: dehi me tam bhaṇḍanti vutte accantam upagantum na aham gaṇhāmi iti sampajāna musāvādam

original: bhāsatoti attho. Gaṇhāmīti aggahesiṃ. Accantā heso atīte vattamānappayogoyaṃ. “Sampajānamusāvāde
analyzed: bhāsato ti atthaḥ gaṇhāmi iti aggahesim accantā hesaḥ atīte vattamāna ppayogo yam sampajāna musāvāde

original: pācittiya”nti imassa sikkhāpadassa visaye kasmā dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti āha “adinnādānapubbakattā”tiādi.
analyzed: pācittiyam ti imassa sikkhāpadassa visaye kasmā dukkaṭam vuttan ti āha adinnādāna pubbaka ttā tiādi

original: Tattha adinnādānapubbakattāti adinnādānassa sahapayogavasena pubbaṅgamattā, na pubbapayogattā.
analyzed: tattha adinnādāna pubbaka ttā ati adinnādānassa sahapayoga vasena pubbaṅgama ttā na pubba payoga ttā

original: Na hi adinnādānassa pubbapayoge pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭamatthīti. Tenevāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: na hi adinnādānassa pubba payoge pācittiya ṭṭhāne dukkaṭam atthi iti tena iva āha aṭṭhakathāyam

original: “adinnādānassa payogattā”ti.
analyzed: a dinna ādānassa payoga ttā iti

original: 202. Etassāti etassa samīpe. Kiṃ nu dassatīti dassati kiṃ nu. Vimatuppādeti hetumhi bhummaṃ. Tassāti yassa bhikkhuno santike upanikkhittaṃ, tassa.
analyzed: etassa ati etassa samīpe kim nu dassati iti dassati kim nu vimati uppāde ti hetumhi bhummam tassa ati yassa bhikkhuno santike upanikkhittam tassa

original: 203. Tasminti yasmiṃ upanikkhittaṃ, tasmiṃ bhikkhumhi. Dāne nirussāheti attani nikkhittassa
analyzed: tasmin ti yasmin upanikkhittam tasmin bhikkhumhi dāne nirussāhe iti attani nikkhittassa

original: bhaṇḍassa sāmikassa dānavisaye ussāharahite sati, “na dāni taṃ dassāmī”ti dhuranikkhepe
analyzed: bhaṇḍassa sāmikassa dāna visaye ussāha rahite sati na dāni tam dassāmi iti dhura nikkhepe

original: kateti adhippāyo. Tenevāha “ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepe”ti. Paroti bhaṇḍasāmiko. Dhuranti
analyzed: katā iti adhippāyaḥ tena iva āha ubhinnam dhura nikkhepe iti bhaṇḍa sāmikaḥ dhuranti

original: “yena kenaci ākārena gaṇhissāmī”ti ussāhaṃ. Nikkhipeti nikkhipeyya.
analyzed: yena kenacid ākārena gaṇhissāmi iti ussāham nikkhipeti nikkhipeyya

original: 204. Cittenādātukāmovāti ettha “yo tassā”ti pāṭhaseso. Ceti api-saddatthe. Yo coro
analyzed: cittena ādātu kāmaḥ vā ati ettha yaḥ tassa ati pāṭha sesaḥ ca iti apisadda tthe yaḥ coro

original: cittena adātukāmova, tassa corassa “dassāmī”ti mukhena vadatopīti yojanā. Atha vā
analyzed: cittena a dātu kāmaḥ uva tassa corassa dassāmi iti mukhena vadataḥ api iti yojanā atha vā

original: adātukāmoti ettha “hutvā”ti pāṭhaseso. Ceti vuttattho. Evāti “parājayo”ti iminā yujjati.
analyzed: a dātu kāmaḥ iti ettha hutvā iti pāṭha sesaḥ ca iti vutta tthaḥ evā ti parājayaḥ iti iminā yujjati

original: Cittena adātukāmo hutvā mukhena “dassāmī”ti vadatopi sāmino dhuranikkhepe sati parājayo hotevāti yojanā.
analyzed: cittena a dātu kāmaḥ hutvā mukhena dassāmi iti vadataḥ api sāminaḥ dhura nikkhepe sati parājayaḥ hotā iva ati yojanā

original: Upanidhikathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: upanidhi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 205. Suṅkaghātassāti “suṅkaghātaṃ nāma raññā ṭhapitaṃ hoti pabbatakhaṇḍe vā nadītitthe
analyzed: suṅkaghātassa ati suṅkaghātam nāma raññā ṭhapitam hoti pabbata khaṇḍe vā nadī titthe

original: vā gāmadvāre vā”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatassa “suṅkaṃ tato hananti…pe… vināsentī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: vā gāma dvāre vāti pāḷiyam āgatassa suṅkam tatas vināsenti iti aṭṭhakathāyam

original: niruttassa “ito paṭṭhāya nīyamāne bhaṇḍe ettakato ettakaṃ rājabhāgaṃ gahetabba”nti
analyzed: niruttassa itas paṭṭhāya nīyamāne bhaṇḍe ettakataḥ ettakam rāja bhāgam gahetabbanti

original: rājādīhi taṃtaṃpadesasāmikehi niyamitassa pabbatakhaṇḍādiṭṭhānassa. Bahīti suṅkagahaṇatthāya
analyzed: rāja ādīhi taṃ taṃ padesa sāmikehi niyamitassa pabbata khaṇḍa ādi ṭṭhānassa bahi iti suṅka gahaṇa atthāya

original: parikappitasīmato bahi. Pātetīti ettha “theyyacitto”ti pakaraṇato labbhati. “Rājārahaṃ
analyzed: parikappita sīmataḥ bahi pāta iti iti ettha theyya citto ti pakaraṇataḥ labbhati

original: bhaṇḍa”nti pāṭhaseso. Yato kutoci bhaṇḍato pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā

original: agghanako bhāgo rājādidesasāmikassa dātabbo hoti, tādisaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ theyyacitto yathā
analyzed: agghanakaḥ bhāgaḥ rāja ādidesa sāmikassa dātabbaḥ hoti tādisam bhaṇḍam theyya cittaḥ yathā

original: bahi patati, evaṃ khipatīti attho. Dhuvaṃ patatīti etthāpi “ta”nti pāṭhaseso, “bhaṇḍa”nti
analyzed: bahi patati evam khipati iti atthaḥ dhuvam patati iti ettha api tanti pāṭha sesaḥ

original: pakaraṇato labbhati. Yathā khittaṃ taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ ekantena bahi patatīti. Hatthato muttamatte tasmiṃ bhaṇḍe.
analyzed: pakaraṇataḥ labbhati yathā khittam tam bhaṇḍam ekantena bahi patati iti hatthataḥ mutta matte tasmin bhaṇḍe

original: 206. “Dhuvaṃ patatī”ti ettha byatirekaṃ dassetumāha “taṃ rukkhe”tiādi. Tanti theyyāya
analyzed: dhuvam patati iti ettha byatirekam dassetum āha tam rukkha itiādi tanti theyyāya

original: bahi pātetuṃ khittaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ paṭihataṃ hutvāti yojanā. Vātakkhittampi vāti pāṭho
analyzed: bahi khittam bhaṇḍam paṭihatam hutvā iti yojanā vātakkhittam pi vā iti pāṭhaḥ

original: gahetabbo. “Vātakkhitto”ti liṅgavipallāso vā daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: gahetabbaḥ vāta khittaḥ ti liṅga vipallāsaḥ vā daṭṭhabbo

original: 207. Pacchāti patitaṭṭhāne thokaṃ cirāyitvā, iminā thokampi cirāyitamatte payogasādhiyaṃ kāriyaṃ siddhamevāti pārājikassa kāraṇaṃ sampannamevāti dasseti. Tenāha “pārājikaṃ siyā”ti.
analyzed: pacchā ati patita ṭṭhāne thokam cirāyitvā iminā thokam pi cirāyita matte payoga sādhiyam kāriyam siddham eva ati pārājikassa kāraṇam sampannam eva ati dasseti tena āha pārājikam siyā iti

original: 208. “Ṭhatvā”tiādinā patitaṭṭhāne acirāyitvā gatepi tasmiṃ bahi patitaṭṭhānato itaratrāpi
analyzed: patita ṭṭhāne tasmin bahi itaratra api

original: cirāyitena bahi pātanappayogena sādhiyaṃ kāriyaṃ siddhamevāti pārājikakāraṇassa siddhataṃ

original: dasseti. Tenevāha “parājayo”ti. “Atiṭṭhamāna”ntiādinā yattha katthaci acirāyanena
analyzed: dassa iti tena iva āha atiṭṭhamāna nti ādinā yattha katthaci acirāyanena

original: payogassa niratthakataṃ dasseti. Tenevāha “rakkhatī”ti.
analyzed: payogassa niratthaka tam dasseti tena iva āha rakkhati iti

original: 209. Tanti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ.
analyzed: tanti aṭṭhakathā vacanam

original: 210. Sayaṃ vā vaṭṭetīti anto ṭhito sayaṃ vā hatthena vā pādena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahisīmāya
analyzed: sayam vā vaṭṭeti iti antaḥ ṭhitaḥ sayam vā hatthena vā pādena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi sīmāya

original: ninnaṭṭhānaṃ parivaṭṭeti. Aṭṭhatvāti pavaṭṭitamatte anto katthacipi aṭṭhatvā. Vaṭṭamānanti
analyzed: ninna ṭṭhānam parivaṭṭeti a ṭṭhatvā iti pavaṭṭita matte antar katthacipi a ṭṭhatvā vaṭṭamānanti

original: pavaṭṭantaṃ. Gatanti bahisīmaṃ kesaggamattaṭṭhānampi antosīmamatikkamamattaṃ.
analyzed: pavaṭṭantam bahi sīmam kesagga matta ṭṭhānam pi anto sīmam atikkama mattam

original: 211. Taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sace anto ṭhatvā ṭhatvā bahi gacchatīti yojanā. Yadi antosīmāya
analyzed: tam bhaṇḍam sace antar ṭhatvā ṭhatvā bahi gacchati iti yojanā yadi

original: ṭhatvā ṭhatvā bahisīmaṃ gacchatīti attho. Rakkhatīti antosīmāya paṭhamagatinivattaneneva
analyzed: ṭhatvā ṭhatvā bahi sīmam gacchati iti attho rakkhati iti antosīmāya paṭhama gati nivattanena iva

original: etassa bhikkhuno payogavegassa nivattattā, tato upari nivattanārahakāraṇassa aladdhabhāvena
analyzed: etassa bhikkhuno payoga vegassa nivattattā tatas upari nivattana āraha kāraṇassa a laddha bhāvena

original: attanā ca gatattā tathā bahisīmappattaṃ taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ taṃmūlakapayojakaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpattiyā

original: rakkhatīti adhippāyo. Suddhacittena ṭhapiteti “evaṃ ṭhapite vaṭṭitvā gamissatī”ti
analyzed: rakkhati iti adhippāyaḥ suddha cittena ṭhapitā iti evam ṭhapite vaṭṭitvā gamissati iti

analyzed: theyya cittena vinā kevalam ṭhapessāmi iti cittena bahi sīmā abhimukham ninna ṭhānam

original: otāretvā ṭhapite. Sayaṃ vaṭṭatīti bhaṇḍaṃ sayameva ninnaṭṭhānaṃ ninnaṃ hutvā bahisīmaṃ

analyzed: ce pavaṭṭantam gacchati vaṭṭati iti āpattiyāḥ a karaṇataḥ vaṭṭati

original: 212. Gacchanteti corassa payogaṃ vinā attanāva gacchante. Tanti rājadeyyapañcamāsakaatirekapañcamāsakamattaṃ
analyzed: gacchantā iti corassa payogam vinā gacchante rāja deyya pañca māsaka atireka pañca māsakam attam

analyzed: suṅkavantam bhaṇḍam yojanā kevalam theyya cittassa āpattiyā

original: anaṅgabhāvato, yānādipayojakakāyavacīpayogassa abhāvato, bhaṇḍaṭṭhapitayānādino attanāva
analyzed: anaṅga bhāvataḥ yāna ādi payojaka kāya vacī payogassa abhāvataḥ bhaṇḍa ṭṭhapita yāna ādinaḥ

analyzed: bahi sīma ppatta ttā tena iva bhaṇḍassa api gata ttā ca bhikkhuno avahāraḥ natthi iti attho

original: 213. Payogena vināti corassa sakapayogamantarena. Avahāro na vijjatīti ettha yutti vuttanayāva.
analyzed: payogena vinā ati corassa saka payogam antarena avahāraḥ na vijjati iti ettha

original: 214. Maṇinti pādārahaṃ suṅkadātabbamaṇiratanaṃ, eteneva upalakkhaṇapadattā yaṃkiñci

original: suṅkaggahaṇassa niyamitaṭṭhānātikkamane.
analyzed: suṅka ggahaṇassa niyamita ṭṭhāna atikkamane

original: 215. Matanti “ettakabhaṇḍato ettakaṃ gahetabba”nti rājūhi anumataṃ. Seso kathāmaggoti

original: “Kammaṭṭhānaṃ citte katvā;
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam citte katvā

original: Cintento aññavihito;

original: Suṅkaṭṭhānaṃ patvā gacche;
analyzed: suṅka ṭṭhānam patvā gacche

original: Bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hotevassā”ti. –
analyzed: bhaṇḍa deyyam

original: Ādinā nayena vuccamānasadisoyeva. Teneva gatatthatāya idāni na vicārīyatīti adhippāyo.

original: Suṅkaghātakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: suṅka ghāta kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: pāṇaḥ nāma manussa pāṇaḥ vuccati iti ca tam pi bhujissam harantassa avahāro

original: kīto dhanakkīto, taṃ vā. Dinnaṃ vā pana kenacīti mātulaayyakādīsu yena kenaci dāsaṃ

original: katvā dinnaṃ vā. Dāsanti paccekaṃ sambandhanīyaṃ. Karamarānītaṃ vā dāsanti paravisayaṃ
analyzed: katvā dinnam vā dāsanti paccekam sambandhanīyam karamara ānītam vā dāsanti para visayam

original: ettha “corikāya harissāmī”ti āmasane dukkaṭaṃ, phandāpane thullaccayaṃ āpajjitvā
analyzed: ettha corikāya harissāmi iti āmasane dukkaṭam phandāpane thullaccayam āpajjitvā

original: ṭhitaṭṭhānato kesaggamattampi atikkāmayato pārājikaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ kesagga mattam pi atikkāmayataḥ pārājikam hoti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 217. Bhujissaṃ vāti yassa kassaci manussassa adāsabhūtaṃ. Mānusanti manussajātikaṃ sattaṃ. Āṭhapitanti upanikkhittaṃ.
analyzed: bhujissam vāti yassa kassaci manussassa a dāsa bhūtam mānusanti manussa jātikam sattam āṭhapitanti upanikkhittam

original: 218. Tanti antojātādīsu dāsesu yaṃ kañci dāsaṃ. Palāyitukāmovāti palāpetukāmo nīharitukāmo.
analyzed: antojāta ādīsu dāsesu yam kañcid dāsam palāyitu kāmaḥ uvāti palāpetu kāmaḥ nīharitu kāmaḥ

original: Atha vā taṃ dāsaṃ bhujehi ukkhipitvā ayaṃ palāyitukāmotipi attho gahetabbo. Bhujehīti
analyzed: atha vā tam dāsam bhujehi ukkhipitvā ayam palāyitu kāmaḥ iti pi atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ bhujehi iti

original: ubhohi hatthehi. Taṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānatoti tassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ taṃṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ, tato taṃṭhitaṭṭhānato,
analyzed: ubhohi hatthehi tam ṭhita ṭhānato ti tassa ṭhita ṭhānam tat ṭhita ṭhānam tatas tad ṭhita ṭhānato

original: corena attanā ṭhitaṭṭhānatoti attho na gahetabboti dassetumevaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñci saṅkāmetīti
analyzed: corena attanā ṭhita ṭṭhānato ti atthaḥ na gahetabbaḥ iti dassetum evam vuttam kiñci saṅkāmeti iti

original: kesaggamattampi tato aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpeti. Bhujehi vāti ettha vā-saddo vakkhamānapakārantarāpekkho,
analyzed: kesagga mattam pi tatas aññam ṭhānam pāpeti bhujehi vā ti ettha vā saddaḥ vakkhamāna pakāra antara apekkhaḥ

original: “saṅkāmeti vā”ti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: saṅkāmā iti vā ati yojetabbam

original: 219. Tajjetvāti bhayakarena vacanena lesena, iṅgitena vā tāsetvā nentassa tassāti
analyzed: tat jetvā ati bhaya karena vacanena lesena iṅgitena vā tāsetvā nentassa tassa ati

original: sambandho. Padavāratoti padavārena yuttā thullaccayādayo āpattiyo hontīti yojanā.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ pada vārato ti pada vārena yuttāḥ thullaccaya ādayaḥ āpattiyaḥ honti iti yojanā

original: Paṭhamapadavārayuttā thullaccayāpatti, dutiyapadavārayuttā pārājikāpatti hotīti attho.

original: 220. Hatthādīsūti ādi-saddena kesavatthādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tanti dāsaṃ. Kaḍḍhatopīti
analyzed: hattha ādīsu iti ādi saddena kesavattha ādim saṅgaṇhāti tanti dāsam kaḍḍhataḥ api iti

original: ākaḍḍhatopi. Parājayoti “padavārato”ti anuvattamānattā paṭhamapadavāre thullaccayaṃ,
analyzed: ākaḍḍhataḥ api parājayaḥ ti padavārataḥ ti paṭhama padavāre thullaccayam

original: dutiyapadavāre atikkante pārājikanti attho. Ayaṃ nayoti “padavārato yuttā thullaccayādayo
analyzed: dutiya pada vāre atikkante pārājikam ti atthaḥ ayam pada vārataḥ yuttā thullaccaya ādayaḥ

original: āpattiyo hontī”ti vuttanayo.
analyzed: āpattiyaḥ honti iti vutta nayaḥ

original: 221. Vegasāvāti vegeneva, corassa vacanena kātabbavisesarahitena balavagamanavegenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Iminā anāpattibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: vegasāvā ati vegena iva corassa vacanena kātabba visesa rahitena balava gamana vegena ati vuttam hoti iminā anāpatti bhāvassa kāraṇam dasseti

original: 222. Saṇikanti mandagatiyā. Vadatīti “gaccha, yāhi, palāyā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ katheti. Sopi cāti yo mandagatiyā gacchanto evaṃ vutto, sopi ca.
analyzed: saṇikam ti manda gatiyā vadati iti gaccha yāhi palāya ati ādikam vacanam kathā iti saḥ api ca ati yaḥ manda gatiyā gacchantaḥ evam vuttaḥ saḥ api ca

original: 223. Palāyitvāti sāmikaṃ pahāya gantvā. Aññanti sāmikāyattaṭṭhānato aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: palāyitvā iti sāmikam pahāya gantvā aññam ti sāmika āyatta ṭṭhānataḥ aññam ṭhānam

original: Sāpaṇaṃ vīthisannivesayuttaṃ nigamampi vā. Tatoti palāyitvā paviṭṭhagāmādito. Tanti
analyzed: sa āpaṇam vīthi sannivesa yuttam nigamam pi vā palāyitvā paviṭṭha gāma ādito

original: palāyitvā paviṭṭhaṃ taṃ dāsaṃ.
analyzed: palāyitvā paviṭṭham tam dāsam

original: Pāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: pāṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 224. Theyyāti theyyacittena. Sappakaraṇḍanti sappasayanapeḷaṃ. Yathāvatthunti thullaccayamāha. Ṭhānatoti sappapeḷāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato. Cāvaneti kesaggamattātikkame.
analyzed: theyyā ti theyya cittena sappa karaṇḍam ti sappa sayana peḷam yathāvatthum ti thullaccayam āha ṭhānataḥ ti sappa peḷāya ṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ ca āvaneti kesagga matta atikkame

original: 225. Karaṇḍanti sappapeḷaṃ. Ugghāṭetvāti vivaritvā. Karaṇḍatalatoti antopeḷāya talato. Naṅguṭṭheti naṅguṭṭhapariyante.
analyzed: karaṇḍam ti sappa peḷam ugghāṭetvā ati vivaritvā karaṇḍa talataḥ iti antopeḷāya talataḥ naṅguṭṭha iti naṅguṭṭha pariyante

original: 226. Ghaṃsitvāti peḷāpasse phusāpetvā. Sappakaraṇḍassa mukhavaṭṭitoti karaṇḍapuṭamukhavaṭṭito. Tassa naṅguṭṭhe muttamatteti yojanā.
analyzed: ghaṃsitvā iti peḷā passe phusāpetvā sappa karaṇḍassa mukha vaṭṭitaḥ ti karaṇḍa puṭa mukha vaṭṭitaḥ tassa naṅguṭṭhe yojanā

original: 227. Nāmatoti nāmena, nāmaṃ vatvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pakkosantassāti avhāyantassa. Tassāti pakkosakassa.
analyzed: nāmataḥ ti nāmena nāmam vatvā ati vuttam hoti pakkosantassa ati avhāyantassa tassa ati pakkosakassa

original: 228. Tathāti karaṇḍaṃ vivaritvā. Maṇḍūkamūsikānaṃ ravaṃ katvā nāmena pakkosantassāti yojanā. Vā-saddena lājāvikiraṇaaccharapahārādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: tathā ati karaṇḍam vivaritvā maṇḍūka mūsikānam ravam katvā nāmena pakkosantassa ati yojanā vā saddena lājā vikiraṇa acchara pahāra ādikam saṅgaṇhāti

original: 229. Mukhanti sappakaraṇḍassa mukhaṃ. Evameva ca karontassāti maṇḍūkasaññaṃ, mūsikasaññaṃ
analyzed: mukham ti sa pakaraṇḍassa mukham evam eva ca karontassa ati maṇḍūka saññam mūsika saññam

original: katvā vā lājā vikiritvā vā accharaṃ paharitvā vā nāmaṃ vatvā pakkosantassa. Yena
analyzed: katvā vā lājāḥ vikiritvā vā accharam paharitvā vā nāmam vatvā pakkosantassa yena

original: kenacīti vuttanīhārato yena vā tena vā.
analyzed: kenacid iti vutta nīhārataḥ yena vā tena vā

original: 230. Na pakkosati ceti yathāvuttanayena yojetvā nāmaṃ vatvā na pakkosati. Tassāti karaṇḍamukhavivarakassa bhikkhussa.
analyzed: na pakkosati ca iti yathā vutta nayena yojetvā nāmam vatvā na pakkosati tassa ati karaṇḍamukhavivarakassa bhikkhussa

original: Apadakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: apada kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 231. Hatthinti hatthimhi, bhummatthe eva upayogavacanaṃ.
analyzed: hatthinti hatthimhi bhummatthe eva upayogavacanam

original: 232. Sālāyanti hatthisālāyaṃ. Vasati etthāti vatthu, rājāgāraṃ, tassa anto antovatthu,
analyzed: sālāyanti hatthi sālāyam vasati ettha ati vatthu rājāgāram tassa antaḥ antovatthu

original: antorājagehanti attho. Aṅgaṇeti antorājaṅgaṇe. Pi-saddo “antonagare”ti avuttampi
analyzed: antar rāja geham ti atthaḥ aṅgaṇa iti antar rājaṅgaṇe pi saddaḥ antar nagara iti avuttam pi

original: sampiṇḍeti. Vatthu cāti ca-saddena aṅgaṇaṃ samuccinoti. Sakalaṃ aṅgaṇaṃ ṭhānanti
analyzed: sampiṇḍa iti vatthu ca ati ca saddena aṅgaṇam samuccinoti sakalam aṅgaṇam ṭhānam ti

original: hatthino vicaraṇayoggaṃ aṅgaṇaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha, sakalasālāti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: hatthinaḥ vicaraṇa yoggam aṅgaṇa ṭṭhānam sandhāya āha sakala sālā ati gahetabbam

original: 233. Abaddhassāti yathāvuttasālārājavatthaṅgaṇāpekkhāya vuttaṃ. Abaddhassa hi hatthino
analyzed: abaddhassa iti yathā vutta sālā rāja vattha aṅgaṇa apekkhāya vuttam abaddhassa hi hatthino

original: sakalasālādayo ṭhānaṃ, tadatikkame ṭhānācāvanaṃ hotīti attho. Hīti avadhāraṇe vā.
analyzed: sakala sāla ādayaḥ ṭhānam tad atikkame ṭhāna ācāvanam hoti iti atthaḥ hi iti avadhāraṇe vā

original: “Baddhassa hī”ti yojanāya visesatthova daṭṭhabbo, baddhassa panāti vuttaṃ hoti. Baddhassa
analyzed: baddhassa hi iti yojanāya visesa atthaḥ eva daṭṭhabbaḥ baddhassa pana iti vuttam hoti baddhassa

original: panāti sālādīsu sannihitassa pana. Ṭhitaṭṭhānañcāti sālādīsu ṭhitaṭṭhānañca, catūhi
analyzed: pana ati sāla ādīsu sannihitassa pana ṭhita ṭhānam ca ati sāla ādīsu ṭhita ṭhānam ca catūhi

original: pādehi akkantaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. Bandhanañcāti gīvāya vā pacchā pādadvayabandhanavalaye
analyzed: pādehi akkanta ṭṭhānan ti vuttam hoti bandhanam ca ati gīvāya vā pacchā pāda dvaya bandhana valaye

original: vā ubhayattha vā bandhanaṭṭhānañca. Tasmāti yasmā ṭhitaṭṭhānañca bandhanañca ṭhānanti
analyzed: vā ubhayattha vā bandhana ṭṭhānam ca tasmā iti yasmā ṭhita ṭṭhānam ca bandhanam ca ṭhānanti

original: cha vā pañca vā ṭhānāni labbhanti, tasmā. Tesaṃ ṭhānānaṃ. Kārayeti ettha “āpatti”nti
analyzed: cha vā pañca vā ṭhānāni labbhanti tasmā tesam kāraya iti ettha

original: sāmatthiyā labbhatīti. Haratoti hatthisālādito corikāya harantassa. Kārayeti āmasane
analyzed: sāmatthiyā labbhati iti harato ti hatthi sāla āditas corikāya harantassa kāraya iti āmasane

original: dukkaṭaṃ, ṭhānabhedagaṇanāya yāva pacchimaṭṭhānā purimesu thullaccayāni, antimaṭṭhānā
analyzed: dukkaṭam ṭhāna bheda gaṇanāya yāva pacchima ṭṭhānā purimesu thullaccayāni antima ṭṭhānā

original: kesaggamattampi cāvane pārājikaṃ kāreyyāti attho.
analyzed: kesagga mattam pi cāvane pārājikam kāreyya ati attho

original: 234. Ṭhitaṭṭhānanti catūhi pādehi akkantaṭṭhānaṃ, idañca abaddhahatthiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Baddhassa vinicchayo sālādīsu baddhassa vuttavinicchayasadisoti gatatthatāya na vutto.
analyzed: ṭhita ṭṭhānam ti catūhi pādehi akkanta ṭṭhānam idam ca abaddha hatthim sandhāya vuttam baddhassa vinicchayaḥ sāla ādīsu baddhassa vutta vinicchaya sadisaḥ ti gata ttha tāya na vuttaḥ

original: 235. Ekaṃ ṭhānanti sayitaṭṭhānamattaṃ. Tasminti gaje. Tassāti bhikkhussa. Turaṅgamahisādīsu dvipade ca bahuppade ca.
analyzed: ekam ṭhānam ti sayita ṭṭhāna mattam tasmin ti gaje tassa āti bhikkhussa turaṅga mahisa ādīsu dvipade ca bahuppade ca

original: 236. Eseva nayo ñeyyo, vattabbaṃ kiñcipi natthīti yojanā. Tattha turaṅgā assā. Mahisā
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ñeyyaḥ vattabbam kiñci pi natthi iti yojanā tattha turaṅgāḥ assāḥ mahisā

original: lulāyā. Ādi-saddena gogadrabhaoṭṭhādicatuppadānaṃ saṅgaho. Natthi kiñcipi vattabbanti
analyzed: ādi saddena go gadra bhaoṭṭha ādi catuppadānam saṅgahaḥ natthi kiñci pi vattabbanti

original: assasālārājāgāraṅgaṇabahinagarādīsu abandhitasayanaassādīnaṃ ṭhānabhedo yathāvuttasadisattā na vutto.
analyzed: assa sālā rāja āgāraṅgaṇa bahi nagara ādīsu abandhita sayana assa ādīnam ṭhāna bhedaḥ yathāvutta sadisa ttā na vuttaḥ

original: Bandhitvā ṭhapitaassassa pana sace so catūsu pādesu baddho hoti, bandhanānaṃ, khurānañca
analyzed: bandhitvā ṭhapita assassa pana sace so catūsu pādesu baddhaḥ hoti bandhanānam khurānam ca

original: gaṇanāya aṭṭha ṭhānāni, sace mukhe ca baddho hoti, nava ṭhānāni, mukheyeva baddho,
analyzed: gaṇanāya aṭṭha ṭhānāni sace mukhe ca baddhaḥ hoti nava ṭhānāni mukheya iva baddhaḥ

original: pañca ṭhānānīti ṭhānabhedo ca tatheva sasamigasūkarādicatuppadesu bandhitvā ṭhapitesu
analyzed: pañca ṭhānāni iti ca tathā iva sa sa miga sūkara ādi catuppadesu bandhitvā ṭhapitesu

original: baddhabaddhaṭṭhānehi saha catūhi pādehi akkantaṭṭhānavasena labbhamāno ṭhānabhedo
analyzed: baddha baddha ṭṭhānehi saha catūhi pādehi akkanta ṭṭhāna vasena labbhamānaḥ ṭhāna bhedaḥ

original: ca gomahisesu baddhesu evameva labbhamāno ṭhānabhedo ca vajādīsu padesesu pavesitesu
analyzed: ca go mahisesu baddhesu evam eva labbhamāno ṭhāna bhedo ca vaja ādīsu padesesu pavesitesu

original: dvāresu rukkhasūciyo apanetvā vā anapanetvā vā nāmaṃ vatvā vā avatvā vā pakkosantassa,
analyzed: dvāresu rukkha sūciyaḥ apanetvā vā an apanetvā vā nāmam vatvā vā a vatvā vā pakkosantassa

original: sākhābhaṅgatiṇādīni dassetvā pakkositvā vā apakkositvā vā palobhentassa tāsetvā nikkhamantassa
analyzed: sākhā bhaṅga tiṇa ādīni dassetvā pakkositvā vā a pakkositvā vā palobhentassa tāsetvā nikkhamantassa

original: sappakaraṇḍake sappassa vuttanayena labbhamāno viseso ca netabbo. Iha sabbattha ṭhānabhedesu
analyzed: sappa karaṇḍake sappassa vutta nayena labbhamānaḥ visesaḥ ca netabbaḥ iha sabbattha ṭhāna bhedesu

original: bahukesupi upantaṭṭhānesu thullaccayaṃ, antaṭṭhāne pārājikaṃ vuttasadisanti imassa
analyzed: bahukesu pi upanta ṭṭhānesu thullaccayam anta ṭṭhāne pārājikam vutta sadisanti imassa

original: sabbassa vinicchayassa “eseva nayo”ti imināva gatattā, āhaṭato aviññāyamānassa kassaci
analyzed: sabbassa vinicchayassa esā iva nayo ti iminā ava gata ttā āhaṭataḥ a viññāyamānassa kassaci

original: visesassābhāvā ca vuttaṃ “natthi kiñcipi vattabba”nti.
analyzed: visesassa abhāvā ca vuttam natthi kiñci pi vattabbanti

original: Dvipadepīti “dvipadaṃ nāma manussā pakkhajātā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttā manussā ca mayūrādilomapakkhā
analyzed: dvipade pi iti dvipadam nāma manussā pakkha jātā ati pāḷiyam vuttā manussā ca mayūra ādi loma pakkhā

original: ca vagguliādicammapakkhā ca bhamarādiaṭṭhipakkhā cāti evamādike satte ca. Bahuppadeti
analyzed: ca vagguli ādi camma pakkhā ca bhamara ādi aṭṭhi pakkhā ca ati evamādike satte ca bahuppadā iti

original: “bahuppadaṃ nāma vicchikā satapadī uccāliṅgapāṇakā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttabahuppadasatte cāti attho.
analyzed: bahuppadam nāma vicchikā satapadī uccāliṅgapāṇakā iti pāḷiyam vutta bahuppada satte ca ati attho

original: Ettāvatā pāpabhikkhūnaṃ lesokāsapidahanatthaṃ padabhājane vuttabhūmaṭṭhāditiṃsavinicchayamātikākathāsu
analyzed: ettāvatā pāpa bhikkhūnam lesa ukāsa pidahana attham pada bhājane vutta bhūma ṭṭha ādi tiṃsa vinicchaya mātikā kathāsu

original: pañcavīsati mātikākathā dassetvā avasiṭṭhāsu pañcamātikākathāsu saṃvidāvahāro, saṅketakammaṃ,

original: nimittakammanti mātikattayakathā paṭhamameva adinnādānavinicchayasambhārabhūtānaṃ
analyzed: paṭhamam eva

original: pañcavīsatiyā avahārānaṃ dassanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā –

original: “Pubbasahapayogo ca, saṃvidāharaṇampi ca;
analyzed: ca saṃvid āharaṇam pi ca

original: Saṅketakammaṃ nemittaṃ, pubbayogādipañcaka”nti. –
analyzed: saṅketa kammam nemittam pubba yoga ādi pañcakan ti

original: Iminā saṅgahitāti taṃ pahāya avasese ocarako, oṇirakkhakoti kathādvaye ocaraṇakakathāya

analyzed: āṇatti kappa yoga ttā tat ca oṇirakkhakena kariyamānam ṭhāna ācāvanam sāhatthikena vā

analyzed: āṇattikena vā payogena hoti iti tassa api sāhatthāṇattikaḥ ca iva ati sāhatthika pañcake

original: paṭhamameva saṅgahitattā ca thalaṭṭhavehāsaṭṭhakathādīsu saṅgahitattā ca tañca dvayaṃ
analyzed: paṭhamam eva saṅgahita ttā ca thala ṭṭha vehāsa ṭṭhakathā ādīsu saṅgahita ttā ca tat ca dvayam

original: na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: na vuttam iti veditabbam

analyzed: tattha ocarakaḥ nāma bhaṇḍam ocaritvā ācikkhati iti pāḷiyam vutto cora āpana puriso ocarakaḥ ti

analyzed: veditabbaḥ ocarati iti ocarako tattha tattha gantvā antar anupavisati iti vuttam hoti iti

original: “Oṇirakkho nāma āhaṭaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gopento”ti pāḷiyaṃ vutto muhuttaṃ attani ṭhapitassa
analyzed: oṇirakkhaḥ nāma āhaṭam bhaṇḍam gopento ti pāḷiyam vuttaḥ muhuttam attani ṭhapitassa

original: parabhaṇḍassa rakkhako “oṇirakkho”ti veditabbo. Oṇitaṃ rakkhatīti oṇirakkho, yo parena

analyzed: attanaḥ vasana ṭṭhāne ābhatam bhaṇḍam idam tāva bhante muhuttam oloketha yāva aham

original: Dvicatubahuppadakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: dvi catu bahu ppada kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: pañcahi ākārehi adinnam ādiyantassa āpatti pārājikassa ati ādinā nayena pāḷiyam

analyzed: pañcaṅga saṅgahaḥ veditabbo

original: 238. Ettāvatā tiṃsamātikākathāvinicchayaṃ saṅgahetvā idāni “anāpatti sasaññissa vissāsaggāhe
analyzed: ettāvatā tiṃsa mātikā kathā vinicchayam saṅgahetvā idāni anāpatti sa saññissa vissāsa ggāhe

original: tāvakālike petapariggahe tiracchānagatapariggahe paṃsukūlasaññissā”tiādinā nayena
analyzed: tāvakālike peta pariggahe tiracchānagata pariggahe paṃsukūla saññissa ati ādinā nayena

analyzed: pāḷiyam āgatam anāpatti vāram saṅga hetum āha anāpatti itiādi tattha sa saññissa ati parasantakam pi

original: “sasantaka”nti suddhasaññāya gaṇhantassa anāpattīti sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ gahitaṃ

original: 257. Yaṃ mātikāya niddiṭṭhaṃ satthaṃ, taṃ katamaṃ?. Sattamāraṇanti satte mārenti etenāti sattamāraṇaṃ, asiādivadhopakaraṇaṃ.

analyzed: vijjhananti usu ādīhi vijjhanam bhedanam ti kakaca ādīhi dvidhākaraṇam chedanam

original: khaggādīhi dvidhākaraṇaṃ. Tāḷananti muggarādīhi āghātanaṃ. Evamādividhoti evamādippakāro.
analyzed: khagga ādīhi dvidhākaraṇam tāḷanam ati muggara ādīhi āghātanam evamādi vidhaḥ ti evamādi ppakāro

original: Anekoti bahuko bhedo. Karaṇassa viseso kiriyāvisesoti attho.

analyzed: dassito puratope mārita iti āṇatti visaṅketaḥ dassitaḥ mūlaṭṭho ti āṇāpakaḥ mūlanti

original: māraṇakkhaṇañca anatikkamitvā. Bandhanaṃ bandho, kammunā bandho kammabandho. Atha

original: vā bajjhati etenāti bandho, kammameva bandho kammabandho.
analyzed: vā bajjhati etena ati bandho kammam eva bandho kammabandho

original: 264. Visaṅketo nāti visaṅketo natthi, dvinnampi yathākālaparicchedaṃ kammabandhoyevāti attho.
analyzed: visaṅketaḥ na ati visaṅketaḥ natthi dvinnam pi yathā kāla paricchedam

original: 265. Sabbasoti sabbesu kālabhedesu, sabbaso veditabboti vā sambandho. Sabbasoti sabbappakārena. Vibhāvināti paṇḍitena. So hi atthaṃ vibhāvetīti tathā vutto.
analyzed: sabbaso ti sabbesu kāla bhedesu sabbasas veditabbaḥ iti vā sambandhaḥ sabbasas iti sabbappakārena vibhāvinā ati paṇḍitena saḥ hi attham vibhāveti iti tathā vuttaḥ

original: 266-7-8. “Imaṃ gāme ṭhita”nti idaṃ taṃ sañjānituṃ vuttaṃ, na māraṇakkhaṇaṭṭhānaniyamatthāyāti
analyzed: imam gāme ṭhitanti idam tam sañjānitum vuttam na māraṇa kkhaṇa ṭṭhāna niyama atthāya ati

original: “yattha katthaci ṭhita”nti vatvāpi “natthi tassa visaṅketo”ti āha. Tassāti āṇāpakassa.
analyzed: yattha katthaci ṭhitanti vatvā api na atthi tassa visaṅketo ti āha tassa iti āṇāpakassa

original: “Tatthā”ti vā pāṭho, tassaṃ āṇattiyanti attho. “Gāmeyeva ṭhitaṃ veriṃ mārehī”ti sāvadhāraṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha ati vā pāṭhaḥ tassam āṇattiyanti atthaḥ ṭhitam verim mārehi iti sa avadhāraṇam

original: āṇatto vane ce ṭhitaṃ māreti vā “vaneyeva ṭhitaṃ veriṃ mārehī”ti sāvadhāraṇaṃ vutto
analyzed: āṇattaḥ vane ce ṭhitam māreti vā vaneyā iva ṭhitam verim mārehi iti sa avadhāraṇam vutto

original: gāme ṭhitaṃ ce māreti vāti yojanā. “Bhikkhunā sāvadhāraṇa”nti ca potthakesu likhanti,
analyzed: gāme ṭhitam ce māreti vā ati yojanā bhikkhunā sa avadhāraṇam ti ca potthakesu likhanti

original: taṃ aggahetvā “vane vā sāvadhāraṇa”nti pāṭhoyeva gahetabbo. Vigato saṅketo āṇattiniyāmo etthāti visaṅketo.
analyzed: tam aggahetvā vane vā sāvadhāraṇam ti pāṭhaḥ yā iva gahetabbaḥ vigataḥ saṅketaḥ āṇatti niyāmaḥ ettha ati visaṅketaḥ

original: 269. Sabbadesesūti gāmavanaaṅgaṇagehādīsu sabbesu ṭhānesu. Bhedatoti nānattato.
analyzed: sabba desesu iti gāma vana aṅgaṇa geha ādīsu sabbesu ṭhānesu bhedataḥ ti nānattato

original: 270. “Satthena pana mārehī”ti yena kenaci yo āṇatto, tena yena kenaci satthena mārite visaṅketo natthīti yojanā.
analyzed: satthena pana mārehi iti yena kenaci yaḥ āṇatto tena yena kenaci satthena mārite visaṅketaḥ natthi iti yojanā

original: 271-2. Iminā vāsinā hīti ettha hīti padapūraṇe. “Iminā asinā māreyyā”ti vutto aññena
analyzed: iminā vā asinā hi iti ettha hi iti pada pūraṇe iminā asinā māreyya ati vuttaḥ aññena

original: asinā māreti vā “tvaṃ imassa asissa etāya dhārāya māraya” iti vutto taṃ veriṃ sace
analyzed: asinā māreti vā tvam imassa asissa etāya dhārāya māraya iti vuttaḥ tam verim sace

original: itarāya dhārāya māreti vā tharunā māreti vā tuṇḍena māreti vā, tathā mārite visaṅketoyeva
analyzed: itarāya dhārāya māreti vā tharunā māreti vā tuṇḍena māreti vā tathā mārite visaṅketoyā iva

original: hotīti yojanā. Tharunāti khaggamuṭṭhinā. Tuṇḍenāti khaggatuṇḍena. “Visaṅketovā”ti
analyzed: hoti iti yojanā tharunā ati khaggamuṭṭhinā tuṇḍena ati khaggatuṇḍena visaṅketā uvāti

original: saṅketavirādheneva pārājikaṃ na hotīti dassanapadametaṃ.
analyzed: saṅketa virādhena iva pārājikam na hoti iti dassana padam etam

original: 273. Sabbāvudhakajātisūti idhāvuttakarapālikāchurikādisabbapaharaṇasāmaññesu. Visesatoti bhedato.
analyzed: sabba āvudhaka jātisu iti idha avutta karapālikā churikā ādi sabba paharaṇa sāmaññesu visesataḥ ti bhedato

original: 274. Parenāti bhikkhunā. Soti āṇatto. Nisinnaṃ naṃ māreti, visaṅketo na vijjatīti
analyzed: parena ati bhikkhunā saḥ ti āṇattaḥ nisinnam nam māreti visaṅketaḥ na vijjati iti

original: “gacchantameva mārehī”ti sāvadhāraṇaṃ avuttattā “nisinnopi soyevā”ti taṃ mārentassa
analyzed: gacchantam eva mārehi iti sa avadhāraṇam a vutta ttā nisinnaḥ api tam mārentassa

original: visaṅketo na hoti, avadhāraṇaṃ antarena kathanaṃ taṃ sañjānāpetuṃ vuccatīti iriyāpathaniyāmakaṃ
analyzed: visaṅketaḥ na hoti avadhāraṇam antarena kathanam tam vuccati iti iriyāpatha niyāmakam

original: na hotīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: na hoti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 275-6. Asati sāvadhāraṇe visaṅketābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sāvadhāraṇe iriyāpathantaresu
analyzed: asati sāvadhāraṇe visaṅketa abhāvam dassetvā idāni sāvadhāraṇe iriyāpatha antaresu

original: visaṅketaṃ dassetumāha “nisinnaṃyevā”tiādi. “Nisinnaṃyeva mārehī”ti vutto gacchantaṃ
analyzed: visaṅketam dassetum āha nisinnaṃ yā iva atiādi nisinnam yā iva mārehi iti vuttaḥ gacchantam

original: māreti, visaṅketanti ñātabbaṃ. “Gacchantaṃyeva mārehī”ti vutto nisinnaṃ māreti, visaṅketanti
analyzed: māreti visaṅketam ti ñātabbam gacchantam yeva mārehi iti vuttaḥ nisinnam māreti visaṅketam ti

original: ñātabbanti yojanā. Imameva yojanākkamaṃ sandhāyāha “yathākkama”nti.
analyzed: ñātabbanti yojanāḥ imam eva yojana ākkamam sandhāya āha yathā ākkamanti

original: 277. Vijjhitvāti sarādīhi vijjhitvā.
analyzed: vijjhitvā iti sara ādīhi vijjhitvā

original: 278. Chinditvāti asiādīhi chinditvā. Puna soti payogo.
analyzed: chinditvā iti chinditvā punar

original: 279. Karaṇesūti vijjhanādikiriyāvisesesu.
analyzed: karaṇesu iti vijjhana ādi kiriyā visesesu

original: 280-1. Ettāvatā āṇattiniyāmakaniddesaṃ dassetvā idāni dīghādiliṅgavasenāpi sambhavantaṃ
analyzed: ettāvatā āṇatti niyāmaka niddesam dassetvā idāni dīgha ādi liṅga vasena api sambhavantam

original: visaṅketaṃ dassetumāha “dīgha”ntiādi. “Dīghaṃ…pe… thūlaṃ mārehīti aniyametvā āṇāpetī”ti
analyzed: visaṅketam dassetum āha dīghantiādi thūlam mārehi iti aniyametvā āṇāpeti iti

original: aṭṭhakathāvacanato eva-kāraṃ vinā “dīghaṃ mārehī”ti aniyametvā kenaci yo āṇatto hoti,
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā vacanataḥ evakāram vinā dīgham mārehi iti aniyametvā kenaci yaḥ āṇattaḥ hoti

original: sopi āṇatto yaṃ kiñci tādisaṃ sace māreti, natthi tattha visaṅketo, ubhinnampi parājayoti
analyzed: saḥ api āṇattaḥ yam kiñci tādisam sace māreti natthi tattha visaṅketaḥ ubhinnam pi

original: yojanā. Evaṃ “rassa”ntiādisabbapadehipi paccekaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Aniyametvāti visaṅketābhāvassa
analyzed: yojanā evam paccekam yojanā kātabbā aniyametvā ati visaṅketa abhāvassa

original: hetudassanaṃ. Evakāro vākyālaṅkāro. Tatthāti āṇattikappayoge. “Ubhinnampi parājayo”ti
analyzed: hetu dassanam evakāraḥ vākya alaṅkāro tattha ati āṇatti kappa yoge ubhinnam pi

original: vuttattā āṇāpakaṃ vinā aññaṃ yathāvuttakkhaṇaṃ manussaviggahaṃ “yaṃ kiñci tādisa”nti iminā dasseti.
analyzed: vutta ttā āṇāpakam vinā aññam yathā vutta kkhaṇam manussa viggaham yam kiñci tādisanti iminā dasseti

original: Sace āṇāpako āṇāpetvā attānameva māreti, āṇāpako dukkaṭaṃ āpajjitvā marati, āṇattassa
analyzed: sace āṇāpakaḥ āṇāpetvā attānam eva māreti āṇāpakaḥ dukkaṭam āpajjitvā marati āṇattassa

original: pārājikaṃ. Āṇāpakena attānamuddissa āṇattiyā katāya āṇatto ajānitvā tādisaṃ aññaṃ
analyzed: pārājikam āṇāpakena attānam uddissa āṇattiyā katāya āṇattaḥ a jānitvā tādisam aññam

analyzed: māreti okāsassa a niyamita ttā āṇāpakaḥ muccati itaraḥ kammunā bajjhati yadi amukasmin

original: rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisinnaṃ īdisaṃ mārehī”ti okāsaṃ niyametvā āṇāpeti,
analyzed: ratti ṭṭhāne vā divā ṭṭhāne vā nisinnam īdisam mārehi iti okāsam niyametvā āṇāpa iti

original: tattha āṇāpakato aññasmiṃ mārite ubhinnampi pārājikaṃ. Tato bahi mārite vadhakasseva
analyzed: tattha āṇāpakato aññasmin mārite ubhinnam pi pārājikam tatas bahi mārite vadhakassa iva

original: kammabandho. Āṇāpako attānameva uddissa āṇāpeti, itaro ca tameva tattha māreti, āṇāpakassa
analyzed: kammabandhaḥ āṇāpakaḥ attānam eva uddissa āṇāpeti itaraḥ ca tam eva tattha māreti āṇāpakassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ, āṇattassa pārājikaṃ. Sace aññattha māreti, mūlaṭṭho muccati. Ajānitvā aññaṃ
analyzed: dukkaṭam āṇattassa pārājikam sace aññattha māreti mūlaṭṭhaḥ muccati a jānitvā aññam

original: tattha vā aññattha vā māreti, vadhako pārājikaṃ āpajjati, mūlaṭṭho muccati. Ānantariyavatthumhi
analyzed: tattha vā aññattha vā māreti vadhakaḥ pārājikam āpajjati mūla ṭṭhaḥ muccati ānantariya vatthumhi

original: ānantariyena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ānantariyena saddhim yojetabbam

original: 282. Yo manussaṃ kañci uddissa sace opātaṃ khaṇati, tathā opātaṃ khaṇantassa tassa
analyzed: yaḥ manussam kañci uddissa sace opātam khaṇati tathā opātam khaṇantassa tassa

original: dukkaṭaṃ nāma āpatti hotīti ajjhāhārayojanā. Yojanā ca nāmesā yathārutayojanā, ajjhāhārayojanāti
analyzed: dukkaṭam nāma āpatti hoti iti ajjhāhāra yojanā yojanā ca nāma esā yathā ruta yojanā ajjhāhāra yojanā ati

original: duvidhā. Tattha pāṭhāgatapadānameva yojanā yathārutayojanā, ūnapūraṇatthamajjhāhārapadehi
analyzed: duvidhā yojanā yathā ruta yojanā ūna pūraṇa attha majjha āhāra padehi

original: saha pāṭhāgatapadānaṃ yojanā ajjhāhārayojanāti veditabbā. “Khaṇantassa ca opāta”nti
analyzed: saha pāṭhā āgata padānam yojanā ajjhāhāra yojanā ati veditabbā khaṇantassa ca

original: potthakesu pāṭho dissati. “Khaṇantassa tathopāta’nti pāṭho sundaro”ti nissandehe
analyzed: potthakesu pāṭhaḥ dissati pāṭho sundaraḥ ti nissandehe

original: vuttaṃ. “Āvāṭanti etassa ‘opāta’nti pariyāyo”ti ca vuttaṃ. Tatopi –
analyzed: vuttam etassa opātanti pariyāyo ti ca vuttam tatas pi

original: “Manussaṃ kañci uddissa;
analyzed: manussam kañci uddissa

original: Yo ce khaṇativāṭakaṃ;
analyzed: yaḥ ce khaṇa tivāṭakam

original: Khaṇato taṃ tathā tassa;
analyzed: khaṇataḥ tam tathā tassa

original: Hoti āpatti dukkaṭa”nti. –
analyzed: hoti āpatti dukkaṭanti

original: Pāṭho sundarataro. Jātapathaviṃ khaṇantassa pārājikapayogattā payogagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ sundarataraḥ jāta pathavim khaṇantassa pārājika payoga ttā payoga gaṇanāya dukkaṭam

original: 283. Tatthāti tasmiṃ āvāṭe. Tassāti patitassa manussaviggahassa. Dukkhassuppattiyāti
analyzed: tattha ati tasmin āvāṭe tassa ati patitassa manussa viggahassa dukkha ssuppattiyā ati

original: dukkhuppattihetu. Tassāti yena āvāṭo khato, tassa bhikkhuno. Patitvā so ce marati,
analyzed: dukkha uppatti hetu tassa ati yena āvāṭaḥ khato tassa bhikkhuno patitvā saḥ ce marati

original: tasmiṃ mate tassa bhikkhuno pārājikaṃ bhaveti yojanā.
analyzed: tasmin mate tassa bhikkhuno pārājikam bhava iti yojanā

original: 284. Aññasminti yaṃ samuddissa āvāṭo khato, tato aññasmiṃ. Anuddissakanti kiriyāvisesanaṃ,
analyzed: aññasmin ti yam samuddissa āvāṭaḥ khataḥ tatas aññasmin anuddissakam ti kiriyā visesanam

original: anuddissakaṃ katvāti attho. Opātavisesanaṃ ce, “anuddissako opāto”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: anuddissakam katvā iti atthaḥ opāta visesanam ce anuddissakaḥ opāto ti padacchedaḥ

original: “Aggamakkhāyatī”tiādīsu viya o-kāraṭṭhāne a-kāro, ma-kārāgamo ca daṭṭhabbo, anodissako
analyzed: aggam akkhāyati iti ādīsu viya okāra ṭṭhāne akāraḥ makāra āgamaḥ ca daṭṭhabbaḥ anodissakaḥ

original: opāto khato hotīti attho.
analyzed: opātaḥ khataḥ hoti iti attho

original: 285. “Ettha patitvā yo koci maratū”ti anodissako opāto sace khato hoti, yattakā nipatitvā
analyzed: ettha patitvā yaḥ koci maratu uti an udissakaḥ opāto sace khataḥ hoti yattakā nipatitvā

original: maranti ce, assa tattakā dosā hontīti yojanā. “Yo kocī”ti iminā attano mātāpitaro
analyzed: maranti ce assa tattakāḥ dosāḥ honti iti yojanā yaḥ koci iti iminā attanaḥ mātā pitaro

original: ca saṅgahitā. Dosāti kammabandhadosā, pārājikaṃ pana ekameva. Assāti yena anodissa opāto khato, tassa.
analyzed: ca saṅgahitā dosā ati kammabandha dosā pārājikam pana ekam eva assa ati yena an udissa opāto khato tassa

original: 286. Ānantariyavatthusmiṃ mateti pāṭhaseso, “tattha patitvā”ti adhikāro, arahante,
analyzed: ānantariya vatthusmim matā iti pāṭha sesaḥ tattha patitvā iti adhikāraḥ arahante

original: mātari, pitari ca tasmiṃ patitvā mate kālakateti attho. Ānantariyakanti ettha sakatthe,
analyzed: mātari pitari ca tasmin patitvā mate kālakatā iti atthaḥ ānantariyakanti ettha saka tthe

original: kucchite, saññāyaṃ vā ka-paccayo daṭṭhabbo. “Tathā”ti iminā “ānantariyavatthusmi”nti
analyzed: kucchite saññā ayam vā ka paccayaḥ daṭṭhabbo tathā ti iminā ānantariya vatthusmin ti

original: imasmiṃ samāsapade avayavabhūtampi “vatthusmi”nti idañca “tattha patitvā mate”ti
analyzed: imasmin samāsa pade avayava bhūtam pi vatthusmin ti idam ca tattha patitvā mata iti

original: idañca ākaḍḍhati. Thullaccayādīnaṃ vatthusmiṃ tattha patitvā mate thullaccayādayo
analyzed: ākaḍḍhati thullaccaya ādīnam vatthusmim patitvā mate thullaccaya ādayaḥ

original: hontīti yojanā. Tasmiṃ āvāṭe patitvā yakkhādīsu matesu, pārājikavatthuno dukkhuppattiyañca
analyzed: honti iti yojanā tasmin āvāṭe patitvā yakkha ādīsu matesu pārājika vatthunaḥ dukkha uppattiyam ca

original: thullaccayaṃ, manussaviggahe mate pārājikaṃ, tiracchāne mate pācittiyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: thullaccayam manussa viggahe mate pārājikam tiracchāne mate pācittiyam ti vuttam hoti

original: 287. Pāṇātipātā dveti dvinnaṃ matattā dve pāṇātipātā, ekena pārājikaṃ, itarena kammabandhoyeva. Ekovekekadhaṃsaneti mātu vā dārakassa vā maraṇe eko pāṇātipātova.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātā dve iti dvinnam matattā dve pāṇa atipātāḥ ekena pārājikam itarena mātu vā dārakassa vā maraṇe ekaḥ pāṇa atipātaḥ uva

original: 288. Corehi anubaddho ettha āvāṭe patitvā marissati ce, opātakhaṇakasseva pārājikaṃ hoti kirāti yojanā. Kirāti anussavane arucisūcakaṃ.
analyzed: corehi anubaddhaḥ ettha āvāṭe patitvā marissati ce opāta khaṇakassa iva pārājikam hoti kirāti yojanā kirāti anussavane aruci sūcakam

original: 289-90. Verino bhikkhuto aññe veripuggalā. Tattha tasmiṃ opāte sace manussaṃ pātetvā
analyzed: verinaḥ bhikkhutaḥ aññe veri puggalā tattha tasmin opāte sace manussam pātetvā

original: mārenti, tathā verino tattha sayameva patitaṃ manussaṃ bahi nīharitvā sace mārenti,
analyzed: mārenti tathā verino tattha sayam eva patitam manussam bahi nīharitvā sace mārenti

original: tattha opapātikā manussā opāte nibbattitvā tato nikkhantuṃ asakkontā matā ce siyuṃ,
analyzed: tattha opapātikāḥ manussāḥ opāte nibbattitvā tatas nikkhantum a sakkontāḥ matā ce siyuṃ

original: sabbattha ca yathāvuttasabbavāresu opātakhaṇakasseva parājayoti yojanā. Nibbattitvā
analyzed: sabbattha ca yathā vutta sabba vāresu opāta khaṇakassa iva parājayaḥ ti yojanā nibbattitvā

original: hīti ettha hīti padapūraṇe. Yattha yattha nipātasaddānaṃ attho na dassito, tattha
analyzed: hi iti ettha hi iti pada pūraṇe yattha yattha nipāta saddānam atthaḥ na dassito tattha

original: tattha padapūraṇamattatā veditabbā.
analyzed: tattha pada pūraṇa matta tā veditabbā

original: 291. Yakkhādayoti ādi-saddena tiracchānānaṃ saṅgaho. Vatthuvasāti thullaccayapācittiyānaṃ vatthubhūtayakkhatiracchānānaṃ vasā. Thullaccayādayoti ādi-saddena pācittiyasaṅgaho.
analyzed: yakkha ādayaḥ ti ādi saddena tiracchānānam saṅgahaḥ vatthu vasā ati thullaccaya pācittiyānam vatthu bhūta yakkha tiracchānānam vasā thullaccaya ādayaḥ ti ādi saddena pācittiya saṅgahaḥ

original: 293. Ayaṃ nayoti “anāpattī”ti yathāvutto nayo.
analyzed: ayam anāpatti iti yathā vuttaḥ nayaḥ

original: 294-5. Bajjhantīti sace avassaṃ bajjhanti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ pāse. “Hatthato muttamattasmi”nti iminā payogassa atthasādhakataṃ dīpeti.
analyzed: bajjhanti iti sace a vassam bajjhanti tattha ati tasmin pāse hatthataḥ mutta mattasmin ti iminā payogassa attha sādhaka tam dīpeti

original: 296. Yaṃ pana uddissa pāso oḍḍito, tato aññassa bandhane tu anāpatti pakāsitāti yojanā.
analyzed: yam pana uddissa pāsaḥ oḍḍito tatas aññassa bandhane tu anāpatti pakāsitā ati yojanā

original: 297. Mudhā vāpīti amūlena vāpi. Mūlaṭṭhassevāti pāsakārakasseva. Kammabandhoti pāṇātipāto.
analyzed: mudhā vā api iti amūlena vā api mūla ṭṭhassa iva ati pāsa kārakassa iva kamma bandho ti pāṇātipāto

original: Bajjhati etenāti bandho, kammameva bandho kammabandho. Pārājikamatte vattabbepi yāva

analyzed: vatthanti iminā nivāsana pārupana dvayam pi sāmaññena gahitam idam ca mātu gāmena paribhuñjitum

original: ṭhapitampi anāmāsameva, cīvaratthāya dinnaṃ sampaṭicchitvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhimaparicchedena

analyzed: tiṇa cumbaṭakam aṅguliyā paṇṇa muddikam upādāya alaṅkāram eva ettha ca vāla kesa vaṭṭa kesesu

original: pavesanakadantasūciādi kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ diyyamānaṃ samaṇasāruppaparikkhāratthāya gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: pavesanaka dantasūci ādi kappiya bhaṇḍam diyyamānam samaṇa sāruppa parikkhāra tthāya gahetabbam

analyzed: tattha jāta phalam khajjanti rukkhe ṭhitam khāditabbam panasa nāḷikera ādi phalam ca manussehi

analyzed: rāsikatam paribhuñjitabba phalam ca manussehi rāsikatesu pi esa iva nayaḥ ti aṭṭhakathāyam

original: vuttattā anāmāsanti upalakkhaṇato imināva gahetabbaṃ. Araññe rukkhato patitaṃ phalaṃ
analyzed: vutta ttā anāmāsanti upalakkhaṇato iminā ava gahetabbam araññe rukkhataḥ patitam phalam
