analyzed: anupasampannassa dassāmi iti gahetum vaṭṭati mugga ādim tattha jātakam ti upalakkhaṇa padattā

original: gacchato viyuttampi gahetabbaṃ. Muggādinti ettha “aparaṇṇa”nti pāṭhaseso.
analyzed: gacchataḥ viyuttam pi gahetabbam mugga ādin ti ettha aparaṇṇam ti pāṭha sesaḥ

original: Sabbāni dhaññānīti “sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu, kudrūsavarakagodhumā”ti vuttāni satta dhaññāni.
analyzed: sabbāni dhaññāni iti sāli vīhi yavaḥ kaṅgu kudrūsa varaka godhumā ati vuttāni satta dhaññāni

original: Khettamaggena gacchatā sālisīse hatthena aphusantena gantabbaṃ. Sace maggo sambādho
analyzed: khetta maggena gacchatā sāli sīse hatthena a phusantena gantabbam sace maggaḥ sambādhaḥ

original: hoti, sarīre dhaññaṃ phusantepi maggattā na doso. Vīthiyaṃ, gehaṅgaṇe vā dhaññesu
analyzed: hoti sarīre dhaññam phusante api magga ttā na dosaḥ vīthiyam gehaṅgaṇe vā dhaññesu

original: pasāritesu apasakkitvā ce gantuṃ na sakkā, “maggaṃ adhiṭṭhāya gantabba”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanato
analyzed: pasāritesu a pasakkitvā ce gantum na sakkā maggam adhiṭṭhāya gantabbanti aṭṭhakathā vacanato

original: “imaṃ maggaṃ gamissāmī”ti gantuṃ vaṭṭati. “Kulagehe dhaññamatthake ce āsanaṃ paññāpetvā
analyzed: imam maggam gamissāmi iti gantum vaṭṭati kula gehe dhañña matthake ce āsanam paññāpetvā

original: dinnaṃ hoti, nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Āsanasālāyaṃ dhaññe vippakiṇṇe
analyzed: dinnam hoti nisīditum vaṭṭati iti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam āsana sālāyam dhaññe vippakiṇṇe

original: anukkamitvā ekamante pīṭhakaṃ paññāpetvā nisīditabbaṃ. Sace manussā tasmiṃ dhaññamatthake
analyzed: an ukkamitvā eka mante pīṭhakam paññāpetvā nisīditabbam sace manussā tasmim dhañña matthake

original: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā denti, nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā attanā tattha
analyzed: āsanam paññāpetvā denti nisīditum vaṭṭati iti aṭṭhakathā ayam vutta ttā attanā tattha

original: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: āsanam paññāpetvā nisīditum na vaṭṭati

original: 345. Dhamanasaṅkhādiṃ sabbaṃ pañcaṅgaturiyampi cāti sambandho. Dhamanasaṅkho nāma
analyzed: dhamana saṅkha ādim sabbam pañcaṅga turiyam pi ca ati sambandhaḥ dhamanasaṅkhaḥ nāma

original: saddakaraṇasaṅkho. Ādi-saddena vaṃsasiṅgatāḷādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Pañcaṅgaturiyanti ātataṃ,
analyzed: ādi saddena vaṃsa siṅga tāḷa ādīnam saṅgahaḥ pañcaṅga turiyanti ātatam

original: vitataṃ, ātatavitataṃ, ghanaṃ, susiranti pañcaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ turiyaṃ. Tattha ātataṃ
analyzed: vitatam ātatavitatam ghanam susiranti pañcaṅga saṅkhātam turiyam tattha ātatam

original: nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekato ākaḍḍhitvā onaddhaṃ ekatalaturiyaṃ. Vitataṃ
analyzed: nāma camma pariyonaddhesu bheri ādīsu ekatas ākaḍḍhitvā onaddham eka tala turiyam vitatam

original: nāma ubhato ākaḍḍhitvā onaddhaṃ ubhayatalaturiyaṃ. Ātatavitataṃ nāma ubhayato ca
analyzed: nāma ubhatas ākaḍḍhitvā onaddham ubhaya tala turiyam ātata vitatam nāma ubhayatas ca

original: majjhato ca sabbato pariyonandhitaṃ. Ghanaṃ sammādi. Sammanti tāḷaṃ, ghaṇṭākiṅkaṇiādīnampi
analyzed: majjhatas ca sabbatas pariyonandhitam ghanam sammādi sammanti tāḷam ghaṇṭā kiṅkaṇi ādīnam pi

original: ettheva saṅgaho. Susiranti vaṃsādi.
analyzed: etthā iva saṅgahaḥ vaṃsa ādi

original: Idha kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena bheripokkharañca bheritalacammañca vīṇā ca vīṇāpokkharacammañca
analyzed: idha kurunda ṭṭhakathā ayam vutta nayena bheri pokkharañca bheri tala cammañca vīṇā ca vīṇā pokkhara cammañca

original: daṇḍo ca anāmāsaṃ. “Pūjaṃ katvā cetiyaṅgaṇādīsu ṭhapitabheriyo acālentena avasesaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: ca anāmāsam pūjam katvā cetiya ṅgaṇa ādīsu ṭhapita bheriyaḥ a cālentena avasesa ṭṭhānam

original: sammajjitabbaṃ. Kacavarachaḍḍanakāle kacavaraṃ viya gahetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetabba”nti
analyzed: sammajjitabbam kaca vara chaḍḍana kāle kaca varam viya gahetvā ekasmim ṭhāne ṭhapetabbanti

original: mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Turiyabhaṇḍesu yaṃ kiñci attano dīyamānaṃ taṃ parivattetvā
analyzed: mahā paccariyam vuttam turiya bhaṇḍesu yam kiñci attanaḥ dīyamānam tam parivattetvā

original: kappiyaparikkhāraṃ gahetuṃ adhivāsetabbaṃ. Doṇi vā pokkharaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhanikkhipanatthāya,
analyzed: kappiya parikkhāram gahetum adhivāsetabbam doṇi vā pokkharam vā danta kaṭṭha nikkhipana tthāya

original: cammañca satthakosakaraṇatthāya gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: cammañca sattha kosa karaṇa tthāya gahetabbam

original: Ratanāni ca sabbānīti muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ lohitaṅko
analyzed: ratanāni ca sabbāni iti muttā maṇi veḷuriyaḥ saṅkhaḥ silā pavāḷam rajatam jātarūpam lohitaṅkaḥ

original: masāragallanti vuttāni sabbāni ratanāni ca. Ettha ca viddhā, aviddhā vā sāmuddikādī
analyzed: vuttāni sabbāni ratanāni ca ettha ca viddhā aviddhā vā sāmuddika ādī

original: sabbāpi muttā anāmāsā. Bhaṇḍamūlatthañca gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati. Antamaso jātiphalikaṃ
analyzed: sabbā api muttāḥ anāmāsāḥ gaṇhitum na vaṭṭati antamasaḥ jāti phalikam

original: upādāya nīlapītādibhedo sabbopi maṇi dhotaviddho anāmāso. Āhatākāreneva ṭhito aviddhādhoto
analyzed: upādāya nīla pīta ādi bhedaḥ sabbaḥ api maṇi dhotaviddhaḥ anāmāsaḥ āhata ākārena iva ṭhitaḥ aviddha adhotaḥ

original: maṇi pattādi bhaṇḍamūlatthaṃ adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ.
analyzed: maṇi patta ādi bhaṇḍa mūlattham adhivāsetum vaṭṭati iti vuttam mahāpaccariyam pana paṭikkhittam

original: Pacitvā kato kācamaṇiyeveko vaṭṭati. Veḷuriye ca maṇisadisoyeva vinicchayo.
analyzed: pacitvā kato kācamaṇiyā iva ekaḥ vaṭṭati veḷuriye ca maṇi sadisaḥ yā iva vinicchayaḥ

original: Dhamanasaṅkho “sabbaṃ dhamanasaṅkhādi”ntiādigāthāya turiyesu gahito. Ratanakhacito
analyzed: dhamana saṅkhaḥ sabbam dhamana saṅkha adinti ādi gāthāya turiyesu gahitaḥ rata nakha citaḥ

original: saṅkho anāmāso. Pānīyasaṅkho dhotopi adhotopi āmāso. Avasesasaṅkho pana añjanādibhesajjatthaṃ,
analyzed: saṅkhaḥ anāmāsaḥ pānīya saṅkhaḥ āmāsaḥ avasesa saṅkhaḥ pana añjana ādi bhesajja ttham

original: pattādibhaṇḍamūlabhāvena ca adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati. Suvaṇṇena ekato viliyāpetvā katā
analyzed: patta ādi bhaṇḍa mūla bhāvena ca adhivāsetum vaṭṭati suvaṇṇena ekatas katā

original: muggavaṇṇā silā anāmāsā. Sesā silā khuddakanisānādikammatthaṃ adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: mugga vaṇṇā silā anāmāsā sesā silā khuddaka nisāna ādi kammattham adhivāsetum vaṭṭati

original: “Pavāḷaṃ dhotamadhotañca viddhamaviddhañca sabbathā anāmāsaṃ, nāpi adhivāsetabba”nti
analyzed: pavāḷam dhotam a dhotam ca viddham a viddham ca sabbathā anāmāsam na api adhivāsetabbanti

original: mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttattā pavāḷapaṭimācetiyāni ceva potthakesu pavesetabbaāṇiyā mūle,
analyzed: mahā paccariyam vutta ttā pavāḷa paṭimā cetiyāni ca iva potthakesu pavesetabba āṇiyā mūle

original: aggeca pavesetabbaṃ padumādiākārena kataṃ vaṭṭañca na gahetabbaṃ na phusitabbaṃ.
analyzed: agge ca pavesetabbam paduma ādi ākārena katam vaṭṭam ca na gahetabbam na phusitabbam

original: Bījato paṭṭhāya rajataṃ, jātarūpañca kataṃ vā hotu akataṃ vā, sabbaso anāmāsaṃ, na

original: ca sāditabbaṃ. Iminā kataṃ paṭimādikañca ārakūṭalohañca anāmāsanti vakkhati. Katākatasuvaṇṇarajatānaṃ
analyzed: ca sāditabbam iminā katam paṭimā ādikam ca ārakūṭa loham ca kata akata suvaṇṇa rajatānam

analyzed: a sādiyitabba tāya idha aṭṭhakathāya āgata ttā uttarena rāja puttena kāretvā āhaṭam suvaṇṇa cetiyam

analyzed: na vaṭṭati iti mahāpaduma therena paṭikkhittanti suvaṇṇa paṭimā cetiya potthaka avacchādaka maṇi paduma vaṭṭa ādi

original: yaṃ kiñci na sāditabbameva, na ca āmasitabbaṃ. Etena kataṃ senāsanopakaraṇaṃ pana
analyzed: yam kiñci na sāditabbam eva na ca āmasitabbam etena katam senāsana upakaraṇam pana

original: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Dhammamaṇḍape katampi paṭijaggituṃ vaṭṭati. Lohitavaṇṇo maṇi,
analyzed: paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati dhammamaṇḍape katam pi paṭijaggitum vaṭṭati lohita vaṇṇaḥ maṇi

original: masāragallamaṇi ca sabbathā anāmāso, na ca adhivāsetabboti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: masāragallamaṇi ca sabbathā anāmāsaḥ na ca adhivāsetabbaḥ iti mahā paccariyam vuttam

original: 346. Sabbamāvudhabhaṇḍanti khaggādi sabbaṃ āvudhopakaraṇaṃ pattādikappiyaparikkhāramūlatthāya
analyzed: sabbam āvudhabhaṇḍanti khagga ādi sabbam āvudha upakaraṇam patta ādi kappiya parikkhāra mūla atthāya

original: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ katvā “khurādikappiyaparikkhāraṃ kāressāmī”ti sādituṃ vaṭṭati. Saṅgāmabhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikam katvā khura ādi kappiya parikkhāram kāressāmi iti sāditum vaṭṭati saṅgāma bhūmiyam

original: magge patitakhaggādiṃ disvā pāsāṇena bhinditvā “khurādikappiyabhaṇḍāni kāressāmī”ti
analyzed: magge patita khagga ādim disvā pāsāṇena bhinditvā khura ādi kappiya bhaṇḍāni kāressāmi iti

original: gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Ususattiādikaṃ phalato daṇḍaṃ apanetvā kappiyaparikkhārakārāpanatthāya gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇhitum vaṭṭati usu satti ādikam phalataḥ daṇḍam apanetvā kappiya parikkhāra kārāpana tthāya gahetabbam

analyzed: cakārena imissā gāthāya a vuttam aṅkusa tomara ādim para him sa upakaraṇam

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Dhanudaṇḍakoti jiyāvirahito dhanudaṇḍako. Idaṃ parahiṃsopakaraṇabhaṇḍādikaṃ

original: vihāre sammajjitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ ce, sāmikānaṃ vatvā tehi aggahitaṃ ce, acālentena sammajjitabbaṃ.
analyzed: vihāre sammajjitabba ṭṭhāne ṭhapitam ce sāmikānam vatvā tehi aggahitam ce a cālentena sammajjitabbam

original: Jālañcāti macchajālapakkhijālādijālañca. Jālaṃ dīyamānaṃ chattaveṭhanatthaṃ, āsanacetiyādimatthake
analyzed: jālam ca ati maccha jāla pakkhi jāla ādi jālam ca jālam dīyamānam chatta veṭhana attham āsana cetiya ādi matthake

original: bandhanādipayojane sati tadatthañca gahetabbaṃ. Saravāraṇaṃ nāma phalakādikaṃ aññehi
analyzed: bandhana ādi payojane sati tad attham ca gahetabbam saravāraṇam nāma phalaka ādikam aññehi

original: attano vijjhanatthāya vissaṭṭhasaranivāraṇaṃ vināsanoparodhakāraṇaṃ hotīti bhaṇḍamūlatthaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ vijjhana tthāya vissaṭṭha sara nivāraṇam vināsana uparodha kāraṇam hoti iti bhaṇḍa mūla ttham

original: sādituṃ vaṭṭati. “Dantakaṭṭhādhāraphalakādi yadicchitaṃ karomī”ti muṭṭhiṃ apanetvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: sāditum vaṭṭati danta kaṭṭha ādhāra phalaka ādi yat icchitam karomi iti muṭṭhim apanetvā gahetum vaṭṭati

original: 347. Cetiyanti ettha “suvaṇṇacetiya”nti idaṃ “suvaṇṇapaṭibimbādī”ti anantaraṃ vuttattā
analyzed: cetiyanti ettha suvaṇṇa cetiyanti idam suvaṇṇa paṭibimba ādi iti anantaram vutta ttā

original: labbhati. Suvaṇṇaggahaṇañcupalakkhaṇanti rajatamayañca gahetabbaṃ. Ārakūṭakanti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: labbhati suvaṇṇa ggahaṇam ca upalakkhaṇanti rajata mayañca gahetabbam ārakūṭakanti suvaṇṇa vaṇṇam

original: lohavisesamāha. “Anāmāsa”nti idaṃ “asampaṭicchiyaṃ vā”ti etassa upalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: loha visesam āha idam asampaṭicchiyam vāti etassa upalakkhaṇam

original: 348. Sabbaṃ vāditamiti sambandho. Onahitunti cammavarattatantīhi bandhituṃ. Onahāpetunti
analyzed: sabbam vāditam iti sambandhaḥ onahitum ti camma varatta tantīhi bandhitum onahāpetum ti

original: tatheva aññehi kārāpetuṃ. Vādāpetunti aññehi vādāpetuṃ. Vādetunti attanā vādetuṃ.
analyzed: tathā iva aññehi kārāpetum vādāpetunti aññehi vādāpetum vādetunti attanā vādetum

original: Vāditanti vādanīyaṃ yathā “karaṇīyaṃ kārita”nti, vādanārahaṃ turiyabhaṇḍanti attho.
analyzed: vāditanti vādanīyam yathā karaṇīyam kāritanti vādanā raham

original: Idañca onahanādikiriyāya kammaṃ.
analyzed: idam ca onahana ādi kiriyāya kammaṃ

original: 349. Upahāraṃ karissāmāti pūjaṃ karissāma. Iti anumatiggahaṇatthāya. Vattabbāti te vattāro vattabbāti yojanā.
analyzed: upahāram karissāma ati pūjam karissāma iti anumati ggahaṇa atthāya vattabbā ati te vattāraḥ vattabbā ati yojanā

original: 350-1. Dhuttiyā itthiyāti vipannācārāya loḷitthiyā. Sayaṃ phusiyamānassāti bhikkhuno
analyzed: dhuttiyā itthiyā ati vipanna ācārāya loḷitthiyā sayam phusiyamānassa ati bhikkhuno

original: payogaṃ vinā itthiyā attanāva phusiyamānassa. Kāyena avāyamitvāti tassā sarīrasamphassānubhavanatthaṃ
analyzed: payogam vinā itthiyā phusiyamānassa kāyena avāyamitvā ati tassā sarīra samphassa anubhavana tham

original: attano kāyaṃ acāletvā. Phassaṃ paṭivijānatoti phassaṃ anubhavantassa.
analyzed: attano kāyam a cāletvā phassam paṭivijānato ti phassam anubhavantassa

original: Asañciccāti ettha “phusane”ti pāṭhaseso, “iminā upāyena imaṃ phusāmī”ti acetetvā.
analyzed: asañcit ca ati ettha phusanā iti pāṭha sesaḥ iminā upāyena imam phusāmi iti

original: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? “Iminā pattapaṭiggahaṇādinā upāyena etissā sarīrasamphassaṃ anubhavissāmī”ti
analyzed: kim vuttam hoti iminā patta paṭiggahaṇa ādinā upāyena etissā sarīra samphassam anubhavissāmi iti

original: acintetvā pattathālakataṭṭakapaṇṇapuṭabhesajjādiṃ paṭiggaṇhāpentiyā hatthe attano
analyzed: a cintetvā patta thālaka taṭṭaka paṇṇa puṭa bhesajja ādim paṭiggaṇhāpentiyāḥ hatthe attano

original: Ekaṃ aṅgaṃ pamāṇikattaṃ vā desitavatthukattaṃ vā vipannaṃ etissāti ekavipannā. Pubbe vuttatthānaṃ saṅghādisesādipadānamattho vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Sāti yathāvuttalakkhaṇakuṭi.

original: 459. Idāni dukkaṭena saddhiṃ pācittiyavisayaṃ dasseti “kula…pe… dukkaṭa”nti. Siñcatoti kappiyodakeneva siñcato, siñcāpayato ca.
analyzed: idāni dukkaṭena saddhim pācittiya visayam dasseti kulape dukkaṭanti siñcatoti kappiya udakena iva siñcato ca

original: 460. Tesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ pana atthāyāti kuladūsanaparibhogānaṃ dvinnamatthāya. Siñcane siñcāpaneti ettha “mālāgacchādīna”nti pakaraṇato labbhati. Dukkaṭanti ettha “kevala”nti seso.
analyzed: tesam yeva dvinnam pana atthāya ati kula dūsana paribhogānam dvinnam atthāya siñcane siñcāpane iti ettha pakaraṇataḥ labbhati dukkaṭa nti ettha kevalanti seso

original: 461. Ocināpaneti aññehi pupphānaṃ ocināpane. Sayamocinane cāpīti attanāva ocinane
analyzed: ocināpane iti aññehi pupphānaṃ ocināpane sayam ocinane ca api iti attanāva ocinane

original: ca. Sapācittiyadukkaṭanti “bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiya”nti vuttattā pupphocinanahetu
analyzed: ca sa pācittiya dukkaṭam ti bhūta gāma pātabya tāya pācittiyam ti vutta ttā puppha ucinana hetu

original: pācittiyañca kuladūsanadukkaṭañca hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pācittiyam ca kula dūsana dukkaṭam ca hoti iti vuttam hoti

original: 462. Pūjādiatthāya, kulasaṅgahatthāya ca pupphānaṃ ocinanaocināpanāni kārāpentassa
analyzed: pūjā ādi atthāya kula saṅgaha atthāya ca pupphānaṃ ocinana ocināpanāni kārāpentassa

original: āpattiyā āpajjanappakāraṃ dassetumāha “pupphāna”nti. “Pupphānaṃ gaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ

original: hotī”ti vuttattā pupphamocinatoti ettha “visuṃ visu”nti seso. Ekekapupphaṃ ocinantassa
analyzed: hoti iti vutta ttā puppham ocinato ti ettha visum visum ti sesaḥ ekeka puppham ocinantassa

original: pupphagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ hotīti attho. “Ekena payogena bahūni pupphāni ocinantassa
analyzed: puppha gaṇanāya pācittiyam hoti iti attho ekena payogena bahūni pupphāni ocinantassa

original: pana payogagaṇanāya hotī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ idha byatirekato labbhati. “Ocinato”ti
analyzed: pana payoga gaṇanāya hoti iti aṭṭhakathā ayam vuttam idha byatirekataḥ labbhati ocinato ti

original: iminā “ocināpayato”ti idañca kiriyāsāmaññe visesassa antogadhabhāvato vā upalakkhaṇato vā dassitanti.
analyzed: iminā ocināpayato ti idam ca kiriyā sāmaññe visesassa antogadha bhāvataḥ vā upalakkhaṇato vā dassitanti

original: Tattha ca pupphāni visuṃ visuṃ vatvā ocināpentassa pupphānaṃ gaṇanāya hotīti idameva
analyzed: tattha ca pupphāni visum visum vatvā ocināpentassa pupphānam gaṇanāya hoti iti idam eva

original: āpajjati. Ekavāramāṇattena bahūni pupphāni bahūsu ca vāresu ocitesu āṇattigaṇanāya
analyzed: āpajjati eka vāram āṇattena bahūni pupphāni bahūsu ca vāresu ocitesu āṇatti gaṇanāya

original: hotīti vinicchayo daṭṭhabbo. Idaṃ sabbappakāraṃ anantaravuttagāthāya dassitavidhimhi
analyzed: hoti iti vinicchayaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ idam sabbappakāram anantara vutta gāthāya dassita vidhimhi

original: ca daṭṭhabbanti ñāpetumāha “kulatthaṃ ce sadukkaṭā”ti. Kulatthanti kulasaṅgahatthaṃ.

analyzed: sa dukkaṭā ti vutta ttā pācittiyam ca dukkaṭam ca puppha gaṇanāya hoti iti siddham yathā āha

original: 463. Ganthanaṃ gantho, tena nibbattaṃ ganthimaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Ganthimādisarūpaṃ sayameva vakkhati. Saṅgahaṇaṃ saṅgaho, pupphānaṃ saṅgahoti viggaho.
analyzed: ganthanam gantho tena nibbattam ganthimam esa nayaḥ sabbattha ganthima ādi sarūpam sayam eva vakkhati saṅgahaṇam saṅgahaḥ pupphānam saṅgahaḥ iti viggahaḥ

original: 464. Imāni ganthimādīni sarūpato dassetumāha “tattha daṇḍena daṇḍaṃ vā”tiādi. Tattha
analyzed: imāni ganthima ādīni sarūpataḥ dassetum āha tattha daṇḍena daṇḍam vā tiādi tattha

original: tatthāti tesu chasu pupphasaṅgahesu. “Daṇḍena daṇḍaṃ vā”ti idaṃ sadaṇḍauppalādikusumaṃ

original: sandhāyāha. “Vaṇṭenapi ca vaṇṭaka”nti idaṃ savaṇṭakarattakusumādiṃ sandhāyāha. Karaṇaṃ
analyzed: sandhāya āha ca idam sa vaṇṭaka ratta kusuma ādim sandhāya āha karaṇam

original: sabbanti kataṃ sabbaṃ. Idha sabbattha kappiyavidhivibhāgaṃ “sabbameta”miccādigāthāyaṃ vakkhati.

original: 465. Suttādīhi gopphetvāti ettha “vassikapupphādīnī”ti seso. Suttena vā kadalivākādīhi
analyzed: sutta ādīhi gopphetvā ti ettha vassika puppha ādīni iti sesaḥ suttena vā kadalivāka ādīhi

original: viggaho. Ubhatovaṇṭikāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Appatthe vā sakatthe vā ka-kāro daṭṭhabbo.

original: Itthiliṅgavisaye ka-kārato pubbākārassa i-kārādeso.

original: Sabbapupphānaṃ vaṇṭāni ekadisāya katvā ganthitapupphāvali ekatovaṇṭikā nāma, vaṇṭāni

analyzed: ubhaya disāya katvā ganthita puppha āvali ubhatovaṇṭikā nāma ati tam gopphimam evam duvidham

original: hotīti attho. “Vākaṃ vā valliṃ vā rajjuṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā tattha nīpakadambādivaṇṭarahitāni
analyzed: hoti iti atthaḥ vākam vā vallim vā rajjum vā diguṇam katvā tattha nīpa kadamba ādi vaṇṭa rahitāni

original: pupphāni veṭhetvā gahaṇaṃ gopphimaṃ nāmā”ti aṭṭhakathāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pupphāni veṭhetvā gahaṇam gopphimam nāma ati aṭṭhakathāya vuttam

original: 466. Bundesūti mūlesu. Makulādikanti ettha ādi-saddena vaṇṭarahitamadhukādipupphañca
analyzed: bundesu iti mūlesu makula ādikam ti ettha ādi saddena vaṇṭa rahita madhuka ādi puppham ca

original: 482. Pitucchāti pitubhaginī jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhā. Mātuloti mātu bhātā. Jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhe dve pitucchā, dve mātule ca ekato katvā “dasā”ti vuttaṃ. Bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti sambandho.

analyzed: ubhaya saṅgāhaka vacanataḥ vā tuyham pitu vā ati yathāsambhavam visum visum ca

original: vattabbaṃ. Tesanti ca tumhākanti ca sāmivacanaṃ. Puttānanti ca mātāpitūnanti ca sampadānavacanaṃ.
analyzed: vattabbam tesan ti ca tumhākan ti ca sāmi vacanam puttānan ti ca mātā pitūnan ti ca sampadāna vacanam

original: 489. Bhesajjakaraṇārahānaṃ vattabbatāya “akallako”ti idaṃ issarādipadehi paccekaṃ
analyzed: vattabba tāya idam issara ādi padehi paccekam

original: yojetabbaṃ. Akallakoti āturo. Kallaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti kallako,
analyzed: yojetabbam akallakaḥ ti āturaḥ kallam vuccati sukham tam etassa atthi iti kallakaḥ

original: na kallako akallako. Ñātijanujjhito vāti ñātijanena pariccatto vā.
analyzed: na kallakaḥ a kallakaḥ ñāti jana ujjhitaḥ vā ati ñāti janena pariccattaḥ vā

original: 490. Etesaṃ sabbesanti issarādiāturānaṃ sabbesametesaṃ janānaṃ. “Sādhunā”ti vakkhamānattā
analyzed: etesam sabbesanti issara ādi āturānam sabbesam etesam janānam sādhunā ati

original: apaccāsīsatā satāti ettha satāti kiriyāpadaṃ. “Imasmiṃ kate ime mayhaṃ evarūpaṃ dassantī”ti
analyzed: satā ati ettha satā ati kiriyāpadam imasmin kate ime mayham evarūpam dassanti iti

original: attano atthāya paccāsīsanaṃ akarontenāti attho. Bhikkhusaṅghassa upakārataṃ paccāsīsantena
analyzed: attanaḥ atthāya paccāsīsanam a karontena ati atthaḥ bhikkhu saṅghassa upakāra tam paccāsīsantena

original: kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Paṭisanthāroti āmisapaṭisanthāro, dhammapaṭisanthāroti duvidho paṭisanthāro.
analyzed: kātum vaṭṭati paṭisanthāro ti āmisa paṭisanthāro dhamma paṭisanthāro ti duvidho paṭisanthāro

original: Ettha āmisapaṭisanthāro gayhati. Bhesajjaṃ āmisenapi hotīti dhammakathāya saṅgahopi
analyzed: ettha āmisa paṭisanthāraḥ bhesajjam āmisena api hoti iti dhamma kathāya saṅgahaḥ api

original: yujjateva. Paṭisantharaṇaṃ paṭisanthāro. Paṭiladdhāmisassa ca dhammassa ca tesu ca

original: attani ca patirūpenākārena samaṃ attharaṇaṃ pavattananti attho.

original: Aparo nayo – āmisassa ca dhammassa ca alābhena attano, parassa ca antare sambhavantassa

analyzed: appamattena pavattetabbanti adhippāyena vuttam

analyzed: kenaci iti upalakkhaṇattā upāsakena vā upāsikāya vā ati atthaḥ hatthena ati hattha avayavā

analyzed: aṅguliyaḥ vuttā samudāye pavattassa vohārassa avayave pavattanato katvā ati ettha parittanti

analyzed: parittam bhaṇāpentānam eva santakam sutta udakam evam vutta ttā attanaḥ sutta udakam āharitvā

analyzed: puññatthāya idam hatthena cāletvā āmasitvā vā parittam bhaṇatha iti vutte kenacid

analyzed: paritta udakam suttam kātabbam kenaci paritta udaka suttāni detha ati vutte bhikkhunā

analyzed: tesam eva santakam jalam hatthena cāletvā suttakam madditvā parittam katvā dātabbanti yojanā

original: 493. Anāmaṭṭhopīti hatthena anāmasitopi, apabbajitassa hatthato laddhā attanā vā aññena vā bhikkhunā agahitaggoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: an āmaṭṭhaḥ api iti hatthena an āmasito api apabbajitassa hatthataḥ laddhā attanā vā aññena vā bhikkhunā agahitaggo ti vuttam hoti

original: 494. Coradāmarikassa cāti gāmavilopakassa corassa ca.
analyzed: cora dāmarikassa ca ati gāma vilopakassa corassa ca

original: 495. Paṇḍupalāsassāti pabbajjāpekkhassa bhaṇḍukassa, paṇḍuvaṇṇo palāso paṇḍupalāso,

analyzed: saḥ viyāti paṇḍu palāsaḥ tad sadise tad ohāro sīhoyam māṇavaka ūti ādīsu yathā

original: paṇḍupalāso rukkhā patanābhimukho tiṭṭhati niyatapāto, evamayampi gihiliṅgato apagamābhimukho

original: Thālakepi cāti attano paribhogathālakepi. Idañca nidassanamattaṃ, pattopi gahitoyevāti
analyzed: thālake pi ca ati paribhoga thālake pi idam ca nidassanam attam pattaḥ pi

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ṭhapetvāti ettha “piṇḍapāta”nti upayogavasena sambandhanīyaṃ. Taṃ panāti
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam ṭhapetvā iti ettha piṇḍapātam ti upayoga vasena sambandhanīyam tam panāti

original: 496. Jaṅghapesaniyanti gihīnaṃ dūteyyasāsanaharaṇakammaṃ “jaṅghapesaniya”nti vuccati. Api cāti vuttasamuccayo.
analyzed: jaṅghapesaniyanti gihīnam dūteyya sāsana haraṇa kammam jaṅghapesaniyanti vuccati api ca ati vutta samuccayo

original: 497. Ettāvatā sāmaññavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni apavādavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “bhaṇḍū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sāsananti sandesaṃ. Haritunti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ netuṃ.
analyzed: ettāvatā sāmañña vidhim dassetvā idāni apavāda vidhim dassetum bhaṇḍu iti ādi vuttam sāsanam ti sandesam haritum ti vutta ṭṭhānam netum

analyzed: aṭṭhavidhena pi iti puppha dāna ādi jaṅgha pesaniyā avasānena aṭṭha ppakārena api kula dūsana kammena ati

original: Pañcasu sahadhammikesu ekenāpi kuladūsanena kammena uppāditapaccayo sabbesampi na

analyzed: vaṭṭati iti pañcannam sahadhammīnam na ca vaṭṭati iti sabba paṭisedho kato

original: 499. Sabbatthāti “ajjhohāresū”ti etassa visesanaṃ, sabbesūti attho. “Ajjhohāre ajjhohāre”ti
analyzed: sabbattha āti ajjhohāresu iti etassa visesanam sabbesu iti atthaḥ ajjhohāre ajjhohāre ti

analyzed: aṭṭhakathā gatam saṅgaṇhāti ajjhohāresu iti idam para galam kātabbam āmisam sandhāya āha

original: Sesapaccaye paṭicca paribhogavaseneva “sesesū”ti āha, anajjhoharaṇīyesu sesapaccayesūti
analyzed: sesa paccaye paṭicca paribhoga vasena iva sesesu iti āha an ajjhoharaṇīyesu sesa paccayesu iti

original: attho. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Cīvarapaccaye sarīrato mocetvā paribhogagaṇanāya, senāsanapaccaye
analyzed: attho kim vuttam hoti cīvara paccaye sarīrataḥ mocetvā paribhoga gaṇanāya senāsana paccaye

analyzed: sarīrataḥ mocetvā vāra gaṇanāya ati vuttam hoti ayam nayo ti dukkaṭam paridīpitanti vuttaḥ nayo

original: 500. “Uppannapaccayā”ti idaṃ “abhūtārocanenā”ti idamapekkhitvā vuttaṃ. “Katvā rūpiyavohāra”nti
analyzed: uppanna paccayā ti idam abhūta ārocanena ati idam apekkhitvā vuttam katvā rūpiya vohāram ti

analyzed: vinicchayaḥ atidisati

analyzed: paṭinissajjataḥ pi tanti samanubhāsana kammataḥ pubbe vā ñatti catutthāsu kamma vācāsu

analyzed: kula dūsana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: yattakāni ahāni, “chāditā”ti iminā sambandho, chādanakiriyāaccantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ.

original: Dvebhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: sambandhaḥ kena ati āha tividha apeta cetasā ti tissaḥ vidhā sā iyaṃ uham asmi iti vidhā

analyzed: apagata cittena sammāsambuddhena ati attho

original: Paṭicchannā āpatti etassāti paṭicchanno. Arisādīnaṃ āgatigaṇattā tattha pakkhipanena a-kārapaccayo daṭṭhabbo. Teneva vakkhati “paṭicchannāya dātabbo”tiādi.

analyzed: vacana dvayena iti vuttam hoti vuttam ha etam aṭṭhakathāyam sukka vissaṭṭhim kāya saṃsagga nti ādi vacanena api

original: 567. Kīvappamāṇe chidde jāteti āha “kaniṭṭhassā”tiādi. “Kaniṭṭha…pe… māṇaka”nti iminā heṭṭhimaparicchedaṃ dasseti.

original: Kaṅgusitthappamāṇenāti sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ khuddakatarassa kaṅguno sitthappamāṇena. Khenāti mukhavaṭṭiyā dvaṅgulato heṭṭhā ākāsapariyāyena chiddena. Āṇiyā vāti ayomayāya āṇiyā vā.

original: 750-1. Maṇipattoti maṇinā kato. Veḷuriyubbhavoti marakatamaṇimayo. Phalikubbhavoti

analyzed: loha ādi mayaḥ bhājaniya visesaḥ puggalassa ati bhikkhussa gihī ca saṅghaḥ ca gihi saṅghā

original: 754. Yaṃ kiñci pattanti sattasu pattesu yaṃ kiñci pattaṃ. Vodakaṃ katvāti vigatodakaṃ

analyzed: ātape aggimhi vā tāpetum uṇhā iti tasmin yeva uṇhe na nidahetabbā iti

original: 756. Miḍḍhanteti miḍḍhiyā ante. Paribhaṇḍanteti pamukhe mahāmiḍḍhiyā ante. “Vitthiṇṇeti
analyzed: miḍḍhantā iti miḍḍhiyāḥ ante paribhaṇḍantā iti pamukhe mahāmiḍḍhiyāḥ ante vitthiṇṇā iti

analyzed: ayam nayaḥ daṇḍa bhūmi ādhārakesu iti ettha daṇḍādhāraḥ nāma bahūhi daṇḍehi kataḥ bhūmi ādhārakaḥ

original: 758-9. Taṭṭikāyāti tālapaṇṇādīhi katataṭṭikāya. Potthaketi makacivākamaye vā rukkhavākamaye

original: 760. Laggetunti olambetuṃ. Daṇḍakoṭiyā, nāgadantakoṭiyā ca pattamukhena pakkhipitvā ṭhapanampi lagganaṃ nāma. Chattaṅkamañcapīṭhesūti chatte, aṅke, mañcapīṭhe ca.

original: 761. Aṭanīsūti aṅgesu. Bandhitvāti thavikāya aṃsavaddhanakādinā yena kenaci bandhitvā. Olambetumpīti laggetumpi. “Ṭhapetuṃ uparī”ti padacchedo.

original: saṅgaho. Tucchapatte vinicchayo yathāvuttoyeva. Pūraṇaṃ pūro, bhattassa pūro bhattapūro.

original: Tibhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: pidaheyya ati attho pattam hatthe yassa saḥ pattahattho ti bhinna adhikaraṇaḥ uyam bāhirattha samāsaḥ

analyzed: vajirapāṇi iti ādīsu assa ati padacchedaḥ

original: 764. Na nīhareyya pattena calakānīti rasaṃ pivitvā pātitamadhukaphalaṭṭhikādi chaḍḍitāni
analyzed: na nīhareyya pattena calakāni iti rasam pivitvā pātita madhuka phalaṭṭhikā ādi chaḍḍitāni

original: 766. Vinassatīti vibbhamena vā sikkhāpaccakkhānena vā kālakiriyāya vā vinassati.

analyzed: paṭhamena ati cīvara vaggassa paṭhamam saṅgahita ttā paṭhamena kathinena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Mahesināti mahante sīlakkhandhādayo guṇe esi gavesīti mahesi. Paṭhamassa pattassa
analyzed: mahesinā ati mahante sīlakkhandha ādayaḥ guṇe esi gavesīti mahesi paṭhamassa pattassa

original: Paṭhamapattakathāvaṇṇanā.
768. Pañca bandhanāni ūnāni yassa so pañcabandhanaūno, patto, tasmiṃ, abandhanañca
analyzed: pañca bandhanāni ūnāni yassa saḥ pañcabandhana ūnaḥ pattaḥ tasmin a bandhanam ca

analyzed: eka dviti catur bandhanam ca gahitam yathā āha

original: nāma patto abandhano vā ekabandhano vā dvibandhano vā tibandhano vā catubandhano

original: vā”ti. Bandhane akatepi bandhanāraho vakkhamānalakkhaṇarājiyuttopi “ūnapañcabandhanoyevā”ti

original: Dvaṅgulappamāṇato ūnarājiyutto abandhanokāsopi “abandhanoyevā”ti gahetabbo. Yathāha
analyzed: dvi aṅgula ppamāṇataḥ ūna rāji yuttaḥ abandhana ukāsaḥ api abandhanaḥ yā iva ati gahetabbaḥ yathā āha

original: avatthubhāvaṃ dīpeti.
analyzed: avatthu bhāvam dīpeti

original: 836. Tathāti ekāyeva āpattīti dīpeti.

analyzed: vatthānaṃ ti cīvarānaṃ assa ati bhikkhussa

original: 841. Saṅghāṭiṃ gaṇha, uttarāsaṅgaṃ gaṇhāti yojanā.
analyzed: saṅghāṭim gaṇhe uttarāsaṅgam gaṇhāti yojanā

analyzed: nāma aññam kiñci parikkhāranti yojanā antamasaḥ su cimpī ti vuttam hoti param puggalam

analyzed: idam vibhatti vipariṇāmena sāmi vacanam katvā dinnanti ajjhāhārena saha yojetabbam

original: 845. So vāti yassa cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ, so eva vā bhikkhu. Tuṭṭho vā duṭṭho vā so detīti yojanā. Vissāsameva vāti vissāsaṃ katvā gaṇhatoti yojanā.

analyzed: ettha ati imasmim sikkhāpade

original: Cīvaracchindanakathāvaṇṇanā.

analyzed: khomam kappāsikam koseyyam kambalam sāṇam bhaṅganti āgatam chappakāram suttam

analyzed: iminā saḥ apāṭhaḥ vāyā apeti na vaṭṭati iti pāṭhaḥ yujjati iti sace

analyzed: yojanā attanaḥ atthāya yadi

original: 848. Tathā akappiyo. Kīdisoti āha “aññātakādiko”ti. Aññātakādikoti aññātako ādi yassa

analyzed: so aññātaka ādikaḥ ādi saddena appavāritaḥ gahitaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu tantavāyassa aññātako

original: tena appavārito ca, tassa aññātakādiko bhikkhunā viññatto so tantavāyo akappiyoti attho.
analyzed: tena appavāritaḥ ca tassa aññātaka ādikaḥ bhikkhunā viññattaḥ saḥ tantavāyaḥ akappiyaḥ ti attho

original: 849. Akappiyenāti viññāpitena. Vāyāpentassāti ettha “payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhenā”ti seso. Yathāha “vāyāpeti, payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ. Paṭilābhena nissaggiya”nti.
analyzed: akappiyena ati viññāpitena vāyāpentassa ati ettha payoge payoge dukkaṭam paṭilābhena ati sesaḥ yathā āha vāyāpeti payoge payoge dukkaṭam paṭilābhena nissaggiyanti

original: 850. Kittake vīte nissaggiyaṃ hotīti āha “vidatthimatte”tiādi. Hatthamatteti ratanamatte.

analyzed: yojetabbam dīghataḥ akappiya suttam pasāretvā tiriyataḥ kappiya suttena vītā iti ayam ettha

original: 856. Sace kappiyākappiyatantavāyā dvepi vemaṃ ubhayakoṭiyā gahetvā ekatova vinanti vāti yojanā. Tiriyaṃ suttaṃ pavesetvā yena ākoṭento ghanabhāvaṃ sampādenti, taṃ vemaṃ vuccati.
analyzed: sace kappiya akappiya tantavāyāḥ dve api vemam ubhaya koṭiyā gahetvā ekatas va vinanti vāti yojanā tiriyam suttam pavesetvā yena ākoṭentaḥ ghana bhāvam sampādenti tam vemam vuccati

analyzed: nayena dāyakānam adhippāyataḥ adhikatara āyata ādi karaṇa attham vidhānam karoti iti vuttam hoti

original: 863. Mahagghaṃ kattukāmino tantavāyehi appagghaṃ vāyāpentassa anāpattiṃ viniddiseti yojanā.
analyzed: mahaggham kattu kāminaḥ tantavāyehi appaggham vāyāpentassa anāpattim viniddiseti yojanā

original: Pesakārakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: pesakāra kathā vaṇṇanā

original: tīsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā paṃsu, eko pāsāṇādīsu aññataro koṭṭhāso”ti ca “adaḍḍhāpīti
analyzed: tīsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāsā eko pāsāṇa ādīsu aññataro koṭṭhāso ti ca adaḍḍhā api iti

original: uddhanapattapacanakumbhakārāvāpādivasena tathā tathā adaḍḍhā”tiādi aṭṭhakathāto ca
analyzed: uddhana patta pacana kumbhakāra āvāpa ādi vasena tathā tathā adaḍḍha atiādi aṭṭhakathāto ca

original: veditabbaṃ. “Appapaṃsuappamattikā”ti dvīsupi padesu niddesarūpena yebhuyyenapāsāṇādipadapañcakaṃ
analyzed: veditabbam appapaṃsu appamattikā iti dvīsu pi padesu niddesa rūpena yebhuyyena pāsāṇa ādi pada pañcakam

original: vuttaṃ, tatthāpi attho yebhuyyenapaṃsupadādīsu vuttavipallāsena veditabbo. Yathāha
analyzed: vuttam tattha api atthaḥ yebhuyyena paṃsupada ādīsu vutta vipallāsena veditabbaḥ yathā āha

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃyeva hi dvinnaṃ pabhedadassanameta”nti.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam tesam yeva hi dvinnam pabheda dassanam etat ti

original: Khaṇeyya vāti evarūpaṃ akappiyapathavipadesaṃ antamaso pādaṅguṭṭhenāpi sammuñjanisalākāyapi
analyzed: vāti evarūpam a kappiya patha vipa desam antamasaḥ pādaṅguṭṭhena api

original: sayaṃ vā khaṇati. Khaṇāpeyya vāti aññena vā “idaṃ khaṇāhī”tiādinā akappiyavohārena
analyzed: sayam vā khaṇati khaṇāpeyya vā ati aññena vā idam khaṇāhi iti ādinā akappiya vohārena

original: khaṇāpeyya. Bhedāpeyyāti tatheva bhedāpeyya. Bhindeyya vāti passāvadhārādīhipi bhindeyya.
analyzed: khaṇāpeyya bhedāpeyya ati tathā iva bhedāpeyya bhindeyya vā ati bhindeyya

original: Adhikāravasena vā-saddassa sabbakiriyāpadehi sambandho labbhatīti bhedāpeyya cāti
analyzed: adhikāra vasena vā saddassa sabba kiriyā padehi sambandhaḥ labbhati iti ca ati

original: ettha ca-saddo idha avuttassa “dahati vā, dahāpeti vā”ti padadvayassa samuccayakoti
analyzed: ettha ca saddo idha a vuttassa dahati vā dahāpeti vā ati pada dvayassa

original: veditabbo. Antamaso pattampi pacanto sayaṃ vā dahati, aññena vā dahāpetītiādi imesaṃ
analyzed: veditabbaḥ antamasaḥ pattam pi pacantaḥ sayam vā dahati aññena vā daha apeti itiādi imesam

original: padānaṃ aṭṭhakathāvasena veditabbaṃ. Pācittiyaṃ siyāti khaṇantassa, bhindantassa
analyzed: padānam aṭṭhakathā vasena veditabbam pācittiyam siyā ti khaṇantassa bhindantassa

original: ca pahāre pahāre pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: ca pahāre pahāre pācittiyam

original: 949. Āṇāpentassa āṇattigaṇanāya, dahantassa aggipātagaṇanāya hotīti idaṃ “pahāre pahāre pācittiya”ntiādiaṭṭhakathāvacanavasena veditabbaṃ, imameva dassetumāha “sayamevā”tiādi.
analyzed: āṇāpentassa āṇatti gaṇanāya dahantassa aggipāta gaṇanāya hoti iti idam pahāre pahāre pācittiya nti ādi aṭṭhakathā vacana vasena veditabbam imam eva dassetum āha sayam eva atiādi

original: 950. Āṇāpentassāti sakiṃ āṇāpentassa.
analyzed: āṇāpentassa ati sakim āṇāpentassa

original: 951. “Khaṇāpeyyā”ti sāmaññavacanassa apavādadassanatthaṃ “khaṇa pokkharaṇi”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: khaṇāpeyyā ti sāmañña vacanassa apavāda dassana tham khaṇa pokkharaṇin ti ādim āha

original: Koci doso na vijjatīti ettha pokkharaṇiāvāṭādisaddānaṃ pathavipariyāyattābhāvato
analyzed: koci dosaḥ na vijjati iti ettha pokkharaṇi āvāṭa ādi saddānam

original: evaṃvacanena anāpattīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: evaṃvacanena anāpatti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 952. “Imaṃ idhā”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ paccakkhabhūtādhippetabhūmivācakattā tehi yojetvā vuttassa tasseva payogassa āpattikarabhāvaṃ dassetumāha “ima”ntiādi.
analyzed: imam idha ati ādīnam padānam paccakkha bhūta adhippeta bhūmi vācaka ttā tehi yojetvā vuttassa tassa iva payogassa āpatti kara bhāvam dassetum āha imam tiādi

original: 953. Kandanti tālādikandaṃ. Kurundanti kulacocarukkhaṃ. Thūṇanti thambhaṃ. Khāṇukanti
analyzed: kandanti tāla ādi kandam kurundanti kula coca rukkham thūṇanti thambham khāṇukanti

original: sākhāviṭaparahitaṃ rukkhāvayavaṃ. Mūlanti pathaviyā suppatiṭṭhitabhāvakaraṃ rukkhāvayavaṃ.
analyzed: sākhā viṭapa rahitam rukkha avayavam mūlanti pathaviyā su patiṭṭhita bhāva karam rukkha avayavam

original: Vaṭṭatīti aniyametvā vacanena anāpattibhāvato vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti aniyametvā vacanena anāpatti bhāvataḥ vaṭṭati

original: 954. Imanti paccakkhaparāmāsapadena niyametvā vacanato āpatti hotīti āha “niyametvāna vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti.
analyzed: iman ti paccakkha parāmāsa padena niyametvā vacanataḥ āpatti hoti iti āha niyametvāna vattum pana na vaṭṭati iti

original: 955. Ghaṭehi ussiñcitunti ghaṭehi gahetvā avasiñcituṃ. Tanukaddamoti jambālo. Bahalaṃ kaddamaṃ bhikkhunā apanetuṃ na ca vaṭṭatīti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ghaṭehi ussiñcitum ti ghaṭehi gahetvā avasiñcitum tanu kaddamaḥ ti jambālaḥ bahalam kaddamam bhikkhunā apanetum na ca vaṭṭati iti yojetabbam

original: 956. Nadiyādīnanti ettha ādi-saddena gaṅgākandarādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. “Taṭa”nti iminā sambandho.
analyzed: ettha ādi saddena gaṅgā kandara ādīnam gahaṇam taṭanti iminā sambandhaḥ

original: Vaṭṭhanti vuṭṭhīhi ovaṭṭhañca. Cātumāsanti vikopanakiriyāya accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ,
analyzed: vaṭṭhanti vuṭṭhīhi ovaṭṭhan ca vikopana kiriyāya a c c anta saṃyoge upayoga vacanam

original: cātumāsabbhantare vikopetuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
analyzed: vikopetum vaṭṭati iti attho

original: 957. Sace toyasmiṃ patati taṭanti yojanā, sace kūlaṃ bhijjitvā antoudake patatīti.
analyzed: sace toyasmin patati yojanā sace kūlam bhijjitvā antar udake patati iti

original: Deve vuṭṭhepīti pajjunnadeve vuṭṭhepi. Vuṭṭha-saddo kattusādhano. Cātumāsamatikkantepīti
analyzed: deve vuṭṭhe iti pajjunnadeve vuṭṭhe ipi vuṭṭha saddo kattu sādhano cātumāsamatikkante iti

original: yojanā. Tattha hetudassanatthamāha “toye devo hi vassatī”ti.
analyzed: yojanā tattha hetu dassana attham āha toye devaḥ hi vassati iti

original: 958. Soṇḍinti pāsāṇapokkharaṇiṃ. Tattha tūti udakarahite tasmiṃ soṇḍiāvāṭe.
analyzed: soṇḍinti pāsāṇa pokkharaṇim tattha udaka rahite tasmin soṇḍi āvāṭe

original: 959. Antocātumāsaṃ sodhetuṃ bhinditunti yojanā. “Sodhetuṃ bhindituṃ vikopetu”nti
analyzed: antocātumāsam sodhetum bhinditum yojanā sodhetum bhinditum vikopetum

original: kiriyāpadehi “raja”nti kammapadaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Taṃ rajorāsiṃ deve vuṭṭhe
analyzed: kiriyā padehi rajanti kamma padam ānetvā sambandhitabbam tam rajorāsim deve vuṭṭhe

original: pacchā udakassa chinnattā bahalabhūmisukkhampi vuṭṭhipātadivasato paṭṭhāya antocātumāse
analyzed: pacchā udakassa chinnattā bahala bhūmi sukkham pi vuṭṭhi pāta divasataḥ paṭṭhāya antocātumāse

original: kopetuṃ bhindituṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
analyzed: kopetum bhinditum vaṭṭati iti attho

original: 960. Puṇṇe soṇḍimhi taṃ rajaṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭati cātumāsato uddhanti yojanā.
analyzed: puṇṇe soṇḍimhi tam rajam vikopetum vaṭṭati cātumāsataḥ uddhanti yojanā

original: 961. “Phusāyante”ti etena “devo”ti idaṃ bhummavasena vipariṇāmetvā “deve phusāyante”ti
analyzed: phusāyantā iti etena devā iti idam deve phusāyantā iti

original: yojetabbaṃ, pajjunnadeve vuṭṭhipātaṃ karonteti attho. Piṭṭhipāsāṇaketi pāsāṇapiṭṭhe.
analyzed: yojetabbam pajjunna deve vuṭṭhi pātam karontā iti attho piṭṭhi pāsāṇaka iti pāsāṇa piṭṭhe

original: Tampīti tathā pāsāṇapiṭṭhe laggaṃ tampi rajaṃ.
analyzed: tampi iti tathā pāsāṇa piṭṭhe laggam rajam

original: 962. Akatapabbhāro nāma yathā heṭṭhābhāgo vuṭṭhiphusitehi na temīyati, tathā namitvā ṭhitapabbatappadeso. Idaṃ anovassakaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitavammikānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: akata pabbhāraḥ nāma yathā heṭṭhā bhāgaḥ vuṭṭhi phusitehi na temīyati tathā namitvā ṭhita pabbata ppadesaḥ idam anovassaka ṭhāne uṭṭhita vammikānam upalakkhaṇam

original: 963. Abbhokāse vuṭṭhito vammiko sace ovaṭṭho, kaṃ cātumāsaṃ vikopetuṃ vaṭṭatīti sambandho.
analyzed: abbhokāse vuṭṭhitaḥ vammiko sace ovaṭṭhaḥ kam cātumāsam vikopetum vaṭṭati iti sambandho

original: Cātumāsanti vikopanakiriyāya accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Rukkheti ca thambhapāsāṇādīnaṃ
analyzed: vikopana kiriyāya upayoga vacanam rukkha iti ca thambha pāsāṇa ādīnam

original: upalakkhaṇaṃ. Upacikādīnanti ādi-saddena kāḷakipillikādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. So nayoti “ovaṭṭhadivasato
analyzed: upalakkhaṇam upacika ādīnam ti ādi saddena kāḷa kipillika ādīnam gahaṇam saḥ nayo ti ovaṭṭha divasato

original: uttari cātumāsabbhantare kopetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti yathāvutto nayo.
analyzed: uttari cātumāsabbhantare kopetum vaṭṭati iti yathā vuttaḥ nayaḥ

original: 964. Mūsikukkiraṃ nāma mūsikāhi uddhaṭapaṃsu. Mūsikānaṃ ukkiro mūsikukkiroti viggaho.
analyzed: mūsikukkiram nāma mūsikāhi uddhaṭa paṃsu mūsikānam ukkiraḥ mūsikukkiraḥ iti viggahaḥ

original: Gokaṇṭakaṃ nāma gunnaṃ khurānaṃ uṭṭhitamattikā. Gaṇḍuppādamalaṃ nāma bhūlatāya malamattikā.
analyzed: gokaṇṭakam nāma gunnam khurānam uṭṭhita mattikā gaṇḍuppādamalam nāma bhū latāya mala mattikā

original: Sambandhaṃ pana pakatibhūmiṃ akopentena matthakato gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: sambandham pana pakati bhūmim a kopentena matthakataḥ gaṇhitum vaṭṭati

original: 965. Kasīti kasitaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha naṅgalena uddhaṭamattikā kasinaṅgalamattikā. “Acchinnā”tiiminā
analyzed: kasī ti kasita ṭṭhānam tattha naṅgalena uddhaṭa mattikā kasi naṅgala mattikā

original: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ katvā āyataṃ hutvā ṭhitamattikāpaṭalampi ajātapathavī siyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthamāha
analyzed: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikam katvā āyatam hutvā ṭhita mattikā paṭalam pi ajāta pathavī siyā iti āsaṅkā nivattana attham āha

original: “bhūmisambandhā”ti. Sāti kasinaṅgalamattikā.
analyzed: bhūmi sambandhā ati sā ati kasinaṅgalamattikā

original: 966. Senāsananti ettha “purāṇa”nti pāṭhaseso gahetabbo. Ovaṭṭhaṃ cātumāsato uddhaṃ na vikopayeti yojanā.
analyzed: senāsanam ti ettha purāṇam ti pāṭha sesaḥ gahetabbaḥ ovaṭṭham cātumāsataḥ uddham na vikopaya iti yojanā

original: 967. Tatoti ovaṭṭhadivasato paṭṭhāya cātumāsātikkantagehato. “Gopānasi”nti iminā
analyzed: tato ti ovaṭṭha divasataḥ paṭṭhāya cātumāsa atikkanta gehataḥ iminā

original: gopānasimatthake ṭhitaupacikāpaṃsumhi bhijjantepi anāpattibhāvaṃ dīpeti. “Bhitti”nti
analyzed: gopānasi matthake anāpatti bhāvam dīpeti bhittinti

original: iminā tadekadesaṃ bhittipādādidārumāha. Idampi bhittimattikaṃ upacikāmattikaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: iminā tad eka desam bhitti pāda ādi dārum āha idam pi bhitti mattikam upacikā mattikam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. “Thambha”nti idampi taṃsambandhapākārabhūmimattikāupacikādipaṃsuṃ sandhāya
analyzed: vuttam idam api sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Padarattharanti atthatapadaraṃ. Idampi padarānaṃ upari mattikāupacikāpaṃsuṃ
analyzed: vuttam idam pi upari

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Gopānasi”ntiādīhi padehi “gaṇhissāmī”ti paccekaṃ yojanīyaṃ. “Gaṇhissāmī”ti
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam gopānasi nti ādīhi padehi gaṇhissāmi iti paccekam yojanīyam gaṇhissāmi iti

original: iminā vikopanādhippāyābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
analyzed: iminā vikopana adhippāya abhāvam dīpeti

original: 968. Gaṇhantassāti ettha anādare sāmivacanaṃ, “suddhacittenā”ti pāṭhaseso. Iṭṭhakāti
analyzed: gaṇhantassa iti ettha anādare sāmi vacanam suddha cittena ati pāṭha sesaḥ iṭṭhakā ati

original: chadaniṭṭhakā. Ādi-saddena pāsāṇasamuddapheṇādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Patatīti suddhacittena
analyzed: ādi saddena pāsāṇa samudda pheṇa ādīnam gahaṇam patati iti suddha cittena

original: gaṇhante sace mattikā chijjitvā patati, anāpattīti attho. Mattikanti bhittiyaṃ, chadane
analyzed: gaṇhante sace mattikā chijjitvā patati anāpatti iti atthaḥ mattikam ti bhittiyam chadane

original: ca cātumāsādhikovaṭṭhamattikaṃ, anovaṭṭhaṃ ce, gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Yathāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: ca anaḥ vaṭṭham ce gaṇhitum vaṭṭati iti yathā āha aṭṭhakathāyam

original: “sace yā yā atintā, taṃ taṃ gaṇhāti, anāpattī”ti. Yadi gaṇhati, āpatti siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: sace yā yā atintā tam tam gaṇhāti anāpatti iti yadi gaṇhati āpatti siyāt iti yojanā

original: 969. Atintoti vassodakena atinto, iminā vinicchitabbavatthuṃ dasseti. Tassa antogehe
analyzed: atinto ti vassodakena iminā vinicchitabba vatthum dasseti tassa antogehe

original: ca bahi ca sambhavato antogehe ṭhitassa tāva vinicchayaṃ dassetumāha “antogehe sace
analyzed: ca bahi ca sambhavataḥ antar gehe ṭhitassa tāva vinicchayam dassetum āha antar gehe sace

original: siyā”ti. Vassodakena tintātintesu dvīsu mattikāpuñjesu atintaṃ tāva dassetumāha “anovaṭṭho cā”ti.
analyzed: siyā iti vassa udakena tinta atintesu dvīsu mattikā puñjesu atintam tāva dassetum āha anovaṭṭhaḥ ca iti

original: 970. Vassodakena tinte vinicchayaṃ dassetumāha “vuṭṭhe puna cā”tiādi. “Vuṭṭhe”ti
analyzed: vassa udakena tinte vinicchayam dassetum āha vuṭṭhe puna ca atiādi vuṭṭha iti

original: iminā “mattikāpuñjo”ti padaṃ bhummavasena vipariṇāmetvā vuṭṭhe mattikāpuñjeti yojetabbaṃ,
analyzed: iminā mattikā puñjaḥ ti padam bhumma vasena vipariṇāmetvā vuṭṭhe mattikā puñje iti yojetabbam

original: “ekadivasampī”ti seso, gehasminti ettha “ṭhite”ti vattabbaṃ, gehasmiṃ ṭhite mattikāpuñje
analyzed: eka divasam pi iti sesaḥ gehasmin ti ettha ṭhitā iti vattabbam gehasmin ṭhite mattikā puñje

original: vassodakena ekadivasampi tinteti vuttaṃ hoti. Vakkhamānanayena aññattha paharitvā
analyzed: vassa udakena eka divasam pi tintā iti vuttam hoti vakkhamāna nayena aññattha paharitvā

original: uṭṭhitena tena atemitvā ujukaṃ patitehi vassaphusitehi tinteti gahetabbaṃ. Sace sabbo
analyzed: uṭṭhitena tena a temitvā ujukam patitehi vassa phusitehi gahetabbam sace

original: tinto hotīti yojanā. “Mattikāpuñjo”ti iminā sambandho.
analyzed: tintaḥ hoti iti yojanā mattikā puñjā iti iminā sambandhaḥ

original: 971. “Sabbo”ti iminā visesanena byavacchinnaṃ ekadesatinte vinicchayaṃ dassetumāha
analyzed: sabbā ti iminā visesanena byavacchinnam eka desa tinte vinicchayam dassetum āha

original: “yattaka”ntiādi. Tu-saddo imameva visesaṃ joteti. Yattakanti heṭṭhā anotaritvā matthakato,
analyzed: yattakantiādi tu saddaḥ imam eva visesam heṭṭhā a notaritvā matthakato

original: pariyantakato ca yattakappamāṇaṃ. Tatthāti mattikāpuñje. “Akappiya”nti etassa “cātumāsaccayenā”ti
analyzed: pariyantakataḥ ca tattha ati mattikā puñje etassa cātumāsaccayena ati

original: anuvattati. “Atintaṃ…pe… kappiya”nti iminā akappiyaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā vā kappiyakārakehi
analyzed: anuvattati atintaṃpe kappiyanti iminā akappiya ṭṭhānam pariharitvā vā kappiya kārakehi

original: kappiyavacanena harāpetvā vā atintaṃ ṭhānaṃ yathākāmaṃ vaḷañjetabbanti ayamattho
analyzed: kappiya vacanena vā atintam ṭhānam yathākāmam vaḷañjetabbanti ayam attho

original: dassito hoti. Yathāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kappiyakārakehī”tiādi.
analyzed: dassitaḥ hoti yathā āha aṭṭhakathā ayam kappiya kārakehi itiādi

original: 972. Vārināti ujukaṃ ākāsato patitavassodakena. Aññattha paharitvā tattha patitvā
analyzed: vārinā ati ujukam ākāsataḥ patitavassa udakena aññattha paharitvā tattha patitvā

original: temite vaṭṭati. So mattikāpuñjo. Tato paranti ekābaddhakālato uttariṃ so mattikāpuñjo
analyzed: temite vaṭṭati saḥ mattikā puñjo tatas eka ābaddha kālataḥ uttarim saḥ mattikā puñjaḥ

original: vārinā temito bhūmiyā ekābaddho ce hoti, tato paraṃ sā jātā pathavī eva, kopetuṃ
analyzed: vārinā temitaḥ bhūmiyā ekābaddhaḥ ce hoti tatas param sā jātā pathavī eva

original: na vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: na vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 973. “Ovaṭṭho”ti iminā anovaṭṭhapākāro kappiyoti byatirekavasena dasseti. “Mattikāmayo”ti
analyzed: ovaṭṭhaḥ ti iminā kappiyo ti byatireka vasena dasseti

original: visesanena iṭṭhakapākārādiṃ byavacchindati. Tassa pana kappiyabhāvaṃ vakkhati “sace
analyzed: visesanena iṭṭhaka pākāra ādim byavacchindati tassa pana kappiya bhāvam vakkhati sace

original: 1000. Yathāvuttassa byatirekaṃ dassetumāha “udakenā”tiādi. Tattha udakenāti sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Taṃ sevālajātikaṃ. Vārisūti ettha vāsaṃ vārayantīti vārī, tesu.

original: 1001. Jale vallitiṇādīnīti jalamatthake valliñca jāyamānakaravallitiṇādīni ca. Uddharantassāti

original: 1002. Etthāti udake eva. Vikopentassāti kappiyaṃ akārāpetvā chedanādiṃ karontassa.
analyzed: ettha ati udake eva vikopentassa ati kappiyam chedana ādim karontassa

original: 1004. Nāḷikerādikānaṃ khāṇūti etthāpi “upariharito”ti sāmatthiyā labbhati. “Bījagāmena
analyzed: nāḷikera ādikānam ettha api upariharitoti sāmatthiyā labbhati bīja gāmena

original: saṅgaho”ti iminā dukkaṭavatthutamāha. Evamuparipi. Kiñcāpi hi tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ khāṇu
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ ti iminā dukkaṭa vatthu tam āha evam upari pi kiñca api hi tāla nāḷikera ādīnam

original: uddhaṃ avaḍḍhanako bhūtagāmassa kāraṇaṃ na hoti, tathāpi bhūtagāmasaṅkhātanibbattapaṇṇamūlabījato
analyzed: uddham avaḍḍhanakaḥ bhūta gāmassa kāraṇam na hoti tathā api bhūta gāma saṅkhāta nibbatta paṇṇa mūla bījato

original: sambhūtattā bhūtagāmato uppanno nāma hotīti bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: sambhūta ttā bhūta gāmataḥ uppannaḥ nāma hoti iti bīja gāmena saṅgaham gacchati

original: 1005. Tathāpakāsitoti “bījagāmo”ti vutto.
analyzed: tathā apakāsito ti bīja gāmaḥ ti vutto

original: 1006. Phalitā kadalī yāva nīlapaṇṇā, tāva sā ca bhūtagāmoti pakāsitāti yojanā. Yathāha
analyzed: phalitā kadalī nīla paṇṇā tāva sā ca pakāsitā ati yojanā yathā āha

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kadalī pana phalitā yāva nīlapaṇṇā, tāva bhūtagāmeneva saṅgahitā”ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam kadalī pana phalitā yāva nīla paṇṇā tāva bhūta gāmena iva saṅgahitā ati

original: Naḷanti khuddakaveḷu. Veḷūti mahāveḷu. Tiṇādīnanti ādi-saddena sassādayo gahitā.
analyzed: naḷanti khuddaka veḷu veḷu ti mahā veḷu ādi saddena sassa ādayaḥ gahitā

original: 1007. Yo ayaṃ pana veḷu aggato paṭṭhāya yadā sussati, tadā so bījagāmena saṅgahito
analyzed: yaḥ ayam pana veḷu aggataḥ paṭṭhāya yadā sussati tadā saḥ bīja gāmena saṅgahito

original: nāma hotīti yojanā. Bījagāmenāti phaḷubījagāmena. Yathāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “katarabījagāmena? Phaḷubījagāmenā”ti.
analyzed: nāma hoti iti yojanā bīja gāmena ati phaḷu bīja gāmena yathā āha aṭṭhakathā ayam katara bīja gāmena phaḷu bīja gāmena ati

original: 1008. Indasālo sallakī. Ādi-saddena sobhañjanādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Tu-saddena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: indasālaḥ sallakī ādi saddena sobhañjana ādīnam saṅgahaḥ tu saddena aṭṭhakathā ayam

original: “kiñcāpi rāsikatadaṇḍakehi ratanappamāṇāpi sākhā nikkhamantī”ti vuttavisesaṃ joteti.
analyzed: kiñcā api rāsikata daṇḍakehi ratana ppamāṇā api sākhāḥ nikkhamanti iti vutta visesam joteti

original: Chinditvā ṭhapitadaṇḍakesu ratanamattāsupi sākhāsu uṭṭhitāsu bhūtagāmaṃ ahutvā bījagāmameva
analyzed: chinditvā ṭhapita daṇḍakesu ratana mattāsu pi sākhāsu uṭṭhitāsu bhūtagāmam a hutvā bījagāmam eva

original: hoti aviruḷhamūlakattāti ayaṃ vinicchayo vinayaññunā ñāto kukkuccakānamupakārāya
analyzed: hoti a viruḍha mūlaka ttā ati ayam vinicchayaḥ vinayan ñunā ñātaḥ kukkuccakānam upakārāya

original: hotīti āha “viññeyyo vinayaññunā”ti. Imamevatthaṃ “mūlamattepi vā”tiādinā vakkhati.
analyzed: hoti iti āha viññeyyaḥ vinayaññunā ti imam eva attham mūlamatte pi vā tiādinā vakkhati

original: 1009. Maṇḍapādīnamatthāyāti maṇḍapavatipākārādīnamatthāya. Sace te nikkhaṇantīti
analyzed: maṇḍapa ādīnam atthāya ati maṇḍapavati pākāra ādīnam atthāya sace te nikkhaṇanti iti

original: yadi te indasālādidaṇḍake bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇanti. Niggate mūlapaṇṇasminti tathā nikhātadaṇḍato
analyzed: yadi te indasāla ādi daṇḍake nikhaṇanti niggate mūla paṇṇasmin ti tathā nikhāta daṇḍataḥ

original: mūle ca paṇṇe ca jāte. Bhūtagāmena saṅgahoti ettha “tesa”nti sāmatthiyā labbhati,
analyzed: mūle ca paṇṇe ca jāte bhūtagāmena saṅgaho ti ettha sāmatthiyā labbhati

original: “viññeyyo”ti adhikāro.
analyzed: viññeyyaḥ ti adhikāro

original: 1010. Niggatepīti tatiyena pi-saddena atikhuddakataṃ sūceti.
analyzed: niggate pi iti tatiyena pisaddena ati khudda katam sūcā iti

original: 1011. Sakandā tālaṭṭhīti sakandatālabījaṃ. Pattavaṭṭīti sūcisaṇṭhānā aṅkurapattavaṭṭi. Na ca bījagāmoti vuccatīti yojanā. “Bhūtagāmo”ti idaṃ yathāvuttassa byatirekavasena dasseti.
analyzed: sakandā tālaṭṭhī iti sakanda tāla bījam pattavaṭṭī iti sūcisaṇṭhānā aṅkura pattavaṭṭi na ca bījagāmī ti vuccati iti yojanā bhūtagāmī ti idam yathā vuttassa byatireka vasena dasseti

original: 1012. Nāḷikeratacanti nāḷikeraphalachalliṃ. Dantasūcīvāti dantamayasūci iva. Sopīti
analyzed: nāḷikera tacanti nāḷikera phala challim danta sūcī ivāti danta maya sūci iva sopī iti

original: nāḷikeropi. Rukkhatacasaddānaṃ phalesu vattamānakālesupi taṃliṅgatā na virujjhatīti
analyzed: nāḷikeraḥ upi rukkha taca saddānam phalesu vattamāna kālesu pi taṃliṅga tā na virujjhati iti

original: “so”ti āhāti viññāyati.
analyzed: sā iti āha ati viññāyati

original: 1013. Migasiṅgasamānāyāti haritavisāṇasadisāya. Pattavaṭṭiyāti aṅkurapattavaṭṭiyā.
analyzed: miga siṅga samānāya ati harita visāṇa sadisāya patta vaṭṭiyā ati aṅkura patta vaṭṭiyā

original: Satiyāti vijjamānāya. Bhūtagāmoti vuccatīti amūlakabhūtagāmoti vuccati. Idaṃ nāḷikerassa
analyzed: satiyā ati vijjamānāya bhūta gāmo ti vuccati iti amūlaka bhūta gāmo ti vuccati idam nāḷikerassa

original: āveṇikaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: āveṇikam katvā vuttam

original: Catubhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: catu bhāṇa vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 1015-6. Ambaṭṭhīti ambabījaṃ. Jambuṭṭhīti jambubījaṃ. Ādi-saddena madhukapanasādibījānaṃ
analyzed: ambaṭṭhī iti amba bījam jambuṭṭhī iti jambu bījam ādi saddena madhuka panasa ādi bījānam

original: gahaṇaṃ. Vandākāti rukkhādanī. Aññaṃ vāti bhaṇḍakadalimanorahaṃ vā. Assāti vandākādino.
analyzed: gahaṇam vandākā ati rukkhādanī aññam vā ati bhaṇḍaka dali manoraham vā assa ati vandāka ādino

original: Amūlavallīti evaṃnāmikā valli.
analyzed: amūlavallī iti evaṃnāmikā valli

original: 1017. So sevāloti yojanā.
analyzed: yojanā

original: 1018. Ghaṃsitvāti yena kenaci ghaṃsitvā. Taṃ sevālaṃ. Tasmāti tasmā pākārā.
analyzed: ghaṃsitvā iti yena kenacid ghaṃsitvā tam

original: 1019. Sevāle apanīte. Antoti pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ antokucchimhi. Kaṇṇakaṃ abbohāranti
analyzed: sevāle apanīte anto ti pānīya ghaṭa ādīnam anto kucchimhi kaṇṇakam

original: yojanā. Pānīyaghaṭādīnaṃ bahi sevālo udake aṭṭhitattā, bījagāmānulomattā ca dukkaṭavatthūti
analyzed: yojanā pānīya ghaṭa ādīnam bahi udake aṭṭhita ttā bīja gāma anuloma ttā ca dukkaṭa vatthu iti

original: vadanti. Kaṇṇakaṃ nīlavaṇṇampi abbohārikameva.
analyzed: vadanti kaṇṇakam nīla vaṇṇam pi abbohārikam eva

original: 1020. Pāsāṇadaddūti manussasarīre rogākārena pāsāṇe jāyamānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sevālanti pāsāṇasevālaṃ. Seleyyakā nāma silāya sambhūtā ekā sugandhajāti. Apattānīti paṇṇarahitāni.
analyzed: manussa sarīre roga ākārena pāsāṇe jāyamānassa etam adhivacanam sevālanti pāsāṇa sevālam seleyyakā nāma silāya sambhūtā ekā su gandha jāti apattāni iti paṇṇa rahitāni

original: 1021. Pupphitanti vikasitaṃ. Taṃ ahicchattaṃ. Makulanti avikasitaṃ.
analyzed: pupphitanti vikasitam tam ahicchattam makulanti a vikasitam

original: 1022. Allasmiṃ rukkhe tacaṃ vikopetvā yathā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati, tathā pappaṭikampi
analyzed: allasmin rukkhe tacam vikopetvā yathā gahetum na vaṭṭati tathā

original: niyyāsampi vikopetvā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti yojanā, pācittiyamevāti adhippāyo. Pappaṭikampīti
analyzed: niyyāsam pi vikopetvā gahetum na vaṭṭati iti yojanā pācittiyam evā ti adhippāyaḥ pappaṭikampī iti

original: allatacamatthake sukkhatacapaṭalampi. “Allasmi”nti iminā byatirekena matarukkhe dosābhāvaṃ
analyzed: alla taca matthake sukkha taca paṭalam pi allasmin ti iminā byatirekena mata rukkhe dosa abhāvam

original: dīpeti. “Tacaṃ vikopetvā”ti vacanato rukkhatacampi pappaṭikampi sālakapitthādiniyyāsampi
analyzed: dīpeti tacam vikopetvā iti vacanato rukkha tacam pi pappaṭikam pi sāla kapittha ādi niyyāsam pi

original: rukkhe allatacaṃ avikopetvā matthakato chinditvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: rukkhe alla tacam a vikopetvā matthakato chinditvā gahetum vaṭṭati

original: 1023. Akkharacchindanārahesu nuhikadaliādīsu rukkhesu, tatthajātesu tālapaṇṇādikesu
analyzed: akkhara chindana arahesu nuhi kadali ādīsu rukkhesu tattha jātesu tāla paṇṇa ādikesu

original: vā akkharaṃ likhato pācittiyamudīrayeti yojanā. “Tatthajātesū”ti iminā rukkhato apanītapaṇṇesu
analyzed: vā akkharam likhataḥ pācittiyam udīraya iti yojanā tattha jātesu iti iminā rukkhataḥ apanīta paṇṇesu

original: likhituṃ vaṭṭatīti byatirekato dīpeti.
analyzed: likhitum vaṭṭati iti byatirekataḥ dīpa iti

original: 1024. “Pakkameva vā”ti visuṃ vacanato “phalaṃ vā”ti iminā apakkaṃ phalaṃ gahitaṃ.
analyzed: pakkam eva vāti visum vacanataḥ phalam vāti iminā apakkam phalam gahitam

original: 1025. Phaliniṃsākhanti khādanārahaphalavatiṃ jambusākhādikaṃ sākhaṃ. Gaṇhato anupasampannassāti
analyzed: phalinim sākhanti khādana araha phalavatim jambu sākhā ādikam sākham gaṇhataḥ an upasampannaḥ sa ati

original: gahetabbaṃ. Sayaṃ khāditukāmo ceti tathā onamitvā sākhato ocinitvā dinnaphalaṃ sace
analyzed: gahetabbam sayam khāditu kāmo ca iti tathā onamitvā dinna phalam sace

original: sayaṃ khāditukāmo hoti. Evaṃ dātunti yathāvuttappakāraṃ nāmetvā dātuṃ.
analyzed: sayam khāditu kāmaḥ hoti evam dātunti yathāvutta pakāram nāmetvā dātum

original: 1026. Paraṃ kañci ukkhipitvāti aññaṃ kañci anupasampannaṃ ukkhipitvā. Pupphāni ocinantesūti
analyzed: param kañci ukkhipitvā ati aññam kañci anupasampannam ukkhipitvā pupphāni ocinantesu iti

original: kusumāni lunantesu. Ayameva vinicchayoti sāmaññaniddesepi ettha attano nāmetvā dinnasākhāya
analyzed: kusumāni lunantesu ayam eva vinicchayaḥ ti sāmañña niddese pi ettha attanaḥ nāma itvā dinnasākhāya

original: pupphāni pānīyavāsatthāya na gahetabbāni. Anupasampannaṃ ukkhipitvā pupphāni ocināpetvā
analyzed: pupphāni pānīya vāsa tthāya na gahetabbāni an upasampannam ukkhipitvā pupphāni ocināpetvā

original: gahitapupphāni gahetabbānīti ayamettha viseso. Yathāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tehi pana pupphehi
analyzed: gahita pupphāni gahetabbāni iti ayam ettha visesaḥ yathā āha aṭṭhakathā ayam tehi pana pupphehi

original: pānīyaṃ na vāsetabbaṃ. Pānīyavāsatthikena sāmaṇeraṃ ukkhipitvā ocināpetabbānī”ti.
analyzed: pānīyam na vāsetabbam pānīya vāsatthikena sāmaṇeram ukkhipitvā ocināpetabbāni iti

original: 1027. “Sākhā”ti bhinditvā vā chinditvā vā mocitā vuccati. Sākhīnanti rukkhānaṃ. Tanti
analyzed: sākhā ati bhinditvā vā chinditvā vā mocitā vuccati rukkhānam tanti

original: yathāvuttarukkhato mocitasākhaṃ. Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā ruhati, tesaṃ sākhīnaṃ taṃ
analyzed: yathāvutta rukkhataḥ mocita sākham yesam rukkhānam sākhā ruhati tesam sākhīnam tam

original: sākhaṃ kappiyaṃ akārāpetvā vikopentassa dukkaṭanti yojanā. “Yesaṃ rukkhānaṃ sākhā
analyzed: sākham kappiyam a kārāpetvā vikopentassa dukkaṭanti yojanā yesam rukkhānam sākhā

original: ruhatī”ti vuttattā yesaṃ sākhā na ruhati, tesaṃ tassā kappiyakaraṇakiccaṃ natthīti vadanti.
analyzed: ruhati iti vutta ttā yesam sākhā na ruhati tesam tassā kappiya karaṇa kiccam natthi iti vadanti

original: 1028. Allasiṅgiverādikesupīti ādi-saddena vacalasuṇādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: alla siṅgi vera ādikesu pi iti ādi saddena vaca la suṇa ādīnam gahaṇam

original: 1029. Aniyāmato vaṭṭatevāti yojanā. Niyāmasarūpaṃ dassetuṃ “imaṃ rukkha”ntiādivakkhamānattā aniyāmatoti sāmaññaniddese “ima”nti niyāmavacanābhāvatoti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: aniyāmataḥ vaṭṭatā iva āti yojanā niyāma sarūpam dassetum imam aniyāmato ti sāmañña niddese imam ti niyāma vacana abhāvato ti gahetabbam

original: 1032. Ucchukhaṇḍānanti pūraṇayoge sāmivacanaṃ, ucchukhaṇḍehīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbamevāti
analyzed: ucchukhaṇḍānam ti pūraṇa yoge sāmi vacanam ucchukhaṇḍehi iti vuttam hoti sabbam eva ati

original: pacchiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ sabbaṃ khaṇḍaṃ. Kataṃ hotīti kataṃ kappiyaṃ hoti. Ekasmiṃ kappiye
analyzed: pacchiyam ṭhitam sabbam khaṇḍam katam hoti iti katam kappiyam hoti ekasmim kappiye

original: kateti pacchiyaṃ sabbakhaṇḍesu phusitvā ṭhitesu ekasmiṃ khaṇḍe kappiye kate. “Anujānāmi
analyzed: kata iti pacchiyam sabba khaṇḍesu phusitvā ṭhitesu ekasmin khaṇḍe kappiye kate anujānāmi

original: bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ aggiparijitaṃ satthaparijitaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhave pañcahi samaṇa kappehi phalam paribhuñjitum aggi parijitam sattha parijitam

original: nakhaparijitaṃ abījaṃ nibbaṭṭabījaṃyeva pañcama”nti iti vuttesu aggisatthanakhesu
analyzed: nakha parijitam abījam iti vuttesu aggisattha nakhesu

original: aññatarena tatta ayokhaṇḍena vā jalitagginā vā sūcimukhena vā nakhacchedanena vā
analyzed: aññatarena tatta ayaḥ khaṇḍena vā jali tagginā vā sūci mukhena vā nakha chedanena vā

original: satthakadhārāya vā manussasīhādīnaṃ uppāṭitānuppāṭitaapūtinakhena vā vijjhitvā vā
analyzed: satthaka dhārāya vā manussa sīha ādīnam uppāṭita an uppāṭita a pūti nakhena vā vijjhitvā vā

original: chinditvā vā kappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ. Karontena ca anupasampannena bhikkhunā “kappiyaṃ
analyzed: chinditvā vā kappiyam kātabbam karontena ca anupasampannena bhikkhunā kappiyam

original: karohī”ti vutteyeva “kappiya”nti paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā aggiparijitādi kākabbanti
analyzed: karohi iti vuttā iya iva kappiyanti paṭhamam vatvā pacchā aggi parijita ādi kākabbanti

original: gahetabbaṃ. Vakkhati ca “kappiyanti…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti. “Kappiya”nti vacanaṃ pana yāya
analyzed: gahetabbam vakkhati ca kappiyantipe vaṭṭati iti kappiyanti vacanam pana

original: kāyaci vācāya vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Paṭhamaṃ aggiṃ nikkhipitvā nakhādīhi vā vijjhitvā
analyzed: kāyaci vācāya vattum vaṭṭati iti vadanti paṭhamam aggim nikkhipitvā nakha ādīhi vā vijjhitvā

original: vā chinditvā vā kappiyaṃ kātabbaṃ. Karontena ca taṃ anuddharitvāva “kappiya”nti vatvā
analyzed: vā chinditvā vā kappiyam kātabbam karontena ca tam an uddharitvā ava kappiyanti vatvā

original: pacchā uddharituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti, “kappiya”nti vattukāmo “kappa”nti ce vadati, vaṭṭatīti keci.
analyzed: pacchā uddharitum vaṭṭati iti vadanti kappiyanti vattu kāmo kappanti ce vadati vaṭṭati iti keci

original: 1033. Dārunti ucchūhi saddhiṃ ekatobaddhadāruṃ. Dāruṃ vijjhatīti ettha jānitvāpi vijjhati vā vijjhāpeti vā, vaṭṭatiyeva. “Ekasitthepī”ti etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: dārum ti ucchūhi saddhim ekatobaddha dārum dārum vijjhati iti ettha jānitvā api vijjhati vā vijjhāpeti vā ekasitthe api iti ettha api esa iva nayo

original: 1034. Tāni ucchudārūni. Tanti valliṃ, rajjuṃ vā.
analyzed: tāni ucchu dārūni tanti vallim rajjum vā

original: 1035. Maricapakkehīti pariṇatehi maricapakkehi. Apariṇatānaṃ pana abījattā kappiye
analyzed: marica pakkehi iti pariṇatehi marica pakkehi apariṇatānam pana abīja tā kappiye

original: akatepi vaṭṭati. Idañca setalasuṇatacalasuṇādīhi missabhattassa upalakkhaṇaṃ. Ettha
analyzed: a kate api vaṭṭati idam ca missa bhattassa upalakkhaṇam ettha

original: ca bhattasitthasambandhavasena ekābaddhatā veditabbā, na phalādīnameva aññamaññasambandhavasena.
analyzed: ca bhatta sittha sambandha vasena ekābaddha tā veditabbā na phala ādīnam eva aññam añña sambandha vasena

original: 1036. Tilataṇḍulakādisūti kappiyaṃ kātabbatilehi missataṇḍulādīsu. Ādi-saddena kappiyaṃ
analyzed: tila taṇḍulaka ādisu iti kappiyam kātabba tilehi missa taṇḍula ādīsu ādi saddena kappiyam

original: kātabbavatthūhi missitāni itaravatthūni gahitāni. Ekābaddhe kapitthepīti kaṭāhena
analyzed: kātabba vatthūhi missitāni itara vatthūni gahitāni eka ābaddhe kapitthe iti kaṭāhena

original: baddhabīje pariṇatakapitthaphalepi. Kaṭāheti baddhamiñje kapāle.
analyzed: baddha bīje pariṇata kapittha phale api kaṭāha iti baddha miñje kapāle

original: 1037. Kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvāti sukkhattā samantato kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvā. Miñjakanti pariṇatakapitthaphalamiñjaṃ.

original: 1199. Anodisseva paññatte piṇḍeti yojanā, “imesaṃyeva vā”ti aññataraṃ pāsaṇḍaṃ vā

original: “ettakānaṃyeva vā”ti tattha puggalaparicchedaṃ vā akatvā sabbasādhāraṇaṃ katvā paññatte
analyzed: ettakānam yeva vā ti tattha puggala paricchedam vā a katvā sabba sādhāraṇam katvā paññatte

original: āvasathapiṇḍeti attho. Yāvadatthe eva piṇḍe paññatteti yojanā, yāvatā attho kucchipūraṇādikaṃ
analyzed: āvasatha piṇḍā iti attho yāvadatthe eva piṇḍe paññattā iti yojanā yāvatā kucchi pūraṇa ādikam

original: payojanamettha piṇḍeti viggaho, “ettakaṃ dātabba”nti aparicchinditvā “bhuñjantānaṃ
analyzed: payojanam ettha piṇḍa iti viggahaḥ ettakam dātabbanti a paricchinditvā bhuñjantānam

original: yāvadatthaṃ dātabba”nti paññatte piṇḍe evāti attho. Bhuñjitabbanti kammasādhanaṃ
analyzed: yāvadattham dātabbanti paññatte piṇḍe eva ati atthaḥ bhuñjitabbanti kamma sādhanam

original: vā bhāvasādhanaṃ vā. “Bhojana”nti ajjhāharaṇīyaṃ. Sakinti ekavāraṃ. Tatthāti āvasathe.
analyzed: vā bhāva sādhanam vā bhojananti ajjhāharaṇīyam eka vāram tattha ati āvasathe

original: 1200. Tassa piṇḍassa. Ajjhohāresu sabbesūti sabbesu ajjhohārappayogesu katesu. Tassa ajjhohārakassa. Pācittiyo payogagaṇanāya.
analyzed: tassa piṇḍassa ajjhohāresu sabbesu iti sabbesu ajjhohāra ppayogesu katesu tassa ajjhohārakassa pācittiyaḥ payoga gaṇanāya

original: 1201. “Ekena kulena nānekaṭṭhānabhedesu paññatte”ti, “nānākulehi vā nānekaṭṭhānabhedesu
analyzed: ekena kulena nāneka ṭṭhāna bhedesu paññattā iti nānā kulehi vā nāneka ṭṭhāna bhedesu

original: paññatte”ti cāti yojanā. “Piṇḍe”ti adhikāro. Nānā ca eko ca nānekā, ṭhānānaṃ bhedā
analyzed: paññattā iti ca ati yojanā piṇḍā iti adhikāraḥ nānā ca ca bhedā

original: ṭhānabhedā, nānekā ca te ṭhānabhedā cāti viggaho, tesu. Ekabhogoti ekapiṇḍaparibhogo.
analyzed: ṭhāna bhedā ca te ṭhāna bhedā ca ati viggaho tesu eka bhogo ti eka piṇḍa paribhogo

original: Evakārena dutiyadivasādiparibhogaṃ nivatteti.
analyzed: eva kārena dutiya divasa ādi paribhogam

original: 1204. Gilānassāti vuttalakkhaṇena gilāno hutvā punappunaṃ bhuñjantassa gacchato vā
analyzed: gilānassa ati vutta lakkhaṇena gilānaḥ hutvā punappunam bhuñjantassa gacchataḥ vā

original: āgacchantassa vā anāpattīti yojanā, antamaso addhayojanampi gacchato, gantvā āgacchato
analyzed: āgacchantassa vai anāpatti iti yojanā antamasaḥ addha yojanam pi gacchataḥ gantvā āgacchataḥ

original: vā antarāmagge ca gataṭṭhāne ca ekasmiṃ divase bhuñjantassa anāpattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vā antarāmagge ca gata ṭṭhāne ca ekasmin divase bhuñjantassa anāpatti iti vuttam hoti

original: Yathāha “yo gacchanto antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ, gataṭṭhāne ca ekadivasaṃ bhuñjati,
analyzed: yathā āha yaḥ gacchantaḥ antarāmagge eka divasam gata ṭṭhāne ca eka divasam bhuñjati

original: tassāpi anāpatti. Āgacchantepi eseva nayo”ti. Odissa paññatteti ettha “bhikkhū”ti
analyzed: tassa api anāpatti āgacchante pi esā iva nayo ti odissa paññattā iti ettha bhikkhū ti

original: seso. Yathāha “bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāya uddisitvā paññatto hotī”ti. Paritteti udarapūraṇāya
analyzed: sesaḥ yathā āha bhikkhūnam yeva atthāya uddisitvā paññattaḥ hoti iti parittā iti udara pūraṇāya

original: appahonake thoke bhojane. Yathāha “yāvadatthaṃ paññatto na hoti, thokaṃ thokaṃ labbhati,
analyzed: appahonake thoke bhojane yathā āha yāvadattham paññattaḥ na hoti thokam thokam labbhati

original: tādisaṃ niccampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Sakinti yāvadatthaṃ paññattaṃ vuttanayena
analyzed: tādisam niccam pi paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti sakin ti yāvadattham paññattam vutta nayena

original: ekavāraṃ bhuñjato anāpatti.
analyzed: eka vāram bhuñjataḥ anāpatti

original: 1205. Yāguādīnīti ādi-saddena pañcabhojanato aññesaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yāgu ādīni iti ādi saddena pañcabhojanato aññesam ajjhoharaṇīyānam gahaṇam

original: Āvasathakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: āvasatha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1206. Vuttā samayā aññatrāti yojanā, “tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo cīvaradānasamayo
analyzed: vuttā samayāḥ aññatra ati yojanā tattha ayam samayaḥ gilāna samayaḥ cīvara dāna samayaḥ

original: cīvarakārasamayo addhānagamanasamayo nāvābhiruhanasamayo mahāsamayo samaṇabhattasamayo”ti
analyzed: cīvarakāra samayaḥ addhāna gamana samayaḥ nāvā abhiruhana samayaḥ mahā samayaḥ samaṇa bhatta samayaḥ ti

original: vuttā sattavidhakālā aññatra.
analyzed: vuttā sattavidha kālā aññatra

original: Tattha yadā pādānaṃ phalitattā na sakkoti piṇḍāya carituṃ, ayaṃ gilānasamayo. Atthatakathinānaṃ
analyzed: tattha yadā pādānam phalita ttā na sakkoti piṇḍāya caritum ayam gilāna samayaḥ

original: pañca māsā, itaresaṃ kattikamāsoti ayaṃ cīvaradānasamayo. Yadā cīvare kariyamāne
analyzed: pañca māsāḥ itaresam ayam cīvara dāna samayaḥ yadā cīvare kariyamāne

original: kiñcideva cīvare kattabbaṃ karoti, ayaṃ cīvarakārasamayo. Yadā addhayojanampi gantukāmo
analyzed: kiñcid eva cīvare kattabbam karoti ayam cīvarakāra samayaḥ yadā addha yojanam pi gantu kāmaḥ

original: vā hoti, gacchati vā, gato vā, ayaṃ addhānagamanasamayo. Nāvābhiruhanasamayepi eseva
analyzed: vā gacchati vā gataḥ vai ayam addhāna gamana samayaḥ nāvā abhiruhana samaye pi eṣā iva

original: nayo. Yadā gocaragāme cattāro bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā na yāpenti, ayaṃ mahāsamayo.
analyzed: nayaḥ yadā gocaragāme cattāraḥ bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā na yāpenti ayam mahā samayaḥ

original: Yadā yo koci pabbajito bhattena nimanteti, ayaṃ samaṇabhattasamayo. Gaṇo katamoti āha “gaṇo”tiādi.
analyzed: yadā yaḥ koci pabbajitaḥ bhattena nimanteti ayam samaṇa bhatta samayaḥ gaṇaḥ katamaḥ iti āha gaṇa itiādi

original: 1207. Gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma kinti āha “ya”ntiādi. Yaṃ pañcannaṃ aññataraṃ nimantanato,
analyzed: gaṇa bhojanam nāma kinti āha yantiādi yam pañcannam aññataram nimantanato

original: viññattito vā laddhaṃ, taṃ idha bhojananti adhippetaṃ hotīti yojanā. Nimantanatoti
analyzed: viññattitaḥ vā laddham tam idha bhojananti adhippetam hoti iti yojanā nimantanato ti

original: “bhojanāna”ntiādinā vakkhamānappakārena kataṃ akappiyanimantanamāha. Viññattitopi
analyzed: bhojanānaṃ ti ādinā vakkhamāna ppakārena katam akappiya nimantanam āha viññattitaḥ pi

original: vāti “sacepī”tiādinā vakkhamānanayena katamakappiyaviññattimāha.
analyzed: vā ti sacepi itiādinā vakkhamāna nayena katama kappiya viññattim āha

original: 1208-11. Bhojanānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, “aññatarassā”ti seso, “odano sattu
analyzed: niddhāraṇe sāmi vacanam aññatarassa ati sesaḥ odanaḥ sattu

original: kummāso, maccho maṃsañca bhojana”nti saṅgahitānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarassa.
analyzed: kummāsaḥ macchaḥ maṃsam ca bhojananti saṅgahitānam pañcannam bhojanānam aññatarassa

original: Nāmanti vakkhamānaṃ odanādināmaṃ. Bhikkhū nimantetīti ettha “ekato, nānato vā”ti
analyzed: nāman ti vakkhamānam odana ādi nāmam bhikkhū nimanteti iti ettha ekatas nānatas vāti

original: seso. Yathāha “ekato nimantitā. Nānato nimantitā”ti. Ekato nimantanaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ
analyzed: sesaḥ yathā āha ekatas nimantitā nānatas nimantitā ati ekatas nimantanam nāma sabbesam

original: bhikkhūnaṃ ekato ṭhitānaṃ nimantanaṃ. Nānato nimantanaṃ nāma bhikkhūnaṃ visuṃ visuṃ
analyzed: bhikkhūnam ekatas ṭhitānam nimantanam nānatas nimantanam nāma bhikkhūnam visum visum

original: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vā ekato ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vā anekehi nimantanaṃ. Yathāha
analyzed: vasana ṭhānam gantvā vā ekatas ṭhita ṭhānam gantvā vā anekehi nimantanam yathā āha

original: “cattāri pariveṇāni vā vihāre vā gantvā nānato nimantitā, ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitesuyeva vā
analyzed: cattāri pariveṇāni vā vihāre vā gantvā nānatas nimantitāḥ eka ṭhāne vā

original: eko puttena, eko pitarāti evampi nānato nimantitā”ti.
analyzed: ekaḥ puttena ekaḥ pitarā ti evam pi nānatas nimantitā ati

original: Vevacanaṃ nāma odanādisabbapadānaṃ, sampaṭicchathātiādikiriyāpadānañca pariyāyavacanaṃ.
analyzed: vevacanam nāma odana ādi sabba padānam sampaṭicchatha ati ādi kiriyā padānam ca pariyāya vacanam

original: Bhāsantaraṃ nāma māgadhavacanato aññaṃ sīhaḷadamiḷādivohārantaraṃ. Vevacanehi eva
analyzed: bhāsantaram nāma māgadha vacanataḥ aññam sīha ḷada miḷādi vohāra antaram vevacanehi eva

original: vā bhāsantarena vā nimantetīti sambandho.
analyzed: vā bhāsa antarena vā sambandhaḥ

original: Tato nimantanānantaraṃ. Nimantananti yathāvuttaṃ akappiyanimantanaṃ. Ekato gaṇhantīti aññamaññassa dvādasahatthaṃ amuñcitvā ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā ekato gaṇhanti.
analyzed: tatas nimantana anantaram nimantananti yathā vuttam akappiya nimantanam ekatas gaṇhanti iti aññamaññassa dvādasa hattham a muñcitvā ṭhitāḥ vā nisinnāḥ vā ekatas gaṇhanti

original: “Gaṇabhojanakāraṇa”nti idaṃ bhojanapaccayā pācittiyaṃ evaṃ gahaṇamantarena na hotīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇa bhojana kāraṇam ti idam bhojana paccayā pācittiyam evam gahaṇam antarena na hoti iti vuttam

original: 1212. Ekato, nānato vāpi yaṃ gamanaṃ, bhojanampi vā, taṃ gaṇabhojane na kāraṇantipi viññū bhaṇantīti yojanā. Ekato nānato vāpīti ettha “ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā”ti seso.
analyzed: ekatas nānatas vā api yam gamanam bhojanam pi vā tam gaṇa bhojane na viññū bhaṇanti iti yojanā ekatas nānatas vā api iti ettha ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā ati sesaḥ

original: 1213-4. Viññāpetvāti “amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī”tiādinā ekato vā “mayhaṃ dehi, mayhaṃ dehī”ti pāṭekkaṃ vā viññāpetvā. Evampīti viññattitopi.
analyzed: viññāpetvā ti amhākam catunnam pi bhattam dehi itiādinā ekatas vā mayham dehi mayham dehi iti pāṭekkam vā viññāpetvā evam pi iti viññattitaḥ pi

original: 1215. Duvidhassāti nimantakassa, viññāpakassa ca.
analyzed: duvidhassa ati nimantakassa viññāpakassa ca

original: 1216. Sattasupi samayesu bhuñjataṃ anāpattīti yojanā, “gaṇabhojana”nti pakaraṇato
analyzed: satta supi samayesu bhuñjatam anāpatti iti yojanā pakaraṇataḥ

original: labbhati, yathāvuttesu gilānādīsu sattasu kālesu lesaṃ vinā bhuñjantānanti attho.
analyzed: labbhati yathā vuttesu gilāna ādīsu sattasu kālesu lesam vinā bhuñjantānam ti attho

original: “Ekato”ti idaṃ “gahetvā”ti iminā yojetabbaṃ. Bhuñjatanti bhuñjantānaṃ. Tathāti “anāpattī”ti idaṃ paccāmasati.
analyzed: ekatas iti idam gahetvā iti iminā yojetabbam bhuñjatanti bhuñjantānam tathā iti anāpatti iti idam

original: 1217. Anupasampanno ca cārī ca patto ca animantito ca anupasampanna…pe… nimantitā,
analyzed: an upasampannaḥ ca cārī ca patto ca a nimantitaḥ ca an upasampanna pe nimantitā

original: te catutthe katvāti attho, anupasampannaṃ vā piṇḍacāriṃ vā catutthassa pattaṃ vā
analyzed: te catutthe katvā ati atthaḥ anupasampannam vā piṇḍacārim vā catutthassa pattam vā

original: animantitaṃ vā catutthaṃ katvā ekato gahetvā bhuñjantānaṃ gaṇabhedo muninā pakāsito,
analyzed: a nimantitam vā catuttham katvā ekatas gahetvā bhuñjantānam gaṇa bhedaḥ muninā pakāsitaḥ

original: gaṇassa aparipuṇṇatā dīpitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Piṇḍāya carati sīlenāti piṇḍacārī, so
analyzed: gaṇassa a paripuṇṇa tā dīpitā ati vuttam hoti piṇḍāya carati sīlena ati piṇḍa cārī so

original: idha pubbapadalopena “cārī”ti vutto, piṇḍapātiko. So hi nimantanaṃ asādiyanto gaṇabhojanako
analyzed: idha pubba pada lopena cārī iti vuttaḥ piṇḍapātiko so hi nimantanam gaṇa bhojanakaḥ

original: gaṇakhādako na hotīti adhippāyo. Patto nāma vihāre nisīditvā catutthena attanā laddhabbabhojanatthāya
analyzed: gaṇa khādakaḥ na hoti iti adhippāyaḥ pattaḥ nāma vihāre nisīditvā catutthena attanā laddhabba bhojana tthāya

original: pesito patto. Animantito nāma paṭhamaṃ akappiyanimantanāya nimantite anantogadho
analyzed: pesitaḥ pattaḥ a nimantitaḥ nāma paṭhamam a kappiya nimantanāya nimantite anantogadho

original: upasampanno. Etthāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade. Api-saddo heṭṭhā dassitaṃ dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: upasampannaḥ ettha ati imasmim sikkhāpade api saddo heṭṭhā dassitam dvinnam tiṇṇam

original: vā vasena vuttavinicchayaṃ apekkhati.
analyzed: vā vasena vutta vinicchayam apekkhati

original: 1218. Samayaladdhānanti gilānādayo sattasamayā laddhā yehi te samayaladdhā, tesaṃ,
analyzed: gilāna ādayo satta samayāḥ laddhāḥ yehi te samaya laddhā tesam

original: niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. “Aññatarassā”ti seso, “vasenā”ti iminā sambandho. Neva gaṇabhedoti
analyzed: niddhāraṇe sāmi vacanam aññatarassa ati sesaḥ vasena ati iminā sambandhaḥ na iva gaṇa bhedaḥ ti

original: yojanā. Samayaladdhakassa attano anāpattibhāvamantarena taṃ catutthaṃ katvā gaṇabhojanaṃ
analyzed: yojanā samaya laddhakassa attanaḥ anāpatti bhāvam antarena tam catuttham katvā gaṇa bhojanam

original: gaṇhantānaṃ pana āpattisambhavato āha “āpatti pana veditabbā”ti. Yathāha mahāpaccariyaṃ
analyzed: gaṇhantānam pana āpatti sambhavataḥ āha āpatti pana veditabbā iti yathā āha mahāpaccariyam

original: “samayaladdhako sayameva muccati, sesānaṃ gaṇapūrakattā āpattikaro hotī”ti.
analyzed: samaya laddhako sayam eva muccati sesānam gaṇa pūraka ttā āpatti karaḥ hoti iti

original: 1219. Pañcabhojanesu aññatarassa nāmaṃ gahetvā nimantetvā tesuyeva aññaṃ diyyamānaṃ
analyzed: pañcabhojanesu aññatarassa nāmam gahetvā nimantetvā tesu yeva aññam diyyamānam

original: gaṇhantassa visaṅketābhāvaṃ dassetumāha “bhojanānañcā”tiādi. Bhojanānanti niddhāraṇe
analyzed: gaṇhantassa visaṅketa abhāvam dassetum āha bhojanānaṃ ca atiādi niddhāraṇe

original: sāmivacanaṃ, aññatarassa vasenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ visaṅketaṃ, odanādīnaṃ nāmena
analyzed: sāmi vacanam aññatarassa vasena ati vuttam hoti tam visaṅketam odana ādīnam nāmena

original: nimantetvā diyyamānaṃ yāguādiṃ gaṇhantassa gaṇabhojanaṃ na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: nimantetvā diyyamānam yāgu ādim gaṇhantassa gaṇa bhojanam na hoti iti vuttam hoti

original: 1221. “Niccabhatta”nti dhuvabhattaṃ vuccati. “Niccabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, bahūnampi ekato gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Salākabhattādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: nicca bhattam ti dhuva bhattam vuccati nicca bhattam gaṇhatha iti vadanti bahūnam pi ekatas gahetum vaṭṭati salākabhatta ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ

original: Gaṇabhojanakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: gaṇa bhojana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1223-4. Bahūhi manussakehīti visuṃ visuṃ nimantitehi anekehi manussehi. Pañcasu yassa
analyzed: bahūhi manussakehi iti visum visum nimantitehi anekehi manussehi pañcasu yassa

original: kassāti ettha “sahadhammikesū”ti seso, niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ, pañcasu sahadhammikesu
analyzed: kassa ati ettha sahadhammikesu uti sesaḥ niddhāraṇe bhummam pañcasu sahadhammikesu

original: yassa kassacīti attho. “Hitvā”tiādinā kimāhāti? Yassa vikappeti, tasmiṃ sannihite
analyzed: yassa kassaci iti atthaḥ hitvā atiādinā kim āha ati yassa vikappeti tasmin sannihite

original: “mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”ti sammukhā vikappanavasena vā tasmiṃ asannihite
analyzed: mayham bhatta paccāsam tuyham dammi iti sammukhāḥ vikappana vasena vā tasmin asannihite

original: tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā “mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti asammukhā vikappanavasena
analyzed: tassa nāmam gahetvā mayham bhatta paccāsam itthannāmassa dammi iti asammukhā vikappana vasena

original: vā paṭhamanimantanāya vikappanaṃ hitvā, taṃ avikappetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vā paṭhama nimantanāya vikappanam hitvā tam a vikappetvā iti vuttam hoti

original: Bhattanti ettha “yo bhuñjatī”ti seso. Nimantito yo pacchā nimantitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjati,
analyzed: bhattanti ettha yaḥ bhuñjati iti sesaḥ nimantitaḥ yaḥ pacchā nimantitam bhattam bhuñjati

original: tassa pācittiyanti yojanā. Uppaṭipāṭiyā ekasitthampi bhuñjato tassa pācittiyaṃ siyāti
analyzed: tassa pācittiyanti yojanā uppaṭipāṭiyā eka sittham pi bhuñjato tassa pācittiyam siyāti

original: yojanāti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Pacchā nimantitānaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhuñjitvā paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: yojanā iti kim vuttam hoti pacchā nimantitānam bhojanam paṭhamam bhuñjitvā paṭhamam

original: nimantitānaṃ bhojanaṃ pacchā bhuñjantassa ca ekapatteyeva heṭṭhā paṭhamaṃ nimantitānaṃ
analyzed: nimantitānam bhojanam pacchā bhuñjantassa ca heṭṭhā paṭhamam nimantitānam

original: bhojanaṃ pakkhipitvā itaraṃ upari pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā hatthaṃ otāretvā heṭṭhā ṭhitabhojane

original: 1225-6. Paramparabhojanassa sarūpaṃ padabhājane vuttanayena dassetumāha “bhojanānampī”tiādi.

1240. Aññenāti taddhitalopena niddeso, aññatarenāti attho, pavāritoti sambandho.

analyzed: khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vāti saha eka yogañāyena khādanīyam vāti ca

original: 1241. Asananti ettha vippakatabhojanaṃ dissati, bhuñjamāno ce puggalo hoti, bhojanakiriyānupacchinnā

original: pavāraṇapahonakaṃ bhojanaṃ dātuṃ abhiharitvā ṭhitokāso aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇo hotīti

original: paṭiggāhakassa hatthavikārādiko kāyiko vā “ala”ntiādiko vācasiko vā paṭikkhepo paññāyatīti attho.

original: 1242. Nippapañcenāti saha vāsanāya pahīnataṇhādipapañcattayarahitena tathāgatena.
analyzed: nippapañcena ati saha vāsanāya pahīna taṇhā ādi papañcattaya rahitena tathāgatena

original: 1243. Tatthāti odanādīsu. Sattannanti “sālī”tiādinā vakkhamānānurūpānaṃ.
analyzed: tattha ati odana ādīsu sāli iti ādinā

original: 1244. Odakoti udake bhavo. Etthāti pañcaṅgapavāraṇāya. Ayaṃnicchayoti vakkhamānavidhippakāraṃ vinicchayaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: odakaḥ ti udake bhavaḥ ettha ati pañcaṅga pavāraṇāya ayaṃnicchayo ti vakkhamāna vidhi pakāram vinicchayam dasseti

original: 1245. Sālīti sabbasālijāti. Vīhīti sabbavīhijāti. Kaṅgūti setarattakāḷabhedā sabbā kaṅgujāti. Varako setavarako. Dhaññena sambhatapuññasambhārena bhagavatā.
analyzed: sālī iti sabba sāli jāti vīhī iti sabba vīhi jāti kaṅgu uti seta ratta kāḷa bhedā sabbā kaṅgu jāti varako setavarakaḥ dhaññena sambhata puñña sambhārena bhagavatā

original: 1246. Tiṇanti tiṇabījameva vuttaṃ. Dīpitaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Varakacorakoti sukhumavarako.
analyzed: tiṇam ti tiṇa bījam eva vuttam dīpitam saṅgahitam varaka corako ti sukhuma varakaḥ

original: 1248. Aṅgasampattiṃ dassetumāha “hatthenā”tiādi.
