original: 1249. Tanūti tanukā.
analyzed: tanu iti tanukā

original: 1250. Na rakkhati pavāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: na rakkhati pavāraṇam

original: 1251-2. Dhaññarasādīnīti ādi-saddena dadhiādayo gahitā. Āropetvāti uddhanaṃ āropetvā.
analyzed: dhañña rasa ādīni iti ādi saddena dadhi ādayaḥ gahitāḥ āropetvā iti uddhanam āropetvā

original: Phalanti elāḷukādiphalaṃ. Paṇṇanti sūpasākaṃ. Kaḷīranti veḷuādīnaṃ kaḷīraṃ. Bahūnīti
analyzed: phalanti elāḷuka ādi phalam paṇṇanti sūpa sākam kaḷīranti veḷu ādīnam kaḷīram bahūni iti

original: tesameva visesanaṃ. Tattha cāti pakkhittapaṇṇādimhi takkādike. Odhiṃ dassetīti ettha
analyzed: tesam eva visesanam tattha ca ati pakkhitta paṇṇa ādimhi takka ādike odhim dasseti iti ettha

original: “paribhogakāle”ti seso. Sañjanetīti ettha “phalādiyāgū”ti labbhati.
analyzed: paribhoga kāle iti sesaḥ sañjana iti iti ettha labbhati

original: 1253-4. Raseti maṃsādirase. “Yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā “yāgu”nti vā vatvāti yojetabbā. Yāgu saṅgahitāti ettha odhipaññāyanaapaññāyanavikappadvaye yāguyā samo vinicchayoti adhippāyo.
analyzed: rasa iti maṃsa ādi rase yāgum gaṇhatha ati vā yāgum iti vā vatvā ati yojetabbā yāgu saṅgahitā ati ettha odhi paññāyana apaññāyana vikappa dvaye yāguyā samaḥ vinicchayaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

original: 1255. Chupantīti samphusanti. Chupa samphasseti dhātu, pakkhipantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: chupanti iti samphusanti samphasseti dhātu pakkhipanti iti vuttam hoti

original: Yathāha “yattha macchamaṃsaṃ pakkhipantī”ti. Sāsapamattampi macchamaṃsaṃ vā sace
analyzed: yathā āha yattha maccha maṃsam pakkhipanti iti sāsapa mattam pi maccha maṃsam vā sace

original: paññāyatīti yojanā. Pavāraṇanti ettha “janetī”ti seso. Yāguyāti padaṃ paccattavasena
analyzed: paññāyati iti yojanā pavāraṇanti ettha janeti iti sesaḥ padam paccatta vasena

original: vipariṇāmetvā yāgu janetīti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: vipariṇāmetvā yāgu janeti iti yojetabbam

original: 1256. Saṃsaṭṭhoti parissāvito na sañjanetīti yojanā.
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭhaḥ iti parissāvitaḥ na sañjaneti iti yojanā

original: 1257. Sabbaso ṭhapetvāti sambandho. Maṃsādipakkhittaodanādippakaraṇāvasesato aṅgaṃ
analyzed: sabbasas ṭhapetvā iti sambandhaḥ maṃsa ādi pakkhitta odana ādi pakaraṇa avasesataḥ aṅgam

original: dassetumāha “sabbaso”ti. Sabbaso na pavāretīti yojanā. Veḷutaṇḍulanti veḷuvīhīnaṃ
analyzed: dassetum āha sabbaso iti sabbasas na pavāreti iti yojanā veḷu taṇḍulam ti veḷu vīhīnam

original: taṇḍulaṃ. Ādi-saddena kandamūlaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Yathāha “veṇutaṇḍulādīhi vā kandamūlaphalehi
analyzed: taṇḍulam ādi saddena kanda mūlam saṅgahitam yathā āha veṇu taṇḍula ādīhi vā kanda mūla phalehi

original: vā yehi kehici katabhatta”nti.
analyzed: vā yehi kehicid

original: 1258. Tatoti sāliādito, veḷuādito ca, tato nibbattā puthukā vāti attho. Tāhīti puthukāhi. Suddhāti puthukādīhi amissā na pavārentīti sambandho.

original: Dutiyapavāraṇakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: dutiya pavāraṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1320. Khādanīyaṃ vāti pañca bhojanāni ca kālikattayañca vinā avasesesu yaṃ kiñci
analyzed: khādanīyam vāti pañca bhojanāni ca vinā avasesesu yam kiñci

original: vā. Bhojanīyaṃ vāti pañcasu bhojanesu aññatarampi. Vikāleti vigate kāle. Kālo nāma
analyzed: vā bhojanīyam vā ati pañcasu bhojanesu aññataram pi vikāleti vigate kāle kālaḥ nāma

original: aruṇuggamanato yāva majjhantikā, tadañño vikālo. Yathāha “vikālo nāma majjhantike
analyzed: aruṇuggamanataḥ yāva majjhantikā tad aññaḥ vikālaḥ yathā āha vikālaḥ nāma majjhantike

original: vītivatte yāva aruṇuggamanā”ti. Ṭhitamajjhantikopi kāleyeva saṅgayhati. Yathāha “ṭhitamajjhantikopi
analyzed: vītivatte yāva ṭhita majjhantikaḥ api kāleya iva saṅgayhati yathā āha ṭhita majjhantikaḥ api

original: kālasaṅgahaṃ gacchati. Tato paṭṭhāya pana khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā na sakkā, sahasā
analyzed: kālasaṅgaham gacchati tatas paṭṭhāya pana khāditum vā bhuñjitum vā na sakkā sahasā

original: pivituṃ pana sakkā bhaveyya. Kukkuccakena pana na kātabbaṃ. Kālaparicchedajānanatthañca
analyzed: pivitum pana sakkā bhaveyya kukkuccakena pana na kātabbam kāla pariccheda jānana attham ca

original: kālatthambho yojetabbo, kālabbhantareva bhattakiccaṃ kātabba”nti. Dosanti pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: kālatthambhaḥ yojetabbo bhatta kiccam kātabbanti dosanti pācittiyam

original: 1321. “Khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā”ti ettha bhojanīyassa pavāraṇasikkhāpade dassitasarūpattā
analyzed: khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā ti ettha bhojanīyassa pavāraṇa sikkhāpade dassita sarūpa ttā

original: khādanīyaṃ tāva sarūpato dassetumāha “yamāmisagata”ntiādi. Etthāti etesu khādanīyabhojanīyesu.
analyzed: khādanīyam tāva sarūpataḥ dassetum āha ettha iti etesu khādanīya bhojanīyesu

original: Yaṃ pana vanamūlaphalādikaṃ āmisagataṃ āmise yāvakālike pariyāpannaṃ, taṃ khādanīyanti
analyzed: yam pana vana mūla phala ādikam āmisa gatam āmise yāva kālike pariyāpannam tam khādanīyanti

original: yojanā. Kālikesvasamohatthanti ettha gāthābandhavasena ma-kāralopo, asammohatthanti
analyzed: yojanā ettha gāthābandha vasena makāra lopaḥ

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Idanti vakkhamānaṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: vuttam hoti idam ti vakkhamānam sandhāya āha

original: 1322. Mūlanti yaṃ kiñci rukkhalatānaṃ mūlaṃ. Kandanti rukkhalatānameva kandaṃ. Muḷālanti
analyzed: mūlanti yam kiñci rukkha latānam mūlam kandanti rukkha latānam eva kandam muḷālanti

original: padumagacchamūlakandaṃ. Matthakanti tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ matthakaṃ, veḷukaḷīrapallavaṅkurānañca
analyzed: paduma gaccha mūla kandam tāla nāḷikera ādīnam matthakam veḷu kaḷīra palla vaṅkura anañca

original: ettheva saṅgaho. Khandhakanti ucchuādikhandhakaṃ. Tacanti challi. Pattanti paṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: ettha iva saṅgahaḥ khandhakanti ucchu ādi khandhakam tacanti challi pattanti paṇṇam

original: Pupphanti kusumaṃ. Phalanti rukkhalatādīnaṃ phalaṃ. Aṭṭhīti rukkhalatādibījaṃ. Piṭṭhanti
analyzed: pupphanti kusumam phalanti rukkha latā ādīnam phalam aṭṭhīti rukkha latā ādi bījam piṭṭhanti

original: dhaññādipiṭṭhaṃ. Niyyāsanti silesaṃ. “Khādanīya”nti sabbattha pakaraṇato labbhati.
analyzed: dhañña ādi piṭṭham niyyāsanti silesam khādanīyanti sabbattha pakaraṇataḥ labbhati

original: 1323. Evaṃ khādanīyānaṃ mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā te sarūpato dassetumāha “mūlakhādanīyādīna”ntiādi.
analyzed: evam khādanīyānam mātikam nikkhipitvā te sarūpataḥ dassetum āha mūla khādanīya ādīnam ntiādi

original: Tattha rukkhamūlameva khādanīyaṃ, taṃ ādi yesanti viggaho. Mukhamattanidassanaṃ nibodhathāti
analyzed: tattha rukkha mūlam eva khādanīyam tam ādi yesanti viggahaḥ mukha matta nidassanam nibodhatha ati

original: ettha “mayā kariyamāna”nti seso. Mukhamattanti pavesadvāramattaṃ, niravasesato dassane
analyzed: ettha mayā kariyamāna nti sesaḥ mukha mattam ti pavesa dvāra mattam niravasesataḥ dassane

original: papañcabhīrukānaṃ pubbe bhayaṃ hotīti saṅkhepato khādanīyāni dassissanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: papañca bhīrukānam pubbe bhayam hoti iti saṅkhepataḥ khādanīyāni dassissanti vuttam hoti

original: Tathā dassane payojanamāha “nāmatthesu bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāyā”ti, mūlakhādanīyādīnaṃ
analyzed: tathā dassane payojanam āha nāmatthesu bhikkhūnam pāṭava tthāya ati mūla khādanīya ādīnam

original: nāmesu ca tadatthesu ca bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavuppādanatthanti attho.
analyzed: nāmesu ca tad atthesu ca bhikkhūnam pāṭava uppādana tthanti attho

original: 1324-5. Mūlakamūlādīni upadesatoyeva veditabbāni. Na hi tāni pariyāyantarena vuccamānānipi
analyzed: mūlaka mūla ādīni veditabbāni na hi tāni pariyāya antarena vuccamānāni pi

original: sakkā viññātuṃ. Pariyāyantarenapi hi vuccamāne taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva
analyzed: sakkā viññātum pariyāyantarena api hi vuccamāne tam tam nāmam a jānantānam

original: siyā, tasmā tattha na kiñci vakkhāma. Sākānanti sūpeyyapaṇṇānaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade.
analyzed: siyā tasmā tattha na kiñci vakkhāma sākānanti sūpeyya paṇṇānam idha iti imasmim sikkhāpade

original: Āhāratthanti āhārena kattabbapayojanaṃ, āhārakiccanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Āmisattha”ntipi
analyzed: āhāra attham ti āhārena kattabba payojanam āhāra kiccanti vuttam hoti āmisa attham tipi

original: likhanti. Pharantīti vitthārenti.
analyzed: likhanti pharanti iti vitthārenti

original: 1326. Jaraṭṭhanti purāṇakandaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ jaraṭṭhanti sambandho. Sesānaṃ jaraṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: jaraṭṭhanti purāṇa kandam yam tam jaraṭṭhanti sambandhaḥ sesānam jaraṭṭham

original: yāvakālikanti yojanā. Sesānanti mūlakādīni vuttāni. Yathāha “mūlakakhārakajajjharīmūlānaṃ
analyzed: yāvakālikam iti yojanā mūlaka ādīni vuttāni yathā āha

original: pana jaraṭṭhānipi āmisagatikānevā”ti.
analyzed: pana jaraṭṭhāni pi āmisa gatikāna eva ati

original: 1331. Dhototi nibbattitapiṭṭho.
analyzed: dhoto ti nibbattita piṭṭhaḥ

original: 1332. Adhoto khīravalliyā kandoti yojanā. Vākyapathātītāti “asuko vā asuko vā”ti vatvā pariyantaṃ pāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā vacanapathātītā.
analyzed: adhotas khīravalliyā kando ti yojanā vākya patha atītā ati asukaḥ vā asukaḥ vā ati vatvā pariyantam pāpetum vacana patha atītā

original: 1333. Puṇḍarīkaṃ setaṃ. Padumaṃ rattaṃ.
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam setam padumam rattam

original: 1334. Sambhavaṃ jātaṃ.
analyzed: sambhavam jātam

original: 1338. Jaraṭṭhabundoti kandassa heṭṭhā atīva pariṇataṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: jaraṭṭha bundo ti kandassa heṭṭhā atīva pariṇata ṭṭhānam

original: 1339. Pathaviyaṃ gatoti antopathaviyaṃ gato, pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā gatataruṇadaṇḍoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pathaviyam gatoti antopathaviyam gato pathaviyam nimujjitvā gata taruṇa daṇḍo ti vuttam hoti

original: 1340. Evaṃ antobhūmiyaṃ gato. “Paṇṇadaṇḍo uppalādīna”nti padacchedo. Sabboti taruṇopi pariṇatopi. Uppalādīnaṃ, padumajātiyā ca sabbo paṇṇadaṇḍo yāvakālikoti yojanā.
analyzed: evam antobhūmiyam gataḥ paṇṇa daṇḍo uppala ādīnam ti padacchedo sabbaḥ ti taruṇaḥ api pariṇataḥ api uppala ādīnam paduma jātiyā ca sabbaḥ paṇṇa daṇḍaḥ yāvakālikaḥ iti yojanā

original: 1345. Pattakhādanīyaṃnāmāti pattasaṅkhātaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma.
analyzed: patta khādanīyaṃ nāma ati patta saṅkhātam khādanīyam nāma

original: 1348. Mūlakādīnanti “mūlakaṃ khārakañcevā”tiādikāya gāthāya vuttamūlakādīnaṃ.
analyzed: mūlaka ādīnam ti mūlakam khārakam ca iva ati ādikāya gāthāya vutta mūlaka ādīnam

original: 1349. Kaṇṇikāti padumakaṇṇikā.
analyzed: kaṇṇikā ati paduma kaṇṇikā

original: 1360. Ketakādīnanti ettha ādi-saddena timbarusakaṃ gahitaṃ. Tālaphalaṭṭhīti taruṇaphalānaṃ aṭṭhi.
analyzed: ketaka ādīnam ti ettha ādi saddena timbarusakam gahitam tāla phalaṭṭhī iti taruṇa phalānam aṭṭhi

original: 1361. “Punnāgamadhukaṭṭhīnī”ti ca “punnāgamadhukaṭṭhicā”ti ca potthakesu ubhayathā pāṭho dissati, attho pana ekoyeva. “Selu aṭṭhī”ti padacchedo. Anāmiseti yāvajīvike.
analyzed: punnāga madhuka ṭṭhīni iti ca punnāga madhuka ṭṭhi ca ati ca potthakesu ubhayathā pāṭhaḥ dissati atthaḥ pana aṭṭhī iti padacchedaḥ anāmisā iti yāvajīvike

original: 1363. Dhotaṃ tālapiṭṭhanti tālaphegguṃ koṭṭetvā udake madditvā parissāvetvā kalale
analyzed: dhotam tāla piṭṭhanti tāla pheggum koṭṭetvā udake madditvā parissāvetvā kalale

original: bhājanatalaṃ otiṇṇe pasannodakaṃ apanetvā gahitatālapiṭṭhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā
analyzed: bhājana talam otiṇṇe pasanna udakam apanetvā gahita tāla piṭṭhan ti vuttam hoti tathā

original: khīravalliyā piṭṭhanti yojanā, tatheva koṭṭetvā parissāvetvā gahitakhīravalliyā piṭṭhanti attho.
analyzed: khīra valliyā piṭṭhanti yojanā tathā iva koṭṭetvā parissāvetvā gahita khīra valliyā piṭṭhanti attho

original: 1364. Adhotaṃ vuttavipariyāyato gahetabbaṃ. “Āhāratthamasādhentaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ yāvajīvika”nti
analyzed: adhotam vutta vipariyāyataḥ gahetabbam āhāra attham asādhentam sabbam tam yāvajīvikam ti

original: vacanato tesu tesu janapadesu manussānaṃ āhārakiccaṃ akarontaṃ mūlādi yāvajīvikaṃ,
analyzed: vacanataḥ tesu tesu janapadesu manussānam āhāra kiccam a karontam mūla ādi yāvajīvikam

original: tadaññaṃ yāvakālikanti saṅkhepalakkhaṇaṃ kātabbanti.
analyzed: tad aññam yāvakālikam ti saṅkhepa lakkhaṇam kātabbanti

original: Vikālabhojanakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: vikāla bhojana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1369. Bhojanaṃ sannidhiṃ katvā khādanaṃ vāti ettha bhojanakhādanīyāni yathāvuttabhedasarūpāneva.
analyzed: bhojanam sannidhim katvā khādanam vāti ettha bhojana khādanīyāni yathā vutta bheda sarūpān eva

original: Sannidhiṃ katvāti paṭiggahetvā ekarattampi atikkāmetvā, sannidahitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: sannidhim katvā iti paṭiggahetvā eka rattam pi atikkāmetvā sannidahitvā iti vuttam hoti

original: Yathāha “paṭiggahetvā ekarattampi vītināmitassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Tadeva vakkhati
analyzed: yathā āha paṭiggahetvā eka rattam pi vītināmitassa etam adhivacanam ti tat eva vakkhati

original: “saya”ntiādinā. Khādananti kammasādhanoyaṃ, “khajja”nti iminā samānattho.
analyzed: sayanti ādinā khādananti kamma sādhanoyam khajjanti iminā samāna atthaḥ

original: 1371. “Sannidhiṃ katvā”ti ettha niddesaṃ dassetumāha “saya”ntiādi.
analyzed: sannidhim katvā iti ettha niddesam dassetum āha sayan tiādi

original: 1372. “Taṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ettha atthaṃ dassetumāha “tato”tiādi. Tatoti sannidhikatabhojanato.
analyzed: tam na vaṭṭati iti ettha attham dassetum āha tatas iti ādi tatas iti sannidhi kata bhojanato

original: Suddhacittenāti savāsanasakalakilesappahānato nimmalacittena. Tādināti aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu
analyzed: suddha cittena ati sa vāsana sakala kilesa ppahānataḥ nimmala cittena tādinā ati aṭṭhasu loka dhammesu

original: nibbikārabhāvena tādinā. Atha vā yādisā purimakā sammāsambuddhā rūpārūpaguṇehi ahesuṃ, tādisena bhagavatā.
analyzed: nibbikāra bhāvena tādinā atha vā yādisā purimakā sammāsambuddhāḥ rūpa arūpa guṇehi ahesum tādisena bhagavatā

original: 1373. Odanādīsu pañcasu bhojanesu tāva akappiyamaṃsena sannidhivasena pācittiyañca
analyzed: odana ādīsu pañcasu bhojanesu tāva akappiya maṃsena sannidhi vasena pācittiyam ca

original: āpattivisesañca dassetumāha “akappiyesū”tiādi. Pācittīti sannidhipācittiyamāha. Itareti
analyzed: āpatti visesañca dassetum āha akappiyesu utiādi pācitti iti sannidhi pācittiyam āha itare ti

original: sīhādimaṃsamhi. Dukkaṭena saha pācittīti yojanā.
analyzed: sīha ādi maṃsamhi dukkaṭena saha pācitti iti yojanā

original: 1374. Yāmakālikasaṅkhātaṃ paribhuñjatoti ettha “sannidhiṃ katvā”ti adhikārato labbhati.
analyzed: yāmakālika saṅkhātam paribhuñjato ti ettha sannidhim katvā iti adhikārataḥ labbhati

original: “Dukkaṭena sahā”ti avatvā “pācittī”ti vuttattā sati paccaye paribhuñjatoti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: dukkaṭena saha ati avatvā pācitti iti vutta ttā sati paccaye paribhuñjato ti gahetabbam

original: Yathāha “yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye ajjhohārato pācittiyaṃ. Āhāratthāya ajjhohārato
analyzed: yathā āha yāma kālikam sati paccaye ajjhohārato pācittiyam āhāra atthāya ajjhohārato

original: dukkaṭena saddhiṃ pācittiya”nti.
analyzed: dukkaṭena saddhim pācittiyanti

original: 1375. Annanti etthāpi “sannidhikata”nti idaṃ pure viya labbhati, “pakati”nti idaṃ
analyzed: ettha api idam pure viya labbhati idam

original: “anna”nti etassa visesanaṃ, manussamaṃsādīhi asammissaṃ nātirittakataṃ annamattanti
analyzed: annam ti etassa visesanam manussa maṃsa ādīhi asammissam na atiritta katam anna mattam ti

original: attho. Pācittiyadvayanti anatirittapaccayā ca sannidhipaccayā ca dve pācittiyāni.
analyzed: attho pācittiya dvayanti anatiritta paccayā ca sannidhi paccayā ca dve pācittiyāni

original: 1376. “Dve, dvaya”nti ubhayatthāpi ayamevattho.
analyzed: dve ubhayatthā api

original: 1377. Sāmisena mukhena dveti ettha “pañca bhojanāni yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ
analyzed: sa āmisena mukhena dve iti ettha pañca bhojanāni yāma kālikam sattāha kālikam yāvajīvikam

original: ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāmā”ti vuttattā khādanīyāsaṅgahitena yāmakālikena ca
analyzed: ṭhapetvā avasesam khādanīyam nāma ati vutta ttā khādanīya a saṅgahitena yāma kālikena ca

original: tena sammissattā sannidhināmena mukhagataāmisamūlakena ca sannidhipācittiyāni dve
analyzed: tena sannidhi nāmena mukha gata āmisa mūlakena ca sannidhi pācittiyāni dve

original: hontīti attho. Sāmisena mukhenāti upalakkhaṇattā yathākathañci āmise missībhūte ettakā
analyzed: honti iti attho sa āmisena mukhena ati upalakkhaṇa ttā yathā kathañci āmise missībhūte ettakā

original: āpattiyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nirāmisaṃ yāmakālikaṃ bhuñjato ekameva pācittiyanti yojanā,
analyzed: āpattiyaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam nirāmisam yāmakālikam bhuñjataḥ ekam eva pācittiyanti yojanā

original: yena kenaci ākārena asammissaṃ yāmakālikaṃ paribhuñjato ekameva pācittiyaṃ hotīti attho.
analyzed: yena kenacid ākārena asammissam yāmakālikam paribhuñjataḥ ekam eva pācittiyam hoti iti attho

original: 1378. Tamevāti sannihitameva kālikaṃ. Tesu dvīsu vikappesūti sāmisanirāmisavikappadvaye.
analyzed: tam eva ati sannihitam eva kālikam tesu dvīsu vikappesu iti sāmisa nirāmisa vikappa dvaye

original: Kevalaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhatīti paṭhamavikappe dvīhi pācittiyehi saddhiṃ dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyavikappe
analyzed: kevalam dukkaṭam vaḍḍhati iti paṭhama vikappe dvīhi pācittiyehi saddhim dukkaṭam dutiya vikappe

original: pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pācittiyena saddhim dukkaṭam hoti iti vuttam hoti

original: 1379. Suddhanti ettha “sannidhikataṃ bhojana”nti seso. Idaṃ “pakatibhojane”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
analyzed: suddham ti ettha sannidhi katam bhojananti sesaḥ idam pakati bhojana iti aṭṭhakathā ayam

original: idha ca “na doso yāmakālike”ti yāmakālikassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā viññāyati, akappiyamaṃsayāmakālikehi
analyzed: idha ca na dosaḥ yāmakālikā iti yāmakālikassa visum vakkhamāna ttā viññāyati akappiya maṃsa yāmakālikehi

original: amissaṃ bhojananti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: amissam bhojanam ti vuttam hoti

original: 1380. Maṃseti ettha “akappiye”ti idaṃ thullaccayādivacaneneva labbhati. Vaḍḍhatīti
analyzed: maṃsa iti ettha akappiya iti idam thullaccaya ādi vacanena iva labbhati vaḍḍhati iti

original: pubbe vuttehi pācittiyadvayehi saddhiṃ manussamaṃse thullaccayañca sīhādimaṃse dukkaṭañca
analyzed: pubbe vuttehi pācittiya dvayehi saddhim manussa maṃse thullaccayam ca sīha ādi maṃse dukkaṭañca

original: vaḍḍhati. Manussamaṃse ca sese sīhamaṃsādike akappiyamaṃse ca yathānukkamato thullaccayañceva
analyzed: vaḍḍhati manussa maṃse ca sese sīha maṃsa ādike akappiya maṃse ca yathā anukkamataḥ thullaccayam ca eva

original: dukkaṭañcāti dvayaṃ vaḍḍhatīti yojanā.
analyzed: dukkaṭam ca ati dvayam vaḍḍhati iti yojanā

original: 1381. Anatirittampi bhojanaṃ vikāle paribhuñjato bhikkhuno tannimittako doso yathāvuttesu
analyzed: bhojanam vikāle paribhuñjataḥ bhikkhuno tad nimittakaḥ dosaḥ yathāvuttesu

original: sabbavikappesu natthīti yojanā. “Vikāla…pe… kālike”ti yāmakālikassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā
analyzed: sabba vikappesu na atthi iti yojanā vikālape kālikā iti yāmakālikassa visum vakkhamāna ttā

original: ca atirittakārāpanañca bhojaneyeva sambhavatīti anatirittanti ettha “nihitabhojana”nti
analyzed: ca sambhavati iti ettha nihita bhojananti

original: seso. “Anatirittapaccayā pana vikāle sabbavikappesu anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato
analyzed: sesaḥ an atiritta paccayā pana vikāle sabba vikappesu anāpatti iti aṭṭhakathā vacanato

original: dosoti anatirittapaccayā pācittiyamāha. Teneva vakkhati “tannimittako”ti, anatirittanimittakoti
analyzed: doso ti an atiritta paccayā pācittiyam āha tena eva vakkhati tad nimittakaḥ ti an atiritta nimittakaḥ ti

original: attho. Sabbavikappesūti “suddhaṃ vā manussamaṃsamissaṃ vā sīhādimaṃsamissaṃ vā yāmakālikamissaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ sabba vikappesu iti suddham vā manussa maṃsa missam vā sīha ādi maṃsa missam vā yāmakālika missam

original: vā”ti sabbesu vikappesu. “Tannimittako”ti vacaneneva vāritavikālādinimittassa dosassa sambhavaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: vā ti sabbesu vikappesu tad nimittakaḥ ti vacanena iva vārita vikāla ādi nimittassa dosassa sambhavam dasseti

original: 1382-3. Vikālapaccayā vāti ettha vā-saddena “anatirittapaccayā”ti idaṃ samuccitaṃ.
analyzed: vikāla paccayā vā ti ettha vā saddena anatiritta paccayā ti idam samuccitam

original: Api-saddo “yāmakālikepī”ti yojetabbo. Sattāhakālikaṃ, yāvajīvikaṃ āhārasseva atthāya

original: paṭiggaṇhato gahaṇe, yathāvuttassa sattāhakālikayāvajīvikabhedena duvidhassa tu ajjhohārapayogesu
analyzed: paṭiggaṇhataḥ gahaṇe yathā vuttassa sattāha kālika yāvajīvika bhedena duvidhassa tu ajjhohāra payogesu

original: nirāmise vā dukkaṭanti yojanā. Tu-saddo eva-kārattho.
analyzed: nirāmise vā dukkaṭanti yojanā tu saddaḥ evakāra attho

original: 1384. Athāti vākyārambhe nipāto. Āmisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ, yāvajīvikaṃ vāti yojanā. Gahetvāti paṭiggahetvā. Ṭhapitanti aruṇaṃ atikkāmetvā ṭhapitaṃ. Pācittīti sannidhipācitti.
analyzed: atha ati vākya ārambhe nipātaḥ āmisa saṃsaṭṭham satta aha kālikam yāvajīvikam vā iti yojanā gahetvā iti paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitam ti aruṇam atikkāmetvā ṭhapitam pācitti iti sannidhi pācitti

original: 1385. Kāloti aruṇuggamanādimajjhantikāvasāno kālo. Yāmoti majjhantikādidutiyaaruṇuggamanāvasāno.
analyzed: kālo ti aruṇuggamana ādi majjhantika avasāno kālaḥ yāmo ti majjhantika ādi dutiya aruṇuggamana avasāno

original: Taṃ taṃ kālaṃ kālikaṃ atikkāmayato tu dosoti yojanā. Tu-saddo evakārattho. Taṃ vā
analyzed: tam tam kālam kālikam atikkāmayataḥ tu dosaḥ iti yojanā tu saddaḥ evakāra atthaḥ tam vā

original: kālikanti yathākkamaṃ yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kālikanti yathākkamam yāva kālikam yāma kālikam sattāha kālikam iti vuttam hoti

original: 1386. Yāvakālikaṃ attanā sambhinnāni itarāni tīṇi kālikāni attanoyeva sabhāvaṃ upanetīti yojanā. Sako bhāvo sabhāvo, taṃ.
analyzed: yāvakālikam attanā sambhinnāni itarāni tīṇi kālikāni attanoyā iva sabhāvam upaneti iti yojanā sakaḥ bhāvaḥ sabhāvaḥ tam

original: 1387-8. Evameva viniddiseti “purimaṃ purimaṃ kālikaṃ attanā sammissaṃ pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ attano sabhāvameva gāhāpetī”ti katheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: evam eva viniddiseti purimam purimam kālikam attanā sammissam pacchimam pacchimam attano sabhāvam eva gāhāpeti iti katheyya ati vuttam hoti

original: Imesūtiādīsu niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Antovutthaṃ hotīti akappiyakuṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā aruṇuṭṭhāpanena
analyzed: imesu utiādīsu niddhāraṇe bhummam antovuttham hoti iti akappiya kuṭiyam ṭhapetvā aruṇu ṭṭhāpanena

analyzed: sannidhi ca nāma hoti potthakesu sannidhinti sa anunāsikaḥ pāṭhaḥ dissati hoti iti

original: kiriyāya sambandhattā sannidhi-saddo paṭhamekavacanantoti anunāsiko āgamasandhijoti
analyzed: kiriyāya sannidhi saddo anunāsikaḥ āgama sandhi jaḥ ti

original: veditabbo. Ubhayampīti yathāvuttaṃ antovutthaṃ, sannidhi cāti ubhayampi. Na hotevāti
analyzed: veditabbaḥ ubhayam pi iti yathāvuttam antovuttham sannidhi ca ati ubhayam pi na hotā iva ati

original: purimakālikadvayena amissaṃ na hoteva.
analyzed: purima kālika dvayena amissam na hotā iva

original: 1389. Kappiyakuṭināmena akataṃ, asammataṃ, apariggahaṃ, pākārādīhi parikkhittaṃ senāsanaṃ
analyzed: kappiya kuṭi nāmena a katam a sammatam a pariggaham pākāra ādīhi parikkhittam senāsanam

original: akappiyakuṭi nāmāti saṅkhepato gahetabbaṃ. Antadvayenāti sattāhakālikayāvajīvikena,
analyzed: akappiyakuṭi nāma ati saṅkhepataḥ gahetabbam anta dvayena ati satta aha kālikayā āvajīvikena

original: sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. “Missita”nti seso. Gahitanti paṭiggahitaṃ. Taṃ pubbaṃ dvayanti

analyzed: ṭhapetvā aruṇam uṭṭhāpitena pacchima kālika dvaye yena kenaci sammissam antovuttham

original: nāma hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: nāma hoti iti vuttam hoti

original: 1390. Antovutthena pacchimakālikadvayena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ yadidaṃ purimakālikadvayaṃ, ayaṃ
analyzed: antovutthena pacchima kālika dvayena saṃsaṭṭham yat idam purima kālika dvayam ayam

original: mukhasannidhi nāma hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana antovutthaṃ hoti,
analyzed: mukhasannidhi nāma hoti iti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam mahāpaccariyam pana antovuttham hoti

original: na kappati iti daḷhaṃ katvā vuttanti yojanā.
analyzed: na kappati iti daḷham katvā vuttanti yojanā

analyzed: ubhinnam aṭṭhakathā vacanānam anatthantara tā veditabbā tathā hi mukha saddaḥ antosadda pariyāyaḥ

original: samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
analyzed: samantapāsādikāyam vutto

analyzed: yathā āha sāmaṇeraḥ bhikkhussa taṇḍula ādikam āmisam āharitvā kappiya kuṭiyam nikkhipitvā

analyzed: puna divase pacitvā deti antovuttham na hoti tattha akappiya kuṭiyam nikkhitta sappi ādīsu

original: yaṃ kiñci pakkhipitvā deti, mukhasannidhi nāma hoti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana ‘antovutthaṃ
analyzed: yam kiñci pakkhipitvā deti mukhasannidhi nāma hoti mahāpaccariyam pana antovuttham

original: hotī’ti vuttaṃ, tattha nāmamattameva nānākaraṇa”nti. Nissandehe pana aññathā vutto
analyzed: hoti iti vuttam tattha nāma mattam eva nānākaraṇanti nissandehe pana aññathā vutto

original: viya viññāyati, tatthapi ayameva nayo veditabbo.
analyzed: viya viññāyati tattha api ayam eva nayaḥ veditabbo

original: dhovitvā puna tattha acchodakaṃ vā āsiñcitvā aṅguliyā vā ghaṃsitvā nisnehabhāvo jānitabbo”ti

original: 1393. Paṇītāni bhojanānīti pāḷiyaṃ “seyyathidaṃ? Sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ maccho maṃsaṃ khīraṃ dadhī”ti uddisitvā –

original: “Sappi nāma gosappi vā ajikāsappi vā mahiṃsasappi vā, yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati, tesaṃ
analyzed: sappi nāma go sappi vā ajikā sappi vā mahiṃsa sappi vā yesam maṃsam kappati tesam

original: sappi. Navanītaṃ nāma tesaññeva navanītaṃ. Telaṃ nāma tilatelaṃ sāsapatelaṃ madhukatelaṃ

original: eraṇḍakatelaṃ vasātelaṃ. Madhu nāma makkhikāmadhu. Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbattaṃ.

original: Maccho nāma odako vuccati. Maṃsaṃ nāma yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati, tesaṃ maṃsaṃ. Khīraṃ

original: Dadhi nāma tesaññeva dadhī”ti –
analyzed: dadhi nāma tesaññeva dadhi iti

original: Niddiṭṭhāni nava paṇītabhojanānīti attho. Agilānoti “agilāno nāma yassa vinā paṇītabhojanāni phāsu hotī”ti vutto. Agilānoti ettha “hutvā”ti seso.

original: 1394. Sappinā dehītiādi viññāpanappakāro. Sappibhattanti ettha kiñcāpi sappisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ

analyzed: bhattam sappi ca bhattam ca sappibhattanti viññāyati aṭṭhakathāsu pana sālibhattam

original: viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthī”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā dukkaṭasseva daḷhataraṃ katvā vuttattā

original: 1395. Pācitti pariyāputāti “ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassā”ti evaṃ ajjhohāragaṇanāya pācitti vuttā.
analyzed: pācitti ati ajjhohāre ajjhohāre āpatti pācittiyassa ati evam ajjhohāra gaṇanāya pācitti vuttā

original: 1396. Suddhānīti annena amissāni. Sekhiyesūti sikkhākaraṇīye vuttanti attho.
analyzed: suddhāni iti annena amissāni sekhiyesu ti sikkhākaraṇīye vuttanti attho

original: 1397. Yasmā suddhānaṃ paṇītabhojanānaṃ viññāpetvā paribhuñjanaṃ dukkaṭavisayaṃ, tasmā. Sattadhaññamayanti sāliādīnaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ aññatarassa vikārabhūtaṃ.
analyzed: yasmā suddhānam paṇīta bhojanānam viññāpetvā paribhuñjanam dukkaṭa visayam tasmā sāli ādīnam sattannam dhaññānam aññatarassa vikāra bhūtam

original: 1398. Sace dadātīti yojanā. Visaṅketanti anāpatti hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.

original: 1399. Deti ceti sambandho. Aññatarenāti sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. “Bhatta”nti adhikārato

analyzed: labbhati assa bhikkhussa visaṅketanti aññam yācitassa aññassa dinna ttā saṅketassa

original: virādhanena anāpattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: virādhanena anāpatti iti vuttam hoti

original: 1400. Yena yena hīti etthāpi tatheva karaṇavacanaṃ. “Viññatta”nti idaṃ adhikatassa
analyzed: yena yena hi iti ettha api tathā iva karaṇa vacanam viññattam ti idam adhikatassa

analyzed: laddhe sati tassa tassa mūle pi laddhā iti vicchā vasena yojanā

original: āpattiṃ āpajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: āpattim āpajjati iti vuttam hoti

analyzed: na aññathā ati sappim yācitavataḥ imam gahetvā sappim katvā gaṇhatha iti avatvā sappi

analyzed: natthi idam gaṇhatha ati vatvā vā tuṇhībhūtena vā navanīta ādīsu kismiñci dinne visesa viññāpakassa

original: 1401. Pāḷiyanti pubbe dassitaṃ “sappi nāma gosappī”tiādiṃ niddesapāḷimāha. Yathāha “pāḷiyaṃ āgatanavanītādīni ṭhapetvā”tiādi. Aññehi navanītādīhi. Sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
analyzed: pāḷiyanti pubbe dassitam sappi nāma gosappī itiādim niddesa pāḷim āha yathā āha pāḷiyam āgata navanīta ādīni ṭhapetvā atiādi aññehi navanīta ādīhi sahatthe karaṇavacanam

original: 1402. “Viññāpetvā”ti imassa kammabhūtaṃ “bhatta”nti adhikataṃ. Gāthābandhavasena
analyzed: viññāpetvā ti imassa kamma bhūtam bhattan ti adhikatam gāthābandha vasena

original: vā-saddassa rasso kato. Ekato vāti yojanā, “nānato”tipi gahitameva, ekaṭṭhānato vā
analyzed: vā saddassa rasso kataḥ ekatas vā ti yojanā gahitam eva eka ṭṭhānataḥ vā

original: nānaṭṭhānato vāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha “sace pana sabbehipi sappiādīhi ekaṭṭhāne
analyzed: nāna ṭṭhānataḥ vā iti vuttam hoti yathā āha sace pana sabbehi pi sappi ādīhi eka ṭṭhāne

original: vā nānaṭṭhāne vā viññāpetvā”tiādi. Teneva bhuñjatīti ettha parikappasūcakaṃ “ce”ti
analyzed: vā nāna ṭṭhāne vā viññāpetvā atiādi tena iva bhuñjati iti ettha parikappa sūcakam ca iti

original: idañca avakaṃsasandassanatthaṃ “kusaggena ekabindumpī”ti idañca ajjhāharitabbaṃ.
analyzed: idam ca avakaṃsa sandassana attham kusaggena eka bindum pi iti idam ca ajjhāharitabbam

original: Matāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ sandhāyāha. Ekato vā nānato vā ṭhānā bhattaṃ viññāpetvā
analyzed: matā ti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam sandhāya āha ekatas vā nānatas vā ṭhānā bhattam viññāpetvā

original: ekarasaṃ katvā antamaso kusaggena ekabindumpi bhuñjati ce, nava pācittiyo matāti yojanā.
analyzed: eka rasam katvā antamasaḥ kusaggena eka bindum pi bhuñjati ce nava pācittiyaḥ matā ati yojanā

original: 1403. Akappiyena sappinā dehīti vuttepīti yojanā, sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. “Bhatta”nti
analyzed: akappiyena sappinā dehi iti vutte pi iti yojanā sahatthe karaṇa vacanam bhattanti

original: adhikataṃ. “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati, tesaṃ sappī”ti vuttappakārassa vipariyāyato akappiyaṃ
analyzed: adhikatam yesam maṃsam kappati tesam sappi iti vutta ppakārassa vipariyāyataḥ akappiyam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena ce detīti yadi tena yācitena teneva akappiyena saddhiṃ odanaṃ detīti.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam tena ce deti iti yadi tena yācitena tena iva akappiyena saddhim odanam deti iti

original: 1404. Tathāsaññissāti tathāsaññino, gilānomhītisaññinoti attho. Yathāha “gilāno gilānasaññī, anāpattī”ti.
analyzed: tathāsaññissa ati tathāsaññinaḥ gilānaḥ asmi iti saññinaḥ atthaḥ yathā āha gilānaḥ gilāna saññī anāpatti iti

original: 1405. Gilānakāle viññattaṃ agilānassa bhuñjato anāpatti pakāsitāti yojanā. Evamitarehipi
analyzed: gilāna kāle viññattam a gilānassa bhuñjataḥ anāpatti pakāsitā ati yojanā evam itarehi pi

original: dvīhi padehi yojetabbaṃ. Yathāha “anāpatti gilāno hutvā viññāpetvā agilāno bhuñjatī”tiādi.
analyzed: dvīhi padehi yojetabbam yathā āha anāpatti gilānaḥ hutvā viññāpetvā agilānaḥ bhuñjati itiādi

original: Ñātakādīnanti ettha “āyatta”nti seso. Ādi-saddena “pavāritānaṃ aññassatthāya attano
analyzed: ñātaka ādīnam ti ettha āyattam ti sesaḥ ādi saddena pavāritānam aññassa atthāya attano

original: dhanena ummattakassa ādikammikassā”ti idaṃ saṅgaṇhātīti.
analyzed: dhanena ummattakassa ādikammikassa ati idam saṅgaṇhāti iti

original: 1406. Cattāri samuṭṭhānāni dassetumāha “kāyato”tiādi.
analyzed: cattāri samuṭṭhānāni dassetum āha kāyataḥ tiādi

original: Paṇītabhojanakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: paṇīta bhojana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1407. “Adinna”nti iminā adinnādānasikkhāpade viya parapariggahitaṃ avatvā appaṭiggahitameva
analyzed: adinnam ti iminā adinnādāna sikkhāpade viya para pariggahitam avatvā a paṭiggahitam eva

original: vattabbaṃ. Yathāha “adinnaṃ nāma appaṭiggahitakaṃ vuccatī”ti. Mukhadvāranti mukhe
analyzed: vattabbam yathā āha adinnam nāma appaṭiggahitakam vuccati iti mukha dvāram ti mukhe

analyzed: dvāram mukha dvāram gala nāḷikā iminā pana vacanena yam kiñci ajjhoharaṇīyam tam

original: udakadantaponehi aññaṃ ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikādiṃ. Yathāha “āhāro nāma
analyzed: udaka danta ponehi aññam ajjhoharitabbam yam kiñci yāvakālikā ādim yathā āha āhāraḥ nāma

original: udakadantaponaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci ajjhoharaṇīya”nti.
analyzed: udaka danta ponam ṭhapetvā yam kiñci

original: Āhareyyāti mukhadvāraṃ paveseyya, iminā paragalaṃ akatvā mukhena paṭiggahitaggahaṇepi
analyzed: āhareyya ati mukha dvāram paveseyya iminā para galam a katvā mukhena paṭiggahita ggahaṇe pi

original: natthi dosoti sūcitaṃ. Tenevāha “dantaponodakaṃ hitvā”ti. Teneva vuttaṃ gaṇṭhipade
analyzed: natthi doso ti sūcitam tena iva āha danta ponodakam hitvā iti tena iva vuttam gaṇṭhi pade

original: “bhagavato dantakaṭṭhassa mukhadvāraṭhapane anāpattivacaneneva yaṃ kiñci vatthuṃ
analyzed: bhagavataḥ dantakaṭṭhassa mukha dvāra ṭhapane anāpatti vacanena iva yam kiñci vatthum

original: paragalaṃ akatvā mukhe ṭhapane anāpattibhāvo vutto”ti. Udakañhi yathāsukhaṃ pātuṃ,
analyzed: para galam a katvā mukhe ṭhapane anāpatti bhāvaḥ vuttaḥ ti udakam hi yathāsukham pātum

original: dantakaṭṭhañca dantaponaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, tassa pana rasaṃ gilituṃ
analyzed: danta kaṭṭham ca danta pona paribhogena paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati tassa pana rasam gilitum

original: na vaṭṭati. Sacepi dantakaṭṭharaso ajānantassa anto pavisati, pācittiyameva. Dante
analyzed: na vaṭṭati sace pi danta kaṭṭha rasaḥ a jānantassa antaḥ pavisati pācittiyam eva dante

original: punanti nimmale karonti etenāti dantaponaṃ.
analyzed: punanti nimmale karonti etena ati danta ponam

original: 1408-9. Byatirekamukhena adinnalakkhaṇaṃ, padabhājane ca vuttanayena paṭhamaṃ dinnalakkhaṇaṃ dassento āha “hatthapāso”tiādi. Hatthapāsoti pavāraṇasikkhāpade –
analyzed: byatireka mukhena adinna lakkhaṇam pada bhājane ca vutta nayena paṭhamam dinna lakkhaṇam dassentaḥ āha hattha pāsa itiādi hattha pāso ti pavāraṇa sikkhāpade

original: “Gaṇhato pacchimaṃ aṅgaṃ, dadato purimaṃ pana;
analyzed: gaṇhataḥ pacchimam aṅgam dadataḥ purimam pana

original: Ubhinnaṃ aḍḍhateyyaṃ ce, vinā hatthaṃ pasārita”nti. –
analyzed: ubhinnam aḍḍhateyyam ce vinā hattham

original: Vuttalakkhaṇo hatthapāso. Abhinīhāroti tattheva vuttanayena abhimukhaṃ katvā haraṇañca.
analyzed: vutta lakkhaṇaḥ hattha pāsaḥ abhinīhāraḥ ti tattha eva vutta nayena abhimukham katvā haraṇam ca

original: Majjhimuccāraṇakkhamoti paṭiggahetabbabhārassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena thāmamajjhimena
analyzed: majjhima uccāraṇa kkhamaḥ ti paṭiggahetabba bhārassa ukkaṭṭha paricchedena thāma majjhimena

original: purisena ukkhipanārahatā. Bhāvappadhānoyaṃ niddeso. Avakaṃso pana “antamaso rathareṇumattampī”ti
analyzed: purisena ukkhipana arahatā bhāva ppadhānaḥ yam niddesaḥ avakaṃso pana antamasaḥ ratha reṇu mattam pi iti

original: aṭṭhakathāvacanato veditabbo. Uccāraṇaṃ ukkhipanaṃ. “Amanusso”ti iminā tadaññasattasāmaññena
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā vacanataḥ veditabbaḥ uccāraṇam ukkhipanam amanussaḥ ti iminā tad añña satta sāmaññena

original: tiracchānagatāpi veditabbā. “Pakkhī vā”tiādivakkhamānena vā veditabbā. Kāyādināti
analyzed: tiracchāna gatā api veditabbā pakkhī vā ati ādi vakkhamānena vā veditabbā kāya ādinā ati

original: kāyakāyapaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ aññatarena. Tenevāha “tidhā”ti.

original: Dvidhāti kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā. Pañcaṅgasaṃyogeti ettha “hatthapāso”ti paṭhamaṅgaṃ,
analyzed: dvidhā ati kāyena vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā pañcaṅga saṃyoga iti ettha hattha pāso ti paṭhama aṅgam

original: “abhinīhāro”ti dutiyaṃ, “majjhimuccāraṇakkhamo”ti tatiyaṃ, “manusso…pe… tidhā”ti
analyzed: abhinīhāro ti dutiyam majjhima uccāraṇa khamaḥ ti tatiyam manussa upe tidhā

analyzed: saṃyogo samāgamaḥ sannipāto pañcaṅga saṃyogo tasmin gahaṇanti paṭiggahaṇam tassa

original: bhikkhuno. Rūhati sampajjati.
analyzed: bhikkhunaḥ rūhati sampajjati

original: 1410-12. Itaroti paṭiggāhako. Tassa aṅgassa. Na gacchatīti nago, “nago”ti rukkhopi pabbatopi vuccati. Evarūpeti īdise uccanīcaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: itaro ti paṭiggāhako tassa aṅgassa na gacchati iti nagaḥ nagaḥ iti rukkhaḥ pi pabbataḥ pi vuccati evarūpe iti īdise ucca nīca ṭṭhāne

original: 1413. Soṇḍāyāti hatthena.
analyzed: soṇḍāyāti hatthena

original: 1415-6. Īsakaṃ onatvā thokaṃ nāmetvā tena bhikkhunā taṃ heṭṭhimaṃ bhājanaṃ ekadesenāpi paṭicchitabbanti yojanā.
analyzed: īsakam onatvā thokam nāmetvā tena bhikkhunā tam heṭṭhimam bhājanam eka desena api paṭicchitabbanti yojanā

original: 1417. Ugghāṭetvā uccāretvā, bhājanāni visuṃ visuṃ oropetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ugghāṭetvā uccāretvā bhājanāni visum visum oropetvā iti vuttam hoti

original: 1418. Kājabhattanti bhattakājaṃ, bhattabharitaṃ piṭakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Onatvā detīti sayaṃ onamitvā byābhaṅgiṃ deti.
analyzed: kājabhattanti bhatta kājam bhatta bharitam piṭakanti vuttam hoti onatvā deti iti sayam onamitvā byābhaṅgim deti

original: 1419. “Tiṃsahattho”ti idaṃ tiṃsaratanamatto ce hoti, “dūra”nti na parisaṅkitabboti
analyzed: tiṃsa hatthaḥ ti idam ce hoti dūram ti na

original: dassanatthamāha. Gahitekasminti ubhayakoṭīsu ṭhapite dve ghaṭe paṭiggahāpetuṃ hatthapāse

analyzed: ṭhitena dāyakena diyyamānam tiṃsa hattha veṇum paṭiggaṇhantena yena kenacid kāya ppadesena

original: vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā “imaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā mañcādīsu yattha katthaci phusitvā
analyzed: vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā imam gaṇhāmi iti ābhogam katvā mañca ādīsu yattha katthaci phusitvā

original: paṭiggahiteti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ sabbanti tesu dvīsu ghaṭesu pakkhittaṃ sabbameva.
analyzed: paṭiggahitā iti vuttam hoti tat sabbam ti tesu dvīsu ghaṭesu pakkhittam sabbam eva

original: Gahitamevāti paṭiggahitameva hoti, dāyakassa hatthapāsabbhantare gatattā idaṃ tassa
analyzed: gahitam eva ati paṭiggahitam eva hoti dāyakassa hattha pāsa abbhantare gata ttā idam tassa

analyzed: kāya paṭibaddhanti dūranti saṅkā na kātabbā ati eva kārena dīpeti dvīsu ghaṭesu bhūmiyam

original: ṭhapitesupi tattha bandhanaveḷuyaṃ paṭiggaṇhanamatteneva paṭiggahitaṃ hotī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhapitesu pi tattha bandhana veḷuyam paṭiggaṇhana mattena iva paṭiggahitam hoti iti gaṇṭhi pade vuttam

original: 1420-24. “Kaṭasārake”ti iminā doṇiphalakādayo upalakkhitā. “Nisīdatī”ti idaṃ “tiṭṭhatī”tiādīnaṃ
analyzed: kaṭasāraka iti iminā doṇi phalaka ādayaḥ upalakkhitāḥ nisīdati iti idam tiṭṭhati iti ādīnam

analyzed: upalakkhaṇam mañca ādīni phusitvā iti ettha aṅguliyā api iti sesaḥ yathā āha paṭiggahaṇa saññāya

original: mañcādīni aṅguliyāpi phusitvā ṭhitena vā nisinnena vā nipannena vā”tiādi. Pattesūti

original: tathā ṭhapitesu sabbesu pattesuyeva. Yañca dīyatīti ettha “tathā ṭhitenā”ti sāmatthiyā labbhati.
analyzed: tathā ṭhapitesu sabbesu yat ca dīyati iti ettha tathā ṭhitena ati sāmatthiyā labbhati

original: Mañcādīsu aṅguliādinā yena kenaci phuṭṭhamattepi paṭiggahaṇassa ruhaṇabhāvaṃ dassetvā

original: idāni tadārohaṇenāpi sijjhatīti dassetumāha “paṭiggahessāmī”tiādi. Sace pana paṭiggahessāmicceva

original: mañcādīni āruhitvā nisīdati, dāyakopi hatthapāse ṭhatvāna deti ce, taṃ sabbaṃ gahitaṃ hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: mañca ādīni āruhitvā nisīdati dāyakaḥ api hattha pāse deti ce tam sabbam gahitam hoti iti yojanā

original: Kucchiyā kucchiṃ āhacca ye pattā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā, tesu yaṃ yaṃ pattaṃ aṅguliyāpi vā sūciyāpi vā phusitvā nisinno, tattha tattheva dīyamānampi paṭiggaṇhāti, vaṭṭatīti yojanā.

original: 1425. Kaṭasārādayo sace mahantā, paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruheyyāti vikappo siyāti tannivattanatthamāha
analyzed: kaṭa sāra ādayo sace mahantā paṭiggahaṇam na ruheyya iti vikappaḥ siyā iti tad nivattana attham āha

original: “kaṭasārake”tiādi. “Mahantasmi”nti iminā kaṭasārakassa puna vacane hetumāha. Hatthattharaṃ
analyzed: kaṭasāraka itiādi mahantasmin ti iminā kaṭasārakassa puna vacane hetum āha hatthattharam

original: nāma hatthipiṭṭhe attharitabbaṃ attharaṇaṃ. Ādi-saddena assatthararathattharādiṃ

original: vijjamāne tū”ti. Tu-saddo vuttavisesameva joteti.
analyzed: vijjamāne tu iti tu saddaḥ vutta visesam eva

original: 1426. Tatthajātakapaṇṇesūti rukkheyeva ṭhitesu paṇṇesu. Gahetunti paṭiggahetuṃ. “Na panetānī”tiādi yena hetunā na vaṭṭati, tassa dassanaṃ. Hi-saddo pasiddhiṃ sūceti.
analyzed: tattha jātaka paṇṇesu iti ṭhitesu paṇṇesu gahetum ti paṭiggahetum na pana itāni itiādi yena hetunā na vaṭṭati tassa dassanam hi saddaḥ pasiddhim sūceti

original: 1427. Thāmamajjhimena purisena ukkhipituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ asaṃhāriyaṃ. Tādiseti tathārūpe, asaṃhāriyeti vuttaṃ hoti. Khāṇubaddheti bhūmiyaṃ nikhātakhāṇuke baddhe.
analyzed: thāma majjhimena purisena ukkhipitum a sakkuṇeyyam a saṃhāriyam tādisā iti tathārūpe asaṃhāriyā iti vuttam hoti khāṇu baddhā iti bhūmiyam nikhāta khāṇuke baddhe

original: 1428. Tintiṇikāti ciñcā. Ādi-saddena tathā khuddakānaṃ kadambapupphapaṇṇādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: tintiṇikā iti ciñcā ādi saddena tathā khuddakānam kadamba puppha paṇṇa ādīnam gahaṇam

original: “Tintiṇikādipaṇṇesū”ti vacanato sākhāsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhūmiyaṃ

original: patthaṭesūti yojetabbaṃ. Yathāha “bhūmiyaṃ atthatesu sukhumesu tintiṇikādipaṇṇesupi
analyzed: patthaṭesu iti yojetabbam yathā āha bhūmiyam atthatesu su khumesu tintiṇika ādi paṇṇesu pi

original: paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatī”ti.
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇam na ruhati iti

original: 1429. Parivesakoti dāyako.
analyzed: parivesakaḥ uti dāyakaḥ

original: 1430. Asesato puñchitvāti yojanā.
analyzed: puñchitvā iti yojanā

original: 1431. Paṭiggahetvāvāti pattaṃ paṭiggahetvāva. Bhikkhā gahetabbāti sambandho.
analyzed: paṭiggahetvā ava iti pattam paṭiggahetvā ava bhikkhā gahetabbā iti sambandho

original: 1433. Anādiyitvāti aggahetvā, tasmiṃ vacane ādaraṃ akatvāti vuttaṃ hoti.

original: 1435. Aññassa anupasampannassa.
analyzed: aññassa an upasampannassa

analyzed: yāgu ādīnam pacane bhikkhūnam bhājane iti sambandhaḥ pacanti ettha ati pacanam

analyzed: na karoti ettha kāraṇam āha yasmā

original: 1475-6. Ekassa gahaṇūpagaṃ ce bhāranti thāmamajjhimena ekena purisena ukkhipanappamāṇaṃ bhāraṃ sace bhaveyya. “Tathā”ti iminā “ekassa gahaṇūpagaṃ bhāra”nti idaṃ paccāmasati.

original: 1477. Laggentīti olambanti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ mañcapīṭhe. Vaṭṭatevāti uggahitakaṃ na hotīti dīpeti.
analyzed: laggenti iti olambanti tattha ati tasmim mañca pīṭhe vaṭṭatā iva ati uggahitakam na hoti iti dīpeti

original: 1478. Sammujjantoti sammajjanto. Ghaṭṭetīti asañcicca sammajjaniyā phusati.

original: 1479. Taṃ ñatvāti paṭiggahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā. Ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati uggahitakaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.

original: 1480. Tanti paṭiggahitasaññāya gahitaṃ taṃ appaṭiggahitaṃ. Aññathā pana na kattabbanti apihitaṃ pidhātuñca pihitaṃ vivarituñca na vaṭṭatīti attho.

original: 1481. Bahi ṭhapeti ceti yadi pubbe ṭhapitaṭṭhānato bahi ṭhapeti. Tenāti bahi ṭhapetvā
analyzed: bahi ṭhapeti ca iti yadi pubbe ṭhapita ṭṭhānato bahi ṭhapeti tena ati bahi ṭhapetvā

original: ñatvā. Taṃ tathā ñatvā ṭhapitaṃ.
analyzed: ñatvā tam tathā ñatvā

original: 1482-3. Uṭṭheti yadi kaṇṇikāti sace kaṇṇikā sañjāyati. Siṅgiverādiketi ettha ādi-saddena

analyzed: pipphali ādīnam gahaṇam mūla iti pañcamūla ādike mūle ghuṇa cuṇṇam ti ghuṇa pāṇakehi uppādita cuṇṇam

original: 1484-5. Koci puggaloti sāmaṇeragamikādīsupi yo koci satto. Tālapiṇḍinti tālakaṇṇikaṃ phalaṃ. Añño bhūmaṭṭhoti bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito añño koci puggalo itthī vā puriso vā.

original: 1486. Chinditvāti chindaṃ katvā. Vatinti hatthapāsappahonakabahalavatiṃ. Yathāha
analyzed: chinditvā iti chindam katvā vatim ti hattha pāsa ppahonaka bahala vatim yathā āha

original: bahi patitabhaṇḍaṃ viyā”ti.

original: iminā yojetabbaṃ. Sace phalaṃ khādati, evaṃ khādituṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Makkhikānaṃ

original: 1496-9. Bhikkhussa pātheyyataṇḍuleti sambandho. Soti sāmaṇero. Itarehīti bhikkhunā gahitehi attano taṇḍulehi.
analyzed: bhikkhussa pātheyya taṇḍulā iti sambandhaḥ saḥ ti sāmaṇeraḥ itarehi iti bhikkhunā gahitehi attano taṇḍulehi

original: 1502-4. Niccāletuṃ na sakkotīti niccāletvā sakkharā apanetuṃ na sakkoti. Celakoti

original: 1515-6. Loṇakiccanti alavaṇaṭṭhāne loṇena kātabbakiccaṃ. Sannihitasesakālikasammissaṃ

original: 1518. Kasitaṭṭhāneti kaṭṭhaṭṭhāne. Na vaṭṭati appaṭiggahitaṃ. Evaṃ sabbattha.
analyzed: kasita ṭṭhāne iti kaṭṭha ṭṭhāne na vaṭṭati a paṭiggahitam evam sabbattha

original: 1520. Pānīyassa ghaṭeti pānīyaghaṭe. Taṃ pānīyaghaṭaṃ.
analyzed: pānīyassa ghaṭa iti pānīya ghaṭe tam pānīya ghaṭam

original: 1522. Visatīti antogalaṃ pavisati. Teneva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “appaṭiggahetvā ṭhapitaṃ
analyzed: visati iti antogalam pavisati tena iva aṭṭhakathāyam a paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitam

original: paṭiggahetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ “aññatra udakadantaponā”ti pāḷiyā
analyzed: paṭiggahetabbanti vuttam idam aṭṭhakathā vacanam aññatra pāḷiyā

analyzed: virujjhati iti ce na virujjhati sā hi kevalam danta kiccam sandhāya vuttā idam rasam

analyzed: sandhāya vuttam ti tena iva tad anantaram a jānantassa rase paviṭṭhe pi āpattiyā iva acittakam hi

analyzed: idam sikkhāpadanti vuttam tassa sikkhāpadassa acittaka tā appaṭiggahitake paṭiggahita saññī iti ādikāya

analyzed: pātabba tāya dantakaṭṭhena sadisa ttā eka yoga niddiṭṭhānam saha iva pavatti iti viññāyati

original: Udakassa ca dantaponassa ca tulyadosena bhavitabbanti.
analyzed: udakassa ca danta ponassa ca tulya dosena bhavitabbanti

original: 1523. Muttodakasiṅghāṇikādidravaassukhīrādidravassa āpodhātuppakārattā, kaṇṇamalādino
analyzed: kaṇṇa mala ādinaḥ

original: ghanadabbassa pathavidhātuppakārattā “sarīraṭṭhesu bhūtesū”ti iminā khīrādimāha.

original: sāmatthiyā labbhati.
analyzed: sāmatthiyā labbhati

original: 1524. Loṇanti ettha “etaṃ sabbampī”ti idaṃ adhikārato labbhati.
analyzed: ettha etam sabbam pi iti idam adhikārataḥ labbhati

original: 1525. Etthāti etesu yathāvuttesu kaṇṇamalādīsu.
analyzed: ettha iti etesu yathā vuttesu kaṇṇa mala ādīsu

original: 1528. Cattāri vikaṭānīti mahāvikaṭaṃ nāma gūthaṃ, mattikā, muttaṃ, chārikā cāti vuttāni
analyzed: cattāri vikaṭāni iti mahāvikaṭam nāma gūtham mattikā muttam chārikā ca ati vuttāni

original: cattāri vikaṭāni. Tāni hi viruddhāni sappavisāni katāni vihatānīti “vikaṭānī”ti vuccanti.
analyzed: cattāri vikaṭāni tāni hi viruddhāni sa pavisāni katāni vihatāni iti vikaṭāni iti vuccanti

original: Natthi dāyako etthāti nadāyakaṃ, ṭhānaṃ, tasmiṃ. “Na a no mā alaṃ paṭisedhe”ti vuttattā
analyzed: natthi dāyakaḥ ettha ati na dāyakam ṭhānam tasmin na a no mā alam paṭisedha iti vutta ttā

original: paṭisedhavācinā na-saddena samāso, “adāyake”ti iminā anatthantaraṃ. Idha dubbaco
analyzed: paṭisedha vācinā na saddena samāsaḥ iminā anatthantaram idha dubbacaḥ

original: ca asamattho ca asanto nāmāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Idaṃ kālodissaṃ nāma.
analyzed: ca asamattho ca asantaḥ nāma ati aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam idam kālodissam nāma

original: 1529. Pathavinti akappiyapathaviṃ. Tarunti allarukkhaṃ. Iminā sappadaṭṭhakāle asati kappiyakārake vikaṭatthāya attanā ca kattabbanti dasseti.
analyzed: pathavinti akappiya pathavim tarunti alla rukkham iminā sappadaṭṭha kāle asati kappiya kārake vikaṭa atthāya attanā ca kattabbanti dasseti

original: 1530. Acchedagāhatoti vilumpitvā gaṇhanato. “Tassā”ti idaṃ sabbehi hetupadehi yujjati.
analyzed: accheda gāhataḥ ti vilumpitvā gaṇhanataḥ tassa ati idam sabbehi hetu padehi yujjati

original: Tassāti appaṭiggahitassāti attho. Aparassa abhikkhukassa dānena cāti yojanā. “Abhikkhukassā”ti
analyzed: tassa ti a paṭiggahitassa ti attho aparassa abhikkhukassa dānena ca ati yojanā abhikkhukassa ati

original: pana visesanena upasampannassa dinne paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti dīpeti. Sabbanti

analyzed: cittam uppannam tassa sāmantā dvādasa hattha abbhantare ṭhitam bhikkhunti atthaḥ yathā āha

analyzed: yam dvādasa hattha abbhantare ṭhitena sotum sakkā bhaveyya tam pakativacanam nāma

original: Anāpucchāti “ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “cārittaṃ āpucchāmī”ti vā īdisena

analyzed: vacanena an āpucchitvā cārittam āpajjeyya ca iti yadi sañcareyya ati vuttam hoti aññatra

analyzed: vuttā duvidhā samayāḥ aññasmin kāle

original: Āpattibhedaṃ dassetumāha “ṭhapetvā”tiādi. “Avītivatte majjhanhe”ti iminā purebhattaṃ,
analyzed: āpatti bhedam dassetum āha ṭhapetvā itiādi iminā purebhattam

original: pacchābhattañca saṅgahitaṃ. Ettha ca purebhattaṃ pacchābhattanti yena bhattena nimantito,
analyzed: pacchābhattam ca saṅgahitam ettha ca purebhattam pacchābhattam ti yena bhattena nimantitaḥ

original: tasmiṃ abhutte vā bhutte vāti attho. Yathāha “purebhattaṃ nāma yena nimantito, taṃ
analyzed: tasmin a bhutte vā bhutte vā ati atthaḥ yathā āha purebhattam nāma yena nimantitaḥ tam

analyzed: a bhuttāvī pacchābhattam nāma yena nimantito tam antamasaḥ kusaggena api bhuttam hoti iti

original: padabhājane vuttaṃ. Aññassa gharanti nimantitato aññassa gehaṃ. Gharūpacārokkamane

original: Gharummāreti aññassa gehummāre. Gharūpacāre dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya “aparampi cā”ti vuttaṃ.

original: “Yaṃ passe vā abhimukhe vā passatī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.

original: 1558. Dūreti dvādasahatthato dūramevāha. Ito cito ca gavesitvā ārocane kiccaṃ natthīti yojanā.
analyzed: dūra iti dvādasa hatthataḥ dūram eva āha itas citas ca gavesitvā ārocane kiccam natthi iti yojanā

original: 1559. Na dosoti anāpatti. Samayeti ettha “anāpucchato”ti seso. Ettha ca upari ca

original: ettha “gharūpacārena cā”ti seso. Ārāmaṃ gacchatoti ettha tena maggenāti vuttaṃ hoti.

original: 1560. “Tena maggenā”ti ca “gacchato”ti ca padadvayaṃ “titthiyānaṃ passaya”nti ca

original: vā, bhojanasālanti attho. “Āpadāyāsanasāla”nti vattabbe gāthābandhavasena yakāralopo.

original: Bhattiyassa gharanti nimantitagharaṃ vā salākabhattadāyakānaṃ vā gharaṃ.

analyzed: pavesanam kriyam anāpucchanam akriyam acittaka samuṭṭhāna missaka ttā acittanti

original: Cārittakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: cāritta kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1562. “Sabbā”ti idaṃ vivaranto “catumāsapavāraṇā punapavāraṇā niccapavāraṇā”ti pavāraṇattayaṃ
analyzed: idam

original: dasseti. Ettha ca “catumāsapaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbāti gilānapaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā”ti

original: padabhājane vuttaṃ. Punapavāraṇā ca cattāroyeva māse bhesajjena pavāraṇaṃ. Tenāha
analyzed: pada bhājane vuttam puna pavāraṇā ca māse bhesajjena pavāraṇam tena āha

analyzed: tena hi tvam mahā nāma saṅgham aparam pi catu māsam bhesajjena pavārehi iti

original: Niccapavāraṇā nāma yāvajīvaṃ bhesajjeheva pavāraṇā. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ

original: “tena hi tvaṃ mahānāma saṅghaṃ yāvajīvaṃ bhesajjena pavārehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi tvam mahā nāma saṅgham yāvajīvam bhesajjena pavārehi iti

original: Sabbā cetā pavāraṇā bhesajjapariyantarattipariyantatadubhayapariyantaapariyantavasena catubbidhā honti. Yathāha –

original: Rattipariyantā nāma rattiyo pariggahitāyo honti ‘ettakāsu rattīsu pavāremī’ti. Bhesajjapariyantā

original: nāma bhesajjāni ca apariggahitāni honti rattiyo ca apariggahitāyo hontī”ti.

original: 1563. “Sāditabbā”ti vutte sādiyanappakāre dassetumāha “viññāpessāmī”tiādi. Bhesajjampi
analyzed: sāditabbā ati vutte sādiyana ppakāre dassetum āha viññāpessāmi itiādi bhesajjam pi

analyzed: dassetum āha na paṭikkhipitabbā ti paṭikkhepa kāraṇam dassetum āha roga udāni na mā iti

original: cā”ti. Sā tividhā pavāraṇā.
analyzed: ca ati sā tividhā pavāraṇā

original: 1565. Tato catumāsato uttari atirekaṃ tatuttari, tatuttari na hotīti natatuttari,

original: Yehi bhesajjehi pavārito, tāni viññāpentassa anāpattīti saha sesena yojetabbaṃ. Yathāha
analyzed: yehi bhesajjehi pavārito tāni viññāpentassa anāpatti iti saha sesena yojetabbam yathā āha

analyzed: anāpatti yehi bhesajjehi pavāritaḥ hoti tāni bhesajjāni viññāpeti iti yena vā yehi

analyzed: attho ti ācikkhitvā viññāpeti yāsu tayā rattīsu pavāritamha tāyo ca rattiyaḥ vītivattā

original: adhikaṃ viññāpentassāti attho.
analyzed: adhikam viññāpentassa ati attho

original: 1566. Aññassa bhikkhussa atthāya vā viññāpentassa bhikkhussa anāpattīti yojanā. Ñātakānaṃ

analyzed: viññāpentassa anāpatti iti ettha ñātakānam santakam viññāpentassa anāpatti iti attho

original: Attano vā dhanena viññāpentassa anāpattīti yojanā. Ettha dhanaṃ nāma taṇḍulādi kappiyavatthu.
analyzed: attanaḥ vā dhanena viññāpentassa anāpatti iti yojanā ettha dhanam nāma taṇḍula ādi kappiya vatthu

original: 1567. “Tathā”ti iminā “viññāpentassā”ti idaṃ paccāmasati. Ummattakādīnanti visesitabbamapekkhitvā “viññāpentāna”nti bahuvacanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: tathā ti iminā viññāpentassa ati idam paccāmasati ummattaka ādīnam ti visesitabbam apekkhitvā viññāpentānam ti bahuvacanam kātabbam

original: Bhesajjakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: bhesajja kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1568. Uyyuttanti saṅgāmatthāya katauyyogaṃ, gāmato nikkhamma gacchantaṃ vā ekattha

analyzed: sanniviṭṭham vā yathā āha uyyuttā nāma senā gāmataḥ nikkhamitvā niviṭṭhā vā hoti payātā

original: vā”ti. Aññatra paccayāti ṭhapetvā tathārūpapaccayaṃ.
analyzed: vā ati aññatra paccayā ti ṭhapetvā tathārūpa paccayam

original: 1569. Dassanassupacārasminti ettha dassanūpacāraṃ nāma yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitassa senā

original: vimuñcitvā passantassāti yathāvuttadassanopacāraṭṭhānaṃ ettha ṭhatvā oloketuṃ na

original: sukarantiādinā kāraṇena taṃ ṭhānaṃ pahāya aññattha vilokentassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kenaci

original: paṭicchannaṃ hutvā adissamānampi ninnaṃ ṭhānaṃ otiṇṇaṃ apaññāyamānampi paññāyantampi

analyzed: oloketum na sakkā evam eva vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ yathā āha kenaci antaritāḥ vā ninnam

original: oruḷhā vā na dissatī”tiādi. Payogatoti yathāvuttadassanapayogagaṇanāya.
analyzed: oruḷhā vā na dissati itiādi payogato ti yathāvutta dassana payoga gaṇanāya

original: 1570. Idāni caturaṅgasenālakkhaṇaṃ dassetumāha “ārohā pana cattāro”tiādi. Ārohāti
analyzed: idāni caturaṅga senā lakkhaṇam dassetum āha ārohā pana cattāro ti ādi āroha ati

original: ettha hatthārohā daṭṭhabbā. Tappādarakkhakāti tassa pādarakkhakāti viggaho. Dve dveti

original: ekekaṃ pādaṃ rakkhantā dve dve. Dvādasaposoti dvādasa posā etassāti viggaho. Dvādasapurisayutto eko hatthī nāma.
analyzed: ekekam pādam rakkhantā dve dve dvādasa poso ti dvādasa posāḥ etassa ati viggaho dvādasa purisa yuttaḥ ekaḥ hatthī nāma

original: 1571. Ārohoti ettha assāroho vuccati. Tipurisoti tayo purisā assāti viggaho. Hayoti
analyzed: āroho ti ettha assa ārohaḥ vuccati ti puriso ti tayo purisāḥ assa ati viggaho hayo ti

original: asso. Eko sārathīti rathacāriko. “Yodho eko”ti padacchedo. Āṇirakkhāti rathacakkadvayassa

original: “Apaccuddhaṭato”ti iminā “na kappatī”ti etassa hetuṃ dasseti.
analyzed: a paccuddhaṭato ti iminā na kappati iti etassa hetum dasseti

original: 1635. “Santaka”miccādi paccuddharaṇappakāro. Yathāpaccayaṃ karohīti tuyhaṃ ruccanakaṃ karohīti attho.
analyzed: santakam iccādi paccuddharaṇa ppakāraḥ yathāpaccayam karohi iti tuyham ruccanakam karohi iti attho

original: 1636. Sammukhāvikappantaraṃ dassetumāha “aparā sammukhā vuttā”tiādi. Attanā abhirucitassa
analyzed: sammukha a vikappa antaram dassetum āha aparā sammukhā vuttā iti ādi attanā abhirucitassa

original: yassa kassaci nāmaṃ gahetvāti yojanā. Sahadhamminanti ettha “pañcanna”nti seso, niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ.
analyzed: yassa kassacid nāmam gahetvā iti yojanā sahadhamminanti ettha sesaḥ niddhāraṇe sāmi vacanam

original: 1639. Evanti vakkhamānāpekkhaṃ. Api-saddo pana saddassatthe.
analyzed: evam ti vakkhamāna apekkham api saddaḥ pana

original: 1640. Mittoti daḷhamitto, “tena vattabbaṃ ‘ko te mitto vā sandiṭṭho vā”ti vacanato idaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ. Puna tenapi bhikkhunā vattabbanti yojanā.
analyzed: mitto ti daḷha mitto tena vattabbam kaḥ te mittaḥ vā sandiṭṭhaḥ vā ati vacanataḥ idam upalakkhaṇam puna tena api bhikkhunā vattabbanti yojanā

original: 1641-2. “Ahaṃ tissassa bhikkhuno dammī’ti vā…pe… ‘tissāya sāmaṇeriyā dammī’ti vā”ti sesaaṭṭhakathāpāṭhena “ida”miccādipāṭho yojetabbo.
analyzed: aham tissassa bhikkhunaḥ dammi iti vāpe tissāya sāmaṇeriyā dammi iti vā ati sesa aṭṭhakathā pāṭhena idam iccādi pāṭhaḥ yojetabbaḥ

original: 1643. Dvīsūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ, ettha “vikappanāsū”ti pakaraṇato labbhati.
analyzed: dvīsu iti niddhāraṇe bhummam ettha vikappanāsu iti pakaraṇataḥ labbhati

original: 1644-5. Idha pana imasmiṃ sāsane yena pana bhikkhunā saha cīvarasāmikena taṃ vinayakammaṃ

original: kataṃ, tassa avissāsena vissāsabhāvaṃ vinā so vinayakammakato bhikkhu taṃ cīvaraṃ
analyzed: katam tassa avissāsena vissāsa bhāvam vinā saḥ vinaya kamma kataḥ bhikkhu tam cīvaraṃ

original: paribhuñjeyya, tassa bhikkhuno pācittīti yojanā. Chandānurakkhanatthaṃ “vinayaṃkamma”nti
analyzed: paribhuñjeyya tassa bhikkhuno pācitti iti yojanā chanda anurakkhana attham vinayaṃkamman ti

analyzed: anussāra āgamaḥ veditabbaḥ vinaya kamman ti atthaḥ tam cīvaram adhiṭṭhahantassa vā vissajjantassa

original: vā dukkaṭanti yojanā.
analyzed: vā dukkaṭanti yojanā

analyzed: vikappesi tena tassa vissāsā paribhuñjataḥ ca yathā āha tassa vā

original: vissasanto paribhuñjatī”ti.
analyzed: vissasantaḥ paribhuñjati iti

original: Vikappanakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: vikappana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1648-9. “Patto nāma dve pattā ayopatto mattikāpatto”ti jātiyā kappiyapattānaṃ vuttattā
analyzed: pattaḥ nāma dve pattā ayaḥ pattaḥ mattikā pattaḥ iti jātiyā kappiya pattānam vuttattā

original: āha “adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ patta”nti. Tādisanti adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ. Sūcigharaṃ nāma sasūcikaṃ

original: “Pattaṃ vā”tiādīhi upayogantapadehi “apanetvā nidhentassā”ti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.

original: Vakkhati ca “dunnikkhittamanāpatti, paṭisāmayato panā”ti.
analyzed: vakkhati ca dunnikkhittam anāpatti paṭisāmayataḥ pana ati

original: 1650. Tenāpīti āṇattena. Tassāti āṇāpakassa. Tikadukkaṭaṃ vuttanti anupasampanne

original: upasampannasaññivematikaanupasampannasaññīnaṃ vasena tikadukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, iminā ca
analyzed: upasampanna saññi vematika anupasampanna saññīnam vasena tika dukkaṭam vuttam iminā ca

original: upasampannasantake tikapācittiyanti idañca vuttameva hoti.

original: 1651. Aññanti pāḷiyaṃ anāgataṃ pattatthavikādiparikkhāraṃ.

original: Nidheti ce, tathā anāpattīti yojanā. Avihesetukāmassāti vihesādhippāyarahitassa.

original: Akīḷassāti kīḷādhippāyarahitassa kevalaṃ vattasīsena “paṭisāmetvā dassāmī”ti apanidhentassa.

original: 1654. Adinnādānasamuṭṭhānāpattīnaṃ akusalādivasenapi sacittakattā āha “idaṃ akusaleneva sacitta”nti.

original: Cīvarāpanidhānakathāvaṇṇanā.

original: Surāpānavaggo chaṭṭho.
analyzed: surā pāna vaggaḥ chaṭṭhaḥ

analyzed: tiracchāna gatam pāṇam ti iminā yaḥ pana bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇam jīvitā voropeyya

analyzed: maṅgula bījake pi pāṇa saññī nikkāruṇika tāya tam bhindantaḥ apaneti pācittiyam tasmai

original: 1656. Ubhayattha cāti pāṇe vā apāṇe vāti ubhayatthāpi. Avasesavinicchayo panettha manussaviggahe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

original: Sañciccapāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: sañciccapāṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1658. Sappāṇakanti saha pāṇakehīti sappāṇakaṃ. Ye paribhogena maranti, evarūpā idha “pāṇakā”ti adhippetā. Assāti bhikkhuno.
analyzed: sappāṇakam ti saha pāṇakehi iti sappāṇakam ye paribhogena maranti evarūpāḥ idha pāṇakā ati adhippetāḥ assa ati bhikkhuno

original: 1659. “Avicchijjā”ti iminā vicchedeneva payoganānattaṃ hotīti dīpeti. Pattapūrampīti ettha pi-saddo byatireke.
analyzed: a vicchijja iti iminā vicchedena iva payoga nānattam hoti iti dīpeti patta pūram pi iti ettha pi saddaḥ byatireke

original: 1664-6. Pāṇapaṭibaddhatāya kāraṇaṃ dassetumāha “patana”ntiādi. Salabhādīnanti paṭaṅgādīnaṃ.

original: Sappāṇakakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: sappāṇaka kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: atthaḥ kicca adhikaraṇam ti iminā itarāni adhikaraṇāni upalakkhitāni yathā āha adhikaraṇam

original: 1670. Adhamme pana kammasminti yathāpāḷiāgate kammasmiṃ. Ubhayatthāpīti dhammakamme, adhammakamme vāti ubhayattha.

analyzed: na ca vā ati ettha ca saddaḥ vaggena ca ati yojetabbaḥ ca saddaḥ

original: daṭṭhabbo. “Adhammena, vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kata”nti jānato ukkoṭane doso natthīti yojanā.

original: Ukkoṭanakathāvaṇṇanā.

original: 1783. Gaṇapuggalasaṅghānaṃ atthāya cetiye navakammassa atthāya uggaṇhāpayato, uggaṇhatopi vā dukkaṭaṃ hotīti yojanā. Jātarūparajatānaṃ sarūpaṃ nissaggiye vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇa puggala saṅghānam atthāya cetiye nava kammassa atthāya uggaṇhāpayataḥ uggaṇhataḥ pi vā dukkaṭam hoti iti yojanā jātarūpa rajatānam sarūpam nissaggiye vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 1784. Muttādiratanampi vuttasarūpameva. Saṅghādīnampīti ettha ādi-saddena gaṇapuggalacetiyānaṃ saṅgaho.
analyzed: mutta ādi ratanam pi vutta sarūpam eva saṅgha ādīnam pi iti ettha ādi saddena gaṇa puggala cetiyānam saṅgahaḥ

original: 1785-6. Yaṃ kiñci gihisantakaṃ sace kappiyavatthu vā hotu, akappiyavatthu vāpi hotu,
analyzed: yam kiñci gihi santakam sace kappiya vatthu vā hotu a kappiya vatthu vā api hotu

original: mātukaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ tālapaṇṇampi vā hotu, bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena paṭisāmayato tassa
analyzed: mātu kaṇṇa piḷandhanam tāla paṇṇam pi vā hotu bhaṇḍāgārika sīsena paṭisāmayato tassa

original: pācittiyāpatti hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: pācittiya āpatti hoti iti yojanā

original: 1787. Na nidhetabbamevāti na paṭisāmetabbameva.
analyzed: na nidhetabbam eva ati na paṭisāmetabbam eva

original: 1788. Eso hi yasmā palibodho nāma, tasmā ṭhapetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: esaḥ hi yasmā palibodhaḥ nāma tasmā ṭhapetum pana vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 1789. Anuññāte ṭhāneti ettha “patita”nti seso. Ettha anuññātaṭṭhānaṃ nāma ajjhārāmo
analyzed: anuññāte ṭhāne ti ettha patitanti sesaḥ ettha anuññāta ṭṭhānam nāma ajjhārāmaḥ

analyzed: vā ajjhāvasathaḥ vā yathā āha anujānāmi bhikkhave ratanam vā ratana sammatam vā ajjhārāme

original: vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipituṃ ‘yassa bhavissati, so
analyzed: vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitum yassa bhavissati so

original: harissatī”ti. Ettha ca ajjhārāmo nāma parikkhittassa antoparikkhepo, aparikkhittassa

analyzed: dvinnam leḍḍupātānam antaḥ ajjhāvasathaḥ nāma parikkhittassa antoparikkhepaḥ a parikkhittassa

original: musalapātabbhantaraṃ. “Uggahetvā”ti idaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ, uggahāpetvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: musala pāta abbhantaram uggahetvā ti idam upalakkhaṇam uggahāpetvā atipi vuttam hoti

original: 1790-1. Anuññāte pana ṭhāne yathāvuttaajjhārāmādike ṭhāne ratanaṃ vā ratanasammataṃ
analyzed: anuññāte pana ṭhāne yathā vutta ajjhārāma ādike ṭhāne ratanam vā ratana sammatam

original: Sañcarittasamodayanti ettha “samuṭṭhānādinā idaṃ sikkhāpada”nti vattabbaṃ, idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samuṭṭhānādinā sañcarittasamajātikanti attho.
analyzed: ettha samuṭṭhāna ādinā idam sikkhāpadanti vattabbam idam sikkhāpadam samuṭṭhāna ādinā sañcaritta sama jātikanti attho

original: Ratanakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: ratana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1792. Pureti pubbabhāge.
analyzed: purā iti pubba bhāge

original: 1793-4. Santanti cārittasikkhāpade vuttasarūpaṃ. Anāpucchāti “vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ
analyzed: cāritta sikkhāpade vutta sarūpam an āpucchā ati vikāle gāma pavesanam

original: āpucchāmī”ti anāpucchitvā. Paccayaṃ vināti tādisaṃ accāyikaṃ karaṇīyaṃ vinā. Parikkhepokkameti
analyzed: āpucchāmi iti an āpucchitvā paccayam vinā iti tādisam accāyikam karaṇīyam vinā parikkhepa ukkame ti

original: parikkhepassa antopavese. Upacārokkameti etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: parikkhepassa antopavese upacāra ukkame ti ettha api esā iva nayo

original: 1795. Athāti vākyantarārambhe.
analyzed: atha ati vākya antara ārambhe

original: 1796. Tato aññanti paṭhamaṃ vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchitvā tato paviṭṭhagāmato
analyzed: tatas aññanti paṭhamam vikāle gāma pavesanam āpucchitvā tatas paviṭṭha gāmato

original: aññaṃ gāmaṃ. Puna tatoti dutiyagāmamāha. Katthaci potthake “āpucchane kicca”nti pāṭho
analyzed: aññam gāmam puna tatoti dutiya gāmam āha katthaci potthake āpucchane kiccanti pāṭhaḥ

original: dissati, “āpucchanakicca”nti pāṭhoyeva pana yuttataro. Yathāākaṅkhitapamāṇaṃ dassetumāha “gāmasatepi vā”ti.
analyzed: dissati āpucchana kiccam ti pāṭhaḥ yā iva pana yuttataraḥ yathā ākaṅkhita pamāṇam dassetum āha gāma sate pi vā ti

original: 1797. Passambhetvānāti paṭivinodetvā. Antarā aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisanti ceti yojanā.
analyzed: paṭivinodetvā antarā aññam gāmam pavisanti ca iti yojanā

original: 1798-9. Kulaghare vā aññattha āsanasālāya vā bhattakiccaṃ katvā yo bhikkhu sappibhikkhāya vā telabhikkhāya vā sace caritukāmo siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: kula ghare vā aññattha āsana sālāya vā bhatta kiccam katvā yaḥ bhikkhu sappi bhikkhāya vā tela bhikkhāya vā sace caritu kāmo siyā ti yojanā

original: Passeti pakativacanasavanārahe attano samīpe, eteneva ettakā ṭhānā dūrībhūto asanto
analyzed: passa iti pakativacana savana ārahe attano samīpe etena iva ettakā ṭhānā dūrībhūto asanto

analyzed: nāma hoti iti byatirekataḥ labbhati iti dasseti asantā iti avijjamāne vā vutta ppamāṇato

original: 1802. Anokkammāti anupasakkitvā. Maggāti gantabbamaggā.

analyzed: antarārāmanti gāma abbhantare saṅgha ārāmam bhikkhunīnam upassayanti bhikkhuni vihāram titthiyānam upassayanti titthiya ārāmam

original: 1806-7. Antarārāmādigamane na kevalaṃ anāpucchā gacchatoyeva, kāyabandhanaṃ abandhitvā, saṅghāṭiṃ apārupitvā gacchantassāpi anāpatti.

original: Āpadāsupīti sīho vā byaggho vā āgacchati, megho vā uṭṭheti, añño vā koci upaddavo uppajjati, evarūpāsu āpadāsupi bahigāmato antogāmaṃ gacchato anāpattīti attho.
analyzed: āpadāsu pi iti sīhaḥ vā byagghaḥ vā āgacchati meghaḥ vā uṭṭheti aññaḥ vā koci upaddavaḥ uppajjati evarūpāsu āpadāsu pi bahigāmataḥ antogāmam gacchataḥ anāpatti iti attho

original: Vikālagāmappavesanakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: vikāla gāma pavesana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1808. Aṭṭhidantamayaṃ vāpi visāṇajaṃ vāpi sūcigharanti yojanā. Aṭṭhi nāma yaṃ kiñci aṭṭhi. Dantoti hatthidanto. Visāṇaṃ nāma yaṃ kiñci visāṇaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhi danta mayam vā api visāṇa jam vā api sūci gharanti yojanā aṭṭhi nāma yam kiñci aṭṭhi danto ti hatthi dantaḥ visāṇam nāma yam kiñci visāṇam

original: 1809. Lābheti paṭilābhe. Bhedanakanti bhedanameva bhedanakaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti bhedanakaṃ,
analyzed: lābhe iti paṭilābhe bhedanakam ti bhedanam eva bhedanakam tat assa atthi iti bhedanakam

analyzed: paṭhamam bhinditvā pacchā desetabba ttā tam bhedanakam assa pācittiyassa atthi iti bhedanakam

original: pācittiyaṃ, assatthiatthe a-kārapaccayo.
analyzed: pācittiyam assatthi atthe akāra paccayo

analyzed: anāpatti araṇikā iti padacchedaḥ araṇikā iti araṇi dhanuke vidhā iti kāya bandhanassa

original: vidhake. Añjanikāti añjanināḷikā. Dakapuñchaniyāti nahātassa gatte udakapuñchanapesikāya.
analyzed: vidhake añjanikā ati añjani nāḷikā daka puñchaniyā ati nahātassa gatte udaka puñchana pesikāya

original: Vāsijaṭeti vāsidaṇḍake.
analyzed: vāsijaṭā iti vāsi daṇḍake

original: Sūcigharakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: sūcighara kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1812-3. Mañcapīṭhasarūpaṃ dutiye bhūtagāmavagge catutthasikkhāpade vuttameva. “Sugataṅgulena
analyzed: mañca pīṭha sarūpam dutiye bhūta gāma vagge catuttha sikkhāpade vuttam eva sugata aṅgulena

analyzed: aṭṭhaṅgula pādakanti aṭṭhaṅgula pādakassa āgatattā aṭṭhaṅgula ppamāṇena ati ettha pādena ati seso

original: Heṭṭhimāṭaninti aṭaniyā heṭṭhimatalaṃ. Aṭaniyā heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimāṭanī, taṃ ṭhapetvā,
analyzed: heṭṭhima aṭanim ti aṭaniyā heṭṭhima talam aṭaniyā heṭṭhimam heṭṭhima aṭanī tam ṭhapetvā

original: Mañcakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: mañca kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: pakkhipitvā upari pilotikāya sibbitvā katanti vuttaṃ hoti poṭaki tūlanti eraka tūla ādi

original: 1818. Āyogeti āyogapatte. Bandhaneti kāyabandhane. Aṃsabaddhaketi aṃsabandhanake.

original: saṅgaho. Thavikādīsu tūlonaddhesu paribhuttesu bhikkhuno anāpattīti yojanā.

original: Tūlonaddhakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: tūlonaddha kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1820. Nisīdananti nisīdanacīvaraṃ. Pamāṇatoti “tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso dve vidatthiyo
analyzed: nisīdanam ti nisīdana cīvaram pamāṇāt uti tatridam pamāṇam dve

original: sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ diyaḍḍhaṃ, dasā vidatthī”ti vuttapamāṇato. Pamāṇātikkame

original: payoge tassa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: payoge tassa dukkaṭam siyāti yojanā

original: 1821. Sacchedanti pamāṇato atirittapadesassa chedanakiriyāsahitapaṭikammaṃ pācittiyamudīritanti
analyzed: sa chedam ti pamāṇataḥ atiritta padesassa chedana kiriyā sahita paṭikammam pācittiyam udīritan ti

original: 1822. Tadūnakanti tato pamāṇato ūnakaṃ. Vitānādiṃ karontassāti ettha ādi-saddena attharaṇasāṇipākārabhisibibbohanānaṃ saṅgaho. “Sañcarittasamā nayā”ti idaṃ vuttatthameva.
analyzed: tat ūnakam ti tatas pamāṇataḥ ūnakam vitāna ādim karontassa iti ettha ādi saddena saṅgahaḥ naya ati idam vutta ttham eva

original: Nisīdanakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: nisīdana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1823. Rogeti kaṇḍupiḷakādiroge sati. Yathāha “anujānāmi bhikkhave yassa kaṇḍu vā

original: piḷakāvā assāvo vā thullakacchu vā ābādho, tassa kaṇḍupaṭicchādi”nti. Ettha kaṇḍūti

original: kacchu. Piḷakāti lohitatuṇḍikā sukhumapiḷakā. Assāvoti arisabhagandalamadhumehādivasena

analyzed: thullakacchu vā ābādho ti mahā piḷaka ābādhaḥ vuccati pamāṇato ti tatra idam

original: pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo”ti vuttappamāṇato.

original: Kaṇḍupaṭicchādikathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: kaṇḍu paṭicchādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1825. Pamāṇenevāti “tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ, dīghaso cha vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ
analyzed: pamāṇena iva ati tatra idam pamāṇam

original: aḍḍhateyyā”ti vuttappamāṇeneva. Pamāṇātikkameti vassikasāṭikāya yathāvuttapamāṇato

original: Vassikasāṭikakathāvaṇṇanā.

original: 1826. Sugatassa cīvarena tulyappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ yo bhikkhu sace kāreyya, tassa cīvarassa karaṇe tassa bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā. Tulyaṃ pamāṇaṃ yassāti viggaho.

original: 1827. Attano vatthānaṃ karaṇakārāpanaṃ vinā aññato paṭilābho nāma natthi, sūcikammapariyosāne cīvarasarūpassa paṭilābhoyevettha paṭilābhoti viññāyati.

analyzed: tatiyā tasmā bhikkhuniyā iti catutthī rathika ādīsu iti pañcamī

original: “rathikāyapi vā”ti chaṭṭhī. Paṭipāṭi panāyaṃ mātikaṭṭhakathakkamena veditabbā. Imāya

analyzed: tassa iti aññātika bhikkhuniyā vākyataḥ ti antara gharam paviṭṭhāya iti vacanataḥ hi saddaḥ

original: 1838. Ekatoupasampannahatthatoti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike upasampannāya hatthato. Yathāha
analyzed: ekatas upasampanna hatthato ti bhikkhunīnam santike upasampannāya hatthataḥ yathā āha

original: “ekatoupasampannāyāti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike upasampannāyā”ti. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannāya

original: pana yathāvatthukamevāti.
analyzed: pana yathāvatthukam eva ati

analyzed: aññātikāya ñātika saññissa tathā eva vimatissa ca dukkaṭam ti yojanā

analyzed: hatthato ti ettha gahaṇa iti seso tathā ati anāpatti samuṭṭhānam idam sikkhāpadam eḷaka lomena samam matam iti yojanā

original: Paṭhamapāṭidesanīyakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: paṭhama pāṭidesanīya kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1843-4. Avutteti vakkhamānanayena avutte. Ekenapi ca bhikkhunāti sambandho. Apasakkāti
analyzed: a vutta iti vakkhamāna nayena a vutte ekena api ca bhikkhunā ati sambandhaḥ apasakkā ti

original: apagaccha. Ādi-atthavācinā iti-saddena “apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti
analyzed: apagaccha ādi attha vācinā iti saddena apasakka tāva bhagini yāva bhikkhū bhuñjanti iti

original: vākyaseso saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. Iminā apasādanākāro sandassito. “Ekenapi ca bhikkhunā”ti
analyzed: vākya sesaḥ saṅgahito ti daṭṭhabbaḥ iminā apasādana ākāraḥ sandassito ekena api ca bhikkhunā ti

analyzed: iminā avakaṃsaḥ dassito ukkaṃso pana tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā ti

analyzed: tathā iva ati dukkaṭam tattha ati an upasampannāya

analyzed: āpatti sambhavā na deti iti vuttam yathā āha attanaḥ bhattam dāpeti na deti iti ettha

analyzed: aññesam bhattam deti na dāpeti iti ettha pana sace pi dāpeyya iminā sikkhāpadena

original: 1847. Bhikkhunī yaṃ na dinnaṃ, taṃ dāpeti, yattha vā na dinnaṃ, tattha dāpeti, tampi sabbesaṃ mittāmittānaṃ samaṃ dāpeti, tatthāpi anāpatti.
analyzed: bhikkhunī yam na dinnam tam dāpeti yattha vā na dinnam tattha dāpeti tam pi sabbesam mitta amittānam samam dāpeti tattha api anāpatti

analyzed: sikkhamānā vā sāmaṇerikā vā idha sūpam detha odanam detha ati vosāsantī vidhānam

original: 1849. Samuṭṭhānanti ettha “imassā”ti seso. Bhojanaṃ kiriyaṃ, vosāsantiyā anivāraṇaṃ akiriyanti evamidaṃ kriyākriyaṃ.
analyzed: samuṭṭhānam ti ettha imassa ati sesaḥ bhojanam kiriyam vosāsantiyāḥ anivāraṇam evam idam kriyākriyam

analyzed: dutiya pāṭidesanīya kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: sekkhanti sammata iti sekkhasammatam nāma kulam yam kulam saddhāya vaḍḍhati

analyzed: bhogena hāyati evarūpassa kulassa ñatti dutiyena kammena sekkha sammuti dinnā hoti iti

analyzed: vuttam idam kulam sekkhasammatam nāma tena āha laddha sammutike kule iti laddhā sammuti

analyzed: yena ati viggahaḥ okkante nimantitaḥ api a nimantitaḥ uva hoti iti āha gharūpacāra ukkamanā

analyzed: okkamante nimantā iti esaḥ a nimantitaḥ nāma ati

analyzed: nāma gahetvā iti sahatthā paṭiggahetvā āmisanti iminā sambandhaḥ yathā āha khādanīyam

original: vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā”ti. Gahaṇeti ettha “āhāratthāyā”ti seso.
analyzed: vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā ati gahaṇa iti ettha āhāra atthāya ati seso

original: 1853. Tatthāti asekkhasammate kule. Tatheva paridīpitanti dukkaṭaṃ paridīpitaṃ.

analyzed: nimantitassa vā ti ettha vā saddena nimantitassa avasesam gaṇhāti yathā āha nimantitassa

analyzed: vā gilānassa vā sesakam bhuñjati iti aññesam bhikkhā tattha dīyati iti yojanā tattha ati

analyzed: tasmim sekkha sammate kule

original: 1855. Yattha katthacīti āsanasālādīsu yattha katthaci. Niccabhattādike vāpīti ettha ādi-saddena salākabhattapakkhikauposathikapāṭipadikabhattānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.

original: 1856. Dvāreti ettha “ṭhapetvā”ti seso. Sampatteti ettha “pacchā”ti seso. Yathāha

original: 1857. Mahāpaccariyā gatavinicchayaṃ dassetumāha “bhikkhu”ntiādi. Samuṭṭhāneḷakūpamanti samuṭṭhānato eḷakalomasikkhāpadasadisanti attho.
analyzed: mahā paccariyāḥ gata vinicchayam dassetum āha bhikkhu nti ādi samuṭṭhāna iḷaka upamanti samuṭṭhānataḥ eḷaka loma sikkhāpada sadisanti attho

original: Tatiyapāṭidesanīyakathāvaṇṇanā.

analyzed: pañcannam paṭisaṃviditam etam appaṭisaṃviditam nāma ati vacanataḥ ca idha api

analyzed: vuttam eva nayam vohāra antarena dassetum āha itthiyā purisena vāti yāni kho pana

original: tāni āraññakāni senāsanānī”ti vacanato ārāmanti āraññakārāmamāha. Sace evamārocitaṃ

original: paṭisaṃviditanti hi vuttaṃ padabhājaneti yojanā. Paṭisaṃviditanti pageva niveditaṃ.

original: 1860. Pacchā yathārocitaṃ tameva vā tassa ca parivāraṃ katvā aññaṃ bahuṃ vā āharīyatu, tampi paṭisaṃveditaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
analyzed: pacchā yathā rocitam tam eva vā tassa ca parivāram katvā aññam bahum vā āharīyatu tam pi paṭisaṃveditam nāma ati yojanā

original: 1861. Yāguyā viditaṃ katvāti ettha “taṃ ṭhapetvā”ti idaṃ sāmatthiyā labbhati. Idampi viditaṃ kurundiyaṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttanti yojanā.
analyzed: yāguyā viditam katvā iti ettha tam ṭhapetvā ati idam sāmatthiyā labbhati idam api viditam kurundiyam vaṭṭati iti vuttam ti yojanā

original: 1862. Panāti api-saddattho. Aññānipi kulānīti yojanā. Ettha “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ paṭisaṃveditaṃ
analyzed: pana ati api sadda atthaḥ aññāni api kulāni iti yojanā ettha asukam nāma kulam paṭisaṃveditam

original: aniveditaṃ. “Eva”nti idaṃ “yaṃ ārāmamanābhata”nti imināpi yojetabbaṃ. Evanti “tassa
analyzed: a niveditam evam ti idam yam iminā api yojetabbam evam ti tassa

original: parivāraṃ katvā”tiādinā pakārena. “Taṃ asaṃviditaṃ nāmā”ti idaṃ “sahadhammikañāpita”nti

analyzed: tattha ati tasmin āraññaka ārāme khādataḥ anāpatti eva ati yojanā tattha aññena kappiyam katvā dinnāni iti seso

analyzed: evam pāṭidesanīya vinicchayam dassetvā tad anantaram uddiṭṭhānam vinicchayam

original: vakkhamānasamuccayo.

original: Dutiyaṃ.

analyzed: tatiyam
