analyzed: sattamaḥ vaggo

original: 1946. Gacchato puratoti ettha “pacchato gacchantenā”ti seso. Pacchato gacchantena
analyzed: gacchato puratas ti ettha pacchatas gacchantena ati sesaḥ pacchatas gacchantena

original: purato gacchato pañhaṃ na vattabbanti yojanā. Sace purato gacchanto pañhaṃ pucchati,
analyzed: puratas gacchato pañham na vattabbanti yojanā sace puratas gacchantaḥ pañham pucchati

original: kiṃ kātabbanti āha “pacchimassā”tiādi.
analyzed: kim kātabbanti āha pacchimassa atiādi

original: 1947. Uggahitaṃ dhammaṃ purato gacchantena saddhiṃ pacchato gacchanto sajjhāyati,
analyzed: uggahitam dhammam puratas gacchantena saddhim pacchatas gacchantaḥ sajjhāyati

original: vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Samameva gacchato yugaggāhaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Yugaggāhanti
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti yojanā samam eva gacchataḥ yuga ggāham kathetum vaṭṭati iti yojanā yuga gāhanti

original: aññamaññaṃ. Aññamañña-saddapariyāyo hi yugaggāha-saddo.
analyzed: aññam aññam aññamañña sadda pariyāyaḥ hi yugaggāha saddaḥ

original: Paṭhamaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhamam

original: 1948. Sakaṭamagge ekekassa cakkassa pathena gacchanto ekekassa cakkassa pathena samaṃ
analyzed: sakaṭa magge ekekassa cakkassa pathena gacchantaḥ ekekassa cakkassa pathena samam

original: gacchato dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Uppathenāpi gacchanto uppathena samaṃ gacchantassa
analyzed: gacchataḥ dhammam desetum vaṭṭati uppathena api gacchantaḥ uppathena samam gacchantassa

original: dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ajjhāhārayojanā. Uppathenāti amaggena. Evaṃ anāpattivisaye
analyzed: dhammam desetum vaṭṭati iti ajjhāhāra yojanā uppathena ati amaggena evam anāpatti visaye

original: dassite tabbipariyāyato āpattivisayo dassitoyevāti veditabbo.
analyzed: dassite tad bipariyāyataḥ āpatti visayaḥ dassitaḥ yeva ati veditabbaḥ

original: Dutiyaṃ.
analyzed: dutiyam

original: 1949. Tatiye natthi vattabbanti “na ṭhito agilāno uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karissāmī”ti
analyzed: tatiye natthi vattabbanti na ṭhitaḥ a gilānaḥ uccāram vā passāvam vā karissāmi iti

original: etassa vinicchayo yathārutavasena suviññeyyoti katvā vuttaṃ. Sace paṭicchannaṃ ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: etassa vinicchayaḥ yathā ruta vasena su viññeyyaḥ ti katvā vuttam sace paṭicchannam ṭhānam

original: gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati, asañcicca kato nāma, anāpatti.
analyzed: gacchantassa sahasā uccāraḥ vā passāvaḥ vā nikkhamati asañcit ca kataḥ nāma anāpatti

original: Ayamettha viseso daṭṭhabbo. Siṅghāṇikāya kheḷeneva saṅgahitattepi bāttiṃsakoṭṭhāsesu
analyzed: ayam ettha visesaḥ daṭṭhabbo siṅghāṇikāya kheḷena iva saṅgahita tte pi bāttiṃsa koṭṭhāsesu

original: visuṃyeva dassito eko koṭṭhāsoti sikkhāpadesu avuttampi saṅgahetvā āha “uccārādicatukka”nti.
analyzed: visuṃ yeva dassitaḥ ekaḥ koṭṭhāso ti sikkhāpadesu a vuttam pi saṅgahetvā āha uccāra ādi catukkam ti

original: 1950. Ettha haritaṃ nāma idanti dassetumāha “jīvarukkhassā”tiādi. Rukkhassāti upalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: ettha haritam nāma idam ti dassetum āha jīva rukkhassa ati ādi rukkhassa ati upalakkhaṇam

original: jīvamānakatiṇalatādīnampi hariteyeva saṅgahitattā. “Dissamānaṃ gacchatī”ti vacaneneva
analyzed: jīvamānaka tiṇa latā ādīnam pi hariteya iva saṅgahita ttā dissamānam gacchati iti vacanena iva

original: adissamānagataṃ aharitanti byatirekato viññāyati. Sākhā vā bhūmilaggā dissamānā gacchati,
analyzed: a dissamāna gatam a haritam ti byatirekataḥ viññāyati sākhā vā bhūmi laggā dissamānā gacchati

original: taṃ sabbaṃ haritamevāti yojanā.
analyzed: tam sabbam haritam eva ati yojanā

original: 1951. Sahasā vaccaṃ nikkhamatevāti sambandho. Assa bhikkhuno. Vaccanti upalakkhaṇaṃ passāvādīnampi dassitattā. Vaṭṭatīti ettha “gilānaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā”ti seso.
analyzed: sahasā vaccam nikkhamatā iva ati sambandhaḥ assa bhikkhuno vaccanti upalakkhaṇam passāva ādīnam pi dassita ttā vaṭṭati iti ettha gilāna ṭṭhāne ṭhita ttā ati sesaḥ

original: 1952. Palālaṇḍupake vāpīti palālacumbaṭakepi. Ettha “appaharitaṃ alabhantenā”ti seso. Kismiñcīti sukkhatiṇādimhi kismiñci. Taṃ vaccaṃ pacchā haritaṃ ottharati, vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: palāla ṇḍupake vā api iti palāla cumbaṭake pi ettha appaharitam a labhantena ati sesaḥ kismiñci iti sukkha tiṇa ādimhi kismiñci tam vaccam pacchā haritam ottharati vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 1953. Etīti pavisati. Etthāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade. “Kheḷena eva cā”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: eti iti pavisati ettha ati imasmim sikkhāpade kheḷena eva ca ati padacchedo

original: Tatiyacatutthāni.
analyzed: tatiya catutthāni

original: 1954. Vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakesūti ettha ādi-saddena sabbaṃ aparibhogajalaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Teneva “tesaṃ aparibhogattā”ti aparibhogattameva kāraṇamāha.
analyzed: vacca kuṭi samudda ādi udakesu iti ettha ādi saddena sabbam a paribhoga jalam saṅgaṇhāti tena iva tesam a paribhoga ttā ati a paribhoga ttam eva kāraṇam āha

original: 1955. Udakogheti ettha “jāte”ti seso. Ajalanti ajalaṭṭhānaṃ. Jaleti paribhogārahajale. Idhāpi thalakato udakaṃ ottharati, anāpatti.
analyzed: udaka ogha iti ettha jātā iti sesaḥ ajalanti ajala ṭṭhānam jala iti paribhoga araha jale idha api thalakataḥ udakam ottharati anāpatti

original: Pañcamaṃ.
analyzed: pañcamam

original: Aṭṭhamo vaggo.
analyzed: aṭṭhamaḥ vaggo

original: 1956-7. Pakiṇṇakavinicchayaṃ dassetumāha “samuṭṭhānādayo”tiādi. Ñeyyāti vakkhamānanayena
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka vinicchayam dassetum āha samuṭṭhāna ādayaḥ tiādi ñeyyā iti vakkhamāna nayena

original: veditabbā. Etthāti etesu sekhiyesu. Ujjagghikā ādi yesanti viggaho, tagguṇasaṃviññāṇoyaṃ
analyzed: veditabbā ettha ati etesu sekhiyesu ujjagghikāḥ ādi yesanti viggahaḥ

original: bāhiratthasamāso, ujjagghikāappasaddapaṭisaṃyuttāni cattāri sikkhāpadānīti attho.
analyzed: bāhirattha samāsaḥ ujjagghikā appasadda paṭisaṃyuttāni cattāri sikkhāpadāni iti atthaḥ

original: Chamā ca nīcāsanañca ṭhānañca pacchā ca uppatho ca chamānīcāsanaṭṭhānapacchāuppathā,
analyzed: chamā ca nīca āsanam ca ṭhānam ca pacchā ca uppatho ca chamā nīca āsana ṭṭhāna pacchā uppathā

original: te saddā etesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ atthīti tappaṭisaṃyuttāni sikkhāpadāni chamā…pe… uppathavā,
analyzed: te saddāḥ etesam sikkhāpadānam atthi iti tad paṭisaṃyuttāni sikkhāpadāni chamāpe uppathavā

original: chamādipadavantāni pañca sikkhāpadānīti attho. Ettha ṭhāna-saddena ṭhā-dhātusseva
analyzed: chama ādi padavantāni pañca sikkhāpadāni iti atthaḥ ettha ṭhāna saddena ṭhā dhātussa eva

original: rūpattā sikkhāpadāgato ṭhita-saddo gahito. “Dasasū”ti vattabbe vaṇṇalopena, vibhattivipallāsena
analyzed: rūpa ttā sikkhāpada āgataḥ ṭhita saddaḥ gahitaḥ dasasu iti vattabbe vaṇṇa lopena vibhatti vipallāsena

original: vā “dasā”ti vuttaṃ. Samanubhāsane samuṭṭhānādīhi etesu dasasu sikkhāpadesu samuṭṭhānādayo
analyzed: vā dasā iti vuttam samanubhāsane samuṭṭhāna ādīhi etesu dasasu sikkhāpadesu samuṭṭhāna ādayaḥ

original: tulyā vuttāti yojanā.
analyzed: tulyā vuttā iti yojanā

original: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānāni, ekekamettha kiriyaṃ,
analyzed: kim vuttam hoti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni samanubhāsana samuṭṭhānāni ekekam ettha kiriyam

original: saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: saññā vimokkham sa cittakam lokavajjam kāya kammam vacī kammam akusala cittam dukkha vedananti vuttam hoti

original: 1958-9. “Chatta”ntiādīni sikkhāpadānaṃ upalakkhaṇapadāni. Etāni ekādasa sikkhāpadāni
analyzed: chatta nti ādīni sikkhāpadānam upalakkhaṇa padāni etāni ekādasa sikkhāpadāni

original: samuṭṭhānādinā pana dhammadesanena tulyāva sadisā evāti yojanā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
analyzed: samuṭṭhāna ādinā pana dhamma desanena sadisā eva ati yojanā idam vuttam hoti

original: – imāni ekādasa sikkhāpadāni dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānāni, kiriyākiriyāni, saññāvimokkhāni,
analyzed: imāni ekādasa sikkhāpadāni dhamma desanā samuṭṭhānāni kiriyā akiriyāni saññā vimokkhāni

original: sacittakāni, lokavajjāni, vacīkammāni, akusalacittāni, dukkhavedanānīti.
analyzed: sa cittakāni lokavajjāni vacī kammāni akusala cittāni dukkha vedanāni

original: Sūpodanena viññattīti sūpodana-saddena lakkhitaṃ viññattisikkhāpadaṃ. Viññattisikkhāpadānaṃ
analyzed: sūpodanena viññatti iti sūpodana saddena lakkhitam viññatti sikkhāpadam viññatti sikkhāpadānam

original: bahuttā idameva visesitaṃ. Theyyasatthasamaṃ matanti samuṭṭhānādīhi theyyasatthasikkhāpadena
analyzed: bahu ttā idam eva visesitam theyya sattha samam matan ti samuṭṭhāna ādīhi theyya sattha sikkhāpadena

original: samānaṃ matanti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadaṃ theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: samānam matam ti atthaḥ idam vuttam hoti sūpodana viññatti sikkhāpadam theyyasattha samuṭṭhānam

original: kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedananti.
analyzed: kiriyam saññā vimokkham sa cittakam lokavajjam kāya kammam vacī kammam akusala cittam dukkha vedananti

original: 1960. Avasesā tipaññāsāti avasesāni tepaññāsasikkhāpadāni. Samānā paṭhamena tūti
analyzed: avasesā tipaññāsā ati avasesāni tepaññāsa sikkhāpadāni samānā paṭhamena tu uti

original: paṭhamena pārājikena samuṭṭhānādito samānānīti attho, paṭhamapārājikasadisasamuṭṭhānānīti
analyzed: paṭhamena pārājikena samuṭṭhāna āditaḥ samānāni iti attho paṭhama pārājika sadisa samuṭṭhānāni iti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. “Anāpatti āpadāsū”ti padacchedo. Parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā, pārupitvā carantānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam hoti anāpatti āpadāsu iti padacchedaḥ parimaṇḍalam nivāsetvā carantānam

original: corupaddavādi āpadā nāma. Api-saddena nadisantaraṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sekhiyesu sabbesūti
analyzed: coru paddava ādi āpadā nāma api saddena nadi santaraṇa ādim saṅgaṇhāti sekhiyesu sabbesu iti

original: yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: yebhuyyavasena vuttam

original: 1961. “Na ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmī”tiādīnaṃ imassa anāpattivārassa asambhavato na panāgatoti pāḷiyaṃ na vutto. Tassāpi yathāvatthukāva āpattiyo daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: na ujjhāna saññī paresam pattam olokessāmi iti ādīnam imassa anāpatti vārassa asambhavataḥ na pana āgataḥ ti pāḷiyam na vuttaḥ tassa api yathāvatthukāḥ va āpattiyaḥ daṭṭhabbā

original: Iti vinayatthasārasandīpaniyā
analyzed: iti vinayattha sāra sandīpaniyā

original: Vinayavinicchayavaṇṇanāya
analyzed: vinaya vinicchaya vaṇṇanāya

original: Sekhiyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sekhiya kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 1962. Yo imaṃ vinicchayaṃ viditvā ṭhito, so hi yasmā vinaye visārado hoti, vinītamānaso
analyzed: yaḥ imam vinicchayam viditvā ṭhitaḥ saḥ hi yasmai vinaye visāradaḥ vinīta mānasaḥ

original: ca hoti, parehi duppadhaṃsiyo ca hoti, tato tasmā kāraṇā samāhito satataṃ imaṃ vinayavinicchayaṃ sikkheyyāti yojanā.
analyzed: ca hoti parehi duppadhaṃsiyo ca hoti tato tasmā kāraṇā samāhito satatam imam vinaya vinicchayam sikkheyya ati yojanā

original: Tattha imaṃ vinicchayaṃ viditvāti sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampattinidānaṃ imaṃ vinayavinicchayaṃ
analyzed: tattha imam vinicchayam viditvā ati sabba lokiya lokuttara guṇa sampatti nidānam imam vinaya vinicchayam

original: atthato, ganthato, vinicchayato ca sakkaccaṃ ñatvā. Visāradoti sārajjanaṃ sārado,
analyzed: atthataḥ ganthataḥ vinicchayataḥ ca sakkaccam ñatvā visāradaḥ iti sārajjanam sāradaḥ

original: vigato sārado assāti visārado, vinayapariyattiyā, āpattādivibhāge ca nibbhayo nirāsaṅkoti
analyzed: vigataḥ sāra daḥ assa ati visāra daḥ vinaya pariyattiyā āpatta ādi vibhāge ca nibbhayaḥ nirāsaṅko ti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Na kevalaṃ imassa jānane esova ānisaṃso, atha kho vinītamānaso ca hoti,
analyzed: vuttam hoti na kevalam imassa jānane esaḥ uva ānisaṃsaḥ atha kho vinīta mānasaḥ ca hoti

original: saṃyatacitto hotīti attho. Soti imaṃ vinicchayaṃ sakkaccaṃ viditvā ṭhito bhikkhu.
analyzed: saṃyata cittaḥ hoti iti attho saḥ ti imam vinicchayam sakkaccam viditvā ṭhitaḥ bhikkhu

original: Parehīti imaṃ ajānantehi aññehi. Duppadhaṃsiyo ca hotīti anabhibhavanīyo ca hoti.
analyzed: parehi iti imam a jānantehi aññehi duppadhaṃsiyo ca hoti iti an abhibhavanīyo ca hoti

original: Tatoti tasmā vinaye visāradatādisabbaguṇasampannahetuttā. Hīti yasmāti attho. Sikkheti
analyzed: tatas ti tasmai vinaye hi iti yasmā attho sikkha iti

original: sajjhāyanasavanādivasena sikkheyya, uggaṇheyyāti attho. “Satata”nti iminā sabbatthakakammaṭṭhāne
analyzed: sajjhāyana savana ādi vasena sikkheyya uggaṇheyya ati attho satatam ti iminā sabbatthaka kammaṭṭhāne

original: viya etthāpi satatābhiyogo kātabboti dasseti. Vikkhittassa yathābhūtapaṭivedhābhāvato
analyzed: viya ettha api satata abhiyogo kātabbaḥ iti dasseti vikkhittassa yathā bhūta paṭivedha abhāvato

original: tappaṭipakkhāya ekaggatāya niyojento āha “samāhito”ti, sammā vinayavinicchaye āhito
analyzed: tad paṭipakkhāya ekagga tāya niyojentaḥ āha samāhitaḥ ti sammā vinaya vinicchaye āhitaḥ

original: patiṭṭhito ekaggacittoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha “avikkhittassāyaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo vikkhittassā”ti.
analyzed: patiṭṭhitaḥ ekagga cittaḥ ti vuttam hoti yathā āha a vikkhittassa ayam dhammo na ayam dhammo vikkhittassa ati

original: 1963. Evaṃ imāya gāthāya vuttamevatthaṃ pakārantarenāpi dassetumāha “ima”ntiādi.
analyzed: evam imāya gāthāya vuttam eva attham pakāra antarena api dassetum āha imantiādi

original: Teti apekkhitvā “ye”ti labbhati. Ye therā vā navā vā majjhimā vā. Paramanti amatamahānibbānappattiyā
analyzed: te iti apekkhitvā ye iti labbhati ye therāḥ vā navāḥ vā majjhimāḥ vā amata mahānibbāna pattiyā

original: mūlakāraṇassa sīlassa pakāsanato uttamaṃ. Asaṃkaranti nikāyantaraladdhīhi asammissaṃ.
analyzed: mūla kāraṇassa sīlassa pakāsanataḥ uttamam asaṃkaranti nikāya antara laddhīhi a sammissam

original: Saṃkaranti vuttappakāraguṇopetattā kāyacittasukhakāraṇaṃ sammukhaṃ karotīti saṃkaraṃ.
analyzed: saṃkaranti vutta ppakāra guṇa upeta ttā kāya citta sukha kāraṇam sammukham karoti iti saṃkaram

original: Savanāmatanti saddarasādiyogena kaṇṇarasāyanaṃ. Amatanti tatoyeva amataṃ sumadhuraṃ.
analyzed: sadda rasa ādi yogena kaṇṇa rasāyanam amatanti amatam sumadhuram

original: Amatamahānibbānāvahattā vā phalūpacārena amataṃ. Imaṃ vinayavinicchayaṃ. Aveccāti
analyzed: amata mahānibbāna avahattā vā phala upacārena amatam imam vinaya vinicchayam

original: sakkaccaṃ viditvā. Adhiketi adhisīlādisikkhattayappakāsanena ukkaṭṭhe. Hiteti lokiyalokuttarasukhahetuttena
analyzed: sakkaccam viditvā adhikā iti adhi sīla ādi sikkhattaya ppakāsanena ukkaṭṭhe hitā iti lokiya lokuttara sukha hetuttena

original: hite. Hinoti attano phalanti “hita”nti sukhahetu vuccati. Kalisāsaneti lobhādikilesaviddhaṃsane.
analyzed: hite hinoti attano phalanti hitanti sukha hetu vuccati kali sāsana iti lobha ādi kilesa viddhaṃsane

original: Sāsaneti vinayapariyattisaṅkhātasāsanekadese. Paṭuttanti byattabhāvaṃ. Na yanti na
analyzed: sāsana iti vinaya pariyatti saṅkhāta sāsana ekadese byatta bhāvam na yanti na

original: gacchanti. Ke teti katame te. “Na keci santi cā”ti nissandehe imissā gāthāya attho likhito.
analyzed: gacchanti ke te iti katame te na keci santi ca ati nissandehe imissā gāthāya atthaḥ likhito

original: Evaṃ ettha atthayojanā veditabbā – paramaṃ uttamaṃ asaṃkaraṃ nikāyantaraladdhīhi
analyzed: evam ettha attha yojanā veditabbā paramam uttamam asaṃkaram nikāya antara laddhīhi

original: asammissaṃ saṃkaraṃ sakalalokiyalokuttarasukhābhinipphādakaṃ savanāmataṃ sotarasāyanaṃ
analyzed: a sammissam saṃkaram sakala lokiya lokuttara sukha abhinipphādakam savana amatam sota rasāyanam

original: imaṃ vinicchayappakaraṇaṃ avecca sakkaccaṃ viditvā adhike adhisīlādisikkhattayappakāsanena
analyzed: imam vinicchaya ppakaraṇam avecca sakkaccam viditvā adhike adhi sīla ādi sikkhattaya pakāsanena

original: ukkaṭṭhe hite lokiyalokuttarasukhahetubhūte kalisāsane sakalasaṃkilesaviddhaṃsake
analyzed: ukkaṭṭhe hite lokiya lokuttara sukha hetu bhūte kali sāsane sakala saṃkilesa viddhaṃsake

original: sāsane vinayapiṭakasaṅkhāte pariyattisāsane ye paṭuttaṃ na yanti, te ke nāmāti yojanā,
analyzed: sāsane vinaya piṭaka saṅkhāte pariyatti sāsane ye paṭuttam na yanti te ke nāma ati yojanā

original: ye imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ avecca viditvā ṭhitā, te ekaṃsato vinayapiṭake paṭuttaṃ pāpuṇanti yevāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye imam pakaraṇam avecca viditvā ṭhitā te ekaṃsataḥ vinayapiṭake paṭuttam pāpuṇanti yā iva ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Iti vinayatthasārasandīpaniyā
analyzed: iti vinayattha sāra sandīpaniyā

original: Vinayavinicchayavaṇṇanāya
analyzed: vinaya vinicchaya vaṇṇanāya

original: Bhikkhuvibhaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: bhikkhu vibhaṅga kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Bhikkhunivibhaṅgo
analyzed: bhikkhuni vibhaṅgaḥ

original: 1964. Evaṃ bhikkhuvibhaṅgapāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāya ca āgataṃ vinicchayasāraṃ nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena
analyzed: evam bhikkhu vibhaṅga pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca āgatam vinicchaya sāram na ati saṅkhepa vitthāra nayena

original: dassetvā idāni tadanantarāya bhikkhunivibhaṅgapāḷiyā, tadaṭṭhakathāya ca āgatavinicchayasāraṃ
analyzed: dassetvā idāni tad anantarāya bhikkhuni vibhaṅga pāḷiyā tad aṭṭhakathāya ca āgata vinicchaya sāram

original: dassetumārabhanto āha “bhikkhunīna”ntiādi. Tasmiṃ apīti ettha api-saddo vuttāpekkhāyaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum ārabhantaḥ āha bhikkhunīnaṃ tiādi tasmin api iti ettha api saddaḥ vutta apekkhā ayam

original: “Samāsenā”ti idaṃ ganthavasena saṅkhipanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Kiñcimatta”nti idaṃ
analyzed: samāsena iti idam gantha vasena saṅkhipanam sandhāya vuttam kiñcimattam ti idam

original: atthavasenāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: attha vasena ati veditabbam

original: Pārājikakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pārājika kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1965. Chandasoti methunasevanarāgapaṭisaṃyuttena chandena. Etena “chande pana asati
analyzed: chandasā iti methuna sevana rāga paṭisaṃyuttena chandena etena chande pana asati

original: balakkārena padhaṃsitāya anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathā sūcitā hoti. Sā samaṇī pārājikā nāma
analyzed: balakkārena padhaṃsitāya anāpatti iti aṭṭhakathā sūcitā hoti sā samaṇī pārājikā nāma

original: hotīti pavuccatīti yojanā.
analyzed: hoti iti pavuccati iti yojanā

original: 1966-7. “Sajīvassa api ajīvassā”ti padacchedo. “Santhataṃ vā asanthata”nti idaṃ “aṅgajāta”nti
analyzed: sajīvassa api ajīvassa ati padacchedaḥ santhatam vā a santhatam idam aṅga jātam iti

original: imassa visesanaṃ. Attano tividhe maggeti attano vaccapassāvamukhamaggānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ
analyzed: imassa visesanam attanaḥ tividhe magge ti attanaḥ vacca passa avamukha maggānam aññatarasmiṃ

original: magge. Ettha “santhate vā asanthate vā”ti seso, “allokāse”ti iminā sambandho. “Yebhuyyaakkhāyitādika”nti
analyzed: magge ettha santhate vā a santhate vā ati sesaḥ iti iminā sambandhaḥ

original: padacchedo. Ādi-saddena akkhāyitaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: padacchedaḥ ādi saddena akkhāyitam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Manussapurisādīnaṃ navannaṃ sajīvassapi ajīvassapi yassa kassaci santhataṃ vā asanthataṃ
analyzed: manussa purisa ādīnam navannam sa jīvassa api ajīvassa api yassa kassaci santhatam vā a santhatam

original: vā yebhuyyakkhāyitādikaṃ aṅgajātaṃ attano santhate vā asanthate vā tividhe magge
analyzed: vā yebhuyyakkhāyita ādikam aṅga jātam attano santhate vā a santhate vā tividhe magge

original: allokāse tilaphalamattampi pavesentī parājitāti yojanā.
analyzed: parājitā ati yojanā

original: 1968. Sādhāraṇavinicchayanti bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhāpadavinicchayaṃ.
analyzed: sādhāraṇa vinicchayanti bhikkhu bhikkhunīnam sādhāraṇa sikkhāpada vinicchayam

original: 1969-70. Adhakkhakanti ettha akkhakānaṃ adhoti viggaho. Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalanti jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ
analyzed: ettha akkhakānam adhas ti viggahaḥ jāṇu maṇḍalānam

original: ubbhanti viggaho. Ubbha-saddo uddhaṃ-saddapariyāyo. Idha “attano”ti seso. Avassutassāti
analyzed: ubbhanti viggahaḥ ubbha saddaḥ uddhaṃsadda pariyāyaḥ idha attanoti sesaḥ avassutassa ti

original: kāyasaṃsaggarāgena tintassa. Avassutāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Yāti vuttattā “sā”ti
analyzed: kāya saṃsagga rāgena tintassa avassu tā ti ettha api esā iva nayaḥ yā ati vutta ttā sā ati

original: labbhati. Sarīranti ettha “yaṃ kiñcī”ti seso. Paropakkamamūlakaṃ pārājikaṃ dassetumāha
analyzed: labbhati sarīran ti ettha yam kiñci iti sesaḥ para upakkama mūlakam pārājikam dassetum āha

original: “tena vā phuṭṭhā”ti. Ettha “yathāparicchinne kāye”ti ca “sādiyeyyā”ti ca vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: tena vā ettha yathā paricchinne kāya iti ca sādiyeyya ati ca vattabbam

original: Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa manussapuggalassa yaṃ kiñci sarīraṃ attano
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa manussa puggalassa yam kiñci sarīram

original: adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ yaṃ sarīrakaṃ, tena sarīrakena chupeyya, tena manussapurisena
analyzed: adhakkhakam ubbhaja aṇu maṇḍalam yam sarīrakam tena sarīrakena chupeyya tena manussa purisena

original: yathāparicchinne kāye phuṭṭhā sādiyeyya vā, sā pārājikā siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: yathā a paricchinne kāye phuṭṭhā vā sā pārājikā siyāti yojanā

original: 1971-2. “Gahitaṃ ubbhajāṇunā”ti iminā kapparato uddhaṃ pārājikakkhettamevāti dīpeti.
analyzed: gahitam ubbhaja aṇunā iti iminā kappa rataḥ uddham pārājika khettam eva ati dīpeti

original: Attano yathāvuttappakārena kāyenāti yojanā, attano “adhakkhaka”ntiādivuttappakārena
analyzed: attanaḥ yathā vutta ppakārena kāyena ati yojanā attanaḥ

original: kāyenāti attho. Tathā avassutāya avassutassa purisassa kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ phusantiyā
analyzed: kāyena ati attho tathā avassutāya avassutassa purisassa kāya paṭibaddham phusantiyā

original: thullaccayaṃ hoti. Attano yathāparicchinnakāyapaṭibaddhena tathā avassutāya avassutassa
analyzed: thullaccayam hoti attanaḥ yathā paricchinna kāya paṭibaddhena tathā avassutāya avassutassa

original: purisassa kāyaṃ phusantiyā thullaccayaṃ hoti.
analyzed: purisassa kāyam phusantiyā thullaccayam hoti

original: 1973. Attano avasesena kāyena avassutāya avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyaṃ phusantiyā
analyzed: attanaḥ avasesena kāyena avassutāya avassutassa purisa puggalassa kāyam phusantiyā

original: thullaccayaṃ hoti. Evaṃ attano payoge ca purisassa payoge ca tassā bhikkhuniyāyeva
analyzed: thullaccayam hoti evam attanaḥ payoge ca purisassa payoge ca tassāḥ bhikkhuniyāya eva

original: thullaccayaṃ hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: thullaccayam hoti iti yojanā

original: 1974. Yakkhapetatiracchānapaṇḍakānaṃ kāyaṃ “adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍala”nti yathāparicchinnaṃ
analyzed: yakkha peta tiracchāna paṇḍakānam kāyam adhakkhakam yathāparicchinnam

original: tatheva attano kāyena ubhatoavassave sati phusantiyā assā bhikkhuniyā thullaccayaṃ,
analyzed: tathā iva attano kāyena ubhatoavassave sati phusantiyā assā bhikkhuniyā thullaccayam

original: tatheva yakkhādīnaṃ payogepi tassāyeva thullaccayaṃ hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: tathā iva yakkha ādīnam payoge pi thullaccayam hoti iti yojanā

original: 1975. Ekatovassave cāpīti bhikkhuniyā vasena ekatoavassave cāpi. Thullaccayamudīritanti
analyzed: ekatovassave ca api iti bhikkhuniyā vasena ekatoavassave ca api thullaccayam udīritan ti

original: pārājikakkhettabhūtena attano kāyena manussapurisassa kāyaṃ phusantiyā thullaccayaṃ
analyzed: pārājika khetta bhūtena attanaḥ kāyena manussa purisassa kāyam phusantiyā thullaccayam

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti attho. Avasese ca sabbatthāti yathāvuttapārājikakkhettato
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam vuttanti attho avasese ca sabbattha āti yathā vutta pārājika khettato

original: avasese thullaccayakkhette sabbattha ekatoavassave sati dukkaṭaṃ hotīti attho. Kāyapaṭibaddhena
analyzed: avasese thullaccaya khette sabbattha ekatoavassave sati dukkaṭam hoti iti kāya paṭibaddhena

original: kāyapaṭibaddhāmasanādīsu sabbattha ubhatoavassave vā ekatoavassave vā dukkaṭameva hoti.
analyzed: kāya paṭibaddha amasana ādīsu sabbattha ubhatoavassave vā ekatoavassave vā dukkaṭam eva hoti

original: 1976. “Ubbhakkhakamadhojāṇumaṇḍala”nti yaṃ apārājikakkhettaṃ idha dassitaṃ, ettha
analyzed: yam apārājika khettam idha dassitam ettha

original: ekatoavassave dukkaṭaṃ hoti. Kapparassa ca heṭṭhāpi ettheva adhojāṇumaṇḍale saṅgahaṃ gatanti yojanā.
analyzed: ekatoavassave dukkaṭam hoti kapparassa ca heṭṭhā api ettha iva adhas jāṇu maṇḍale saṅgaham gatanti yojanā

original: 1977-9. Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ sace kāyasaṃsaggaṃ kelāyati sevatīti yojanā.
analyzed: bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhim sace kāya saṃsaggam kelāyati sevati iti yojanā

original: Bhikkhuniyā nāso siyāti sīlavināso pārājikāpatti siyāti attho. Gehapemanti ettha
analyzed: bhikkhuniyā nāsaḥ siyāti sīla vināso pārājika āpatti siyāti atthaḥ geha pemanti ettha

original: “gehasitapema”nti vattabbe gāthābandhavasena sita-saddalopo, attho panassa bhikkhuvibhaṅge vuttanayova.
analyzed: geha sita peman ti vattabbe gāthābandha vasena sita sadda lopaḥ atthaḥ panassa bhikkhu vibhaṅge vutta nayaḥ uva

original: 1980. Avisesenāti “bhikkhuniyā”ti vā “bhikkhussā”ti vā visesaṃ akatvā.
analyzed: avisesena ati bhikkhuniyā ati vā bhikkhussa ati vā visesam a katvā

original: 1981. Yassāti bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā. Yatthāti bhikkhuniyaṃ vā bhikkhusmiṃ
analyzed: yassa ati bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā yattha ati bhikkhuniyam vā bhikkhusmin

original: vā. Manosuddhanti kāyasaṃsaggādirāgarahitaṃ. Tassa bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā tattha
analyzed: vā manaḥ suddhanti kāya saṃsagga ādi rāga rahitam tassa bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā tattha

original: bhikkhuniyaṃ vā bhikkhusmiṃ vā visaye nadosatā anāpattīti attho.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyam vā bhikkhusmin vā visaye na dosa tā anāpatti iti attho

original: 1982. Bhinditvāti sīlabhedaṃ katvā. Bhikkhuniyā apakatattā āha “neva hoti bhikkhunidūsako”ti.
analyzed: bhinditvā iti sīlabhedam katvā bhikkhuniyāḥ apakata ttā āha na iva hoti bhikkhuni dūsakaḥ ti

original: 1983. Athāti vākyārambhe. Na hotāpatti bhikkhunoti ettha bhikkhunīhi kāyasaṃsaggasaṅghādisesamāha.
analyzed: atha ati vākya ārambhe na hotā āpatti bhikkhuno ti ettha bhikkhunīhi kāya saṃsagga saṅgha ādisesam āha

original: 1984. “Khette”ti vakkhamānaṃ “phuṭṭhā”ti iminā yojetvā “pārājika”ntiādīhi, “thullaccayaṃ
analyzed: khetteti vakkhamānam phuṭṭhā ti iminā yojetvā pārājikam ti ādīhi thullaccayam

original: khette”tiādīhi ca sambandhitabbaṃ. “Pārājika”nti vakkhamānattā phuṭṭhāti ettha “pārājikakkhette”ti seso.
analyzed: khetta iti ādīhi ca sambandhitabbam pārājikanti vakkhamāna ttā phuṭṭhā ati ettha pārājika khetta iti sesaḥ

original: 1985. Tathāti niccalāpi sādiyati. Khetteti thullaccayādīnaṃ khette. Kāyena niccalāyapi
analyzed: tathā ati niccalā api sā ādiyati khette iti thullaccaya ādīnam khette kāyena

original: cittena sādiyantiyā āpatti kasmā vuttāti āha “vuttattā…pe… satthunā”ti, bhikkhupātimokkhe
analyzed: cittena sādiyantiyāḥ āpatti kasmā vuttā iti āha vutta ttāpe satthunā iti bhikkhu pātimokkhe

original: viya “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti avatvā idha “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: viya kāya saṃsaggam samāpajjeyya iti avatvā idha kāya saṃsaggam sādiyeyya iti vutta ttā ti adhippāyaḥ

original: 1986. Tassā āpattiyā. Kriyasamuṭṭhānanti kiriyāya samuṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ satīti sādiyanamatteneva
analyzed: tassāḥ āpattiyāḥ kriya samuṭṭhānam ti kiriyāya samuṭṭhānam evam sati iti sādiyana mattena iva

original: āpajjitabbabhāve sati. Idanti “kiriyasamuṭṭhāna”mitividhānaṃ. Tabbahuleneva nayenāti
analyzed: āpajjitabba bhāve sati idam ti kiriya samuṭṭhānam iti vidhānam tad bahulena iva nayena ati

original: kiriyasamuṭṭhānabāhullena nayena khadiravanādivohāro viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: kiriya samuṭṭhāna bāhullena nayena khadira vana ādi vohāraḥ viyāti daṭṭhabbam

original: 1987. Tassā bhikkhuniyā asañcicca virajjhitvā āmasantiyā anāpatti, “ayaṃ puriso”ti
analyzed: tassāḥ bhikkhuniyāḥ a sañcicca virajjhitvā āmasantiyāḥ anāpatti ayam purisaḥ ti

original: vā “itthī”ti vā ajānitvā āmasantiyā anāpatti, purisassa āmasane sati phassaṃ asādiyantiyā
analyzed: vā itthī iti vā a jānitvā āmasantiyāḥ anāpatti purisassa āmasane sati phassam a sādiyantiyāḥ

original: vā anāpattīti yojanā.
analyzed: vā anāpatti iti yojanā

original: 1988. Khittacittāyāti yakkhummattāya. Ummattikāya vāti pittakopena ummādappattāya. Idañca “asucī”ti vā “candana”nti vā visesataṃ ajānanameva pamāṇaṃ.
analyzed: khitta cittāya ati yakkhu mattāya ummattikāya vā ati pitta kopena ummāda pattāya idam ca asuci iti vā candanam iti vā visesataṃ a jānanam eva pamāṇam

original: Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalakathāvaṇṇanā.
1989-90. “Pārājikattaṃ jānantī”ti iminā avasesāpattiṃ jānitvā chādentiyā pārājikābhāvaṃ
analyzed: pārājika ttam jānanti iti iminā avasesa āpattim jānitvā chādentiyā pārājika abhāvam

original: dīpeti. Saliṅge tu ṭhitāyāti pabbajjāliṅgeyeva ṭhitāya. Iti dhure nikkhittamattasminti
analyzed: dīpeti sa liṅge tu ṭhitāya ati ṭhitāya iti dhure

original: yojanā. Iti-saddo nidassane. Itarāya pubbeyeva āpannattā tamapekkhitvā “sā cā”ti āha.
analyzed: yojanā iti saddaḥ nidassane itarāya pubbe iya iva āpanna ttā tam apekkhitvā sā ca ati āha

original: 1991. Vuttāvisiṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ vinicchayaṃ saṅgahetumāha “sesa”ntiādi. Tatthāti duṭṭhullapaṭicchādane.
analyzed: sabbam vinicchayam saṅga hetum āha sesa ntiādi tattha ati duṭṭhulla paṭicchādane

original: Vajjapaṭicchādikathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: vajja paṭicchādi kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1992-5. Saṅghenāti samaggena saṅghena. Ukkhittakoti āpattiyā adassanādīsu ukkhittako.
analyzed: saṅghena ati samaggena saṅghena ukkhittakaḥ ti āpattiyāḥ adassana ādīsu ukkhittakaḥ

original: “Ukkhepane ṭhito”ti iminā ukkhepanīyakammakatassa anosāritabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Yā diṭṭhi
analyzed: ukkhepane ṭhitaḥ ti iminā ukkhepanīya kamma katassa anosārita bhāvam dīpeti yā diṭṭhi

original: etassāti yaṃdiṭṭhiko, so ukkhittako bhikkhu yāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato hotīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: etassa iti yaṃdiṭṭhikaḥ saḥ ukkhittakaḥ bhikkhu yāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgataḥ hoti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: “Tassā diṭṭhiyā gahaṇenā”ti iminā anuvattappakāro dassito. Taṃ ukkhittakaṃ bhikkhunti
analyzed: tassā diṭṭhiyāḥ gahaṇena ati iminā anuvatta ppakāraḥ dassito tam ukkhittakam bhikkhunti

original: yojanā. Sā bhikkhunī aññāhi bhikkhunīhi visumpica saṅghamajjhepi “eso kho ayye bhikkhu
analyzed: yojanā sā bhikkhunī aññāhi bhikkhunīhi saṅgha majjhe pi esaḥ kho ayye bhikkhu

original: samaggena saṅghena ukkhitto”tiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ vuccamānāti yojanā. Taṃ vatthuṃ
analyzed: samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaḥ iti ādinā nayena tikkhattum vuccamānā iti yojanā tam vatthum

original: acajantī gahetvā yadi tatheva tiṭṭhatīti yojanā. Ettha “yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā”ti
analyzed: a cajantī gahetvā yadi tathā iva tiṭṭhati iti yojanā ettha yāvatatiyam samanubhāsitabbā ati

original: seso. Tassa kammassa osāneti tatiyāya kammavācāya yyakārappattavasena assa samanubhāsanakammassa
analyzed: sesaḥ tassa kammassa osāne ti tatiyāya kamma vācāya yyakāra ppatta vasena assa samanubhāsana kammassa

original: pariyosāne. Asākiyadhītarāti asākiyadhītā, paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ. “Puna appaṭisandheyā”ti
analyzed: pariyosāne asākiya dhīta rāti asākiya dhītā paccatte karaṇa vacanam puna appaṭisandheyā ati

original: iminā puna teneva ca attabhāvena bhikkhunibhāve paṭisandhātuṃ anarahatā vuttā.
analyzed: iminā puna tena iva ca atta bhāvena bhikkhuni bhāve paṭisandhātum anaraha tā vuttā

original: 1996. Tikadukkaṭaṃ niddiṭṭhanti adhammakamme adhammakammasaññā, vematikā, dhammakammasaññāti
analyzed: tika dukkaṭam niddiṭṭhanti adhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā vematikā dhamma kamma saññā ti

original: etāsaṃ vasena tikadukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Samanubhāsane vuttā samuṭṭhānādayo sabbe idha vattabbāti yojanā.
analyzed: etāsam vasena tika dukkaṭam vuttam samanubhāsane vuttā samuṭṭhāna ādayo sabbe idha vattabbā iti yojanā

original: Ukkhittānuvattikakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: ukkhittānuvattika kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 1997. “Hatthaggahaṇaṃ vā sādiyeyyāti hattho nāma kapparaṃ upādāya yāva agganakhā.
analyzed: hattha ggahaṇam vā sādiyeyya ati hatthaḥ nāma kapparam upādāya yāva agga nakhā

original: Etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya ubbhakkhakaṃ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṃ gahaṇaṃ sādiyati,
analyzed: etassa asat dhammassa paṭisevana tthāya ubbhakkhakam adhojāṇu maṇḍalam gahaṇam sādiyati

original: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vuttattā āha “apārājikakhettassā”tiādi. “Ta”nti vakkhamānattā
analyzed: āpatti thullaccayassa ati vuttattā āha apārājika khettassa ātiādi tanti vakkhamāna ttā

original: “ya”nti labbhati. Apārājikakkhettassa yassa kassaci aṅgassa yaṃ gahaṇaṃ, taṃ hatthaggahaṇanti
analyzed: labbhati apārājika khettassa yassa kassaci aṅgassa yam gahaṇam tam hattha gahaṇam ti

original: pavuccatīti yojanā. Hatthe gahaṇaṃ hatthaggahaṇaṃ.

analyzed: asat dhamma saddena methunassa api vuccamāna ttā tatas visesetum āha kāya saṃsagga

analyzed: tatas ti tassa asat dhammassa kāraṇā tattha ati hattha pāse purisena ati ettha katam ti

analyzed: etat eva attham byatireka mukhena samatthetum āha atha āditas ti ādi sata khattum pi iti

analyzed: iminā taṃ taṃ vatthu mūlakam dukkaṭa thullaccayam āpajjati iti vuttam hoti

original: 2005. Yā pana āpattiyo āpannā, desetvā tāhi muccatīti yojanā. Dhuranikkhepanaṃ katvāti

original: upeti, pārājikassa aṅgaṃ na hotīti attho. Tasmā yā ekaṃ āpannā, dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā

analyzed: saussāhāya desitā ati puna āpajjane a nikkhitta dhurāya bhikkhuniyā desitā api āpatti

original: aṅgameva hotīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: aṅgam eva hoti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 2008. Ayaṃ atthoti “asaddhammo nāma kāyasaṃsaggo”ti ayaṃ attho. Uddisitoti pakāsito.
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ ti asaddhammaḥ nāma kāya saṃsaggo ti ayam atthaḥ uddisito ti pakāsito

original: 2009. Ayamattho kena vacanena uddisitoti āha “viññū…pe… sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ ida”nti. Idaṃ vacananti “viññū paṭibalo kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjitu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ. Sādhakaṃ pamāṇaṃ.

original: Aṭṭhavatthukakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: aṭṭhavatthuka kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Iti vinayatthasārasandīpaniyā
analyzed: iti vinayattha sāra sandīpaniyā

original: Vinayavinicchayavaṇṇanāya
analyzed: vinaya vinicchaya vaṇṇanāya

analyzed: vuccati yam pabbajitā adhikaraṇam ti pi vadanti sabbattha vattabbe mukham assā atthi iti

original: 2012. Sakkhiṃ vāti paccakkhato jānanakaṃ vā. Aṭṭaṃ kātuṃ gacchantiyā pade pade tathā dukkaṭanti yojanā.

analyzed: vohārikā iti

original: 2014. Anantaranti tassa vacanānantaraṃ.
analyzed: anantaram ti tassa vacana anantaram

original: 2015. Itaroti aṭṭakārako. Pubbasadisova vinicchayoti paṭhamārocane dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyārocane thullaccayanti vuttaṃ hoti.

analyzed: samuṭṭhānam kathinena tulyanti yojanā sesam dassetum āha sa kiriyam idam ti idam

original: sikkhāpadaṃ. Kiriyāya saha vattatīti sakiriyaṃ aṭṭakaraṇena āpajjanato. “Samuṭṭhāna”nti

original: Aṭṭakārikākathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: aṭṭa kārikā kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 2024-5. Jānantīti “sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassā ārocentī”ti vuttanayena jānantī.
analyzed: jānanti iti sāmam vā jānāti aññe vā tassai ārocenti iti vutta nayena jānantī

analyzed: corī nāma vajjham tena kammena vadha arahāḥ evam viditam saṅghanti

original: taṃ rājānaṃ vā. Yathāha “rājā nāma yattha rājā anusāsati, rājā apaloketabbo”ti. Gaṇameva
analyzed: tam rājānam vā yathā āha rājā nāma yattha rājā anusāsati rājā gaṇam eva

analyzed: mallagaṇam nāma pānīya ṭṭhapana pokkharaṇi khaṇana ādi puñña kamma niyuttaḥ jana samūhaḥ etena iva

original: coriṃ upasampādeti, sā bhikkhunīti attho. Upajjhāyassa bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: corim upasampādeti sā bhikkhunī iti attho upajjhāyassa bhikkhussa dukkaṭam

original: 2026. Pañcamāsagghananti ettha pañcamāsañca pañcamāsagghanakañca pañcamāsagghananti ekadesasarūpekasesanayena pañcamāsassāpi gahaṇaṃ. Atirekagghanaṃ vāpīti etthāpi eseva nayo.

original: 2027. Pabbajitaṃ pubbaṃ yāya sā pabbajitapubbā. Vuttappakāraṃ corakammaṃ katvāpi titthāyatanādīsu yā paṭhamaṃ pabbajitāti attho.
analyzed: pabbajitam pubbam yāya sā pabbajitapubbā vutta ppakāram cora kammam katvā api titthāyatana ādīsu yā paṭhamam pabbajitā ti attho

original: 2028-30. Idāni pubbapayogadukkaṭādiāpattivibhāgaṃ dassetumāha “vuṭṭhāpeti ca yā cori”ntiādi.
analyzed: idāni pubba payoga dukkaṭa ādi āpatti vibhāgam dassetum āha vuṭṭhāpeti ca yā corin tiādi

original: Idha “upajjhāyā hutvā”ti seso. Idaṃ kappaṃ ṭhapetvāti yojanā. Sīmaṃ sammannati cāti
analyzed: upajjhāyāḥ hutvā ati sesaḥ idam kappam ṭhapetvā ati yojanā sīmam ca ati

original: abhinavaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, bandhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Assāti bhaveyya. “Dukkaṭa”nti
analyzed: abhinavam sīmam sammannati bandhati iti vuttam hoti assa ati bhaveyya dukkaṭam ti

analyzed: iminā ca thullaccayam iminā ca yojetabbam

analyzed: kammante ti upasampada kammassa pariyosāne tatiyāya kamma vācāya yyakāra ppattāya ati vuttam hoti

original: 2031. Ajānantīti coriṃ ajānantī. (Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.)

original: 2032. Corivuṭṭhāpanaṃ nāmāti idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Vācacittatoti
analyzed: corivuṭṭhāpanam nāma ati idam sikkhāpadam corivuṭṭhāpana samuṭṭhānam nāma vāca cittato ti

original: 2269. Evaṃ carantiyā sagāmakaṭṭhāne gāmantarappavese ca agāmake araññe addhayojane ca vinayaññunā bhikkhunā pācittiyanayo pācittiyāpattividhānakkamo ñeyyo ñātabboti yojanā.

original: dissamāno vaṇṇavisesoti avaṇṇakaṃ, sāsapakakkādi, savaṇṇakañca avaṇṇakañca savaṇṇāvaṇṇakaṃ,
analyzed: dissamānaḥ vaṇṇa visesaḥ ti avaṇṇakam sāsapa kakka ādi savaṇṇakam ca avaṇṇakam ca savaṇṇa avaṇṇakam

original: tena savaṇṇāvaṇṇakena ca. Ubbaṭṭetvā nhāyantiyā nhānosāne pācittiyāpatti pakāsitāti yojanā.
analyzed: tena savaṇṇa avaṇṇakena ca ubbaṭṭetvā nhāyantiyāḥ nhāna usāne pācittiya āpatti pakāsitā ati yojanā

original: 2417. Sabbapayogeti sabbasmiṃ pubbapayoge. Ābādhapaccayāti daddukuṭṭhādirogapaccayā.
analyzed: sabba payoge ti sabbasmim pubba payoge ābādha paccayā ati daddu kuṭṭha ādi roga paccayā

original: 2418. Chaṭṭhanti “yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya, pācittiya”nti sikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: chaṭṭhanti yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya pācittiyam ti sikkhāpadaṃ

original: Pañcamachaṭṭhāni.
analyzed: pañcama chaṭṭhāni

original: 2419. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññāya bhikkhuniyā sace ubbaṭṭāpeyya vā sambāhāpeyya vā, tassā bhikkhuniyā tathā pācittiyāpatti hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī aññāya bhikkhuniyā sace ubbaṭṭāpeyya vā sambāhāpeyya vā tassā bhikkhuniyā tathā pācittiya āpatti hoti iti yojanā

original: 2420. Ettha imasmiṃ ubbaṭṭane, sambāhane ca hatthaṃ amocetvā ubbaṭṭane ekā āpatti siyā, hatthaṃ mocetvā mocetvā ubbaṭṭane payogagaṇanāya siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: ettha imasmin ubbaṭṭane sambāhane ca hattham a mocetvā ubbaṭṭane ekā āpatti siyā hattham mocetvā mocetvā ubbaṭṭane payoga gaṇanāya siyā iti yojanā

original: 2421. Āpadāsūti corabhayādīhi sarīrakampanādīsu. Gilānāyāti antamaso maggagamanaparissamenāpi ābādhikāya.
analyzed: āpadāsu iti cora bhaya ādīhi sarīra kampana ādīsu gilānāya ati antamasaḥ magga gamana parissamena api ābādhikāya

original: 2422. Aṭṭhamasikkhāpade “sikkhamānāyā”ti ca navamasikkhāpade “sāmaṇeriyā”ti ca dasamasikkhāpade
analyzed: aṭṭhama sikkhāpade sikkhamānāya ati ca navama sikkhāpade sāmaṇeriyā ati ca dasama sikkhāpade

original: “gihiniyā”ti ca visesaṃ vajjetvā avasesavinicchayo sattameneva samānoti dassetumāha
analyzed: gihiniyā ti ca visesam vajjetvā avasesa vinicchayo sattamena iva samānaḥ ti dassetum āha

original: “aṭṭhamādīni tīṇipī”ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhama ādīni tīṇi pi iti

original: Sattamaṭṭhamanavamadasamāni.
analyzed: sattama aṭṭhama navama dasamāni

original: 2423. Antoupacārasminti dvādasaratanabbhantare. “Bhikkhussa purato”ti idaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: antar upacārasmin ti dvādasa ratana abbhantare bhikkhussa puratas ti idam upalakkhaṇam

original: Tasmā purato vā hotu pacchato vā passato vā, samantato dvādasaratanabbhantareti nidassanapadametaṃ.
analyzed: tasmai puratas vā hotu pacchatas vā passatas vā samantataḥ dvādasa rata nabbhantarā iti nidassana padam etam

original: Chamāyapīti anantarahitāya bhūmiyāpi. Yā nisīdeyyāti sambandho. Na vaṭṭati pācittiyāpatti hotīti attho.
analyzed: chamāya api iti anantara hitāya bhūmiyā api yā nisīdeyya iti sambandhaḥ na vaṭṭati pācittiya āpatti hoti iti attho

original: 2424. Tikapācittiyaṃ vuttanti anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā, vematikā, āpucchitasaññāti
analyzed: tika pācittiyam vuttanti an āpucchite an āpucchita saññā vematikā āpucchita saññā

original: tīsu vikappesu pācittiyattayaṃ vuttaṃ. Āpucchite anāpucchitasaññā, vematikā vā bhikkhussa
analyzed: tīsu vikappesu pācittiya ttayam vuttaṃ āpucchite an āpucchita saññā vematikā vā bhikkhussa

original: purato nisīdeyyāti vikappadvaye dukkaṭadvayaṃ hoti. Āpadāsūti raṭṭhabhedādiāpadāsu.
analyzed: puratas nisīdeyya ati vikappa dvaye dukkaṭa dvayam hoti āpadāsu iti raṭṭhabheda ādi āpadāsu

original: Āpucchituñca ṭhātuñca asakkontiyā gilānāya.
analyzed: āpucchitum ca ṭhātum ca a sakkontiyā gilānāya

original: 2425. Nipajjanaṃ kriyaṃ. Anāpucchanaṃ akriyaṃ.
analyzed: nipajjanam kriyam an āpucchanam a kriyam

original: Ekādasamaṃ.
analyzed: ekādasamam

original: 2426. Okāso kato yena so okāsakato, na okāsakato anokāsakato, taṃ, akatokāsanti attho,
analyzed: okāsaḥ kataḥ yena saḥ okāsa kataḥ na okāsa kataḥ an okāsa kataḥ tam a kata ukāsanti attho

original: “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmī”ti attanā pucchitabbavinayādīnaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā okāsaṃ
analyzed: asukasmim nāma ṭhāne pucchāmi iti attanā pucchitabba vinaya ādīnam nāmam gahetvā okāsam

original: kārāpanakāle adhivāsanavasena akatokāsanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dosatāti pācittiyāpatti.
analyzed: kārāpana kāle adhivāsana vasena vuttam hoti dosa tā ati pācittiya āpatti

original: Ekasmiṃ piṭake okāsaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ piṭake pañhaṃ pucchantiyāpi pācittiyaṃ hotīti
analyzed: ekasmin piṭake okāsam kārāpetvā aññasmin piṭake pañham pucchantiyā api pācittiyam hoti iti

original: dassetumāha “vinaye cā”tiādi.
analyzed: vinaye ca ati ādi

original: Pucchantiyāpi cāti ettha pi-saddena “abhidhammaṃ pucchantiyāpī”ti idañca anuttasamuccayatthena
analyzed: pucchantiyā api ca ati ettha pi saddena abhidhammam pucchantiyā api iti idam ca anutta samuccaya tthena

original: ca-saddena “suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā vinayaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti
analyzed: ca saddena suttante okāsam kārāpetvā vinayam vā abhidhammam vā pucchati āpatti

original: pācittiyassa. Abhidhamme okāsaṃ kārāpetvā suttantaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā pucchati, āpatti
analyzed: pācittiyassa abhidhamme okāsam kārāpetvā suttantam vā vinayam vā pucchati āpatti

original: pācittiyassā”ti idañca saṅgahitaṃ.
analyzed: pācittiyassa iti idam ca saṅgahitam

original: 2427. Anodissāti “asukasmiṃ nāma pucchāmī”ti evaṃ aniyametvā kevalaṃ “pucchitabbaṃ atthi, pucchāmi ayyā”ti evaṃ vatvā.
analyzed: anodissā ati asukasmin nāma pucchāmi iti evam aniyametvā kevalam pucchitabbam atthi pucchāmi ayyā iti evam vatvā

original: Dvādasamaṃ.
analyzed: dvādasamam

original: 2428-9. Saṃkaccikanti thanaveṭhanacīvaraṃ, taṃ pana pārupantiyā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhanābhimaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: saṃkaccikam ti thana veṭhana cīvaram tam pana pārupantiyā adhakkhakam ubbha nābhi maṇḍalam

original: paṭicchādentiyā pārupitabbaṃ. Tenāha mātikaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “asaṃkaccikāti adhakkhakaubbhanābhimaṇḍalasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: paṭicchādentiyā pārupitabbam tena āha mātika ṭṭhakathā ayam asaṃkaccikā ti adhakkha kaubbha nābhi maṇḍala saṅkhātassa

original: sarīrassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ anuññātasaṃkaccikacīvararahitā”ti. “Saṃkaccikāya pamāṇaṃ
analyzed: sarīrassa paṭicchādana ttham anuññāta saṃkaccika cīvara rahitā ati saṃkaccikāya pamāṇam

original: tiriyaṃ diyaḍḍhahatthanti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vutta”nti vajirabuddhitthero. Parikkhepokkameti
analyzed: tiriyam porāṇa gaṇṭhi pade vuttanti vajira buddhi thero parikkhepa ukkameti

original: parikkhepassa antopavesane. Upacārokkamepīti aparikkhittassa gāmassa dutiyaleḍḍupātabbhantarapavesanepi.
analyzed: parikkhepassa anta upavesane upacāra ukkame pi iti a parikkhittassa gāmassa

original: Etthāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade. Eseva nayoti “paṭhame pāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiye pācittiya”nti
analyzed: ettha ati imasmim sikkhāpade esā iva nayo ti paṭhame pāde dukkaṭam dutiye pācittiyanti

analyzed: yathā vuttaḥ yā iva nayaḥ mataḥ viññātaḥ ti attho

original: 2430. Āpadāsupīti mahagghaṃ hoti saṃkaccikaṃ, pārupitvā gacchantiyā ca upaddavo uppajjati, evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpatti.
analyzed: āpadāsu pi iti mahaggham hoti saṃkaccikam pārupitvā gacchantiyā ca upaddavaḥ uppajjati evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpatti

original: 2431. Sesanti idha sarūpato adassitañca. Vuttanayenevāti mātikāpadabhājanādīsu vuttanayeneva.
analyzed: sesanti idha sarūpataḥ adassitam ca vutta nayena iva āti mātikā pada bhājana ādīsu vutta nayena iva

original: Sunipuṇasmiṃ dhammajātaṃ, atthajātañca vibhāveti vividhenākārena pakāsetīti vibhāvī, tena vibhāvinā.

original: Terasamaṃ.
analyzed: terasamam

original: Chattupāhanavaggo navamo.
analyzed: chattupāhana vaggaḥ navamaḥ

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti tāni idha na dassitāni.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbāni iti tāni idha na dassitāni

analyzed: sikkhāpadāni tatas param sakalam bhikkhuni vaggam parampara bhojanam anatiritta bhojanam

analyzed: santam bhikkhum anāpucchā vikāle gāma pavesanam nisīdanam vassika sāṭikanti imāni

analyzed: uddiṭṭhāni iti veditabbāni

analyzed: tatra ayam saṅkhepataḥ asādhāraṇa sikkhāpadesu samuṭṭhāna vinicchayaḥ giragga samajjā

analyzed: cittāgāra sikkhāpadam saṅghāṇi itthā alaṅkāraḥ gandha vaṇṇakaḥ vāsita kapiññākaḥ bhikkhuni ādīhi

original: ummaddanaparimaddanānīti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni, lokavajjāni, akusalacittāni.
analyzed: ummaddana parimaddanāni iti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni akusala cittāni

analyzed: cori vuṭṭhāpanam gāmantaram ārāma sikkhāpadam gabbhi nivagge āditas

analyzed: paṭṭhāya satta kumāri bhūta vagge āditas paṭṭhāya pañca purisa saṃsaṭṭham pārivāsiya chanda dānam

original: Iti vinayatthasārasandīpaniyā vinayavinicchayavaṇṇanāya

original: Pācittiyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: Pāṭidesanīyakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pāṭidesanīya kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: evam pācittiya vinicchayam dassetvā idāni pāṭidesanīyam dassetum āha a gilāna atiādi

original: gaṇhati, tassā evaṃ gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ paridīpitanti yojanā. Tattha yassā vinā sappinā

original: 2433. Tipāṭidesanīyanti agilānā agilānasaññā, vematikā, gilānasaññāti tīsu vikappesu
analyzed: ti pāṭidesanīyanti agilānā agilāna saññā vematikā gilāna saññā ti tīsu vikappesu

original: tīṇi pāṭidesanīyāni. Gilānā dvikadukkaṭanti gilānāya dvikadukkaṭaṃ. Gilānā agilānasaññā,
analyzed: tīṇi pāṭidesanīyāni gilānāḥ dvika dukkaṭanti gilānāya dvika dukkaṭam gilānā agilāna saññā

original: vematikā vāti dvīsu vikappesu dve dukkaṭāni.
analyzed: vematikā vāti dvīsu vikappesu dve dukkaṭāni

original: 2434-5. Gilānā hutvā sappiṃ viññāpetvā pacchā vūpasantagelaññā hutvā sevantiyā paribhuñjantiyāpi

original: Paṭhamaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhamam

analyzed: iti vinaya ttha sāra sandīpaniyā vinaya vinicchaya vaṇṇanāya

original: Pāṭidesanīyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pāṭidesanīya kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Sikkhākaraṇīyakathāvaṇṇanā

original: 2484. Kuṭṭhamassa atthīti kuṭṭhī, taṃ. “Gaṇḍi”ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. Rattasetādibhedena yena kenaci kuṭṭhena vevaṇṇiyaṃ pattasarīranti attho. Yathāha –

original: “Rattakuṭṭhaṃ vā hotu kāḷakuṭṭhaṃ vā, yaṃ kiñci kiṭibhadaddukacchuādippabhedampi
analyzed: rattakuṭṭham vā hotu kāḷakuṭṭham vā yam kiñci

original: sabbaṃ kuṭṭhamevāti vuttaṃ. Tañce nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇampi vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ hoti,
analyzed: sabbam kuṭṭham eva ati vuttam tat ce nakha piṭṭhi ppamāṇam pi vaḍḍhanaka pakkhe ṭhitam hoti

original: na pabbājetabbo. Sace pana nivāsanapārupanehi pakatipaṭicchannaṭṭhāne nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇaṃ
analyzed: na pabbājetabbaḥ sace pana nivāsana pārupanehi pakati paṭicchanna ṭṭhāne nakha piṭṭhi ppamāṇam

original: avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ hoti, vaṭṭati. Mukhe, pana hatthapādapiṭṭhesu vā sacepi
analyzed: avaḍḍhanaka pakkhe ṭhitam hoti vaṭṭati mukhe pana hattha pāda piṭṭhesu vā sace pi

original: avaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhitaṃ nakhapiṭṭhito khuddakapamāṇampi na vaṭṭatiyevāti kurundiyaṃ
analyzed: avaḍḍhanaka pakkhe ṭhitam nakha piṭṭhitaḥ khuddaka pamāṇam pi na vaṭṭatiyā iva ati kurundiyam

original: vuttaṃ. Taṃ tikicchāpetvā pabbājentenāpi pakativaṇṇe jāteyeva pabbājetabbo”ti.
analyzed: vuttam tam tikicchā apetvā pabbājentena api pakati vaṇṇe jāte iya iva pabbājetabbaḥ iti

original: Nakhapiṭṭhippamāṇanti ettha “kaniṭṭhaṅgulinakhapiṭṭhi adhippetā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
analyzed: nakha piṭṭhi ppamāṇam ti ettha kaniṭṭha aṅguli nakha piṭṭhi adhippetā ti tīsu pi gaṇṭhi padesu vuttam

original: Gaṇḍinti medagaṇḍādigaṇḍabhedavantaṃ. Yathāha “medagaṇḍo vā hotu añño vā, yo koci
analyzed: gaṇḍin iti meda gaṇḍa ādi gaṇḍa bhedavantam yathā āha meda gaṇḍaḥ vā hotu aññaḥ vā yo koci

original: kolaṭṭhimattakopi ce vaḍḍhanakapakkhe ṭhito gaṇḍo hoti, na pabbājetabbo”tiādi. Kolaṭṭhīti
analyzed: kolaṭṭhi mattakaḥ api ce vaḍḍhanaka pakkhe ṭhitaḥ gaṇḍaḥ hoti na pabbājetabbaḥ uti ādi kolaṭṭhī iti

original: badaraṭṭhi. Kilāsinti kilāsavantaṃ. Yathāha – “kilāsoti nabhijjanakaṃ napaggharaṇakaṃ
analyzed: badaraṭṭhi kilāsinti kilāsavantam yathā āha kilāsoti na bhijjanakam na paggharaṇakam

original: padumapuṇḍarīkapattavaṇṇaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, yena gunnaṃ viya sabalaṃ sarīraṃ hotī”ti. Ca-saddo
analyzed: paduma puṇḍarīka patta vaṇṇam kuṭṭham yena gunnam viya sa balam sarīram hoti iti ca saddaḥ

original: sabbehi upayogavantehi paccekaṃ yojetabbo. Sosinti khayarogavantaṃ. Yathāha – “sosoti
analyzed: sabbehi upayogavantehi paccekam yojetabbaḥ sosinti khaya rogavantam yathā āha sosaḥ iti

original: sosabyādhi. Tasmiṃ sati na pabbājetabbo”ti. Apamārikanti apamāravantaṃ. Yathāha –
analyzed: tasmin sati na pabbājetabbaḥ iti apamārikam ti apamāravantam yathā āha

original: “apamāroti pittummāro vā yakkhummāro vā. Tattha pubbaverikena amanussena gahito duttikiccho
analyzed: apamāraḥ ti pittummāraḥ vā yakkhummāraḥ vā tattha pubbaverikena amanussena gahitaḥ duttikiccho

original: hoti, appamattakepi pana apamāre sati na pabbājetabbo”ti.
analyzed: hoti appamattake pi pana apamāre sati na pabbājetabbaḥ ti

original: Rājabhaṭanti rañño bhattavetanabhaṭaṃ vā ṭhānantaraṃ pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā rājapurisaṃ.
analyzed: rāja bhaṭanti raññaḥ bhatta vetana bhaṭam vā ṭhāna antaram pattam vā appattam vā rāja purisam

original: Yathāha – “amacco vā hotu mahāmatto vā sevako vā kiñci ṭhānantaraṃ patto vā appatto
analyzed: yathā āha amaccaḥ vā hotu mahāmattaḥ vā sevakaḥ vā kiñci pattaḥ vā appatto

original: vā, yo koci rañño bhattavetanabhaṭo. Sabbo ‘rājabhaṭo’ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”ti. Coranti
analyzed: vā yaḥ koci raññaḥ bhatta vetana bhaṭo sabbaḥ rāja bhaṭaḥ iti saṅkhyam gacchati iti coranti

original: manussehi appamādanaṃ gāmaghātapanthaghātādikammena pākaṭaṃ corañca. Likhitakanti
analyzed: manussehi appamādanam gāma ghāta pantha ghāta ādi kammena pākaṭam coram ca likhitakanti

original: yaṃ kañci corikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā garuṃ rājāparādhaṃ katvā palātaṃ, rājā ca naṃ paṇṇe
analyzed: yam kañci corikam vā aññam vā garum rāja aparādham katvā palātam rājā ca nam paṇṇe

original: vā potthake vā “itthannāmo yattha dissati, tattha gahetvā māretabbo”ti vā “hatthapādādīnissa
analyzed: vā potthake vā itthannāmaḥ yattha dissati tattha gahetvā māretabbo ti vā

original: chinditabbānī”ti vā “ettakaṃ nāma daṇḍaṃ harāpetabbo”ti vā likhāpeti, evarūpaṃ likhitakaṃ.
analyzed: chinditabbāni iti vā ettakam nāma daṇḍam vā evarūpam likhitakam

original: “Kārabhedaka”nti gāthābandhavasena rasso kato. Kārabhedakanti dātabbakarassa vā katacorakammassa
analyzed: kārabhedakanti gāthābandha vasena rasso kataḥ kārabhedakanti dātabba karassa vā kata cora kammassa

original: vā kāraṇā kārāghare pakkhitto vā nigaḷabandhanādīhi baddho vā, tato so muccitvā palāyati,
analyzed: vā kāraṇā kārā ghare pakkhittaḥ vā nigaḷa bandhana ādīhi baddhaḥ vā tatas saḥ muccitvā palāyati

original: evarūpaṃ kārābhedakañca. Yathāha – “kārā vuccati bandhanāgāraṃ, idha pana andubandhanaṃ
analyzed: evarūpam kārā bhedakam ca yathā āha kārā vuccati bandhanāgāram idha pana andu bandhanam

original: vā hotu saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ vā rajjubandhanaṃ vā gāmabandhanaṃ vā nigamabandhanaṃ
analyzed: vā hotu saṅkhalika bandhanam vā rajju bandhanam vā gāma bandhanam vā nigama bandhanam

original: vā nagarabandhanaṃ vā purisagutti vā janapadabandhanaṃ vā dīpabandhanaṃ vā, yo etesu
analyzed: vā nagara bandhanam vā purisa gutti vā janapada bandhanam vā dīpa bandhanam vā yaḥ etesu

original: yaṃ kiñci bandhanaṃ chinditvā bhinditvā muñcitvā vivaritvā vā passamānānaṃ vā apassamānānaṃ
analyzed: yam kiñci bandhanam chinditvā bhinditvā muñcitvā vivaritvā vā passamānānam vā a passamānānam

original: vā palāyati, so ‘kārābhedako’ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī”ti.
analyzed: vā palāyati saḥ kārābhedakā iti saṅkhyam gacchati iti

original: 2485. Kasāhatanti iṇaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ asamatthattā “ayameva te daṇḍo hotū”ti kasādinā dinnappahāraṃ avūpasantavaṇaṃ. Yathāha –
analyzed: iṇam gahetvā dātum a samattha ttā ayam eva te daṇḍaḥ hotu iti kasā ādinā dinna ppahāram yathā āha

original: “Yo vacanapesanādīni akaronto haññati, na so katadaṇḍakammo. Yo pana keṇiyā vā aññathā
analyzed: yaḥ vacana pesana ādīni a karontaḥ haññati na so kata daṇḍa kammo yaḥ pana keṇiyā vā aññathā

analyzed: vā kiñci gahetvā khāditvā puna dātum a sakkontaḥ ayam eva te daṇḍaḥ hotu iti kasāhi haññati

original: ayaṃ kasāhato katadaṇḍakammo. Yo ca kasāhi vā hato hotu addhadaṇḍakādīnaṃ vā aññatarena,
analyzed: ayam kasā hataḥ kata daṇḍa kammo yaḥ ca kasāhi vā hataḥ hotu addhadaṇḍaka ādīnam vā aññatarena

original: yāva allavaṇo hoti, tāva na pabbājetabbo”ti.
analyzed: yāva allavaṇaḥ hoti tāva na pabbājetabbaḥ ti

original: Lakkhaṇāhatanti ekaṃsaṃ katvā pārutena uttarāsaṅgena appaṭicchādanīyaṭṭhāne tattena lohena āhataṃ asacchavibhūtalakkhaṇena samannāgataṃ. Yathāha –
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āhatam ti eka aṃsam katvā pārutena uttarāsaṅgena appaṭicchādanīya ṭṭhāne tat tena lohena āhatam asacchavi bhūta lakkhaṇena samannāgatam yathā āha

original: “Yassa pana nalāṭe vā urādīsu vā tattena lohena lakkhaṇaṃ āhataṃ hoti, so sace bhujisso,
analyzed: yassa pana nalāṭe vā ura ādīsu vā tat tena lohena lakkhaṇam āhatam hoti saḥ sace bhujissaḥ

original: yāva allavaṇo hoti, tāva na pabbājetabbo. Sacepissa vaṇā ruḷhā honti chaviyā samaparicchedā,
analyzed: yāva allavaṇaḥ hoti tāva na pabbājetabbaḥ sace pi issa vaṇāḥ ruḷhāḥ honti chaviyā sama paricchedā

analyzed: lakkhaṇam pana paññāyati ti maṇḍalam nivatthassa uttarāsaṅge kate paṭicchanna ukāse

original: ce hoti, pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Appaṭicchannokāse ce, na vaṭṭatī”ti.
analyzed: ce hoti pabbājetum vaṭṭati appaṭicchanna ukāse ce na vaṭṭati iti

original: Iṇāyikañcāti mātāpitupitāmahādīhi vā attanā vā gahitaiṇaṃ. Yathāha –
analyzed: iṇāyikam ca ati mātā pitu pitāmaha ādīhi vā attanā vā yathā āha

original: “Iṇāyiko nāma yassa pitipitāmahehi vā iṇaṃ gahitaṃ hoti, sayaṃ vā iṇaṃ gahitaṃ hoti,
analyzed: iṇāyikaḥ nāma yassa piti pitāmahehi vā iṇam gahitam hoti sayam vā iṇam gahitam hoti

original: yaṃ vā āṭhapetvā mātāpitūhi kiñci gahitaṃ hoti, so taṃ iṇaṃ paresaṃ dhāretīti iṇāyiko.
analyzed: yam vai mātā pitūhi kiñci gahitam hoti saḥ tam iṇam paresam dhāreti iti iṇāyikaḥ

original: Yaṃ pana aññe ñātakā āṭhapetvā kiñci gaṇhanti, so na iṇāyiko. Na hi te taṃ āṭhapetuṃ
analyzed: yam pana aññe ñātakāḥ āṭhapetvā kiñci gaṇhanti saḥ na iṇāyikaḥ na hi te tam āṭhapetum

original: issarā. Tasmā taṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
analyzed: issarā tasmā tam pabbājetum vaṭṭati iti

original: Dāsanti antojāto, dhanakkīto, karamarānīto, sayaṃ vā dāsabyaṃ upagatoti catunnaṃ
analyzed: dāsanti antojātaḥ dhanakkītaḥ karamarānītaḥ sayam vā dāsabyam upagataḥ iti

original: dāsānaṃ aññataraṃ. Dāsavinicchayo panettha samantapāsādikāya vitthārato gahetabbo.
analyzed: dāsānam aññataram dāsa vinicchayaḥ pana ittha samantapāsādikāya vitthārataḥ gahetabbo

original: Pabbājentassa dukkaṭanti “kuṭṭhi”ntiādīhi upayogavantapadehi paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: pabbājentassa dukkaṭa nti kuṭṭhi nti ādīhi upayogavanta padehi paccekam yojetabbam

original: 2486. Hatthacchinnanti hatthatale vā maṇibandhe vā kappare vā yattha katthaci chinnahatthaṃ.
analyzed: hattha chinnanti hattha tale vā maṇibandhe vā kappare vā yattha katthaci chinna hattham

analyzed: aṭṭhacchinnam ti yathā nakham na paññāyati evam catūsu aṅguṭṭhakesu aññataram vā

analyzed: sabbe vā yassa chinnāḥ honti evarūpam pāda chinnanti yassa agga pādesu vā gopphakesu

analyzed: vā jaṅghāya vā yattha katthaci ekaḥ vā dve vā pādā chinnā honti hattha pāda chinnassa api

analyzed: pāḷiyam āgata ttā saḥ api idha vattabbaḥ yathā vutta nayena iva tassa dukkaṭa vatthu tā paññāyati iti

original: na vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: na vuttaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Kaṇṇanāsaṅgulicchinnanti ettha “kaṇṇacchinnaṃ nāsacchinnaṃ kaṇṇanāsacchinnaṃ aṅgulicchinna”nti
analyzed: ettha kaṇṇa chinnam nāsa chinnam kaṇṇa nāsa chinnam aṅguli chinnam

original: yojanā. Kaṇṇacchinnanti yassa kaṇṇamūle vā kaṇṇasakkhalikāya vā eko vā dve vā kaṇṇā
analyzed: yojanā kaṇṇacchinnanti yassa kaṇṇa mūle vā kaṇṇa sakkhalikāya vā ekaḥ vā dve vā kaṇṇā

original: chinnā honti. Yassa pana kaṇṇāvaṭṭe chinnā honti, sakkā ca honti saṅghāṭetuṃ, so
analyzed: chinnāḥ honti yassa pana kaṇṇāvaṭṭe chinnāḥ honti sakkā ca honti saṅghāṭetum so

analyzed: vā yattha katthaci nāsā chinnā hoti yassa pana nāsikā sakkā hoti sandhetum saḥ tam

original: phāsukaṃ katvā pabbājetabbo. Kaṇṇanāsacchinnanti tadubhayacchinnaṃ. Aṅgulicchinnanti
analyzed: phāsukam katvā pabbājetabbaḥ kaṇṇa nāsa chinnanti tad ubhaya chinnam aṅguli chinnanti

original: yassa nakhasesaṃ adassetvā ekā vā bahū vā aṅguliyo chinnā honti. Yassa pana suttatantumattampi
analyzed: yassa nakha sesam a dassetvā ekā vā bahū vā aṅguliyaḥ chinnāḥ honti yassa pana sutta tantumattam pi

original: nakhasesaṃ paññāyati, taṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kaṇḍaracchinnameva cāti yassa kaṇḍaranāmakā
analyzed: nakha sesam paññāyati tam pabbājetum vaṭṭati kaṇḍara chinnam eva ca ati yassa kaṇḍara nāmakā

original: mahānhārū purato vā pacchato vā chinnā honti, yesu ekassāpi chinnattā aggapādena
analyzed: puratas vā pacchatas vā chinnāḥ honti yesu ekassa api chinnattā agga pādena

original: vā caṅkamati, mūlena vā caṅkamati, na vā pādaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ sakkoti.
analyzed: vā caṅkamati mūlena vā caṅkamati na vā pādam patiṭṭhāpetum sakkoti

original: 2487. Kāṇanti pasannandho vā hotu pupphādīhi vā upahatapasādo, yo dvīhi vā ekena
analyzed: pasanna ndhaḥ vā hotu puppha ādīhi vā upahata pasādaḥ yaḥ dvīhi vā ekena

original: vā akkhinā na passati, taṃ kāṇaṃ. Kuṇinti hatthakuṇī vā pādakuṇī vā aṅgulikuṇī vā,

original: yassa etesu hatthādīsu yaṃ kiñci vaṅkaṃ paññāyati, so kuṇī. Khujjañcāti yo urassa
analyzed: yassa etesu hattha ādīsu yam kiñci vaṅkam paññāyati saḥ kuṇī yaḥ urassa

original: vā piṭṭhiyā vā passassa vā nikkhantattā khujjasarīro, taṃ khujjaṃ. Yassa pana kiñci
analyzed: vā piṭṭhiyā vā passassa vā nikkhanta ttā khujja sarīro tam khujjam yassa pana kiñci

analyzed: kiñci aṅga paccaṅgam īsakam vaṅkam tam pabbājetum vaṭṭati mahā purisaḥ eva hi brahmu ju gattaḥ

original: avaseso satto akhujjo nāma natthi.
analyzed: avasesaḥ satto akhujjaḥ nāma natthi

original: Vāmananti yo jaṅghavāmano vā kaṭivāmano vā ubhayavāmano vā, taṃ. Tattha jaṅghavāmanassa
analyzed: vāmananti yaḥ jaṅgha vāmanaḥ vā kaṭi vāmanaḥ vā ubhaya vāmanaḥ vā tam tattha jaṅgha vāmanassa

analyzed: kaṭitaḥ paṭṭhāya heṭṭhima kāyaḥ rassaḥ hoti uparima kāyaḥ paripuṇṇaḥ kaṭi vāmanassa kaṭitaḥ

original: paṭṭhāya uparimakāyo rasso hoti, heṭṭhimakāyo paripuṇṇo hoti. Ubhayavāmanassa ubhopi
analyzed: paṭṭhāya uparima kāyaḥ rassaḥ hoti heṭṭhima kāyo paripuṇṇaḥ hoti ubhaya vāmanassa ubho pi

original: kāyā rassā honti. Yesaṃ kāyarassattā bhūtānaṃ viya parivaṭumo mahākucchighaṭasadiso
analyzed: kāyāḥ rassāḥ honti yesam kāya rassattā bhūtānam viya mahā kucchi ghaṭa sadisaḥ

original: attabhāvo hoti. Taṃ tividhampi pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: attabhāvaḥ hoti tam tividham pi pabbājetum na vaṭṭati

original: Phaṇahatthakanti yassa vaggulipakkhakā viya aṅguliyo sambaddhā honti, taṃ. Etaṃ pabbājetukāmena
analyzed: phaṇa hatthakam ti yassa vagguli pakkhakāḥ viya aṅguliyaḥ sambaddhāḥ honti tam etam pabbājetu kāmena

original: aṅgulantarikāyo phāletvā sabbaṃ antaracammaṃ apanetvā phāsukaṃ katvā pabbājetabbo.
analyzed: aṅgula antarikāyaḥ phāletvā sabbam antara cammam apanetvā phāsukam katvā pabbājetabbaḥ

original: Yassāpi cha aṅguliyo honti, taṃ pabbājetukāmena adhikaṃ aṅguliṃ chinditvā phāsukaṃ katvā pabbājetabbo.
analyzed: yassa api cha aṅguliyaḥ honti tam pabbājetu kāmena adhikam aṅgulim chinditvā phāsukam katvā pabbājetabbaḥ

original: Khañjanti yo natajāṇuko vā bhinnajaṅgho vā majjhe saṃkuṭitapādattā kuṇḍapādako vā
analyzed: khañjanti yaḥ nata jāṇukaḥ vā bhinna jaṅghaḥ vā majjhe saṃkuṭita pādattā kuṇḍa pādakaḥ vā

original: piṭṭhipādamajjhena caṅkamanto agge saṃkuṭitapādattā kuṇḍapādako vā piṭṭhipādaggena
analyzed: piṭṭhi pāda majjhena caṅkamantaḥ agge saṃkuṭita pādattā kuṇḍapādakaḥ vā piṭṭhi pāda ggena

original: caṅkamanto aggapādeneva caṅkamanakhañjo vā paṇhikāya caṅkamanakhañjo vā pādassa bāhirantena
analyzed: caṅkamantaḥ agga pādena iva caṅkamana khañjaḥ vā paṇhikāya caṅkamana khañjaḥ vā pādassa bāhirantena

original: caṅkamanakhañjo vā pādassa abbhantarantena caṅkamanakhañjo vā gopphakānaṃ upari bhaggattā
analyzed: caṅkamana khañjaḥ vā pādassa abbhantarantena caṅkamana khañjaḥ vā gopphakānaṃ upari bhaggattā

original: sakalena piṭṭhipādena caṅkamanakhañjo vā, taṃ pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Ettha natajāṇukoti
analyzed: sakalena piṭṭhi pādena caṅkamana khañjaḥ vā tam pabbājetum na vaṭṭati ettha nata jāṇuko ti

original: antopaviṭṭhaānatapādo. Pakkhahatanti yassa eko hattho vā pādo vā aḍḍhasarīraṃ vā sukhaṃ na vahati.
analyzed: anta upaviṭṭha ānata pādaḥ yassa ekaḥ hatthaḥ vā pādaḥ vā aḍḍha sarīram vā sukham na vahati

original: Sīpadinti bhārapādaṃ. Yassa pādo thūlo hoti sañjātapīḷako kharo, so na pabbājetabbo.
analyzed: bhāra pādam yassa pādaḥ thūlaḥ hoti sañjāta pīḍakaḥ kharaḥ saḥ na pabbājetabbaḥ

original: Yassa pana na tāva kharabhāvaṃ gaṇhāti, sakkā hoti upanāhaṃ bandhitvā udakaāvāṭe
analyzed: yassa pana na tāva khara bhāvam gaṇhāti sakkā hoti upanāham bandhitvā udaka āvāṭe

original: pavesetvā udakavālikāya pūretvā yathā sirā paññāyanti, jaṅghā ca telanāḷikā viya
analyzed: pavesetvā udakavālikāya pūretvā yathā sirā paññāyanti jaṅghā ca telanāḷikā viya

original: honti, evaṃ milāpetuṃ sakkā, tassa pādaṃ īdisaṃ katvā taṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace
analyzed: honti evam milāpetum sakkā tassa pādam īdisam katvā tam pabbājetum vaṭṭati sace

original: puna vaḍḍhati, upasampādentenāpi tathā katvāva upasampādetabbo. Pāparoginanti yo
analyzed: puna vaḍḍhati upasampādentena api tathā upasampādetabbaḥ yaḥ

original: arisabhagandarapittasemhakāsasosādīsu yena kenaci rogena niccāturo atekiccharogo
analyzed: arisa bhagaṃdara pitta semha kāsa sosa ādīsu yena kenaci rogena nicca āturaḥ atekiccha rogo

original: jeguccho amanāpo, taṃ.
analyzed: jegucchaḥ amanāpaḥ tam

original: 2488. Jarāya dubbalanti yo jiṇṇabhāvena dubbalo attano cīvararajanādikammampi kātuṃ
analyzed: jarāya dubbalanti yaḥ jiṇṇa bhāvena dubbalaḥ attano cīvara rajana ādi kammam api kātum

original: asamattho, taṃ. Yo pana mahallakopi balavā hoti attānaṃ paṭijaggituṃ sakkoti, so
analyzed: asamatthaḥ tam yaḥ pana mahallakaḥ api balavā hoti attānam paṭijaggitum sakkoti so

original: pabbājetabbo. Andhanti jaccandhaṃ. Padhirañcevāti yo sabbena sabbaṃ na suṇāti, taṃ.
analyzed: pabbājetabbaḥ andhanti jat candham padhiram ca iva ati yaḥ sabbena sabbam na suṇāti tam

original: Yo pana mahāsaddaṃ suṇāti, taṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Mammananti yassa vacībhedo vattati,
analyzed: yaḥ pana mahā saddam suṇāti tam pabbājetum vaṭṭati mammananti yassa vacībhedaḥ vattati

original: saraṇagamanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ bhāsituṃ na sakkoti, tādisaṃ mammanampi pabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: saraṇa gamanam paripuṇṇam bhāsitum na sakkoti tādisam mammanam pi pabbājetum na vaṭṭati

original: Yo pana saraṇagamanamattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ bhāsituṃ sakkoti, taṃ pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Atha
analyzed: yaḥ pana saraṇa gamana mattam paripuṇṇam bhāsitum sakkoti tam pabbājetum vaṭṭati atha

original: vā mammananti khalitavacanaṃ, yo ekameva akkharaṃ catupañcakkhattuṃ vadati, tassetamadhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: vā khalita vacanam yaḥ ekam eva akkharam catu pañca kkhattum vadati tassa itam adhivacanam

original: Pīṭhasappinti chinniriyāpathaṃ. Mūganti yassa vacībhedo nappavattati.
analyzed: pīṭhasappinti yassa vacībhedaḥ na ppavattati

original: 2489. Attano virūpabhāvena parisaṃ dūsentena parisadūsake dassetumāha “atidīgho”tiādi.
analyzed: attanaḥ virūpa bhāvena parisam dūsentena parisadūsake dassetum āha ati dīgha utiādi

original: Atidīghoti aññesaṃ sīsappamāṇanābhippadeso. Atirassoti vuttappakāro ubhayavāmano
analyzed: ati dīghaḥ ti aññesam sīsa ppamāṇa nābhi ppadesaḥ ati rassaḥ ti vutta ppakāraḥ ubhaya vāmanaḥ

original: viya atirasso. Atikāḷo vāti jhāpitakhette khāṇuko viya atikāḷavaṇṇo. Maṭṭhatambalohanidassano
analyzed: viya ati rassaḥ atikāḷaḥ vāti jhāpita khette khāṇukaḥ viya atikāḷa vaṇṇaḥ maṭṭha tamba loha nidassanaḥ

original: accodātopi vāti sambandho, dadhitakkādīhi majjitamaṭṭhatambalohavaṇṇo atīva odātasarīroti attho.
analyzed: accodātaḥ api vā āti sambandhaḥ dadhi takka ādīhi majjita maṭṭha tamba loha vaṇṇo atīva odāta sarīro ti attho

original: 2490. Atithūlo vāti bhāriyamaṃso mahodaro mahābhūtasadiso. Atikisoti mandamaṃsalohito
analyzed: atithūlaḥ vāti bhāriya maṃsaḥ mahodaraḥ mahābhūta sadisaḥ atikisaḥ ti manda maṃsa lohitaḥ

original: aṭṭhisirācammasarīro viya. Atimahāsīso vāti yojanā. Atimahāsīso vāti pacchiṃ sīse
analyzed: aṭṭhi sirā camma sarīro viya ati mahā sīsaḥ vāti yojanā ati mahā sīsaḥ vāti pacchim sīse

original: katvā ṭhito viya. “Atikhuddakasīsena asahitenā”ti padacchedo. Asahitenāti sarīrassa
analyzed: katvā ṭhitaḥ viya ati khudda kasīsena asahitena ati padacchedaḥ asahitena ati sarīrassa

original: ananurūpena. “Atikhuddakasīsenā”ti etassa visesanaṃ. Asahitena atikhuddakasīsena
analyzed: ananurūpena ati khuddaka sīsena ati etassa visesanam asahitena ati khuddaka sīsena

original: samannāgatoti yojanā. Yathāha – “atikhuddakasīso vā sarīrassa ananurūpena atikhuddakena
analyzed: samannāgataḥ iti yojanā yathā āha ati khuddaka sīsaḥ vā sarīrassa ananurūpena ati khuddakena

original: sīsena samannāgato”ti.
analyzed: sīsena samannāgatā iti

original: 2491. Kuṭakuṭakasīsoti tālaphalapiṇḍisadisena sīsena samannāgato. Sikharasīsakoti
analyzed: kuṭa kuṭaka sīso ti tāla phala piṇḍi sadisena sīsena samannāgato sikhara sīsakaḥ ti

original: uddhaṃ anupubbatanukena sīsena samannāgato, matthakato saṃkuṭiko mūlato vitthato
analyzed: uddham anupubba tanukena sīsena samannāgataḥ matthakataḥ saṃkuṭikaḥ mūlataḥ vitthataḥ

original: hutvā ṭhitapabbatasikharasadisasīsoti attho. Veḷunāḷisamānenāti mahāveḷupabbasadisena.
analyzed: hutvā ṭhita pabbata sikhara sadisa sīsaḥ ti atthaḥ veḷu nāḷi samānena ati mahā veḷu pabba sadisena

original: Sīsenāti dīghasīsena. Yathāha – “nāḷisīso vā mahāveḷupabbasadisena sīsena samannāgato”ti.
analyzed: sīsena ati dīgha sīsena yathā āha nāḷi sīsaḥ vā mahāveḷu pabba sadisena sīsena samannāgato ti

original: 2492. Kappasīsopīti majjhe dissamānaāvāṭena hatthikumbhasadisena dvidhābhūtasīsena
analyzed: kappa sīsaḥ api iti majjhe dissamāna āvāṭena hatthi kumbha sadisena dvidhābhūta sīsena

original: samannāgato. Pabbhārasīso vāti catūsu passesu yena kenaci passena oṇatena sīsena
analyzed: samannāgataḥ pabbhāra sīsaḥ vāti catūsu passesu yena kenaci passena oṇatena sīsena

original: samannāgato. Vaṇasīsakoti vaṇehi samannāgatasīso. Kaṇṇikakeso vāti pāṇakehi khāyitakedāre
analyzed: samannāgataḥ vaṇa sīsakaḥ ti vaṇehi samannāgata sīso kaṇṇika kesaḥ vāti pāṇakehi khāyita kedāre

original: sassasadisehi tahiṃ tahiṃ uṭṭhitehi kesehi samannāgato. Thūlakesopi vāti tālahīrasadisehi kesehi samannāgato.
analyzed: sassa sadisehi tahim tahim uṭṭhitehi kesehi samannāgato thūla kesaḥ api vāti tāla hīra sadisehi kesehi samannāgato

original: 2493. Pūtisīsoti duggandhasīso. Nillomasīso vāti lomarahitasīso. Jātipaṇḍarakesakoti
analyzed: pūti sīsaḥ iti duggandha sīsaḥ nilloma sīsaḥ vāti loma rahita sīsaḥ jāti paṇḍara kesakaḥ iti

original: jātiphalitehi paṇḍarakeso vā. Jātiyā tambakeso vāti ādittehi viya tambavaṇṇehi kesehi
analyzed: jāti phalitehi paṇḍara kesaḥ vā jātiyā tamba kesaḥ vāti ādittehi viya tamba vaṇṇehi kesehi

original: samannāgato. Āvaṭṭasīsakoti gunnaṃ sarīre āvaṭṭasadisehi uddhaggehi kesāvaṭṭehi samannāgato.
analyzed: samannāgataḥ āvaṭṭa sīsako ti gunnam sarīre āvaṭṭa sadisehi uddhaggehi kesa avaṭṭehi samannāgataḥ

original: 2494. Sīsalomekabaddhehi bhamukehi yutopīti sīsalomehi saddhiṃ ekābaddhalomehi bhamukehi
analyzed: sīsa loma eka baddhehi bhamukehi yutaḥ api iti sīsa lomehi saddhim eka ābaddha lomehi bhamukehi

original: samannāgato. Sambaddhabhamuko vāti ekābaddhaubhayabhamuko, majjhe sañjātalomehi bhamukehi
analyzed: samannāgataḥ sambaddha bhamukaḥ vāti eka ābaddha aubhaya bhamukaḥ majjhe sañjāta lomehi bhamukehi

original: samannāgatoti attho. Nillomabhamukopi vāti bhamulomarahito. Nillomabhamukopi vāti
analyzed: samannāgataḥ ti atthaḥ nilloma bhamukaḥ api vā ati bhamu loma rahitaḥ nilloma bhamukaḥ api vā ati

original: pi-saddena avuttasamuccayatthena makkaṭabhamuko saṅgahito.
analyzed: pi saddena avutta samuccaya tthena makkaṭa bhamukaḥ saṅgahitaḥ

original: 2495. Mahantakhuddanetto vāti ettha netta-saddo mahantakhudda-saddehi paccekaṃ yojetabbo,
analyzed: mahanta khudda nettaḥ vā ti ettha netta saddaḥ mahanta khudda saddehi paccekam yojetabbo

original: mahantanetto vā khuddakanetto vāti attho. Mahantanetto vāti atimahantehi nettehi
analyzed: mahanta nettaḥ vā khuddaka nettaḥ vā ati attho mahanta nettaḥ vā ati atimahantehi nettehi

original: samannāgato. Khuddakanetto vāti mahiṃsacamme vāsikoṇena paharitvā katachiddasadisehi
analyzed: samannāgataḥ khuddaka nettaḥ vāti mahiṃsa camme vāsi koṇena paharitvā kata chidda sadisehi

original: atikhuddakakkhīhi samannāgato. Visamalocanoti ekena mahantena, ekena khuddakena akkhinā
analyzed: ati khudda kakkhīhi samannāgataḥ visama locanaḥ ti ekena mahantena ekena khuddakena akkhinā

original: samannāgato. Kekaro vāpīti tiriyaṃ passanto. Ettha api-saddena nikkhantakkhiṃ sampiṇḍeti,
analyzed: samannāgataḥ kekaraḥ vāpī iti tiriyam passantaḥ ettha api saddena nikkhanta kkhim sampiṇḍeti

original: yassa kakkaṭakasseva akkhitārakā nikkhantā honti. Gambhīranettoti yassa gambhīre
analyzed: yassa kakkaṭakassa iva akkhi tārakāḥ nikkhantāḥ honti gambhīra netto ti yassa gambhīre

original: udapāne udakatārakā viya akkhitārakā paññāyanti. Ettha ca udakatārakā nāma udakapubbuḷaṃ.
analyzed: udapāne udaka tārakāḥ viya akkhi tārakā paññāyanti ettha ca udaka tārakāḥ nāma udaka pubbuḷam

original: Akkhitārakāti akkhigeṇḍakā. Visamacakkaloti ekena uddhaṃ, ekena adhoti evaṃ visamajātehi
analyzed: akkhitārakā ati akkhigeṇḍakā visamacakkalā ekena uddham ekena adhas iti evam visama jātehi

original: akkhicakkehi samannāgato.
analyzed: akkhi cakkehi samannāgataḥ

original: 2496. Jatukaṇṇo vāti atikhuddikāhi kaṇṇasakkhalīhi samannāgato. Mūsikakaṇṇo vāti
analyzed: jatu kaṇṇaḥ vāti ati khuddikāhi kaṇṇa sakkhalīhi samannāgataḥ mūsika kaṇṇaḥ vāti

original: mūsikānaṃ kaṇṇasadisehi kaṇṇehi samannāgato. Hatthikaṇṇopi vāti ananurūpāhi mahantāhi
analyzed: mūsikānam kaṇṇa sadisehi kaṇṇehi samannāgataḥ hatthi kaṇṇaḥ api vāti ananurūpāhi mahantāhi

original: hatthikaṇṇasadisāhi kaṇṇasakkhalīhi samannāgato. Chiddamattakakaṇṇo vāti yassa vinā
analyzed: hatthi kaṇṇa sadisāhi kaṇṇa sakkhalīhi samannāgataḥ chidda mattaka kaṇṇaḥ vāti yassa vinā

original: kaṇṇasakkhalīhi kaṇṇacchiddameva hoti. Aviddhakaṇṇakoti kaṇṇabandhatthāya aviddhena
analyzed: kaṇṇa sakkhalīhi kaṇṇa chiddam eva hoti aviddha kaṇṇakā iti kaṇṇa bandha tthāya aviddhena

original: kaṇṇena samannāgato.
analyzed: kaṇṇena samannāgataḥ

original: 2497. Ṭaṅkitakaṇṇo vāti gobhattanāḷikāya aggasadisehi kaṇṇehi samannāgato, gohanukoṭisaṇṭhānehi
analyzed: ṭaṅkita kaṇṇaḥ vāti go bhatta nāḷikāya agga sadisehi kaṇṇehi samannāgataḥ go hanu koṭi saṇṭhānehi

original: kaṇṇehi samannāgatoti attho. Pūtikaṇṇopi vāti sadā paggharitapubbena kaṇṇena samannāgato.
analyzed: kaṇṇehi samannāgataḥ ti attho pūti kaṇṇaḥ api vā ati sadā paggharita pubbena kaṇṇena samannāgataḥ

original: Pūtikaṇṇopīti api-saddena kaṇṇabhagandariko gahito. Kaṇṇabhagandarikoti niccapūtinā
analyzed: pūtikaṇṇaḥ api iti api saddena kaṇṇa bhagandarikaḥ gahito kaṇṇa bhagandarikaḥ ti nicca pūtinā

original: kaṇṇena samannāgato. Aviddhakaṇṇo parisadūsako vutto, kathaṃ yonakajātīnaṃ pabbajjāti
analyzed: kaṇṇena samannāgataḥ a viddha kaṇṇaḥ parisadūsakaḥ vuttaḥ katham yonaka jātīnam pabbajjāti

original: āha “yonakādippabhedopi, nāyaṃ parisadūsako”ti, kaṇṇāvedhanaṃ yonakānaṃ sabhāvo,
analyzed: āha yonaka ādi ppabhedaḥ api na ayam kaṇṇā vedhanam yonakānam sabhāvaḥ

original: ayaṃ yonakādippabhedo parisadūsako na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ayam yonaka ādi pabhedo parisadūsakaḥ na hoti iti vuttam hoti

original: 2498. Atipiṅgalanettoti atisayena piṅgalehi nettehi samannāgato. Madhupiṅgalaṃ pana
analyzed: ati piṅgala netto ti atisayena piṅgalehi nettehi samannāgataḥ madhu piṅgalam pana

original: pabbājetuṃ vaṭṭati. Nippakhumakkhi vāti akkhidalaromehi virahitaakkhiko. Pakhuma-saddo
analyzed: pabbājetum vaṭṭati nippakhumakkhi vāti akkhi dala romehi virahita akkhikaḥ pakhuma saddaḥ

original: hi loke akkhidalaromesu niruḷho. Assupaggharanetto vāti paggharaṇassūhi nettehi samannāgato.
analyzed: hi loke akkhi dala romesu niruḷhaḥ assu pagghara nettaḥ vāti paggharaṇa ssūhi nettehi samannāgataḥ

original: Pakkapupphitalocanoti pakkalocano pupphitalocanoti yojanā. Paripakkanetto sañjātapupphanettoti attho.
analyzed: pakka pupphita locano ti pakka locano pupphita locano ti yojanā paripakka netto sañjāta puppha netto ti attho

original: 2499. Mahānāsoti sarīrassa ananurūpāya mahatiyā nāsāya samannāgato. Atikhuddakanāsikoti
analyzed: mahā nāsaḥ ti sarīrassa ananurūpāya mahatiyā nāsāya samannāgataḥ ati khuddaka nāsiko ti

original: tathā atikhuddikāya nāsāya samannāgato. Cipiṭanāso vāti cipiṭāya anto paviṭṭhāya
analyzed: tathā ati khuddikāya nāsāya samannāgataḥ cipiṭa nāsaḥ vāti cipiṭāya antar paviṭṭhāya

original: viya allināsāya samannāgato. Cipiṭanāso vāti avuttavikappatthena vā-saddena dīghanāsiko
analyzed: viya alli nāsāya samannāgato cipiṭa nāsaḥ vāti a vutta vikappa atthena vā saddena dīgha nāsikaḥ

original: saṅgayhati. So ca sukatuṇḍasadisāya jivhāya lehituṃ sakkuṇeyyāya nāsikāya samannāgato.
analyzed: saṅgayhati saḥ ca suka tuṇḍa sadisāya jivhāya lehitum sakkuṇeyyāya nāsikāya samannāgataḥ

original: Kuṭilanāsikoti mukhamajjhe appatiṭṭhahitvā ekapasse ṭhitanāsiko.
analyzed: kuṭila nāsikaḥ ti mukha majjhe a patiṭṭhahitvā eka passe ṭhita nāsiko

original: 2500. Niccavissavanāso vāti niccapaggharitasiṅghāṇikanāso vā. Mahāmukhoti yassa paṭaṅgamaṇḍukasseva
analyzed: nicca vissava nāsaḥ vā ati nicca paggharita siṅghāṇika nāsaḥ vā mahā mukhaḥ ti yassa paṭaṅga maṇḍukassa iva

original: mukhanimittaṃyeva mahantaṃ hoti, mukhaṃ pana lābusadisaṃ atikhuddakaṃ. Paṭaṅgamaṇḍuko
analyzed: mukha nimittam yeva mahantam hoti mukham pana lābu sadisam ati khuddakam

original: nāma mahāmukhamaṇḍuko. Vaṅkabhinnamukho vāpīti ettha “vaṅkamukho vā bhinnamukho vāpī”ti
analyzed: nāma mahāmukhamaṇḍukaḥ vaṅka bhinna mukhaḥ vāpī iti ettha vaṅka mukhaḥ vā bhinna mukhaḥ vāpī iti

original: yojanā. Vaṅkamukhoti bhamukassa, nalātassa vā ekapasse ninnatāya vaṅkamukho. Bhinnamukho
analyzed: yojanā vaṅka mukhaḥ ti bhamukassa nalātassa vā eka passe ninna tāya vaṅka mukhaḥ bhinna mukhaḥ

original: vāti makkaṭasseva bhinnamukho. Mahāoṭṭhopi vāti ukkhalimukhavaṭṭisadisehi oṭṭhehi samannāgato.
analyzed: vāti makkaṭassa iva bhinna mukhaḥ mahā oṭṭhaḥ api vāti ukkhali mukha vaṭṭi sadisehi oṭṭhehi samannāgato

original: 2501. Tanukaoṭṭho vāti bhericammasadisehi dante pidahituṃ asamatthehi oṭṭhehi samannāgato.
analyzed: tanuka oṭṭhaḥ vāti bheri camma sadisehi dante pidahitum asamatthehi oṭṭhehi samannāgataḥ

original: Bhericammasadisehīti bherimukhacammasadisehi. Tanukaoṭṭho vāti ettha vā-saddena mahādharoṭṭho
analyzed: bheri camma sadisehi iti bheri mukha camma sadisehi tanuka oṭṭhaḥ vā ti ettha vā saddena mahādharoṭṭhaḥ

original: vā tanukauttaroṭṭho vā tanukaadharoṭṭho vāti tayo vikappā saṅgahitā. Vipuluttaraoṭṭhakoti
analyzed: vā tanuka auttaroṭṭhaḥ vā tanuka adharoṭṭhaḥ vā ati tayaḥ vikappā saṅgahitāḥ vipula uttara oṭṭhakaḥ ti

original: mahāuttaroṭṭho. Oṭṭhachinnoti yassa eko vā dve vā oṭṭhā chinnā honti. Uppakkamukhoti

analyzed: disāya gajaṅgalam nāma nigamaḥ ti ādinā vutta sīmā paricchede majjhima dese

analyzed: catu paṭalatas paṭṭhāya bahu paṭalā upāhanā yathā āha catu paṭalatas

analyzed: khallaka baddhā iti paṇhi pidhāna attham tale khallakam bandhitvā katā ati pāli guṇṭhimā

analyzed: suddha koseyyam pana vaṭṭati

analyzed: ṭhapetvā tūli kaṃpe vaṭṭanti iti vuttanti apare

analyzed: hatthi assa rathattharanti hatthi piṭṭhe attharitam attharaṇam hatthattharaṇam nāma

original: 2661. Rattavitānassa heṭṭhāti kusumbhādirattassa lohitavitānassa heṭṭhā kappiyapaccattharaṇehi
analyzed: ratta vitānassa heṭṭhā ti kusumbha ādi rattassa lohita vitānassa heṭṭhā kappiya paccattharaṇehi

analyzed: sayanāsanam idam sabbam akappiyam paribhuñjataḥ dukkaṭam hoti yam pana ekam eva

analyzed: dve bibbohanāni na vaṭṭanti iti gaṇṭhi pade vuttam tena iva yebhuyyena ratta vitānam pi

analyzed: na vaṭṭati iti viññāyati

original: Ettha ca kiñcāpi dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “alohitakāni dvepi vaṭṭantiyeva, tato uttari
analyzed: ettha ca kiñcā api alohitakāni dve pi tatas uttari

original: labhitvā aññesaṃ dātabbāni, dātuṃ asakkonto mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ
analyzed: labhitvā aññesam dātabbāni dātum a sakkontaḥ mañce tiriyam attharitvā upari paccattharaṇam

original: 2662. Uddhaṃ setavitānampi heṭṭhā akappiye paccattharaṇe sati na vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Tasminti akappiyapaccattharaṇe.

analyzed: udakena pana asambhinnaḥ rasaḥ yāvakālikaḥ

original: 2685. Phalanti ambādiphalaṃ. Savatthukapaṭiggahoti pānavatthukānaṃ phalānaṃ paṭiggaho.
analyzed: phalanti amba ādi phalam sa vatthuka paṭiggaho ti pāna vatthukānam phalānam paṭiggahaḥ

original: Vasati ettha pānanti vatthu, phalaṃ, vatthunā saha vaṭṭatīti savatthukaṃ, pānaṃ,
analyzed: vasati ettha pānanti vatthu phalam vatthunā saha vaṭṭati iti sa vatthukam pānam

original: savatthukassa paṭiggaho savatthukapaṭiggaho. Savatthukassa paṭiggahaṃ nāma vatthupaṭiggahaṇamevāti
analyzed: savatthukassa paṭiggaho savatthuka paṭiggaho savatthukassa paṭiggaham nāma vatthu paṭiggahaṇam eva ati

original: katvā vuttaṃ “pānavatthukānaṃ phalānaṃ paṭiggaho”ti.
analyzed: katvā vuttam pāna vatthukānam phalānam paṭiggahaḥ ti

original: 2686. “Sukoṭṭetvā”ti vuccamānattā “ambapakka”nti āmakameva ambaphalaṃ vuccati. Udaketi
analyzed: su koṭṭetvā iti amba pakkam ti āmakam eva amba phalam vuccati udaka iti

original: sītodake. Parissavaṃ parissāvitaṃ. Katvāti madhuādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā. Yathāha –
analyzed: sītā udake parissavam parissāvitam katvā ati madhu ādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā yathā āha

original: “tadahupaṭiggahitehi madhusakkarakappūrādīhi yojetvā kātabba”nti. Pātuṃ vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: tad ahu paṭiggahitehi madhu sakkara kappūra ādīhi yojetvā kātabbanti pātum vaṭṭati iti

original: ettha vinicchayo “evaṃ kataṃ purebhattameva kappati, anupasampannehi kataṃ labhitvā
analyzed: ettha vinicchayaḥ evam katam purebhattam eva kappati anupasampannehi katam labhitvā

original: pana purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogenāpi vaṭṭati, pacchābhattaṃ
analyzed: pana purebhattam paṭiggahitam purebhattam sa āmisa paribhogena api vaṭṭati pacchābhattam

original: nirāmisaparibhogena yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭatiyeva. Esa nayo sabbapānesū”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
analyzed: nirāmisa paribhogena yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭatiyā iva esa nayaḥ sabba pānesu iti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttaḥ

original: 2687. Sesapānakesupīti jambupānakādīsupi.
analyzed: sesa pānakesupi iti jambu pānaka ādīsupi

original: 2688. Ucchuraso antogadhattā idha vutto, na pana yāmakālikattā, so pana sattāhakālikoyeva.
analyzed: idha vuttaḥ na pana yāma kālika ttā saḥ pana

original: 2689. Madhukassa rasanti madhukapupphassa rasaṃ. Ettha madhukapuppharaso aggipāko
analyzed: madhukassa rasanti madhuka pupphassa rasam ettha madhuka puppha rasaḥ aggi pākaḥ

original: vā hotu ādiccapāko vā, pacchābhattaṃ na vaṭṭati. Purebhattampi yaṃ pānaṃ gahetvā
analyzed: vā hotu ādicca pākaḥ vā pacchābhattam na vaṭṭati purebhattam pi yam pānam gahetvā

original: majjaṃ karonti, so ādito paṭṭhāya na vaṭṭati. Madhukapupphaṃ pana allaṃ vā sukkhaṃ
