original: vā bhajjitaṃ vā tena kataphāṇitaṃ vā yato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ na karonti, taṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: vā bhajjitam vā tena kata phāṇitam vā yatas paṭṭhāya majjam na karonti tam sabbam

original: purebhattaṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: purebhattam vaṭṭati

original: Pakkaḍākarasanti pakkassa yāvakālikassa rasaṃ. Sabbo pattaraso yāmakāliko vuttoti
analyzed: pakkaḍāka rasanti pakkassa yāvakālikassa rasam sabbaḥ patta rasaḥ yāmakālikaḥ vutto ti

original: yojanā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yāvakālikapattānañhi purebhattaṃyeva raso kappatī”ti imameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: yojanā aṭṭhakathā ayam yāva kālika pattānam hi purebhattam yeva raso kappati iti imam eva sandhāya vuttam

original: 2690. Sānulomānaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ phalajaṃ rasaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbo phalajo raso vikāle yāmasaññite anulomato paribhuñjituṃ anuññātoti yojanā.
analyzed: sa anulomānam sattannam dhaññānam phala jam rasam ṭhapetvā sabbaḥ phala jaḥ raso vikāle yāma saññite anulomataḥ paribhuñjitum anuññātaḥ iti yojanā

original: 2691. Yāvakālikapattānaṃ sītudake madditvā kato rasopi apakko, ādiccapākopi vikāle pana vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: yāvakālika pattānam sīta udake madditvā kataḥ rasaḥ api apakkaḥ ādicca pākaḥ api vikāle pana vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 2692-3. Sattadhaññānulomāni sarūpato dassetumāha “tālañcanāḷikerañcā”tiādi. Aparaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: satta dhañña anulomāni sarūpataḥ dassetum āha aparaṇṇam

original: muggādi. “Sattadhaññānulomika”nti iminā etesaṃ raso yāvakāliko yāmakālasaṅkhāte vikāle
analyzed: mugga ādi satta dhañña ānulomikanti iminā etesam rasaḥ yāvakālikaḥ yāma kāla saṅkhāte vikāle

original: paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
analyzed: paribhuñjitum na vaṭṭati iti dasseti

original: 2695. Evamādīnaṃ khuddakānaṃ phalānaṃ raso pana aṭṭhapānānulomattā anulomike yāmakālikānulomike niddiṭṭho kathitoti yojanā.
analyzed: evamādīnam khuddakānam phalānam raso pana aṭṭhapāna anuloma ttā anulomike yāma kālika ānulomike niddiṭṭhaḥ kathitaḥ iti yojanā

original: 2696. Idha imasmiṃ loke sānulomassa dhaññassa phalajaṃ rasaṃ ṭhapetvā ayāmakāliko añño phalaraso natthīti yojanā, sabbo yāmakālikoyevāti dīpeti.
analyzed: idha imasmin loke sa anulomassa dhaññassa phala jam rasam ṭhapetvā a yāmakālikaḥ aññaḥ phala rasaḥ natthi iti yojanā sabbaḥ dīpeti

original: Bhesajjakkhandhakakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: bhesajja khandhaka kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Kathinakkhandhakakathāvaṇṇanā
2697. Vutthavassānaṃ purimikāya vassaṃ upagantvā yāva mahāpavāraṇā, tāva ratticchedaṃ
analyzed: vuttha vassānam purimikāya vassam upagantvā yāva mahāpavāraṇā tāva ratti chedam

original: akatvā vutthavassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekassa vā dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ atirekānaṃ
analyzed: a katvā vutthavassānam bhikkhūnam ekassa vā dvinnam tiṇṇam catunnam pañcannam atirekānam

original: vā bhikkhūnaṃ pañcannaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vakkhamānānaṃ anāmantacārādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ
analyzed: vā bhikkhūnam pañcannam ānisaṃsānam vakkhamānānam anāmanta cāra ādīnam pañcannam ānisaṃsānam

original: paṭilābhakāraṇā munipuṅgavo sabbesaṃ agārikādimunīnaṃ sakalaguṇagaṇehi uttamo bhagavā
analyzed: paṭilābha kāraṇā muni puṅgavaḥ sabbesam agārika ādi munīnam sakala guṇa gaṇehi uttamaḥ bhagavā

original: kathinatthāraṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassaṃvutthānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathinaṃ attharitu”nti
analyzed: kathinatthāram anujānāmi bhikkhave vassaṃvutthānam bhikkhūnam kathinam attharitun ti

original: abrvi kathesīti yojanā.
analyzed: abrvi kathesi iti yojanā

original: Etthāyaṃ vinicchayo – “kathinatthāraṃ ke labhanti, ke na labhantīti? Gaṇanavasena
analyzed: ettha ayam vinicchayaḥ kathinatthāram ke labhanti ke na labhanti iti gaṇana vasena

analyzed: pacchima koṭiyā pañca janāḥ labhanti uddham sata sahassam pi heṭṭhā

original: na labhantī”ti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāya atthārakassa bhikkhuno saṅghassa kathinadussadānakammaṃ
analyzed: na labhanti iti idam aṭṭhakathāya atthārakassa bhikkhuno saṅghassa kathina dussa dāna kammaṃ

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Vutthavassavasena purimikāya vassaṃ upagantvā paṭhamapavāraṇāya
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam vuttha vassa vasena purimikāya vassam upagantvā paṭhama pavāraṇāya

original: vutthavassāpi na labhantīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāya ānisaṃsalābhaṃ
analyzed: na labhanti iti mahā paccariyam vuttan ti idam aṭṭhakathāya ānisaṃsa lābham

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na kammaṃ.
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam na kammam

original: Idāni tadubhayaṃ vibhajitvā dasseti –
analyzed: idāni tat ubhayam vibhajitvā

original: “Purimikāya upagatānaṃ pana sabbe gaṇapūrakā honti, ānisaṃsaṃ na labhanti, ānisaṃso
analyzed: purimikāya upagatānam pana sabbe gaṇapūrakāḥ honti ānisaṃsam na labhanti ānisaṃso

original: itaresaṃyeva hoti. Sace purimikāya upagatā cattāro vā honti, tayo vā dve vā eko vā,
analyzed: itaresam yā iva hoti sace purimikāya upagatā cattāraḥ vā honti tayaḥ vā dve vā ekaḥ vā

original: itare gaṇapūrake katvā kathinaṃ attharitabbaṃ. Atha cattāro bhikkhū upagatā, eko

analyzed: paripuṇṇa vassaḥ sāmaṇero so ce pacchimikāya upasampajjati gaṇa pūrakaḥ ca iva hoti

original: ānisaṃsañca labhati. Tayo bhikkhū dve sāmaṇerā, dve bhikkhū tayo sāmaṇerā, eko bhikkhu

original: cattāro sāmaṇerāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sace purimikāya upagatā kathinatthārakusalā
analyzed: cattāro sāmaṇerā ti ettha api esā iva nayaḥ sace purimikāya upagatā

analyzed: kathinam attharāpetvā dānam ca bhuñjitvā gamissanti ānisaṃsaḥ pana itaresam yeva hoti iti

analyzed: aññatarena dinnam vaṭṭati kathina dāyakassa vattam atthi sace so tam a jānantaḥ pucchati

analyzed: aññatara ppahonakam sūri yuj gamana samaye vattham kathina cīvaram dema iti dātum vaṭṭati

original: Kathinatthārakenāpi dhammena samena uppannaṃ kathinaṃ attharantena vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
analyzed: kathinatthārakena api dhammena samena uppannam kathinam attharantena vattam jānitabbam

original: Tantavāyagehato hi ābhatasantāneneva khalimakkhitasāṭakopi na vaṭṭati, malīnasāṭakopi
analyzed: tantavāya gehataḥ hi ābhata santānena iva na vaṭṭati malīna sāṭakaḥ api

original: na vaṭṭati, tasmā kathinatthārasāṭakaṃ labhitvā suddhaṃ dhovitvā sūciādīni cīvarakammūpakaraṇāni

analyzed: santakena iva attharitabbam itaraḥ yathā tathā ovaditvā saññāpetabbaḥ

original: Kathinaṃ pana kena attharitabbaṃ? Yassa saṅgho kathinacīvaraṃ deti. Saṅghena pana
analyzed: kathinam pana kena attharitabbam yassa saṅghaḥ kathina cīvaram deti saṅghena pana

original: kassa dātabbaṃ? Yo jiṇṇacīvaro hoti. Sace bahū jiṇṇacīvarā honti, vuḍḍhassa dātabbaṃ.

original: Vuḍḍhesupi yo mahāparivāro tadaheva cīvaraṃ katvā attharituṃ sakkoti, tassa dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuḍḍhesu pi yaḥ mahā parivāraḥ tadahā iva cīvaram katvā attharitum sakkoti tassa dātabbam

original: Sace vuḍḍho na sakkoti, navakataro sakkoti, tassa dātabbaṃ. Api ca saṅghena mahātherassa
analyzed: sace vuḍḍhaḥ na sakkoti navakataraḥ sakkoti tassa dātabbam api ca saṅghena mahā therassa

original: Tīsu cīvaresu yaṃ jiṇṇaṃ hoti, tadatthāya dātabbaṃ. Pakatiyā dupaṭṭacīvarassa dupaṭṭatthāyeva
analyzed: tīsu cīvaresu yam jiṇṇam hoti tad atthāya dātabbam pakatiyā dupaṭṭa cīvarassa dupaṭṭa tthāya eva

original: dātabbaṃ. Sacepissa ekapaṭṭacīvaraṃ ghanaṃ hoti, kathinasāṭako ca pelavo, sāruppatthāya
analyzed: dātabbam sace pissa eka paṭṭa cīvaram ghanam hoti kathina sāṭakaḥ ca pelavaḥ sāruppa tthāya

original: dupaṭṭappahonakameva dātabbaṃ. “Ahaṃ alabhanto ekapaṭṭaṃ pārupāmī”ti vadantassāpi
analyzed: dupaṭṭa ppahonakam eva dātabbam aham a labhantaḥ eka paṭṭam pārupāmi iti vadantassa api

original: Yassa pana diyyati, tassa –
analyzed: yassa pana diyyati tassa

original: “Suṇātu me, bhante saṅgho, idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ idam saṅghassa kathinadussam uppannam saṅghaḥ imam kathinadussam

analyzed: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinam attharitum yassa ayasmataḥ khamati imassa kathina dussassa

analyzed: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dānam kathinam attharitum saḥ tuṇhassa yassa na khamati saḥ bhāseyya

original: “Dinnaṃ idaṃ saṅghena kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kathinaṃ attharituṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –

original: Evaṃ ñattidutiyāya kammavācāya dātabbanti evaṃ dinnaṃ.

original: 2698-9. Na ullikhitamattādi-catuvīsativajjitanti pāḷiyaṃ āgatehi “na ullikhitamattena
analyzed: na ullikhita matta ādi catuvīsati vajjitanti āgatehi na ullikhita mattena

analyzed: atthatam hoti ullikhita matta ādīhi catuvīsatiyā ākārehi vajjitam cīvaranti

original: “ahatena atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ soḷasannaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarena
analyzed: ahatena atthatam hoti pāḷiyam āgatānam ākārānam aññatarena

original: yuttaṃ katapariyositaṃ dinnaṃ kappabinduṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataracīvaraṃ. Te pana

original: “Āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammakatena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṃ.
analyzed: āpattiyāḥ a dassane ukkhepanīya kamma katena bhikkhave bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbam

original: Tatrāyaṃ sammāvattanā – na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo,
analyzed: tatra ayam sammāvattanā na upasampādetabbam na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: na bhikkhunovādakasammuti sāditabbā, sammatenāpi bhikkhuniyo na ovaditabbā, yāya
analyzed: na bhikkhunā uvādaka sammuti sāditabbā sammatena api bhikkhuniyaḥ na ovaditabbā yāya

original: āpattiyā saṅghena āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti, sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā,
analyzed: āpattiyā saṅghena āpattiyāḥ adassane ukkhepanīya kammam katam hoti sā āpatti na āpajjitabbā

original: aññā vā tādisikā, tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarā, kammaṃ na garahitabbaṃ, kammikā na garahitabbā,
analyzed: aññā vā tādisikā tatas vā pāpiṭṭhatarā kammam na garahitabbam kammikā na garahitabbā

original: na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ āsanābhihāro

original: seyyābhihāro pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakathalikaṃ pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ
analyzed: seyyā abhihāraḥ pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalikam patta cīvara paṭiggahaṇam nahāne piṭṭhi parikammaṃ

original: sāditabbaṃ, na pakatatto bhikkhu sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsetabbo, na ācāravipattiyā
analyzed: sāditabbam na pakatattaḥ bhikkhu sīla vipattiyā an uddhaṃsetabbaḥ na ācāra vipattiyā

original: anuddhaṃsetabbo, na diṭṭhivipattiyā anuddhaṃsetabbo, na ājīvavipattiyā anuddhaṃsetabbo,
analyzed: an uddhaṃsetabbaḥ na diṭṭhi vipattiyā an uddhaṃsetabbaḥ na ājīva vipattiyā an uddhaṃsetabbaḥ

original: na bhikkhu bhikkhūhi bhedetabbo, na gihiddhajo dhāretabbo, na titthiyaddhajo dhāretabbo,
analyzed: na bhikkhu bhikkhūhi bhedetabbaḥ na gihiddhajaḥ dhāretabbaḥ na titthiyaddhajaḥ dhāretabbaḥ

original: na titthiyā sevitabbā, bhikkhū sevitabbā, bhikkhusikkhāya sikkhitabbaṃ, na pakatattena
analyzed: na titthiyā sevitabbā bhikkhū sevitabbā bhikkhu sikkhāya sikkhitabbam na pakatattena

original: bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabbaṃ, na ekacchanne anāvāse vatthabbaṃ,
analyzed: bhikkhunā saddhim eka channe āvāse vatthabbam na eka channe anāvāse vatthabbam

original: na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṃ, pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ,
analyzed: na eka channe āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbam pakatattam bhikkhum disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbam

original: na pakatatto bhikkhu āsādetabbo anto vā bahi vā, na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposatho
analyzed: na pakatattaḥ bhikkhu āsādetabbaḥ antar vā bahi vā na pakatattassa bhikkhuno uposathaḥ

original: ṭhapetabbo, na pavāraṇā ṭhapetabbā, na savacanīyaṃ kātabbaṃ, na anuvādo paṭṭhapetabbo,
analyzed: ṭhapetabbaḥ na pavāraṇā ṭhapetabbā na savacanīyam kātabbam na anuvādaḥ paṭṭhapetabbaḥ

original: na okāso kāretabbo, na codetabbo, na sāretabbo, na bhikkhūhi sampayojetabba”nti –
analyzed: na okāsaḥ kāretabbaḥ na codetabbaḥ na sāretabbaḥ na bhikkhūhi sampayojetabbanti

analyzed: evam ca itāni tecattālīsa vattāni sandhāya vuttam tecattālīsa vattāni khandhake kamma saññitā iti

original: Pārivāsikakkhandhake –
analyzed: pārivāsika khandhake

original: “Pārivāsikena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ sammāvattanā – na
analyzed: pārivāsikena bhikkhave bhikkhunā sammā vattitabbam tatra ayam sammāvattanā na

analyzed: sāditabbā sammatena api bhikkhuniyaḥ na ovaditabbā yāya āpattiyā saṅghena parivāso

analyzed: na pavāraṇā ṭhapetabbā na savacanīyam kātabbam na anuvādaḥ paṭṭhapetabbaḥ na okāsaḥ

original: kāretabbo, na codetabbo, na sāretabbo, na bhikkhūhi sampayojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: kāretabbaḥ na codetabbaḥ na sāretabbaḥ na bhikkhūhi sampayojetabbam

original: “Na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattassa bhikkhuno purato gantabbaṃ, na
analyzed: na bhikkhave pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattassa bhikkhuno puratas gantabbam na

analyzed: puratas nisīditabbam yaḥ hoti saṅghassa āsana pariyantaḥ seyyā pariyantaḥ vihāra pariyantaḥ

analyzed: so tassa padātabbo tena ca so sāditabbo

original: “Gantabbo, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā anāvāsā sabhikkhuko anāvāso yatthassu bhikkhū samānasaṃvāsakā yaṃ jaññā ‘sakkomi ajjeva gantu’nti.

original: “Gantabbo, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā anāvāsā sabhikkhuko āvāso vā anāvāso vā yatthassu bhikkhū samānasaṃvāsakā yaṃ jaññā ‘sakkomi ajjeva gantu’nti.

original: “Gantabbo, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā āvāsā vā anāvāsā vā sabhikkhuko āvāso yatthassu bhikkhū samānasaṃvāsakā yaṃ jaññā ‘sakkomi ajjeva gantu’nti.

original: Tīheva samathehīti ettha garukāpatti sammukhāvinayena, paṭiññātakaraṇena cāti dvīhi,
analyzed: tīhi iva samathehi iti ettha garuka āpatti sammukhā vinayena paṭiññāta karaṇena ca ati dvīhi

original: lahukāpattiṃ āpajjitvā saṅghe vā gaṇe vā puggale vā desanāya sammukhāvinayena ceva
analyzed: lahuka āpattim āpajjitvā saṅghe vā gaṇe vā puggale vā desanāya sammukha avinayena ca iva

original: paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, kosambakānaṃ viggahasadisaṃ mahāviggahaṃ karontehi āpannā anekavidhā
analyzed: paṭiññāta karaṇena ca kosambakānam viggaha sadisam mahā viggaham karontehi āpannāḥ anekavidhā

original: āpattiyo sace honti, tāsu vakkhamānasarūpaṃ thullavajjādiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbā
analyzed: āpattiyo sace honti tāsu vakkhamāna sarūpam thullavajja ādim ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbā

original: āpattiyo sammukhāvinayena, tiṇavatthārakena ca sammantīti attho.
analyzed: āpattiyaḥ sammukhāvinayena ca sammanti iti attho

original: Kiccaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena sammukhāvinayeneva sammatīti yojanā.
analyzed: kiccam kicca adhikaraṇam ekena sammukhā avinayena iva sammatī iti yojanā

original: 2770. Yebhuyyasikakammeti ettha nimittatthe bhummaṃ. Salākaṃ gāhayeti vinicchayakārake
analyzed: ettha nimitta atthe bhummam salākam gāhaya iti vinicchaya kārake

original: saṅghe dhammavādīnaṃ bahuttaṃ vā appatarattaṃ vā jānituṃ vakkhamānena nayena salākaṃ
analyzed: saṅghe dhamma vādīnam bahuttam vā appatara ttam vā jānitum vakkhamānena nayena salākam

original: gāhāpeyya. Budhoti “na chandāgatiṃ gacchati…pe… gahitāgahitañca jānātī”ti vuttaṃ
analyzed: gāhāpeyya budhaḥ iti na chanda āgatim gacchati pe gahita a gahitam ca jānāti iti vuttam

original: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ puggalaṃ dasseti. “Gūḷhenā”tiādinā salākaggāhappakāro
analyzed: pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatam puggalam dasseti gūḷhena ati ādinā salākaggāha ppakāro

original: dassito. Kaṇṇajappenāti ettha kaṇṇe jappo yasmiṃ salākaggāhapayogeti viggaho. Ettha
analyzed: dassitaḥ kaṇṇa jappena ati ettha kaṇṇe jappaḥ yasmin salākaggāha payoge iti viggahaḥ ettha

original: gūḷhasalākaggāho nāma dhammavādisalākā ca adhammavādisalākā ca visuṃ visuṃ cīvarakaṇṇe
analyzed: gūḷha salākaggāhaḥ nāma dhammavādi salākā ca adhammavādi salākā ca visum visum cīvara kaṇṇe

original: pakkhipitvā puggalānaṃ santikaṃ visuṃ visuṃ upasaṅkamitvā salākā visuṃ visuṃ dassetvā
analyzed: pakkhipitvā puggalānam santikam visum visum upasaṅkamitvā salākāḥ visum visum dassetvā

original: “ito tava ruccanakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti raho ṭhatvā gāhāpanaṃ. Vivaṭakaṃ nāma dhammavādīnaṃ
analyzed: itas tava ruccanakam gaṇhāhi iti raho ṭhatvā gāhāpanam vivaṭakam nāma dhamma vādīnam

original: bahubhāvaṃ ñatvā sabbesu jānantesu puggalānaṃ santikaṃ gāhāpanaṃ. Kaṇṇajappanaṃ nāma
analyzed: bahu bhāvam ñatvā sabbesu jānantesu puggalānam santikam gāhāpanam kaṇṇajappanam nāma

original: evameva kaṇṇamūle raho ṭhatvā gāhāpanaṃ.
analyzed: evam eva kaṇṇa mūle rahaḥ ṭhatvā gāhāpanam

original: 2771. Alajjussadeti ettha “saṅghe”ti seso. Lajjisu bālesūti etthāpi “ussadesū”ti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: alajju ssadā iti ettha saṅgha iti sesaḥ lajjisu bālesu iti ettha api ussadesu iti vattabbam

original: 2772. Sakena kammunāyevāti attano yaṃ kiccaṃ, tenevāti.
analyzed: sakena kammunā āya iva ati attanaḥ yam kiccam tena iva ati

original: 2773-5. “Āpajjatī”tiādi “alajjī, lajjī, bālo”ti jānanassa hetubhūtakammadassanaṃ.
analyzed: āpajjati itiādi alajjī lajjī bālaḥ ti jānanassa hetu bhūta kamma dassanam

original: Duccintitoti abhijjhāditividhamanoduccaritavasena duṭṭhu cintento. Dubbhāsīti musāvādādicatubbidhavacīduccaritavasena
analyzed: duccintitaḥ ti abhijjhā diti vidhamanaḥ duccarita vasena duṭṭhu cintentaḥ dubbhāsī iti musāvāda ādi catubbidha vacī duccarita vasena

original: vacīdvāre paññattānaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamavasena duṭṭhu bhāsanasīlo. Dukkaṭakārikoti
analyzed: vacī dvāre paññattānam sikkhāpadānam vītikkama vasena duṭṭhu bhāsana sīlaḥ dukkaṭa kārikā ti

original: pāṇātipātāditividhakāyaduccaritavasena kāyadvāre paññattasikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamavasena
analyzed: pāṇa atipātāt itividha kāya duccarita vasena kāya dvāre paññatta sikkhā padānam vītikkama vasena

original: kucchitakammassa karaṇasīlo. Iti lakkhaṇenevāti yathāvuttaṃ alajjīlajjībālalakkhaṇaṃ nigameti.
analyzed: kucchita kammassa karaṇa sīlaḥ iti lakkhaṇena iva ati yathāvuttam alajjī lajjī bāla lakkhaṇam nigameti

original: 2776. “Yebhuyyasikā”tiādigāthāhi niddiṭṭhameva atthaṃ nigametumāha “tidhā”tiādi.
analyzed: yebhuyyasikā iti ādi gāthāhi niddiṭṭham eva attham nigametum āha tidhā atiādi

original: Tidhāsalākagāhenāti tividhassa salākagāhassa aññatarena. Bahukā dhammavādino yadi
analyzed: tidhā salākagāhena ati tividhassa salākagāhassa aññatarena bahukāḥ dhamma vādinaḥ yadi

original: siyunti yojanā. Kātabbanti ettha “vivādādhikaraṇavūpasamana”nti seso.
analyzed: siyum ti yojanā kātabbanti ettha vivāda adhikaraṇa vūpasamananti sesaḥ

original: 2777. Yo puggalo alajjī ca hoti sānuvādo ca kammato kāyakammato, vacīkammato ca asuci
analyzed: yaḥ puggalaḥ alajjī ca hoti sa anuvādaḥ ca kammataḥ kāya kammataḥ vacī kammataḥ ca asuci

original: ca sambuddhajigucchanīyoti attho. So evaṃvidho pāpapuggalo tassa pāpiyasikakammassa
analyzed: ca sambuddha jigucchanīyaḥ ti attho saḥ evaṃvidhaḥ pāpa puggalo tassa pāpiyasika kammassa

original: yogo hotīti sambandho. Sānuvādoti ettha anuvādo nāma codanā, saha anuvādena vattatīti
analyzed: yogaḥ hoti iti sambandho sa anuvādo ti ettha anuvādaḥ nāma codanā saha anuvādena vattati iti

original: sānuvādo, pāpagarahitapuggalehi kātabbacodanāya anurūpoti attho.
analyzed: sa anuvādaḥ kātabba codanāya anurūpaḥ ti atthaḥ

original: 2778-9. Bhaṇḍaneti kalahassa pubbabhāge. Kalaheti kāyavacīdvārappavatte hatthaparāmasādike
analyzed: bhaṇḍane iti kalahassa pubba bhāge kalahe ti kāya vacī dvāra ppavatte hattha parāmasa ādike

original: kalahe ca. Vivādamhi anappaketi bahuvidhe vivāde jāte. Bahuassāmaṇe ciṇṇeti samaṇānaṃ
analyzed: kalahe ca vivādamhi anappakā iti bahuvidhe vivāde jāte samaṇānam

original: ananucchavike nānappakāre kāyikavācasikavītikkame ca kate. Anaggeti anante. Bhassaketi
analyzed: ananucchavike nānappakāre kāyika vācasika vītikkame ca kate anaggā iti anante bhassakā iti

original: kucchite amanāpavacane ciṇṇeti yojanā, bhāsiteti attho. Gavesantanti gavesiyamānaṃ,
analyzed: kucchite a manāpa vacane ciṇṇā iti yojanā bhāsitā iti atthaḥ gavesantam ti gavesiyamānam

original: āpattādhikaraṇanti seso. Vāḷanti caṇḍaṃ. Kakkhaḷanti āsajjaṃ. Kātabbanti vūpasametabbaṃ.
analyzed: āpatta adhikaraṇanti sesaḥ vāḷanti caṇḍam kakkhaḷanti āsajjam kātabbanti vūpasametabbam

original: 2780-2. Yathā ca vūpasammati, tathā tiṇavatthārake suddho hotīti sambandho.
analyzed: yathā ca tathā tiṇavatthārake suddhaḥ hoti iti sambandho

original: Thullavajjanti pārājikañceva saṅghādisesañca. Gihīhi paṭisaṃyutanti gihīnaṃ jātiādīhi
analyzed: thullavajjanti pārājikam ca iva saṅgha ādisesam ca gihīhi gihīnam jāti ādīhi

original: pāḷiyā āgatehi dasahi akkosavatthūhi, aṭṭhakathāgatehi ca tadaññehi akkosavatthūhi
analyzed: pāḷiyā āgatehi dasahi akkosa vatthūhi aṭṭhakathā gatehi ca tad aññehi akkosa vatthūhi

original: khuṃsanavambhanapaccayā ca dhammikapaṭissavassa asaccāpanapaccayā ca āpannāpattiṃ.
analyzed: khuṃsana vambhana paccayā ca dhammika paṭissavassa asaccāpana paccayā ca āpannāpattim

original: Esā eva hi āpatti gihipaṭisaṃyuttā nāma parivāre “atthi gihipaṭisaṃyuttā, atthi nagihipaṭisaṃyuttā”ti
analyzed: esā eva hi āpatti gihi paṭisaṃyuttā nāma parivāre atthi gihi paṭisaṃyuttā atthi na gihi paṭisaṃyuttā ati

original: dukaṃ nikkhipitvā “gihipaṭisaṃyuttāti sudhammattherassa āpatti, yā ca dhammikassa
analyzed: dukam nikkhipitvā gihi paṭisaṃyuttā ati sudhamma therassa āpatti yā ca dhammikassa

original: paṭissavassa asaccāpane āpatti. Avasesā nagihipaṭisaṃyuttā”ti vacanato.
analyzed: paṭissavassa a saccāpane āpatti avasesā na gihi paṭisaṃyuttā ti vacanato

original: Sudhammattherassa āpattīti ca tena cittassa gahapatino jātiṃ paṭicca khuṃsanavambhanapaccayā
analyzed: sudhamma therassa āpatti iti ca tena cittassa gahapatino jātim paṭicca khuṃsana vambhana paccayā

original: āpannā omasavādasikkhāpadavibhāgagatā dukkaṭāpatti gahetabbā. Idañca upalakkhaṇamattaṃ,
analyzed: āpannā omasavāda sikkhāpada vibhāga gatā dukkaṭa āpatti gahetabbā idam ca upalakkhaṇa mattam

original: tasmā itarehipi akkosavatthūhi gihiṃ khuṃsentānaṃ vambhentānaṃ itaresaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: tasmai itarehi pi akkosa vatthūhi gihim khuṃsentānam vambhentānam itaresam bhikkhūnam

original: sā āpatti gihipaṭisaṃyuttāvāti veditabbaṃ. Tathā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ desāpentena dassanūpacāraṃ
analyzed: sā āpatti gihi paṭisaṃyuttā avāti veditabbam tathā āpannam āpattim desāpentena dassana upacāram

original: avijahāpetvā savanūpacāraṃ jahāpetvā ekaṃse uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā
analyzed: a vijahāpetvā savanūpacāram jahāpetvā eka aṃse uttarāsaṅgam kārāpetvā ukkuṭikam nisīdāpetvā

original: añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā sā āpatti desāpetabbā.
analyzed: añjalim paggaṇhāpetvā sā āpatti desāpetabbā

original: Diṭṭhāvikammikanti diṭṭhāvikamme niyutto diṭṭhāvikammiko, taṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ye
analyzed: diṭṭhāvikammikanti diṭṭhāvikamme niyuttaḥ diṭṭhāvikammiko tam aṭṭhakathāyam ye

original: pana ‘na metaṃ khamatī’ti aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ karontī”ti ye puggalā dassitā,
analyzed: pana na mā etam khamati iti aññamaññam diṭṭhā vikammam karonti iti ye puggalāḥ dassitā

original: tesamaññatarasseva gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: tesam aññatarassa iva gahaṇam

original: Yoti bhaṇḍanakārakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ mahantaṃ viggahaṃ katvā sambahulā āpattiyo
analyzed: yaḥ ti bhaṇḍana kārakehi bhikkhūhi saddhim mahantam viggaham katvā sambahulāḥ āpattiyaḥ

original: āpanno yo bhikkhu. Tatthāti tasmiṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathakārake bhikkhusamūhe. Na
analyzed: āpannaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu tattha ati tasmin tiṇavatthāraka samatha kārake bhikkhu samūhe na

original: hotīti chandaṃ datvā taṃ bhikkhuparisaṃ anāgatattā na saṃvijjati. Tañca ṭhapetvāti yojanā.
analyzed: hoti iti chandam da tvā tam bhikkhu parisam anāgata ttā na saṃvijjati tam ca ṭhapetvā iti yojanā

original: Tiṇavatthārake kate sati yāva upasampadamāḷato pabhuti āpannāya sesāya āpattiyā nirāpatti hutvā suddho hoti saṅghoti yojanā.
analyzed: tiṇavatthārake kate sati pabhuti āpannāya sesāya āpattiyā nirāpatti hutvā suddhaḥ hoti saṅghaḥ iti yojanā

original: Samathakkhandhakakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: samatha khandhaka kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Khuddakavatthukkhandhakakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: khuddaka vatthu khandhaka kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 2783. Kuṭṭeti iṭṭhakāsilādārukuṭṭānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. Aṭṭāneti ettha aṭṭānaṃ nāma rukkhe
analyzed: kuṭṭeti iṭṭhakā silā dāru kuṭṭānam aññatarasmim aṭṭāne ti ettha aṭṭānam nāma rukkhe

original: phalakaṃ viya tacchetvā aṭṭhapadākārena rājiyo chinditvā nahānatitthe nikhaṇanti,
analyzed: phalakam viya tat śetvā aṭṭhapada ākārena rājiyaḥ chinditvā nahāna titthe nikhaṇanti

original: tattha cuṇṇāni ākiritvā manussā kāyaṃ ghaṃsanti.
analyzed: tattha cuṇṇāni ākiritvā manussā kāyam ghaṃsanti

original: 2784. Gandhabbahatthenāti nahānatitthe ṭhapitena dārumayahatthena. Tena kira cuṇṇāni
analyzed: gandhabba hatthena ati nahāna titthe ṭhapitena dāru maya hatthena tena kira cuṇṇāni

original: gahetvā manussā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti. Kuruvindakasuttiyāti kuruvindakapāsāṇacuṇṇāni
analyzed: gahetvā manussā sarīram ghaṃsanti kuruvindaka suttiyā ati kuruvindaka pāsāṇa cuṇṇāni

original: lākhāya bandhitvā kataguḷikakalāpako vuccati, taṃ ubhosu antesu gahetvā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti.
analyzed: lākhāya bandhitvā kata guḷika kalāpakaḥ vuccati tam ubhosu antesu gahetvā sarīram ghaṃsanti

original: Mallakenāti makaradantakaṃ chinditvā mallakamūlasaṇṭhānena katena mallakena, idaṃ
analyzed: mallakena ati makara dantakam chinditvā mallaka mūla saṇṭhānena katena mallakena idam

original: gilānassāpi na vaṭṭati. Aññamaññañca kāyatoti aññamaññaṃ sarīrena ghaṃseyya.
analyzed: gilānassa api na vaṭṭati aññam aññam ca kāyato ti aññam aññam sarīrena ghaṃseyya

original: 2785. Akataṃ mallakaṃ nāma makaradante acchinditvā kataṃ, idaṃ agilānassa na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: akatam mallakam nāma makara dante a chinditvā katam idam a gilānassa na vaṭṭati

original: 2786. Kapāliṭṭhakakhaṇḍānīti kapālakhaṇḍaiṭṭhakakhaṇḍāni. Sabbassāti gilānāgilānassa
analyzed: kapāli iṭṭhaka khaṇḍāni iti kapāla khaṇḍa eṭṭhaka khaṇḍāni sabbassa ati gilāna a gilānassa

original: sarīre ghaṃsitvā ubbaṭṭetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Puthupāṇika”nti hatthaparikammaṃ vuccati, tasmā
analyzed: sarīre ghaṃsitvā ubbaṭṭetum vaṭṭati puthu pāṇikam ti hattha parikammam vuccati tasmā

original: sabbassa hatthena piṭṭhiparikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. “Vatthavaṭṭī”ti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttaukkāsikassa
analyzed: sabbassa hatthena piṭṭhi parikammam kātum vaṭṭati vatthavaṭṭī iti idam pāḷiyam vutta aukkāsikassa

original: pariyāyaṃ, tasmā nahāyantassa yassa kassaci nahānasāṭakavaṭṭiyāpi ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: tasmai nahāyantassa yassa kassaci ghaṃsitum vaṭṭati

original: 2787. Pheṇakaṃ nāma samuddapheṇaṃ. Kathalanti kapālakhaṇḍaṃ. Pādaghaṃsane vuttā anuññātā.
analyzed: pheṇakam nāma samudda pheṇam kathalanti kapāla khaṇḍam pāda ghaṃsane vuttā anuññātā

original: Katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāraṃ pādaghaṃsanatthaṃ kaṇṭake uṭṭhāpetvā kataṃ, etaṃ
analyzed: katakam nāma paduma kaṇṇikā ākāram pāda ghaṃsana attham kaṇṭake uṭṭhāpetvā katam etam

original: neva paṭiggahetuṃ, na paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: na iva paṭiggahetum na paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati

original: 2788. Yaṃ kiñcipi alaṅkāranti hatthūpagādialaṅkāresu yaṃ kiñci alaṅkāraṃ.
analyzed: yam kiñci pi hatthūpaga ādi alaṅkāresu yam kiñci

original: 2789. Osaṇṭheyyāti alaṅkāratthaṃ saṅkharonto nameyya. Hatthaphaṇakenāti hattheneva
analyzed: osaṇṭheyya ati alaṅkāra attham saṅkharontaḥ nameyya hattha phaṇakena ati hatthena iva

original: phaṇakiccaṃ karontā aṅgulīhi osaṇṭhenti. Phaṇakenāti dantamayādīsu yena kenaci. Kocchenāti
analyzed: phaṇa kiccam karontāḥ aṅgulīhi osaṇṭhenti phaṇakena ati danta maya ādīsu yena kenacid kocchena ati

original: usiramayena vā muñjapabbajamayena vā kocchena.
analyzed: usira mayena vā muñja pabbaja mayena vā kocchena

original: 2790. Sitthatelodatelehīti sitthatelañca udakatelañcāti viggaho, tehi. Tattha sitthatelaṃ
analyzed: sittha tela uda telehi iti sittha telam ca udaka telam ca ati viggaho tehi tattha sittha telam

original: nāma madhusitthakaniyyāsādi yaṃ kiñci cikkaṇaṃ. Cikkaṇaṃ nāma niyyāsaṃ. Udakatelaṃ
analyzed: nāma madhu sitthaka niyyāsa ādi yam kiñci cikkaṇam cikkaṇam nāma niyyāsam udaka telam

original: nāma udakamissakaṃ telaṃ. Katthaci potthakesu “siṭṭhā”ti pāṭho, soyevattho. Anulomanipātatthanti
analyzed: nāma udaka missakam telam katthaci potthakesu siṭṭhā ti pāṭhaḥ anuloma nipāta atthanti

original: nalāṭābhimukhaṃ anulomena pātanatthaṃ. Uddhalomenāti uddhaggaṃ hutvā ṭhitalomena.
analyzed: nalāṭa abhimukham anulomena pātana attham uddha lomena ati uddhaggam hutvā ṭhita lomena

original: 2791. Hatthaṃ telena temetvāti karatalaṃ telena makkhetvā. Siroruhā kesā. Uṇhābhitattassāti uṇhābhitattarajasirassa. Allahatthena siroruhe puñchituṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: hattham telena temetvā ati kara talam telena makkhetvā siroruhā kesā uṇha abhitattassa ati uṇha abhitatta raja sirassa allahatthena siroruhe puñchitum vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 2792. Ādāse udapatte vāti ettha kaṃsapattādīnipi, yesu mukhanimittaṃ paññāyati, sabbāni
analyzed: ādāse udapatte vā ti ettha kaṃsapatta ādīni pi yesu mukha nimittam paññāyati sabbāni

original: ādāsasaṅkhameva gacchanti, kañjiyādīnipi ca udapattasaṅkhameva, tasmā yattha katthaci
analyzed: ādāsa saṅkham eva gacchanti ca uda patta saṅkham eva tasmai yattha katthaci

original: olokentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: olokentassa dukkaṭam

original: 2793. Yena hetunā mukhaṃ olokentassa anāpatti, taṃ dassetumāha “sañchavi”ntiādi.
analyzed: yena hetunā mukham olokentassa anāpatti tam dassetum āha sañchavi ntiādi

original: Ābādhapaccayā “me mukhe vaṇo sañchavi nu kho, udāhu na sañchavī”ti mukhaṃ daṭṭhuñca
analyzed: ābādha paccayā me mukhe vaṇaḥ sañchavi nu kho udāhu na sañchavi iti mukham daṭṭhum ca

original: “ahaṃ jiṇṇo nu kho, udāhu no”ti attano āyusaṅkhārajānanatthañca mukhaṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: aham jiṇṇaḥ nu kho udāhu no ti attanaḥ āyu saṅkhāra jānana attham ca mukham daṭṭhum vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 2794. Naccaṃ vāti yaṃ kiñci naccaṃ antamaso moranaccampi. Gītanti yaṃ kiñci naṭagītaṃ
analyzed: naccam vāti yam kiñci naccam yam kiñci naṭa gītam

original: vā sādhugītaṃ vā antamaso dantagītampi, yaṃ “gāyissāmā”ti pubbabhāge okūjantā karonti,
analyzed: vā sādhu gītam vā antamasaḥ danta gītam pi yam gāyissāma ati pubbabhāge okūjantā karonti

original: etampi na vaṭṭati. Vāditanti yaṃ kiñci vāditaṃ. Daṭṭhuṃ vā pana sotuṃ vāti naccaṃ
analyzed: etam pi na vaṭṭati vāditam ti yam kiñci vāditam daṭṭhum vā pana sotum vāti naccam

original: daṭṭhuṃ vā gītaṃ vāditaṃ sotuṃ vā.
analyzed: daṭṭhum vā gītam vāditam sotum vā

original: 2795. Sayaṃ naccantassa vā naccāpentassa vā gāyantassa vā gāyāpentassa vā vādentassa
analyzed: sayam naccantassa vā naccāpentassa vā gāyantassa vā gāyāpentassa vā vādentassa

original: vā vādāpentassa vā dukkaṭameva aṭṭhakathāya vuttanti tadekadesaṃ dassetumāha “daṭṭhumantamaso”tiādi.
analyzed: vā vādāpentassa vā dukkaṭam eva aṭṭhakathāya vuttanti tad eka desam dassetum āha daṭṭhumantam asotiādi

original: 2796. Suṇātīti gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā. Passatīti naccaṃ passati.
analyzed: suṇāti iti gītam vā vāditam vā passati iti naccam passati

original: 2797. Passissāmīti ettha “suṇissāmī”ti seso. “Naccaṃ passissāmi, gītaṃ, vāditaṃ vā suṇissāmī”ti vihārato vihāraṃ gacchato vāpi dukkaṭaṃ hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: passissāmi iti ettha suṇissāmi iti sesaḥ naccam passissāmi gītam vāditam vā suṇissāmi iti vihārataḥ vihāram gacchataḥ vā api dukkaṭam hoti iti yojanā

original: 2798. Uṭṭhahitvāna gacchatoti “naccaṃ passissāmī”ti, “gītaṃ, vāditaṃ vā suṇissāmī”ti
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvāna gacchato ti naccam passissāmi iti gītam vāditam vā suṇissāmi iti

original: nisinnaṭṭhānato uṭṭhahitvā antovihārepi taṃ taṃ disaṃ gacchato āpatti hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: nisinna ṭṭhānataḥ uṭṭhahitvā antovihāre pi tam tam disam gacchataḥ āpatti hoti iti yojanā

original: Vīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā passatopi ca āpattīti yojanā.
analyzed: vīthiyam ṭhatvā gīvam pasāretvā passataḥ pi ca āpatti iti yojanā

original: 2799. Dīghāti dvaṅgulato dīghā. Na dhāreyyāti na dhāretabbā. Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ
analyzed: dīghā ati dvaṅgulataḥ dīghā na dhāreyyā ati na dhāretabbā dvaṅgulam vā du māsam

original: vāti ettha dve aṅgulāni parimāṇaṃ etassāti dvaṅgulo, keso. Dve māsā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo
analyzed: vā ti ettha dve aṅgulāni parimāṇam etassa ati dvi aṅgulaḥ kesaḥ dve māsāḥ ukkaṭṭha paricchedo

original: assāti dumāso. Kesaṃ dhārento dvaṅgulaṃ vā dhāreyya dumāsaṃ vā. Tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: du māso kesam dhārentaḥ dvaṅgulam vā dhāreyya du māsam vā tatas uddham na vaṭṭati iti

original: tato dvaṅgulato vā dumāsato vā kesato uddhaṃ kesaṃ dhāretuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: tatas dvaṅgulataḥ vā du māsataḥ vā kesataḥ uddham kesam dhāretum na vaṭṭati

original: Atha vā dve aṅgulāni samāhaṭāni dvaṅgulaṃ, dve māsā samāhaṭā dumāsaṃ, ubhayattha
analyzed: atha vā dve aṅgulāni samāhaṭāni dvi aṅgulam dve māsā samāhaṭā du māsam

original: accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. Kese dhārento dvaṅgulamattaṃ vā dhāreyya dumāsamattaṃ
analyzed: a c c anta saṃyoge upayoga vacanam kese dhārentaḥ dvi aṅgula mattam vā dhāreyya du māsa mattam

original: vā, tato kālaparimāṇato uddhaṃ kese dhāretuṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho. Sace kese antodvemāse
analyzed: vā tatas kāla parimāṇataḥ uddham kese dhāretum na vaṭṭati iti sace kese

original: dvaṅgule pāpuṇanti, antodvemāseyeva chinditabbā. Dvaṅgule hi atikkametuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: dvi aṅgule pāpuṇanti chinditabbā dvi aṅgule hi atikkametum na vaṭṭati

original: Sacepi na dīghā, dvemāsato ekadivasampi atikkametuṃ na labhatiyeva. Evamayaṃ ubhayenapi
analyzed: sace pi na eka divasam pi atikkametum na evam ayam ubhayena api

original: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedeneva vutto, tato oraṃ pana navaṭṭanabhāvo nāma natthi.
analyzed: ukkaṭṭha paricchedena iva vutto tatas oram pana nava ṭṭana bhāvo nāma natthi

original: 2800. Dīghe nakhe, dīghāni nāsikalomāni ca na dhārayeti yojanā, na dhāreyya, chindeyyāti
analyzed: dīghe nakhe dīghāni nāsika lomāni ca na dhāraya iti yojanā na dhāreyya chindeyya ati

original: attho. Vīsatimaṭṭhanti vīsatiyā nakhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ likhitamaṭṭhabhāvaṃ kātuṃ bhikkhuno
analyzed: atthaḥ vīsati maṭṭhanti vīsatiyāḥ nakhānam maṭṭham likhita maṭṭha bhāvam kātum bhikkhunaḥ

original: na vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Satthakena tacchetvā cuṇṇakena pamajjitvā phalikamaṇīnaṃ viya
analyzed: na vaṭṭati iti yojanā satthakena tat śetvā cuṇṇakena pamajjitvā phalika maṇīnam viya

original: ujjalakaraṇaṃ likhitamaṭṭhaṃ nāma. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, malamattaṃ apakaḍḍhitu”nti
analyzed: ujjala karaṇam likhita maṭṭham nāma anujānāmi bhikkhave mala mattam apakaḍḍhitun ti

original: anuññātattā muggaphalatacādīhi nakhamalaṃ apanetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: anuññāta ttā mugga phala taca ādīhi nakha malam apanetum vaṭṭati

original: 2801. Kappāpeyya visuṃ massunti yo kesacchinno visuṃ massuṃ kappāpeyya. Dāṭhikaṃ
analyzed: kappāpeyya visum massunti yaḥ kesa chinnaḥ visum massum kappāpeyya dāṭhikam

original: ṭhapeyyāti kese chindāpetvā massuṃ akappāpetvā visuṃ ṭhapeyya. Sambādheti upakacchakamuttakaraṇasaṅkhāte
analyzed: ṭhapeyya ati kese chindāpetvā massum a kappāpetvā visum ṭhapeyya sambādha iti upakacchaka mutta karaṇa saṅkhāte

original: sambādhaṭṭhāne. Lomaṃ saṃharāpeyyavāti satthena vā saṇḍāsena vā aññena yena kenaci
analyzed: sambādha ṭṭhāne lomam saṃhara apeyya vāti satthena vā saṇḍāsena vā aññena yena kenacid

original: parena chindāpeyya, sayaṃ vā chindeyya. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā sambādhe
analyzed: parena sayam vā chindeyya anujānāmi bhikkhave ābādha paccayā sambādhe

original: lomaṃ saṃharāpetu”nti anuññātattā yathāvuttasambādhe gaṇḍapiḷakavaṇādike ābādhe sati
analyzed: lomam saṃhara a petum ti anuññāta ttā yathāvutta sambādhe gaṇḍa piḷaka vaṇa ādike ābādhe sati

original: lomaṃ saṃharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: lomam saṃhara āpetum vaṭṭati

original: 2802. Agilānassa chindato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññena vā puggalena tathā kattariyā chindāpentassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti sambandho.
analyzed: agilānassa chindataḥ dukkaṭam vuttam aññena vā puggalena tathā kattariyā chindāpentassa dukkaṭam vuttan ti sambandhaḥ

original: 2803. Sesaṅgachedaneti aṅguliyādiavasesasarīrāvayavānaṃ chedane. Attavadheti attupakkamena vā āṇattiyā upakkamena vā attano jīvitanāse.
analyzed: sesaṅga chedane iti aṅguliya ādi avasesa sarīra avayavānam chedane atta vadhe iti attu pakkamena vā āṇattiyāḥ upakkamena vā attanaḥ jīvita nāse

original: 2804. Aṅganti aṅgajātato avasesaṃ sarīrāvayavaṃ. Ahikīṭādidaṭṭhassa tappaṭikāravasena
analyzed: aṅgam ti aṅga jātataḥ avasesam sarīra avayavam ahi kīṭa ādi daṭṭhassa tad paṭikāra vasena

original: aṅgaṃ chindato na doso. Tādisābādhapaccayā tappaṭikāravasena aṅgaṃ chindato na doso.
analyzed: aṅgam chindataḥ na doso tādisa ābādha paccayā tad paṭikāra vasena aṅgam chindataḥ na doso

original: Lohitaṃ mocentassāpi na dosoti yojanā.
analyzed: lohitam mocentassa api na doso ti yojanā

original: 2805. Aparissāvano bhikkhu sace maggaṃ gacchati, dukkaṭaṃ. Magge addhāne taṃ parissāvanaṃ
analyzed: a parissāvanaḥ bhikkhu sace maggam gacchati dukkaṭam magge addhāne tam parissāvanam

original: yācamānassa yo na dadāti, tassa adadato adentassāpi tatheva dukkaṭamevāti yojanā.
analyzed: yācamānassa yaḥ na dadāti tassa a dadataḥ a dentassa api tathā iva dukkaṭam eva ati yojanā

original: Yo pana attano hatthe parissāvane vijjamānepi yācati, tassa na akāmā dātabbaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana attanaḥ hatthe parissāvane vijjamāne pi yācati tassa na akāmā dātabbam

original: 2806. “Naggo”ti padaṃ “na bhuñje”tiādi kiriyāpadehi paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Na bhuñjeti
analyzed: naggo ti padam na bhuñja itiādi kiriyā padehi paccekam yojetabbam na bhuñja iti

original: bhattādiṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ na bhuñjeyya. Na piveti yāguādiṃ pātabbaṃ na piveyya. Na ca
analyzed: bhatta ādim bhuñjitabbam na bhuñjeyya na piveti yāgu ādim pātabbam na piveyya na ca

original: khādeti mūlakhādanīyādikaṃ khādanīyaṃ na khādeyya. Na sāyayeti phāṇitādikaṃ sāyitabbañca
analyzed: khāda iti mūla khādanīya ādikam khādanīyam na khādeyya na sāyaya iti phāṇita ādikam sāyitabbam ca

original: na sāyeyya na liheyya. Na dadeti aññassa bhattādiṃ kiñci na dadeyya. Na gaṇheyyāti
analyzed: na sāyeyya na liheyya na dadeti aññassa bhatta ādim kiñci na dadeyya na gaṇheyya ati

original: tathā sayaṃ naggo hutvā na paṭiggaṇheyya. Añjasaṃ maggaṃ.
analyzed: tathā sayam naggaḥ hutvā na paṭiggaṇheyya añjasam maggam

original: 2807. Parikammaṃ na kātabbanti piṭṭhiparikammādiparikammaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Kārayeti sayaṃ naggo hutvā aññena piṭṭhiparikammādiparikammaṃ na kārāpeyyāti attho.
analyzed: parikammam na kātabbanti piṭṭhi parikamma ādi parikammam na kātabbam kāraya iti sayam naggaḥ hutvā aññena piṭṭhi parikamma ādi parikammam na kārāpeyya ati atthaḥ

original: 2808. Piṭṭhikammādike parikamme jantāgharādikā tisso paṭicchādī vuttā “anujānāmi,
analyzed: piṭṭhikamma ādike parikamme jantāghara ādikā tisso paṭicchādī vuttā anujānāmi

original: bhikkhave, tisso paṭicchādiyo jantāgharapaṭicchādiṃ udakapaṭicchādiṃ vatthapaṭicchādi”nti
analyzed: bhikkhave tissaḥ paṭicchādiyaḥ jantāghara paṭicchādim udaka paṭicchādim vattha paṭicchādinti

original: anuññātāti yojanā. Paṭicchādeti hirikopinanti paṭicchādi, jantāgharameva paṭicchādi
analyzed: anuññātā ati yojanā paṭicchādā iti paṭicchādi jantāgharam eva paṭicchādi

original: jantāgharapaṭicchādi. Udakameva paṭicchādi udakapaṭicchādi. Vatthameva paṭicchādi
analyzed: jantā ghara paṭicchādi udakam eva paṭicchādi udaka paṭicchādi vattham eva paṭicchādi

original: vatthapaṭicchādi. “Sabbattha pana vaṭṭatī”ti iminā itarapaṭicchādidvayaṃ parikammeyeva
analyzed: vattha paṭicchādi sabbattha pana vaṭṭati iti iminā itara paṭicchādi dvayam

original: vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Sabbatthāti bhojanādisabbakiccesu.
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti dīpeti sabbattha ati bhojana ādi sabba kiccesu

original: 2809. Yattha katthaci peḷāyanti tambalohavaṭṭalohakaṃsalohakāḷalohasuvaṇṇarajatādīhi
analyzed: yattha katthacid peḷāyanti tamba loha vaṭṭa loha kaṃsa loha kāḷa loha suvaṇṇa rajata ādīhi

original: katāya vā dārumayāya vā yāya kāyaci peḷāya āsittakūpadhāne. Bhuñjituṃ na ca vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: katāya vā dāru mayāya vā yāya kāyaci peḍāya āsittakūpadhāne bhuñjitum na ca vaṭṭati iti

original: bhājanaṃ ṭhapetvā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Yathāha – “āsittakūpadhānaṃ nāma tambalohena
analyzed: bhājanam ṭhapetvā bhuñjitum na vaṭṭati yathā āha āsittakūpadhānam nāma tamba lohena

original: vā rajatena vā katāya peḷāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ, ‘na bhikkhave āsittakūpadhāne bhuñjitabba’nti
analyzed: vā rajatena vā katāya peḷāya etam adhivacanam na bhikkhave āsittaka upadhāne bhuñjitabbanti

original: sāmaññena paṭikkhittattā pana dārumayāpi na vaṭṭatī”ti. “Anujānāmi bhikkhave maḷorika”nti
analyzed: sāmaññena paṭikkhitta ttā pana dāru mayā api na vaṭṭati iti anujānāmi bhikkhave maḷorikanti

original: anuññātattā maḷorikāya ṭhapetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. “Maḷorikā”ti ca daṇḍādhārako vuccati,
analyzed: anuññāta ttā maḷorikāya ṭhapetvā bhuñjitum vaṭṭati maḷorikā ati ca daṇḍa ādhārakaḥ vuccati

original: yaṃ tayo, cattāro, bahū vā daṇḍake upari ca heṭṭhā ca vitthataṃ majjhe saṅkucitaṃ
analyzed: yam tayo cattāraḥ bahū vā daṇḍake upari ca heṭṭhā ca vitthatam majjhe saṅkucitam

original: katvā bandhitvā ādhārakaṃ karonti. Yaṭṭhiādhārakapaṇṇādhārakapacchikapiṭṭhaghaṭakakavāṭakādibhājanamukhaudukkhalādīnipi
analyzed: katvā bandhitvā ādhārakam karonti yaṭṭhi ādhāraka paṇṇa ādhāraka pacchika piṭṭha ghaṭaka kavāṭaka ādi bhājana mukha odukkhala ādīni pi

original: ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Yaṭṭhiādhārakoti yaṭṭhiṃyeva ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā bandhīkataādhārako.
analyzed: etthā iva saṅgaham gacchanti yaṭṭhi ādhārakā uti ujukam ṭhapetvā

original: Ekabhājane visuṃ visuṃ bhojanassāpi sambhavato “bhuñjato ekabhājane”ti ettakeyeva
analyzed: eka bhājane visum visum bhojanassa api sambhavataḥ bhuñjataḥ eka bhājane iti

original: vutte tassāpi pasaṅgo siyāti tannivattanatthamāha “ekato”ti. “Bhuñjato”ti idaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: vutte tassa api pasaṅgaḥ siyāti tad nivattana attham āha ekatas ti bhuñjato ti idam upalakkhaṇam

original: Ekato ekabhājane yāguādipānampi na vaṭṭati. Yathāha – “na, bhikkhave, ekathālake
analyzed: ekatas eka bhājane yāgu ādi pānam pi na vaṭṭati yathā āha na bhikkhave ekathālake

original: pātabba”nti. Atha vā bhuñjatoti ajjhohārasāmaññena pānampi saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: pātabbanti atha vā bhuñjato ti ajjhohāra sāmaññena pānam pi saṅgahitan ti veditabbam

original: Ayamettha vinicchayo – sace eko bhikkhu bhājanato phalaṃ vā pūvaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati,
analyzed: ayam ettha vinicchayaḥ sace ekaḥ bhikkhu bhājanataḥ phalam vā pūvam vā gahetvā gacchati

original: tasmiṃ apagate itarassa sesakaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Itarassāpi tasmiṃ khaṇe puna gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
analyzed: tasmin apagate itarassa sesakam bhuñjitum vaṭṭati itarassa api tasmin khaṇe puna gahetum vaṭṭati iti

original: 2810. Ye dve vā tayo vā bhikkhū ekapāvuraṇā vā ekattharaṇā vā ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā vā nipajjanti, tesañca, ye ekamañcepi ekato nipajjanti, tesañca āpatti dukkaṭaṃ hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: ye dve vā tayaḥ vā bhikkhū eka pāvuraṇāḥ vā ekattharaṇāḥ vā ekattharaṇa pāvuraṇāḥ vā nipajjanti tesam ca ye ekamañce pi ekatas nipajjanti tesam ca āpatti dukkaṭam hoti iti yojanā

original: 2811. Saṅghāṭipallatthikamupāgatoti ettha saṅghāṭīti saṅghāṭināmena adhiṭṭhitacīvaramāha.
analyzed: saṅghāṭi pallatthikam upāgataḥ ti ettha saṅghāṭī iti saṅghāṭi nāmena adhiṭṭhita cīvaram āha

original: Saṅghāṭipallatthikaṃ upagatena yutto hutvāti attho. Na nisīdeyyāti vihāre vā antaraghare
analyzed: saṅghāṭi pallatthikam upagatena yuttaḥ hutvā ati atthaḥ na nisīdeyya ati vihāre vā antaraghare

original: vā yattha katthaci na nisīdeyya. “Saṅghāṭīti nāmena adhiṭṭhitacīvaravohārappattamadhiṭṭhitacīvaraṃ
analyzed: vā yattha katthaci na nisīdeyya saṅghāṭī iti nāmena adhiṭṭhita cīvara vohāra ppattam adhiṭṭhita cīvaram

original: ‘saṅghāṭī’ti vutta”nti nissandehe, khuddasikkhāvaṇṇanāyampi “saṅghāṭiyā na pallattheti
analyzed: saṅghāṭī iti vuttan ti nissandehe khudda sikkhā vaṇṇanāyam pi saṅghāṭiyā na pallatthā iti

original: adhiṭṭhitacīvarena vihāre vā antaraghare vā pallatthiko na kātabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: adhiṭṭhita cīvarena vihāre vā antaraghare vā pallatthikaḥ na kātabbaḥ ti vuttam aṭṭhakathāyam

original: pana “antogāme vāsatthāya upagatena adhiṭṭhitaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ vinā sesacīvarehi pallatthikāya
analyzed: pana antogāme vāsa thāya upagatena adhiṭṭhitam saṅghāṭim vinā sesa cīvarehi pallatthikāya

original: nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: nisīditum vaṭṭati iti vuttam

original: Kiñci kīḷaṃ na kīḷeyyāti jutakīḷādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāyikavācasikakīḷikaṃ na kīḷeyya. Na ca gāhayeti na ca gāhāpeyya, na harāpeyyāti attho.
analyzed: kiñci kīḷam na kīḷeyya ati jutakīḷa ādikam yam kiñci kāyika vācasika kīḷikam na kīḷeyya na ca gāhaya iti na ca gāhāpeyya na harāpeyya ati attho

original: 2812. Dāṭhikāyapīti massumhi. Uggatanti ettha “bībhaccha”nti seso. Aññanti apalitaṃ. Tādisanti bībhacchaṃ.

original: “bāhiralomikā”ti. Yathāha – “na, bhikkhave, bāhiralomī uṇṇīdhāretabbā”ti. Sikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ

original: 3028. Evaṃ catūsu saṅghesu catunnaṃ tikānaṃ vasena parisato kammavipattiyā dvādasavidhataṃ

original: Kammavipattikathāvaṇṇanā.

original: Pakiṇṇakavinicchayakathāvaṇṇanā
3029. Chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñcīti tālapaṇṇādipaṇṇacchadanaṃ yaṃ kiñci chattaṃ. Bahīti upari. Antoti heṭṭhā. Sibbitunti rūpaṃ dassetvā sūcikammaṃ kātuṃ.
analyzed: chattam paṇṇa mayam kiñci iti tālapaṇṇa ādi paṇṇa chadanam yam kiñci chattam bahi iti upari antar iti heṭṭhā sibbitum iti rūpam dassetvā sūci kammam kātum

original: 3030. Paṇṇeti chadanapaṇṇe. Aḍḍhacandanti aḍḍhacandākāraṃ. Makaradantakanti makaradantākāraṃ,
analyzed: paṇṇā iti chadana paṇṇe aḍḍha candanti aḍḍha canda ākāram makara dantakanti makara danta ākāram

original: yaṃ “girikūṭa”nti vuccati. Chindituṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Mukhavaṭṭiyā nāmetvā

original: vā. Lekhāti ukkiritvā vā chinditvā vā cittakammavasena vā katarāji.
analyzed: vā ukkiritvā vā chinditvā vā citta kamma vasena vā

original: 3031. Pañcavaṇṇānaṃ suttānaṃ antare nīlādiekavaṇṇena suttena thiratthaṃ chattaṃ anto

original: “Pañcavaṇṇena suttena, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭatī”ti –
analyzed: pañca vaṇṇena suttena sibbitum na ca vaṭṭati iti

original: Pāṭhena ca “keci tālapaṇṇacchattaṃ anto vā bahi vā pañcavaṇṇena suttena sibbantā
analyzed: pāṭhena ca keci tāla paṇṇa chattam antar vā bahi vā pañcavaṇṇena suttena sibbantā

analyzed: vaṇṇam aṭṭham karonti tam na vaṭṭati eka vaṇṇena pana nīlena vā pītakena vā yena

analyzed: kenacid suttena antar vā bahi vā sibbitum chatta daṇḍa ggāhakam salāka pañjaram vā vinandhitum

original: vaṭṭati, tañca kho thirakaraṇatthaṃ, na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāyā”ti aṭṭhakathāpāṭhena ca

original: virujjhati, tasmā so na gahetabbo.
analyzed: virujjhati tasmā saḥ na gahetabbaḥ

original: 3032. Lekhā vā pana kevalāti yathāvuttappakārā salākalekhā vā. Chinditvāti ukkiritvā kataṃ chinditvā. Ghaṃsitvāti cittakammādivasena kataṃ ghaṃsitvā.

original: 3033. Daṇḍabundamhīti chattadaṇḍassa pañjare gāhaṇatthāya phālitabundamhi, mūleti
analyzed: daṇḍa bundamhi iti chatta daṇḍassa pañjare gāhaṇa atthāya phālita bundamhi mūla iti

analyzed: atthaḥ ayam ettha nissandehe vutta nayaḥ khudda sikkhāgaṇṭhi pade pana chatta piṇḍiyā

original: mūle”ti vuttaṃ. Ahichattakasaṇṭhānanti phullaahichattākāraṃ. Rajjukehi gāhāpetvā
analyzed: mūla iti vuttam ahi chattaka saṇṭhānam ti phulla ahi chatta ākāram rajjukehi gāhāpetvā

analyzed: daṇḍe bandhanti tasmin bandha ṭṭhāne valayam iva ukkiritvā uṭṭhāpetvā bandhana tthāya ati

analyzed: vātena yathā na calati evam rajjūhi daṇḍe pañjarassa bandhana atthāya ukkiritvā katā

analyzed: lekhā vaṭṭati iti yojanā yathā āha vāta ppahārena acalana attham chattamaṇḍalikam rajjukehi

analyzed: gāhāpetvā daṇḍe bandhanti tasmin bandhana ṭṭhāne valayam iva ukkiritvā lekham ṭhapenti

original: sā vaṭṭatī”ti. “Sacepi na bandhanti, bandhanārahaṭṭhānattā valayaṃ ukkirituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sā vaṭṭati iti sace pi na bandhanti bandhana araha ṭṭhānattā valayam ukkiritum vaṭṭati iti gaṇṭhi pade vuttam

analyzed: samam sata pada ādīn anti sata pada ādīhi sadisam tulya tthe karaṇavacana ppasaṅge sāmi vacanam

analyzed: pattassa pariyante vā ati anuvātassa ubhaya pariyante vā patta mukhe pi vā ati dvinnam

analyzed: ārāma vitthāra pattānam saṅghaṭita ṭṭhāne kaṇṇe pi vā ekassa iva vā pattassa ūna pūraṇa attham

analyzed: saṅghaṭita ṭṭhāne pi vā veṇim ti kudrūsa sīsa ākārena sibbanam keci varaka sīsa ākārena ati

original: 3036. Paṭṭanti paṭṭampi. Aṭṭhakoṇādiko vidhi pakāro etassāti aṭṭhakoṇādikavidhi,
analyzed: paṭṭanti paṭṭampi aṭṭhakoṇa ādikaḥ vidhi pakāraḥ etassa ti aṭṭhakoṇa ādika vidhi

original: etaṃ “paṭṭa”nti etassa samānādhikaraṇavisesanaṃ, kiriyāvisesanaṃ vā, “karontī”ti

original: Imasmiṃ pakkhe “aṭṭhakoṇādika”nti upayogavacanaṃ. “Vidhi”nti etassa visesanaṃ. Idha

original: vakkhamānacatukoṇasaṇṭhānato aññaṃ aṭṭhakoṇādikaṃ nāmaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ paṭṭadvaye.
analyzed: vakkhamāna catukoṇa saṇṭhānato aññam aṭṭhakoṇa ādikam nāmam tattha ati tasmim paṭṭa dvaye

original: Agghiyagadārūpanti agghiyasaṇṭhānañceva gadāsaṇṭhānañca sibbanaṃ. Muggaranti laguḷasaṇṭhānasibbanaṃ.
analyzed: agghiya gadā rūpanti agghiya saṇṭhānam ca iva gadā saṇṭhānam ca sibbanam muggaranti laguḷa saṇṭhāna sibbanam

original: Ādi-saddena cetiyādisaṇṭhānānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: ādi saddena cetiya ādi saṇṭhānānam gahaṇam

original: 3037. Tatthāti paṭṭadvaye tasmiṃ ṭhāne. Kakkaṭakakkhīnīti kuḷīraacchisadisāni sibbanavikārāni.
analyzed: tattha ati paṭṭa dvaye tasmin ṭhāne kakkaṭa kakkhīni iti kuḷīra acchi sadisāni sibbana vikārāni

original: Uṭṭhāpentīti karonti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭake. Suttāti koṇato koṇaṃ
analyzed: uṭṭhāpenti iti karonti tattha ati tasmin gaṇṭhi kapāsaka paṭṭake suttā ati koṇatas koṇam

original: sibbitasuttā ceva caturasse sibbitasuttā ca. Piḷakāti tesameva suttānaṃ nivattetvā
analyzed: sibbita suttā ca iva caturasse sibbita suttā ca piḷakā ati tesam eva suttānam nivattetvā

original: sibbitakoṭiyo ca. Duviññeyyāvāti rajanakāle duviññeyyarūpā anoḷārikā dīpitā vaṭṭantīti.
analyzed: ca du viññeyyā avāti rajana kāle du viññeyya rūpāḥ anoḷārikāḥ dīpitāḥ vaṭṭanti iti

original: Yathāha – “koṇasuttapiḷakā ca cīvare ratte duviññeyyarūpā vaṭṭantī”ti.
analyzed: yathā āha koṇa sutta piḷakā ca cīvare ratte du viññeyya rūpāḥ vaṭṭanti iti

original: 3038. Gaṇṭhipāsakapaṭṭakāti gaṇṭhikapaṭṭakapāsakapaṭṭakāti yojanā. Kaṇṇakoṇesu suttānīti
analyzed: gaṇṭhi pāsaka paṭṭakā ati gaṇṭhika paṭṭaka pāsaka paṭṭakā ati yojanā kaṇṇa koṇesu suttāni iti

original: cīvarakaṇṇesu suttāni ceva gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇesu suttāni ca chindeyya. Ettha
analyzed: cīvara kaṇṇesu suttāni ca iva gaṇṭhi kapāsaka paṭṭānam koṇesu suttāni ca chindeyya ettha

analyzed: ca cīvare āyāmataḥ vitthārataḥ ca sibbitvā anuvātataḥ bahi nikkhanta suttam cīvaram

analyzed: rajitvā su khāpana kāle rajjuyā vā cīvara vaṃse vā bandhitvā olambitum anu vāte baddha suttāni

original: ca kaṇṇasuttāni nāma. Yathāha – “cīvarassa kaṇṇasuttakaṃ na vaṭṭati, rajitakāle chinditabbaṃ.

original: Yaṃ pana ‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kaṇṇasuttaka’nti evaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ anuvāte pāsakaṃ
analyzed: yam pana anujānāmi bhikkhave kaṇṇa suttakan ti evam anuññātam tam pāsakam

original: katvā bandhitabbaṃ, rajanakāle lagganatthāyā”ti.
analyzed: katvā bandhitabbam rajana kāle laggana tthāya ati

original: 3039. Sūcikammavikāraṃ vāti cīvaramaṇḍanatthāya nānāsuttakehi satapadisadisaṃ sibbantā
analyzed: sūcikamma vikāram vāti cīvara maṇḍana thāya nānā suttakehi sata padi sadisam sibbantā

analyzed: āgantuka paṭṭam ṭhapenti evarūpam sūcikamma vikāram vā aññam vā pana kiñcipi iti aññam pi

original: yaṃ kiñci mālākammamigapakkhipādādikaṃ sibbanavikāraṃ. Kātunti sayaṃ kātuṃ. Kārāpetunti

original: aññena vā kārāpetuṃ.
analyzed: aññena vā kārāpetum

analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu param uttamam vaṇṇam aṭṭham abhipatthayam patthayantaḥ kañji piṭṭha khali allikā ādīsu

analyzed: cīvaram pakkhipati tassa pana bhikkhuno dukkaṭā mokkho na vijjati iti yojanā kañjī iti

original: vāyanatantamakkhanakañjisadisā thūlākañji. Piṭṭhanti taṇḍulapiṭṭhaṃ. Taṇḍulapiṭṭhehi
analyzed: vāyana tantam akkhana kañji sadisā thūlākañji piṭṭhanti taṇḍula piṭṭham taṇḍula piṭṭhehi

original: pakkā khali. Allikāti niyyāso. Ādi-saddena lākhādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: pakkā khali allikā ati niyyāsaḥ ādi saddena lākhā ādīnam gahaṇam

original: 3041. Cīvarassa karaṇe karaṇakāle samuṭṭhitānaṃ sūcihatthamalādīnaṃ dhovanatthaṃ, kiliṭṭhakāle ca dhovanatthaṃ kañjipiṭṭhikhaliallikādīsu pakkhipati, vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: cīvarassa karaṇe karaṇa kāle samuṭṭhitānam sūci hattha mala ādīnam dhovana attham kiliṭṭha kāle ca dhovana attham kañji piṭṭhi khali allika ādīsu pakkhipati vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 3042. Tatthāti yena kasāvena cīvaraṃ rajati, tasmiṃ rajane cīvarassa sugandhabhāvatthāya gandhaṃ vā ujjalabhāvatthāya telaṃ vā vaṇṇatthāya lākhaṃ vā. Kiñcīti evarūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci.
analyzed: tattha ati yena kasāvena cīvaram rajati tasmim rajane cīvarassa su gandha bhāva tthāya gandham vā ujjala bhāva tthāya telam vā vaṇṇa tthāya lākham vā kiñci iti evarūpam yam kiñci

original: 3043. Maṇināti pāsāṇena. Aññenapi ca kenacīti yena ujjalaṃ hoti, evarūpena muggarādinā
analyzed: maṇinā ati pāsāṇena aññena api ca kenaci iti yena ujjalam hoti evarūpena muggara ādinā

original: aññenāpi kenaci vatthunā. Doṇiyāti rajanambaṇe. Na ghaṃsitabbaṃ hatthena gāhetvā na ghaṭṭetabbaṃ.
analyzed: aññena api kenacid vatthunā doṇiyā ati raja nambaṇe na ghaṃsitabbam hatthena gāhetvā na ghaṭṭetabbam

original: 3044. Rattaṃ cīvaraṃ hatthehi kiñci thokaṃ paharituṃ vaṭṭatīti yojanā. “Yattha pakkarajanaṃ
analyzed: rattam cīvaram hatthehi kiñci thokam paharitum vaṭṭati iti yojanā pakkarajanam

original: pakkhipanti, sā rajanadoṇi, tattha aṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanādiṃ ghaṭṭetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pakkhipanti sā rajana doṇi tattha aṃsa baddhaka kāya bandhana ādim ghaṭṭetum vaṭṭati iti gaṇṭhi pade vuttam

original: 3045. Gaṇṭhiketi veḷudantavisāṇādimayagaṇṭhike. Lekhā vāti vaṭṭādibhedā lekhā vā.
analyzed: gaṇṭhikā iti veḷu danta visāṇa ādi maya gaṇṭhike lekhā vā ati vaṭṭa ādi bhedā lekhā vā

original: Piḷakā vāti sāsapabījasadisā khuddakapubbuḷā vā. Pāḷikaṇṇikabhedakoti maṇikāvaḷirūpapupphakaṇṇikarūpabhedako.
analyzed: piḷakā vā ti sāsapa bīja sadisā khuddaka pubbuḷā vā pāḷi kaṇṇika bhedakaḥ ti maṇikā vaḷi rūpa puppha kaṇṇika rūpa bhedakaḥ

original: Kappabinduvikāro vā na vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: kappa bindu vikāraḥ vā na vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 3046. Āraggenāti ārakaṇṭakaggena, sūcimukhena vā. Kācipi lekhāti vaṭṭakagomuttādisaṇṭhānā yā kācipi rāji.
analyzed: āraggena ati ārakaṇṭaka aggena sūcimukhena vā kācipi lekhā ati vaṭṭaka gomutta ādi saṇṭhānā yā kācipi rāji

original: 3047. Bhamaṃ āropetvāti bhame alliyāpetvā.
analyzed: bhamam āropetvā ati bhame

original: 3048. Pattamaṇḍalaketi patte chavirakkhanatthāya tipusīsādīhi kate pattassa heṭṭhā
analyzed: patta maṇḍalaka iti patte chavi rakkhana atthāya tipu sīsa ādīhi kate pattassa heṭṭhā

original: ādhārādīnaṃ upari kātabbe pattamaṇḍalake. Bhittikammanti vibhattaṃ katvā nānākārarūpakakammacittaṃ.
analyzed: ādhāra ādīnam upari kātabbe patta maṇḍalake bhitti kammanti vibhattam katvā nānā ākāra rūpaka kamma cittam

original: Yathāha “na bhikkhave citrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatānī”ti.
analyzed: yathā āha na bhikkhave citrāni patta maṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpa kākiṇṇāni bhitti kamma katāni iti

original: Tatthāti tasmiṃ pattamaṇḍale. Assāti bhikkhussa. Makaradantakanti girikūṭākāraṃ.
analyzed: tattha āti tasmim patta maṇḍale assa ati bhikkhussa makaradantakam ti giri kūṭa ākāram

original: 3049. Mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ yā lekhā parissāvanabandhanatthāya anuññātā, taṃ lekhaṃ ṭhapetvā dhammakaraṇacchatte vā kucchiyaṃ vā kācipi lekhā na vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: mukha vaṭṭiyam yā lekhā parissāvana bandhana tthāya anuññātā tam lekham ṭhapetvā dhammakaraṇa chatte vā kucchiyam vā kāci pi lekhā na vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 3050. Tahiṃ tahinti mattikāya tattha tattha. Tanti tathākoṭṭitadiguṇasuttakāyabandhanaṃ.
analyzed: tahim tahinti mattikāya tattha tattha tanti tathā koṭṭita diguṇa sutta kāya bandhanam

original: 3051. Antesu daḷhatthāya dasāmukhe diguṇaṃ katvā koṭṭenti, vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Cittikampīti mālākammalatākammacittayuttampi kāyabandhanaṃ.
analyzed: antesu daḷha atthāya dasā mukhe diguṇam katvā koṭṭenti vaṭṭati iti yojanā cittikampī iti kāya bandhanam

original: 3052. Akkhīnīti kuñjarakkhīni. Tatthāti kāyabandhane vaṭṭatīti kā kathā. Uṭṭhāpetunti ukkirituṃ.
analyzed: akkhīni iti kuñja rakkhīni tattha ati kāya bandhane vaṭṭati iti kā kathā uṭṭhāpetum ti ukkiritum

original: 3053. Ghaṭanti ghaṭasaṇṭhānaṃ. Deḍḍubhasīsaṃ vāti udakasappasīsamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ vā. Yaṃ kiñci vikārarūpaṃ dasāmukhe na vaṭṭatīti yojanā.
analyzed: ghaṭanti ghaṭa saṇṭhānam deḍḍubha sīsam vā ati udaka sappa sīsa mukha saṇṭhānam vā yam kiñci vikāra rūpam dasā mukhe na vaṭṭati iti yojanā

original: 3054. Macchakaṇṭanti macchakaṇṭakākāraṃ. Khajjūripattakākāranti khajjūripattasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: macchakaṇṭanti macchakaṇṭaka ākāram khajjūri pattaka ākāram iti khajjūri patta saṇṭhānam

original: Macchakaṇṭaṃ vā maṭṭhaṃ paṭṭikaṃ vā khajjūripattakākāraṃ vā ujukaṃ katvā koṭṭitaṃ
analyzed: macchakaṇṭam vā maṭṭham paṭṭikam vā khajjūri pattaka ākāram vā ujukam katvā koṭṭitam

original: vaṭṭatīti yojanā. Ettha ca ubhayapassesu macchakaṇṭakayuttaṃ macchassa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti yojanā ettha ca ubhaya passesu maccha kaṇṭaka yuttam macchassa piṭṭhi kaṇṭakam

original: viya yassa paṭṭikāya vāyanaṃ hoti, idaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ macchakaṇṭakaṃ nāma. Yassa
analyzed: viya yassa paṭṭikāya vāyanam hoti idam kāya bandhanam macchakaṇṭakam nāma yassa

original: khajjūripattasaṇṭhānamiva vāyanaṃ hoti, taṃ khajjūripattakākāraṃ nāma.
analyzed: khajjūri patta saṇṭhānam iva vāyanam hoti tam khajjūripattaka ākāram nāma

original: 3055. Pakativītā paṭṭikā. Sūkarantaṃnāma kuñcikākosakasaṇṭhānaṃ. Tassa duvidhassa
analyzed: pakativītā paṭṭikā sūkarantaṃnāma kuñcikā kosaka saṇṭhānam tassa duvidhassa

original: kāyabandhanassa. Tattha rajjukā sūkarantānulomikā, dussapaṭṭaṃ paṭṭikānulomikaṃ.
analyzed: kāya bandhanassa tattha rajjukā sūkaranta anulomikā dussapaṭṭam paṭṭikā anulomikam

original: Ādi-saddena muddikakāyabandhanaṃ gahitaṃ, tañca sūkarantānulomikaṃ. Yathāha – “ekarajjukaṃ,
analyzed: ādi saddena muddika kāya bandhanam gahitam tat ca sūkaranta ānulomikam yathā āha eka rajjukam

original: pana muddikakāyabandhanañca sūkarantakaṃ anulometī”ti. Tattha ekarajjukā nāma ekavaṭṭā.
analyzed: pana muddika kāya bandhanam ca sūkarantakam anulomā iti tattha ekarajjukā nāma eka vaṭṭā

original: Bahurajjukassa akappiyabhāvaṃ vakkhati. “Muddikakāyabandhanaṃ nāma caturassaṃ akatvā
analyzed: bahu rajjukassa a kappiya bhāvam vakkhati muddikakāyabandhanam nāma catu rassam a katvā

original: sajjita”nti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sajjitam iti gaṇṭhi pade vuttam

original: 3056. Murajaṃ nāma murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ. Veṭhetvāti nānāsuttehi veṭhetvā.

original: 3064. Aṭṭhaṃsā vāpīti ettha api-saddena soḷasaṃsādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Vaṇṇamaṭṭhāti mālākammādivaṇṇamaṭṭhā.
analyzed: aṭṭhaṃsā vāpī iti ettha api saddena soḷasaṃsa ādīnam gahaṇam vaṇṇam aṭṭhā ti mālā kamma ādi vaṇṇam aṭṭhā

analyzed: dissati saḥ na gahetabbaḥ

original: gaṇhāti ce, dukkaṭaṃ. Tasmiṃ cīvare naṭṭhe vā jajjare jiṇṇe vā gīvā puna dātabbanti yojanā.

original: 3081. Soti aññattha bhāgaṃ gaṇhanako bhikkhu. Tehīti cīvarasāmikehi. Tanti tathā gahitaṃ vassāvāsikabhāgaṃ. Tesanti cīvarasāmikānaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ ti aññattha bhāgam gaṇhanakaḥ bhikkhu tehi iti cīvara sāmikehi tanti tathā gahitam vassāvāsika bhāgam tesanti cīvara sāmikānam

original: 3082. Karototi kārāpayato. Davā silaṃ pavijjhantoti pantikīḷāya kīḷatthikānaṃ sippadassanavasena

original: 3086. Haveti ekaṃsatthe nipāto.

original: 3088. Asappāyanti pittādidosānaṃ kopanavasena aphāsukāraṇaṃ. Apanetumpi jahitumpi,

analyzed: pañca vaggu upasampadā ati vinaya dhara pañcamena saṅghena kātabba aupasampadā

original: Cammatthāroti kappiyacammattharaṇañca. Dhuvanhānanti pakatinahānaṃ.

original: 3090. Sambādhassāti vaccamaggapassāvamaggadvayassa sāmantā dvaṅgulā anto satthavatthikammaṃ

original: vāritanti yojanā. Satthena antamaso nakhenāpi chedanaphālanādivasena satthakammañca

original: 3091. “Pākattha”nti iminā nibbāpetuṃ calane niddosabhāvaṃ dīpeti.

original: 3092. Upaḷāletīti “pattacīvarādiparikkhāraṃ te dammī”ti vatvā palobhetvā gaṇhāti.
analyzed: upaḷāleti iti patta cīvara ādi parikkhāram te dammi iti vatvā palobhetvā gaṇhāti

analyzed: bhattagge bhojanasālāya bhuñjamānaḥ yāgu pānā iti yāgum pivana kāle antogāma iti

analyzed: andhakāra gataḥ ti attho tat hi vandantassa mañca pāda ādīsu pi nalāṭam anāvajjaḥ ti

original: Suttoti niddaṃ okkanto. Khādanti piṭṭhakakhajjakādīni khādanto. Bhuñjantoti odanādīni

analyzed: dhamma vādī iti idam etassa visesanam yathā āha tayā ume

analyzed: bhikkhave vandiyā pacchā upasampannena pureupasampannaḥ vandiyaḥ nānāsaṃvāsakaḥ vuḍḍhataro

analyzed: dhamma vādī vandiyo sa devake loke bhikkhave sa māra kepe tathāgataḥ araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vandiyo ti

original: 3099. “Eteyeva vandiyā, na aññe”ti niyāmassa akatattā aññesampi vandiyānaṃ sabbhāvaṃ

analyzed: dassetum āha tad jana ādi itiādi ettha ādi saddena niyassa pabbājanīya paasāraṇīya kamme

analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti ettha iti etasmin vandanīya adhikāre kammanti apalokana ādi catubbidham kammaṃ

analyzed: saṅghena adhamma kamme kariyamāne tam vāretum a sakkontena a sakkontehi ca paṭipajjitabba vidhim

original: ekassa “na metaṃ khamatī”ti cittena adhiṭṭhānamuddiṭṭhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Dvinnaṃ vā
analyzed: ekassa na mā etam khamati iti cittena adhiṭṭhānam uddiṭṭhanti vuttam hoti dvinnam vā

original: tiṇṇameva cāti tameva vāretuṃ asakkontānaṃ dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ

original: Tato uddhaṃ tīhi uddhaṃ catunnaṃ kammassa paṭikkosanaṃ “idaṃ adhammakammaṃ mā karothā”ti

original: paṭikkhipanaṃ uddiṭṭhanti attho.
analyzed: paṭikkhipanam uddiṭṭhanti attho

original: 3101. Vissāsaggāhalakkhaṇaṃ aggahitaggahaṇena pañcavidhanti dassetumāha “sandiṭṭho”tiādi.
analyzed: vissāsa ggāha lakkhaṇam aggahita ggahaṇena pañcavidhanti dassetum āha sandiṭṭha utiādi

original: Yojanā panettha evaṃ veditabbā – sandiṭṭho ca hoti, jīvati ca, gahite ca attamano

original: hoti, sambhatto ca hoti, jīvati ca, gahite ca attamano hoti, ālapito ca hoti, jīvati
analyzed: hoti sambhatto ca hoti jīvati ca gahite ca atta manaḥ hoti ālapito ca hoti jīvati

original: ca, gahite ca attamano hotīti evaṃ sandiṭṭhasambhattaālapitānaṃ tiṇṇamekekassa tīṇi
analyzed: ca gahite ca atta manaḥ hoti iti evam sandiṭṭha sambhatta ālapitānam tiṇṇam ekekassa tīṇi

analyzed: tīṇi vissāsa ggāha lakkhaṇāni katvā navavidham hoti iti veditabbam vacana atthaḥ pana ittha

original: vinicchayo ca heṭṭhā vuttova.
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ ca heṭṭhā vuttaḥ eva

original: 3102. Sīlavipatti, diṭṭhivipatti ca ācārājīvasambhavā dve vipattiyo cāti yojanā, ācāravipatti, ājīvavipatti cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: sīla vipatti diṭṭhi vipatti ca ācāra ājīva sambhavāḥ dve vipattiyaḥ ca ati yojanā ācāra vipatti ājīva vipatti ca ati vuttam hoti

original: 3103. Tatthāti tesu catūsu vipattīsu. Appaṭikammā pārājikā vuṭṭhānagāminī saṅghādisesāpattikā duve āpattiyo sīlavipattīti pakāsitāti yojanā.
analyzed: tattha ati tesu catūsu vipattīsu appaṭikammā pārājikā vuṭṭhāna gāminī saṅgha ādi sesa āpattikā duve āpattiyaḥ sīla vipatti iti pakāsitā ati yojanā

original: 3104. Yā ca antaggāhikā diṭṭhi, yā dasavatthukā diṭṭhi, ayaṃ duvidhā diṭṭhi diṭṭhivipattīti
analyzed: yā ca antaggāhikā diṭṭhi yā dasa vatthukā diṭṭhi ayam duvidhā diṭṭhi diṭṭhi vipatti iti

original: dīpitāti yojanā. Tattha antaggāhikadiṭṭhi nāma ucchedantasassatantagāhavasena pavattā
analyzed: dīpitā iti yojanā tattha antaggāhikadiṭṭhi nāma pavattā

original: diṭṭhi. “Natthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattā dasavatthukā diṭṭhi.
analyzed: diṭṭhi natthi dinna nti ādi naya ppavattā dasa vatthukā diṭṭhi

original: 3105. Thullaccayādikā desanāgāminikā yā pañca āpattiyo, ācārakusalena bhagavatā sā
analyzed: thullaccaya ādikā desanā gāminikā yā pañca āpattiyaḥ ācāra kusalena bhagavatā sā

original: ācāravipattīti vuttāti yojanā. Ādi-saddena pācittiyapāṭidesanīyadukkaṭadubbhāsitānaṃ
analyzed: ācāra vipatti iti vuttā ati yojanā ādi saddena pācittiya pāṭidesanīya dukkaṭa dubbhāsitānam

original: gahaṇaṃ. Yāti pañcāpattiyo apekkhitvā bahuttaṃ. Sāti ācāravipatti sāmaññamapekkhitvā ekattaṃ.
analyzed: gahaṇam yā ati pañca āpattiyaḥ apekkhitvā bahuttam sā ati ācāra vipatti sāmaññam apekkhitvā ekattam

original: 3106. Kuhanādīti ādi-saddena lapanā nemittikatā nippesikatā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā
analyzed: kuhanā ādi iti ādi saddena lapanā nemittika tā nippesika tā lābhena lābham nijigīsana tā

original: gahitā, kuhanādīnaṃ vitthāro visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbo. Ājīvo paccayo hetu
yassā āpattiyāti viggaho. Chabbidhāti catutthapārājikasañcarittathullaccayapācittiyapāṭidesanīyadukkaṭāpattīnaṃ
analyzed: yassā āpattiyā iti viggahaḥ chabbidhā ti catuttha pārājika sañcaritta thullaccaya pācittiya pāṭidesanīya dukkaṭa āpattīnam

original: vasena chabbidhā. Pakāsitā –
analyzed: vasena chabbidhā pakāsitā

original: “Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ
analyzed: ājīva hetu ājīva kāraṇā asantam abhūtam uttari manussa dhammam

original: ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa. Ājīvahetu…pe… sañcarittaṃ samāpajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
analyzed: ullapati āpatti pārājikassa ājīva hetupe sañcarittam samāpajjati āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa
