original: kammaṭṭhānesu. Aṭṭhānussatiyoti kāyagatāsatiānāpānasatidvayavajjitā buddhānussatiādikā
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānesu aṭṭha anussatiyaḥ ti buddha anussati ādikā

original: aṭṭha anussatiyo ca. Saññā āhārepaṭikkūlasaññā ca. Vavatthānañca catudhātuvavatthānañcāti
analyzed: aṭṭha anussatiyaḥ ca saññā āhāre paṭikkūla saññā ca vavatthānañca catu dhātu vavatthānañca ati

original: ime dasa. Upacārāvahāti buddhaguṇādīnaṃ paramatthabhāvato, anekavidhattā, ekassāpi
analyzed: ime dasa buddha guṇa ādīnam paramattha bhāvataḥ anekavidha ttā ekassa api

original: gambhīrabhāvato ca etesu dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu appanāvasena samādhissa patiṭṭhātumasakkuṇeyyattā
analyzed: gambhīra bhāvato ca etesu dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu appanā vasena samādhissa patiṭṭhātum a sakkuṇeyya ttā

original: appanābhāvanāppatto samādhi upacārabhāveyeva patiṭṭhāti, tasmā ete upacārāvahā.
analyzed: appanā bhāvanā appatto samādhi patiṭṭhāti tasmai ete upacāra āvahā

original: Nanu cettha dutiyacatutthāruppasamādhi, lokuttaro ca samādhi paramatthadhamme appanaṃ
analyzed: nanu ca ittha dutiya catuttha āruppa samādhi lokuttaro ca samādhi paramattha dhamme appanaṃ

original: pāpuṇāti, tasmā “paramatthabhāvato”ti hetu appanamapāpuṇane kāraṇabhāvena na vuccatīti?
analyzed: pāpuṇāti tasmā paramattha bhāvato ti hetu appanam apāpuṇane kāraṇa bhāvena na vuccati iti

original: Na, tassa bhāvanāvisesena paramatthadhamme pavattisambhavato, imassa ca rūpāvacaracatutthabhāvanāvisesasambhavato
analyzed: na tassa bhāvanā visesena paramattha dhamme pavatti sambhavataḥ imassa ca rūpāvacara catuttha bhāvanā visesa sambhavataḥ

original: ca. Tathā hi dutiyacatutthāruppasamādhi appanāpattassa arūpāvacarasamādhissa catutthajjhānassa
analyzed: ca tathā hi dutiya catuttha āruppa samādhi appanā āpattassa arūpāvacara samādhissa catuttha jjhānassa

original: ārammaṇasamatikkamamattabhāvanāvasena sabhāvārammaṇepi appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Visuddhibhāvanānukkamabalena
analyzed: ārammaṇa samatikkama matta bhāvanā vasena sabhāva ārammaṇe pi appanam pāpuṇāti visuddhi bhāvanā anukkama balena

original: lokuttaro samādhi appanaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
analyzed: lokuttaraḥ samādhi appanam pāpuṇāti iti

original: 3132. Tatthāti tesu jhānāvahesu tiṃsakammaṭṭhānesu. Asubhāti uddhumātakādayo dasa
analyzed: tattha ati tesu jhāna āvahesu tiṃsa kammaṭṭhānesu asubhā ti uddhumātaka ādayaḥ dasa

original: asubhā. Kāyagatāsatīti kāyagatāsati cāti ime ekādasa. Paṭhamajjhānikāti imesaṃ paṭikkūlārammaṇattā,
analyzed: asubhā kāya gatā asatī iti kāya gatā asati ca ati ime ekādasa paṭhama jhānikā ati imesam paṭikkūla ārammaṇa ttā

original: paṭikkūlārammaṇe ca cittassa caṇḍasotāya nadiyā arittabalena nāvāṭṭhānaṃ viya vitakkabaleneva
analyzed: paṭikkūla ārammaṇe ca cittassa caṇḍasotāya nadiyāḥ aritta balena nāvā aṭṭhānam viya vitakka balena iva

original: pavattisambhavato avitakkānaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ asambhavoti savitakkassa paṭhamajjhānasseva
analyzed: pavatti sambhavataḥ a vitakkānam dutiya jhāna ādīnam asambhavaḥ ti sa vitakkassa paṭhama jhānassa iva

original: sambhavato paṭhamajjhānikā. Ānāpānañca kasiṇā cāti ime ekādasa catukkajjhānikā rūpāvacaracatukkajjhānikā
analyzed: sambhavato paṭhama jhānikāḥ āna apānaṃ ca kasiṇā ca ati ime ekādasa catukka jhānikāḥ rūpāvacara catukka jhānikā

original: ca catukkanayena, pañcakajjhānikā ca.
analyzed: ca catukka nayena pañcakajjhānikā ca

original: 3133. Tissova appamaññāti mettā, karuṇā, muditāti appamaññā tissova. Sāmaññaniddese
analyzed: tissaḥ uva appamaññā ati mettā karuṇā muditā ati appamaññā tissaḥ uva sāmañña niddese

original: etāsameva gahaṇaṃ kathaṃ viññāyatīti? “Atha pacchimā”tiādinā catutthāya appamaññāya
analyzed: etāsam eva gahaṇam katham viññāyati iti atha pacchima ati ādinā catutthāya appamaññāya

original: catutthajjhānikabhāvassa vakkhamānattā pārisesato taṃ viññāyati. Tikajjhānānīti tikajjhānikā.
analyzed: catuttha jhānika bhāvassa vakkhamāna ttā pārisesato tam viññāyati tika jhānāni iti tika jhānikā

original: “Tikajjhānā”ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsena evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mettādīnaṃ domanassasahagatabyāpādavihiṃsānabhiratīnaṃ
analyzed: tika jhānā ti vattabbe liṅga vipallāsena evam vuttanti daṭṭhabbam mettā ādīnam domanassa sahagata byāpāda vihiṃsā anabhiratīnam

original: pahāyakattā domanassapaṭipakkhena somanasseneva sahagatatā vuttāti catukkanayena
analyzed: pahāyaka ttā domanassa paṭipakkhena somanassena iva sahagata tā vuttā ati catukka nayena

original: tikajjhānikatā vuttā, pañcakanayena catukkajjhānikatā ca.
analyzed: tika jhānika tā vuttā pañcaka nayena catukka jhānika tā ca

original: “Athā”ti idaṃ “pacchimā”ti padassa “tisso”ti iminā purimapadena sambandhanivattanatthaṃ.
analyzed: atha ati idam pacchimā ti padassa tissaḥ ti iminā purima padena sambandha nivattana attham

original: Pacchimā appamaññā, cattāro āruppā ca catutthajjhānikā matā catukkanayena, pañcamajjhānikā
analyzed: pacchimā appamaññā cattāro āruppā ca catuttha jhānikā matā catukka nayena pañcama jhānikā

original: ca. “Sabbe sattā sukhitā hontu, dukkhā muccantu, laddhasukhasampattito mā vigacchantū”ti
analyzed: ca sabbe sattā sukhitāḥ hontu dukkhāḥ muccantu laddha sukha sampattitaḥ mā vigacchantu uti

original: mettāditividhavasappavattaṃ byāpārattayaṃ pahāya kammassakatādassanena sattesu majjhattākārappattabhāvanānibbattāya
analyzed: mettā diti vidha vasa ppavattam byāpāra ttayam pahāya kammassaka tā dassanena sattesu majjhatta ākāra ppatta bhāvanā nibbattāya

original: tatramajjhattopekkhāya balavatarattā appanāppattassa upekkhābrahmavihārassa sukhasahagatatāsambhavato
analyzed: tatram ajjhatta upekkhāya balavatarattā appanā appattassa upekkhā brahmavihārassa sukha sahagata tā sambhavato

original: upekkhāsahagatatā vuttā.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagata tā vuttā

original: 3134. Aṅgārammaṇato atikkamo dvidhā vuttoti yojanā. Catukkatikajjhānesūti dasakasiṇā,
analyzed: aṅga ārammaṇataḥ atikkamaḥ dvidhā vuttaḥ ti yojanā catukkatika jhānesu iti

original: ānāpānasatīti ekādasasu catukkajjhānikesu ceva mettādipurimabrahmavihārattayasaṅkhātesu
analyzed: āna apāna satī iti ekādasasu catukkajjhānikesu ca iva metta ādi purima brahmavihāra ttaya saṅkhātesu

original: tikajjhānikesu ca kammaṭṭhānesu. Aṅgātikkamatāti ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe vitakkādijhānaṅga
analyzed: tika jhānikesu ca kammaṭṭhānesu aṅga atikkama tā ti ekasmin yeva ārammaṇe

original: samatikkamena paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇeyeva dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ uppattito aṅgātikkamo
analyzed: samatikkamena paṭhama jhāna ādīnam ārammaṇe iya iva dutiya jhāna ādīnam uppattitaḥ aṅga atikkamo

original: adhippetoti attho. Aṅgātikkamoyeva aṅgātikkamatā.
analyzed: adhippetaḥ ti atthaḥ aṅga atikkamaḥ yā iva aṅga atikkama tā

original: 3135. Aṅgātikkamatoti tatiyajjhānasampayuttasomanassātikkamanato. Ārammaṇamatikkammāti
analyzed: aṅga atikkamato ti tatiya jhāna sampayutta somanassa atikkamanataḥ ārammaṇam atikkamma ati

original: paṭibhāganimittakasiṇugghāṭimākāsatabbisayapaṭhamāruppaviññāṇatadabhāvasaṅkhātāni
cattāri ārammaṇāni yathākkamaṃ atikkamitvā. Kasiṇugghāṭimākāsatabbisayapaṭhamāruppaviññāṇatadabhāvatabbisayatatiyāruppaviññāṇasaṅkhātesu
analyzed: cattāri ārammaṇāni yathākkamam atikkamitvā kasiṇugghāṭima ākāsa tad bisaya paṭhama āruppa viññāṇa tad abhāva tad visaya tatiya āruppa viññāṇa saṅkhātesu

original: catūsu ārammaṇesu āruppā ākāsānañcāyatanādīni cattāri arūpāvacarajjhānāni jāyare uppajjanti.
analyzed: catūsu ārammaṇesu āruppāḥ ākāsa anañcāyatana ādīni cattāri arūpāvacara jhānāni uppajjanti

original: 3136. Etthāti etesu ārammaṇesu. Vaḍḍhetabbānīti “yattakaṃ okāsaṃ kasiṇena pharati,
analyzed: ettha ati etesu ārammaṇesu vaḍḍhetabbāni iti yattakam okāsam kasiṇena pharati

original: tadabbhantare dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ sotuṃ, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passituṃ,
analyzed: tad abbhantare dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddam sotum dibbena cakkhunā rūpam passitum

original: parasattānañca cetasā cittaṃ aññātuṃ samattho hotī”ti vuttappayojanaṃ sandhāya aṅgagaṇanādivasena
analyzed: para sattānam ca cetasā cittam aññātum samatthaḥ hoti iti vutta ppayojanam sandhāya aṅga gaṇanā ādi vasena

original: paricchinditvā yattakaṃ icchati, tattakaṃ vaḍḍhetabbāni. Sesaṃ asubhādi sabbaṃ taṃ
analyzed: paricchinditvā yattakam icchati tattakam vaḍḍhetabbāni sesam asubha ādi sabbam tam

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ payojanābhāvā na vaḍḍhetabbamevāti yojanā.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam payojana abhāvā na vaḍḍhetabbam eva ati yojanā

original: 3137. Tattha tesu kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇā ca dasa asubhā ca kāyagatāsati, ānāpānasatīti
analyzed: tattha tesu kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇā ca dasa asubhā ca kāya gatā asati āna apāna satī iti

original: ime bāvīsati kammaṭṭhānāni paṭibhāgārammaṇānīti yojanā. Ettha “kasiṇā”tiādinā tadārammaṇāni jhānāni gahitāni.
analyzed: ime bāvīsati kammaṭṭhānāni paṭibhāga ārammaṇāni iti yojanā ettha kasiṇā ti ādinā tad ārammaṇāni jhānāni gahitāni

original: 3138. Dhātuvavatthananti catudhātuvavatthānaṃ, gāthābandhavasena rassattaṃ. Viññāṇañcāti
analyzed: dhātu vavatthanam ti catu dhātu vavatthānam gāthābandha vasena rassattam viññāṇam ca ati

original: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ. Nevasaññāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Dasa dveti dvādasa. Bhāvagocarāti
analyzed: viññāṇam ca āyatanam nevasaññā ati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam dasa dve iti dvādasa bhāva gocarā ati

original: sabhāvadhammagocarā, paramatthadhammālambaṇāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: sabhāva dhamma gocarā paramattha dhamma ālambaṇā iti vuttam hoti

original: 3139. Dve ca āruppamānasāti ākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanasaṅkhātā arūpāvacaracittuppādā
analyzed: dve ca āruppa mānasā ati ākāsa anañcāyatana ākiñcaññāyatana saṅkhātā arūpāvacara cittuppādā

original: dve ca. Cha ime dhammā navattabbagocarā niddiṭṭhāti yojanā catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ
analyzed: dve ca cha ime dhammā navattabba gocarā niddiṭṭhā ati yojanā catunnam appamaññānam

original: sattapaññattiyā, paṭhamāruppassa kasiṇugghāṭimākāsapaññattiyā, tatiyāruppassa paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvapaññattiyā ca ārammaṇattā.
analyzed: satta paññattiyā paṭhama āruppassa kasiṇugghāṭima ākāsa paññattiyā tatiya āruppassa paṭhama āruppa viññāṇa abhāva paññattiyā ca ārammaṇa ttā

original: 3140. Paṭikkūlasaññāti āhārepaṭikkūlasaññā. Kāyagatāsatīti dvādaseva bhūmito devesu kāmāvacaradevesu kuṇapānaṃ, paṭikkūlārahassa ca asambhavā na pavattantīti yojanā.
analyzed: paṭikkūla saññā ati āhāre paṭikkūla saññā kāya gatā asatī iti dvādasa iva bhūmitaḥ devesu kāmāvacara devesu ca asambhavāḥ na pavattanti iti yojanā

original: 3141. Tāni dvādasa ca. Bhiyyoti adhikatthe nipāto, tato adhikaṃ ānāpānasati cāti terasa rūpārūpaloke assāsapassāsānañca abhāvā sabbaso na jāyareti yojanā.
analyzed: tāni dvādasa ca bhiyyas iti adhika atthe nipāto tatas adhikam āna apāna sati ca ati terasa rūpa arūpa loke assāsa passāsa anañca abhāvā sabbasas na yojanā

original: 3142. Arūpāvacare arūpabhave caturo āruppe ṭhapetvā aññe chattiṃsa dhammā rūpasamatikkamābhāvā
analyzed: arūpāvacare arūpa bhave caturo āruppe ṭhapetvā aññe chattiṃsa dhammā rūpa samatikkama abhāvā

original: na jāyantīti yojanā. Sabbe samacattālīsa dhammā mānuse manussaloke sabbesameva labbhamānattā jāyanti.
analyzed: na jāyanti iti yojanā sabbe sama cattālīsa dhammā mānuse manussa loke sabbesam eva labbhamāna ttā jāyanti

original: 3143. Catutthakasiṇaṃ hitvāti vāyokasiṇaṃ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhena gahetabbattā taṃ vajjetvā
analyzed: catuttha kasiṇam hitvā ati vāyokasiṇam diṭṭha phuṭṭhena gahetabba ttā tam vajjetvā

original: nava kasiṇā ca dasa asubhā cāti te ekūnavīsati dhammā diṭṭheneva cakkhuviññāṇena
analyzed: nava kasiṇā ca dasa asubhā ca ati te ekūnavīsati dhammā diṭṭhena iva cakkhu viññāṇena

original: pubbabhāge parikammakāle gahetabbā bhavantīti yojanā. Pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā
analyzed: pubba bhāge parikamma kāle gahetabbāḥ bhavanti iti yojanā pubba bhāge cakkhunā oloketvā

original: parikammaṃ kataṃ, tena uggahitanimittaṃ tesaṃ gahetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: parikammam katam tena uggahita nimittam tesam gahetabbanti vuttam hoti

original: 3144. Phuṭṭhenāti nāsikagge, uttaroṭṭhe vā phuṭṭhavasena. Kāyagatāsatiyaṃ tacapañcakaṃ
analyzed: phuṭṭhena ati nāsikā agge uttaroṭṭhe vā phuṭṭha vasena taca pañcakam

original: diṭṭhena gahetabbaṃ. Mālutoti vāyokasiṇaṃ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhena gahetabbaṃ ucchusassādīnaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhena gahetabbam mālutoti vāyokasiṇam diṭṭha phuṭṭhena gahetabbam ucchusassa ādīnam

original: pattesu calamānavaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena, kāyappasādaghaṭṭanena ca gahetabbattā. Ettha
analyzed: pattesu calamāna vaṇṇa ggahaṇa mukhena kāya pasāda ghaṭṭanena ca gahetabba ttā ettha

original: etesu kammaṭṭhānesu. Sesakanti vuttāvasesaṃ. Buddhānussatiādikā aṭṭhānussatiyo, cattāro
analyzed: etesu kammaṭṭhānesu sesakanti vutta avasesam buddha anussati ādikāḥ aṭṭha anussatiyaḥ cattāro

original: brahmavihārā, cattāro āruppā, āhārepaṭikkūlasaññā, catudhātuvavatthānaṃ, kāyagatāsatiyaṃ
analyzed: brahmavihārā cattāro āruppāḥ āhāre paṭikkūla saññā catu dhātu vavatthānam kāyagata asatiyam

original: vakkapañcakādīni cāti sabbametaṃ parato sutvā gahetabbattā suteneva gahetabbanti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vakka pañcaka ādīni ca ati sabbam etat paratas sutvā gahetabba ttā sutena iva gahetabban ti vuttam

original: 3145. Ettha etesu kammaṭṭhānesu ākāsakasiṇaṃ ṭhapetvā nava kasiṇā paṭhamāruppacittassa ārammaṇabhūtakasiṇugghāṭimākāsassa hetubhāvato paccayā jāyare paccayā bhavantīti yojanā.
analyzed: ettha etesu kammaṭṭhānesu ākāsa kasiṇam ṭhapetvā nava kasiṇā paṭhama āruppa cittassa ārammaṇa bhūta kasiṇa ugghāṭima ākāsassa hetu bhāvato paccayāḥ paccayāḥ bhavanti iti yojanā

original: 3146. Dasapi kasiṇā abhiññānaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādīnaṃ paccayā bhavantīti yojanā. Catutthassāti catutthassa brahmavihārassa.
analyzed: dasa api kasiṇāḥ abhiññānam dibba cakkhu ñāṇa ādīnam paccayāḥ bhavanti iti yojanā catutthassa ati catutthassa brahmavihārassa

original: 3147. Heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimāruppanti ākāsānañcāyatanādikaṃ. Parassa ca parassa cāti viññāṇañcāyatanādiuttarajjhānassa
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatana ādikam parassa ca parassa ca ati viññāṇañcāyatana ādi uttara jhānassa

original: paccayoti pakāsitanti yojanā. Nevasaññāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ. Nirodhassāti saññāvedayitanirodhassa,
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti pakāsitanti yojanā nevasaññā ati nevasaññā nāsañña āyatanam nirodhassa ati saññā vedayita nirodhassa

original: tāya nirodhasamāpattiyā.
analyzed: tāya nirodha samāpattiyā

original: 3148. Sabbeti samacattālīsakammaṭṭhānadhammā. Sukhavihārassāti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa.
analyzed: sabbe ti sama cattālīsa kammaṭṭhāna dhammā sukha vihārassa ti diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārassa

original: Bhavanissaraṇassa cāti vibhavūpanissayatāya vipassanāpādakattena āsavakkhayañāṇena
analyzed: bhava nissaraṇassa ca ati vibhava upanissaya tāya vipassanā pādaka ttena āsava kkhaya ñāṇena

original: adhigantabbassa nibbānassa ca. Bhavasukhānañcāti parikammopacārabhāvanāvasappavattāni
analyzed: adhigantabbassa nibbānassa ca bhava sukhānam ca ati parikamma upacāra bhāvanā vasa ppavattāni

original: kāmāvacarakusalacittāni kāmasugatibhavasukhānaṃ, rūpāvacarappanāvasapavattāni rūpāvacaracittāni
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusala cittāni kāma sugati bhava sukhānam rūpāvacara ppanā vasa pavattāni rūpāvacara cittāni

original: rūpāvacarabhavasukhānaṃ, itarāni arūpāvacarabhūtāni arūpāvacarabhavasukhānañca paccayāti dīpitā.
analyzed: rūpāvacara bhava sukhānam itarāni arūpāvacara bhūtāni arūpāvacara bhava sukhānam ca paccayā ati dīpitā

original: 3149. Dasa asubhā, kāyagatāsatīti ime ekādasa rāgacaritassa visesato anukūlā viññeyyāti
analyzed: dasa asubhā kāya gatā asatī iti ime ekādasa rāga caritassa visesataḥ anukūlā viññeyyā ati

original: yojanā. “Visesato”ti iminā rāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvena ca atisappāyato ca vutto,
analyzed: yojanā visesato ti iminā rāgassa uju vipaccanīka bhāvena ca ati sappāyato ca vutto

analyzed: maraṇa upasamā iti maraṇam ca upasamaḥ ca maraṇa upasamam tasmin maraṇa upasame sati iti maraṇa anussati upasama anussati ca ati ete cattāro dhammā paññā pakatino ti buddhi caritassa

original: nānādijagaṇā, te tato tato āgantvā ramanti etthāti nānādijagaṇārāmo, tasmiṃ, sukakokilamayūrādisakuṇānaṃ
analyzed: te tatas tatas āgantvā ramanti ettha ati nānā ādi ja gaṇa ārāmaḥ tasmin

original: āgantvā ramanaṭṭhānabhūteti attho. Nānārāmamanorameti nānā aneke ārāmā pupphaphalārāmā
analyzed: āgantvā ramana ṭṭhāna bhūtā iti atthaḥ nānā ārāma manoramā iti nānā aneke ārāmā puppha phala ārāmā

original: nānārāmā, tehi manoramoti nānārāmamanoramo, tasmiṃ.
analyzed: nānā ārāmā tehi manoramaḥ tasmin

original: Cārū ca te paṅkajā cāti cārupaṅkajā, kamaluppalakumudādayo, cārupaṅkajehi saṃkiṇṇā
analyzed: cārū ca te paṅkajā ca ati cāru paṅkajā kamala uppala kumuda ādayaḥ cāru paṅkajehi saṃkiṇṇā

original: sañchannā cārupaṅkajasaṃkiṇṇā, cārupaṅkajasaṃkiṇṇā ca te taḷākā ceti cārupaṅkajasaṃkiṇṇataḷākā,
analyzed: sañchannā cāru paṅkaja saṃkiṇṇā cāru paṅkaja saṃkiṇṇā ca te taḷākā ca iti cāru paṅkaja saṃkiṇṇa taḷākā

original: tehi samalaṅkato vibhūsito cāru…pe… samalaṅkato, tasmiṃ. Sundaro madhuro raso assāti
analyzed: tehi samalaṅkataḥ vibhūsito cārupe samalaṅkataḥ tasmin sundaraḥ madhuraḥ rasaḥ assa ati

original: surasaṃ, surasañca taṃ udakañcāti surasodakaṃ, surasodakena sampuṇṇā surasodakasampuṇṇā,
analyzed: su rasam su rasam ca tam udakam ca ati su rasa udakam su rasa udakena sampuṇṇā su rasa udaka sampuṇṇā

original: varā ca te kūpā cāti varakūpā, surasodakasampuṇṇā ca te varakūpā ceti surasodakasampuṇṇavarakūpā,
analyzed: varā ca te kūpā ca ati vara kūpā su rasa udaka sampuṇṇā ca te vara kūpā ca iti su rasa udaka sampuṇṇa vara kūpā

original: tehi upasobhito suraso…pe… kūpasobhito, tasmiṃ.
analyzed: tehi upasobhitaḥ sura sope kūpa sobhitaḥ tasmin

original: Visesena citrāti vicitrā, vicitrā ca te vipulā cāti vicitravipulā, vicitravipulā
analyzed: visesena citrā ati vicitrā vicitrā ca te vipulā ca ati vicitra vipulā vicitra vipulā

original: ca te maṇḍapā cāti…pe… maṇḍapā, atisayena uggatā accuggatā, accuggatā ca te varamaṇḍapā
analyzed: ca te maṇḍapā ca atipe maṇḍapā atisayena uggatāḥ accuggatāḥ accuggatā ca te varamaṇḍapā

original: cāti accuggavaramaṇḍapā, gāthābandhavasena vaṇṇalopo, vicitravipulā ca te accuggavaramaṇḍapā
analyzed: ca ati accugga vara maṇḍapā gāthābandha vasena vaṇṇa lopaḥ vicitra vipulā ca te accugga vara maṇḍapā

original: cāti vicitravipulaaccuggavaramaṇḍapā, tehi maṇḍito vibhūsito vicitra…pe… maṇḍito,
analyzed: ca ati vicitra vipula accugga vara maṇḍapā tehi maṇḍitaḥ vibhūsitaḥ vicitrape maṇḍitaḥ

original: tasmiṃ. Maṇḍaṃ sūriyarasmiṃ pāti rakkhatīti maṇḍapo. Tato tato āgamma vasanti etthāti
analyzed: tasmim maṇḍam sūriya rasmim pāti rakkhati iti maṇḍapo tatas tatas āgamma vasanti ettha ati

original: āvāso, pāsādahammiyamāḷādayo. Anekehīti bahūhi. Accantanti atisayena.
analyzed: āvāsaḥ anekehi iti bahūhi atisayena

original: Dharaṇītalaṃ bhetvā uggatena viya, kharaṃ pharusaṃ kelāsasikharaṃ jitvā avahasantena viya thūpena ca upasobhite vihāreti yojanā.
analyzed: dharaṇī talam bhetvā uggatena viya kharam pharusam kelāsa sikharam jitvā avahasantena viya thūpena ca upasobhite vihāra iti yojanā

original: Ambuṃ dadātīti ambudo, sarade ambudo saradambudo, thullanatamahantabhāvasāmaññena
analyzed: ambum dadāti iti ambudaḥ sarade ambudaḥ saradambudaḥ thulla nata mahanta bhāva sāmaññena

original: saradambudena saṅkāso saradambudasaṅkāso, tasmiṃ. Sammā ussito uggatoti samussito,
analyzed: sarat ambudena saṅkāsaḥ sarat ambuda saṅkāso tasmin sammā ussitaḥ uggataḥ iti samussitaḥ

original: tasmiṃ. Olokentānaṃ, vasantānañca pasādaṃ cittassa tosaṃ janetīti pasādajananaṃ,
analyzed: tasmin olokentānam vasantānam ca pasādam cittassa tosam janeti iti pasāda jananam

original: tasmiṃ. Ettāvatā vinayavinicchayakathāya pavattitadesaṃ dasseti, “vasatā mayā”ti kattāraṃ.
analyzed: tasmin ettāvatā vinaya vinicchaya kathāya pavatti ta desam dasseti vasatā mayā ati kattāram

original: Devadattaciñcamāṇavikādīhi katāparādhassa, sītuṇhādiparissayassa ca sahanato, sasantānagatakilesādīnaṃ
analyzed: devadatta ciñca māṇavika ādīhi kata aparādhassa sītuṇha ādi parissayassa ca sahanataḥ sa santāna gata kilesa ādīnam

original: hananato ca sīho viyāti sīho, buddho ca so sīho cāti buddhasīho. Seṭṭhapariyāyo vā
analyzed: hananataḥ ca sīhaḥ viyāti sīhaḥ buddho ca so sīho ca ati buddhasīhaḥ seṭṭha pariyāyaḥ vā

original: sīha-saddo, buddhaseṭṭhenāti attho. Vuttassāti desitassa. Vinayassa vinayapiṭakassa.
analyzed: sīha saddaḥ buddhaseṭṭhena āti atthaḥ vuttassa ati desitassa vinayassa vinaya piṭakassa

original: Vinicchayoti pāṭhāgato ceva aṭṭhakathāgato ca ācariyaparamparābhato ca vinicchayo.
analyzed: vinicchayo ti pāṭhā gataḥ ca iva aṭṭhakathā gataḥ ca ācariya paramparā bhato ca vinicchayo

original: Buddhasīhanti evaṃnāmakaṃ mahātheraṃ. Samuddissāti uddisitvā, tena kataāyācanaṃ paṭiccāti
analyzed: buddha sīham ti evaṃnāmakam mahā theram samuddissa ati uddisitvā tena kata āyācanam paṭicca ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Iminā bāhiranimittaṃ dassitaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam hoti iminā bāhira nimittam dassitam

original: Ayaṃ vinicchayo mama saddhivihārikaṃ buddhasīhaṃ samuddissa bhikkhūnaṃ hitatthāya samāsato varapāsāde vasatā mayā katoti yojanā.
analyzed: ayam vinicchayaḥ mama saddhivihārikam buddha sīham samuddissa bhikkhūnam hita atthāya samāsatas vara pāsāde vasatā mayā kataḥ iti yojanā

original: Kimatthāyāti āha “vinayassāvabodhatthaṃ, sukhenevācirena cā”ti, anupādisesena nibbānapariyantānisaṃsassa
analyzed: kimatthāya iti āha vinayassa avabodha attham sukhena iva acirena ca ati anupādisesena nibbāna pariyanta anisaṃsassa

original: vinayapiṭakassa pakaraṇassa ganthavasena samāsetvā atthavasena suṭṭhu vinicchitattā
analyzed: vinaya piṭakassa pakaraṇassa gantha vasena samāsetvā attha vasena suṭṭhu vinicchita ttā

original: sukhena ceva acirena ca avabodhanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhikkhūnanti padhānanidassanaṃ,
analyzed: sukhena ca iva acirena ca avabodhana atthanti vuttam hoti bhikkhūnam ti padhāna nidassanam

original: ekasesaniddeso vā heṭṭhā –
analyzed: ekasesa niddesaḥ vā heṭṭhā

original: “Bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca hitatthāya samāhito. Pavakkhāmī”ti –
analyzed: bhikkhūnam bhikkhunīnam ca hita tthāya samāhitaḥ pavakkhāmi iti

original: Āraddhattā. Iminā payojanaṃ dassitaṃ.
analyzed: iminā payojanam dassitam

original: 3179. Evaṃ desakattunimittapayojanāni dassetvā kālaniyamaṃ dassetumāha “accutā”tiādi.
analyzed: evam desa kattu nimitta payojanāni dassetvā kāla niyamam dassetum āha

original: Vikkamanaṃ vikkanto, vikkamoti attho. Accutaṃ kenaci anabhibhūtaṃ, tañca taṃ vikkantañcāti
analyzed: vikkamanam vikkantaḥ vikkamo ti attho accutam kenaci an abhibhūtam tam ca tam vikkantam ca ati

original: accutavikkantaṃ, accutassa nārāyanassa viya accutavikkantaṃ etassāti accutaccutavikkanto.
analyzed: accuta vikkantam accutassa nārāyanassa viya accuta vikkantam etassa ati accuta cuta vikkantaḥ

original: Ko so? Rājā, tasmiṃ. Kalambhakulaṃ nandayatīti kalambhakulanandano, tasmiṃ. Iminā
analyzed: kaḥ saḥ rājā tasmin kalambha kulam nandayati iti tasmin

original: tassa kulavaṃso nidassito. Kalambhakulavaṃsajāte accutaccutavikkantanāme coḷarājini
analyzed: tassa kula vaṃsaḥ nidassitaḥ kalambha kula vaṃsa jāte accutaccutavikkanta nāme coḷarājini

original: mahiṃ coḷaraṭṭhaṃ samanusāsante sammā anusāsante sati tasmiṃ coḷarājini rajjaṃ kārente
analyzed: mahim coḷaraṭṭham samanusāsante sammā anusāsante sati tasmin coḷa rājini rajjam kārente

original: sati ayaṃ vinicchayo mayā āraddho ceva samāpito cāti. Iminā kālaṃ nidasseti.
analyzed: sati ayam vinicchayaḥ mayā āraddho ca iva samāpitaḥ ca ati iminā kālam nidasseti

original: 3180. Idāni imaṃ vinayavinicchayappakaraṇaṃ karontena attano puññasampadaṃ sakalalokahitatthāya
analyzed: idāni imam vinaya vinicchaya pakaraṇam karontena attano puñña sampadam sakala loka hita tthāya

original: pariṇāmento āha “yathā”tiādi. Ayaṃ vinayavinicchayo antarāyaṃ vinā yathā siddhiṃ
analyzed: āha yathā atiādi ayam vinaya vinicchayaḥ antarāyam vinā yathā siddhim

original: nipphattiṃ patto, tathā sattānaṃ dhammasaṃyutā kusalanissitā saṅkappā cittuppādā,
analyzed: nipphattim pattaḥ tathā sattānam dhamma saṃyutā kusala nissitā saṅkappā citta uppādā

original: adhippetatthā vā sabbe antarāyaṃ vinā sijjhantu nippajjantūti yojanā.
analyzed: adhippeta tthāḥ vā sabbe antarāyam vinā sijjhantu nippajjantu iti yojanā

original: 3181. Teneva puññapphalabhāvena sakalalokahitekahetuno bhagavato sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitimāsīsanto
analyzed: tena iva puñña pphala bhāvena sakala loka hita eka hetunaḥ bhagavataḥ sāsanassa cira ṭṭhitim āsīsanto

original: āha “yāva tiṭṭhatī”tiādi. “Mandāro”ti vuccati sītasiniddhaekapabbatarājā. Kaṃ vuccati
analyzed: āha yāva tiṭṭhati itiādi mandāro ti vuccati sīta siniddha eka pabbata rājā kam vuccati

original: udakaṃ, tena dārito niggamappadeso “kandaro”ti vuccati. Sītasiniddhavipulapulinatalehi,
analyzed: udakam tena dāritaḥ niggama ppadeso kandaraḥ ti vuccati sīta siniddha vipula pulina talehi

original: sandamānasātasītalapasannasalilehi, kīḷamānanānappakāramacchagumbehi, ubhayatīrapupphaphalapallavālaṅkatatarulatāvanehi,
analyzed: sandamāna sātasī tala pasanna salilehi kīḷamāna nānappakāra maccha gumbehi ubhaya tīra puppha phala pallava alaṅkata taru latā vanehi

original: kūjamānasukasālikakaokilamayūrahaṃsādisakuntābhirutehi, tattha tattha paribhamantabhamarāmavajjāhi
analyzed: kūjamāna su kasālika kaokila mayūra haṃsa ādi sa kunta abhirutehi tattha tattha

original: ca cāru manuññā kandarā etassāti cārukandaro. Kali vuccati aparādho, taṃ sāsati hiṃsati
analyzed: ca cāru manuññā kandarā etassa ati cārukandaraḥ vuccati aparādhaḥ tam sāsati hiṃsati

original: apanetīti kalisāsanaṃ. “Kalusāsana”nti vā pāṭho. Kalusaṃ vuccati pāpaṃ, taṃ asati
analyzed: apaneti iti kali sāsanam kalusa āsanam ti vā pāṭhaḥ kalusam vuccati pāpam tat asati

original: vikkhipati dūramussārayatīti kalusāsanaṃ, pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhasaṅkhātaṃ tividhasāsanaṃ.
analyzed: vikkhipati dūram ussārayati iti kalusa āsanam pariyatti paṭipatti paṭivedha saṅkhātam tividha sāsanam

original: 3182. Evaṃ okassa diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthahitasādhakassa sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiṃ
analyzed: evam okassa diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika paramattha hita sādhakassa sāsanassa cira ṭṭhitim

original: patthetvā teneva puññakammānubhāvena lokassa diṭṭhadhammikatthahetumāsīsanto āha
analyzed: patthetvā tena iva puñña kamma anubhāvena lokassa diṭṭhadhammika ttha hetum āsīsantaḥ āha

original: “kāle”tiādi. Kāleti sassasamiddhīnaṃ anurūpe kāle. Sammā pavassantūti avuṭṭhiativuṭṭhidosarahitā
analyzed: kāla itiādi kāla iti anurūpe kāle sammā pavassantu iti avuṭṭhi ativuṭṭhi dosa rahitā

original: yathā sassādīni sampajjanti, tathā vassaṃ vuṭṭhidhāraṃ pavassantūti attho. Vassavalāhakāti
analyzed: yathā sassa ādīni sampajjanti tathā vassam vuṭṭhi dhāram pavassantu iti atthaḥ vassa valāhakā ati

original: vassavalāhakādhiṭṭhitā pajjunnadevaputtā. Mahīpālāti rājāno. Dhammatoti dasarājadhammato.
analyzed: vassa valāhaka adhiṭṭhitā pajjunna deva puttāḥ mahīpālā ati rājānaḥ dhammato ti dasa rāja dhammato

original: Sakalaṃ mahinti pathavinissitasabbajanakāyaṃ.
analyzed: sakalam mahin ti pathavī nissita sabba jana kāyam

original: 3183. Evaṃ sabbalokassa lokiyalokuttarasampattisādhanatthāya attano puññapariṇāmaṃ
analyzed: evam sabba lokassa lokiya lokuttara sampatti sādhana tthāya attano puñña pariṇāmam

original: katvā idāni viditalokuttarasampattinipphādanavaseneva puññapariṇāmaṃ karonto āha
analyzed: katvā idāni vidita lokuttara sampatti nipphādana vasena iva puñña pariṇāmam karontaḥ āha

original: “ima”ntiādi. Iminā attano viracitaṃ paccakkhaṃ vinicchayamāha. Sārabhūtanti sīlasārāditividhasikkhāsārassa
analyzed: imantiādi iminā attanaḥ viracitam paccakkham vinicchayam āha sāra bhūtanti sīla sārāt itividha sikkhā sārassa

original: pakāsanato hatthasāramiva bhūtaṃ. Hitanti tadatthe paṭipajjantānaṃ anupādisesanibbānāvasānassa
analyzed: pakāsanataḥ hattha sāram iva bhūtam hitam ti tad atthe paṭipajjantānam an upādisesa nibbāna avasānassa

original: hitassa āvahanato, saṃsāradukkhassa ca vūpasamanato amatosadhaṃ viya hitaṃ. Atthayuttanti
analyzed: hitassa āvahanataḥ saṃsāra dukkhassa ca vūpasamanataḥ amatosadham viya hitam attha yuttanti

original: diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ vinayanādīhi yuttattā atthayuttaṃ. Karontenāti
analyzed: diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika parama tthānam vinayana ādīhi yutta ttā attha yuttam karontena ati

original: racayantena mayā. Yaṃ puññaṃ pattanti kārakaṃ punātīti puññaṃ, pujjabhavaphalanipphādanato
analyzed: racayantena mayā yam puññam kārakam punāti iti puññam pujja bhava phala nipphādanato

original: vā “puñña”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ yaṃ kusalakammaṃ aparimeyyabhavapariyantaṃ pasutaṃ adhigataṃ.
analyzed: vā saṅkham gatam yam kusala kammam aparimeyya bhava pariyantam pasutam adhigatam

original: Tena puññena hetubhūtena. Ayaṃ lokoti ayaṃ sakalopi sattaloko. Munindappayātanti
analyzed: tena puññena hetu bhūtena ayam loko ti ayam sakalaḥ api satta lokaḥ

original: munindena sammāsambuddhena sampattaṃ. Vītasokanti vigatasokaṃ. Sokaparidevadukkhadomanassaupāyāsādīhi
analyzed: munindena sammāsambuddhena sampattam vīta sokam ti vigata sokam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsa ādīhi

original: vigatattā, tesaṃ nikkamananimittattā ca apagatasokādisaṃsāradukkhaṃ. Sivaṃ puraṃ
analyzed: vigata ttā tesam nikkamana nimitta ttā ca apagata soka ādi saṃsāra dukkham sivam puram

original: nibbānapuraṃ pāpuṇātu sacchikarotu, kilesaparinibbānena, anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
analyzed: nibbāna puram pāpuṇātu sacchikarotu kilesa parinibbānena anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā

original: ca parinibbātūti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ca parinibbātu iti vuttam hoti

original: Iti tambapaṇṇiyenātiādi pakaraṇakārakassa pabhavasuddhibāhusaccādiguṇamukhena pakaraṇe gāravaṃ janetukāmena etassa sissena ṭhapitaṃ vākyaṃ.
analyzed: iti tambapaṇṇiyena atiādi pakaraṇa kārakassa pabhava suddhi bāhu sacca ādi guṇa mukhena pakaraṇe gāravam janetu kāmena etassa sissena ṭhapitam vākyam

original: Tattha tambapaṇṇiyenāti tambapaṇṇimhi jāto, tattha vidito, tato āgatoti vā tambapaṇṇiyo,
analyzed: tattha tambapaṇṇiyena ati tambapaṇṇimhi jātaḥ tattha viditaḥ tatas āgataḥ iti vā tambapaṇṇiyaḥ

original: tena. Byākaraṇamavecca adhītavāti veyyākaraṇo, paramo ca uttamo ca so veyyākaraṇo
analyzed: tena byākaraṇam avet ca veyyākaraṇaḥ paramaḥ ca uttamo ca so veyyākaraṇaḥ

original: cāti paramaveyyākaraṇo, tena. Tīṇi piṭakāni samāhaṭāni, tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ samāhāro
analyzed: ca ati parama veyyākaraṇaḥ tena tīṇi piṭakāni samāhaṭāni tiṇṇam piṭakānam samāhāraḥ

original: vā tipiṭakaṃ, nīyanti bujjhīyanti seyyatthikehīti nayā, nayanti vā etehi lokiyalokuttarasampattiṃ
analyzed: vā tipiṭakam nīyanti bujjhīyanti seyyatthikehi iti nayāḥ nayanti vā etehi lokiya lokuttara sampattim

original: visesenāti nayā, pāḷinayaatthanayaekattanayādayova, tipiṭake āgatā nayā tipiṭakanayā,
analyzed: visesena ati nayā tipiṭake āgatāḥ nayā tipiṭaka nayā

original: vidhānaṃ pasāsanaṃ, pavattanaṃ vā vidhi, tipiṭakanayānaṃ vidhi tipiṭakanayavidhi,
analyzed: vidhānam pasāsanam pavattanam vā vidhi tipiṭaka nayānam vidhi tipiṭaka naya vidhi

original: tipiṭakanayavidhimhi kusalo tipiṭakanayavidhikusalo, tena.
analyzed: tipiṭaka naya vidhimhi kusalaḥ tipiṭaka naya vidhi kusalaḥ tena

original: Paramā ca te kavijanā cāti paramakavijanā, paramakavijanānaṃ hadayāni paramakavijanahadayāni,
analyzed: paramā ca te kavi janā ca ati parama kavi janā hadayāni parama kavi jana hadayāni

original: padumānaṃ vanāni padumavanāni, paramakavijanahadayāni ca tāni padumavanāni cāti paramakavijanahadayapadumavanāni,
analyzed: padumānam vanāni paduma vanāni parama kavi jana hadayāni ca tāni paduma vanāni ca ati parama kavi jana hadaya paduma vanāni

original: tesaṃ vikasanaṃ bodhaṃ sūriyo viya karotīti paramakavijanahadayapadumavanavikasanakaro,
analyzed: tesam vikasanam bodham sūriyaḥ viya karoti iti parama kavi jana hadaya paduma vana vikasana karaḥ

original: tena. Kavī ca te varā cāti kavivarā, kavīnaṃ varāti vā kavivarā, kavivarānaṃ vasabho
analyzed: tena kavī ca te varā ca ati kavi varā kavīnam varāti vā kavi varā kavi varānam vasabho

original: uttamo kavivaravasabho, tena, kavirājarājenāti attho.
analyzed: uttamaḥ kavi vara vasabhaḥ tena kavi rāja rājena ati attho

original: Paramā ca sā rati cāti paramarati, paramaratiṃ karontīti paramaratikarāni, varāni
analyzed: paramā ca sā rati ca ati parama rati parama ratim karonti iti parama rati karāni varāni

original: ca tāni madhurāni cāti varamadhurāni, varamadhurāni ca tāni vacanāni cāti varamadhuravacanāni,
analyzed: ca tāni madhurāni ca ati vara madhurāni vara madhurāni ca tāni vacanāni ca ati vara madhura vacanāni

original: imāneva cattāri pārājikāni, ito ūnaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā natthi. Tasmā bhagavāpi dhaniyaṃ
analyzed: imāni eva cattāri pārājikāni itas ūnam vā atirekam vā na atthi tasmā bhagavā api dhaniyam

original: vigarahitvā pādeneva dutiyapārājikaṃ paññapento ‘yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhāta’ntiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vigarahitvā pādena iva dutiya pārājikam paññapentaḥ yaḥ pana bhikkhu adinnam theyya saṅkhāta nti ādim āha ati vuttam

original: Sāratthadīpaniyañca –
analyzed: sārattha dīpaniyam ca

analyzed: catutthaḥ bhāgaḥ pādaḥ ti veditabbaḥ ti iminā ava sabba janapadesu kahāpaṇassa iva vīsatimaḥ

analyzed: bhāgomāsako ti idam ca vuttam eva hoti iti daṭṭhabbam porāṇa sattha anurūpam lakkhaṇa sampannā

analyzed: nīla kahāpaṇassa pāda gghanakanti paricchinditvā vinicchayaḥ kātabbaḥ ti ayam atthaḥ uva vutto

original: Ettha kahāpaṇaṃ nāma karontā suvaṇṇenapi karonti rajatenapi tambenapi suvaṇṇarajatatambamissakenapi.

analyzed: eka lakkhaṇena bhavitabbam kāla desa paribhoga ādi vasena aggha nānattam pādassa iva bhavitabbam

analyzed: bhagavatā hi dhammika rājūhi hanana bandhana pabbājana anurūpena iva adinna ādāne pārājikam

analyzed: kahāpaṇassa catutthena pādena bhavitabbanti

original: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam

original: Vuttattā, sāratthadīpaniyañca –

analyzed: vutta ttā ca vinaya vinicchayam patvā garuke ṭhātabban ti vacanato ca missaka kahāpaṇoya iva

original: vīhimattaṃ lohaṃ pakkhipitvā akkharāni ca hatthiādīnamaññatarañca rūpaṃ dassetvā

original: kato niddosattā nīlakahāpaṇo nāma hotīti.
analyzed: kataḥ niddosattā nīlakahāpaṇaḥ nāma hoti iti

analyzed: sikkhābhājana vinicchaye ca kesuci potthakesu pādaḥ nāma pañca māsā suvaṇṇassa ati

analyzed: hema rajata tambehi satthe niddiṭṭha lakkhaṇam

original: Cavanti sāmaññaguṇā, iccāhu vinayaññuno”ti.

original: 9. Opātanti āvāṭaṃ. Dukkhe jāteti yojanā.
analyzed: āvāṭam dukkhe jātā iti yojanā

original: 10. Uttariṃ dhammanti ettha “uttarimanussadhamma”nti vattabbe niruttinayena majjhapadalopaṃ,
analyzed: uttarim dhammam ti ettha uttari manussa dhammam ti vattabbe nirutti nayena majjha pada lopam

original: ariyānañca dhammaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ. Attupanāyikanti attani taṃ upaneti “mayi
analyzed: ariyānam ca dhammam uttari manussa dhammam attupanāyikam ti attani tam upaneti mayi

original: atthī”ti samudācaranto, attānaṃ vā tattha upaneti “ahaṃ ettha sandissāmī”ti samudācarantoti
analyzed: atthi iti samudācarantaḥ attānam vā tattha upaneti aham ettha sandissāmi iti samudācarantaḥ ti

original: attupanāyiko, taṃ attupanāyikaṃ, evaṃ katvā vadantoti sambandho.
analyzed: tam attu panāyikam evam katvā vadantaḥ iti sambandhaḥ

original: 11. Pariyāyeti “yo te vihāre vasati, so bhikkhu arahā”tiādinā pariyāyabhaṇane. Ñāteti yaṃ uddissa bhaṇati, tasmiṃ viññumhi manussajātike acirena ñāte. No ceti no ce jānāti.
analyzed: pariyāyeti yaḥ te vihāre vasati saḥ bhikkhu arahā tiādinā pariyāya bhaṇane ñātā iti yam uddissa bhaṇati tasmin viññumhi manussa jātike acirena ñāte no ce iti no ce jānāti

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Pārājikakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pārājika kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 13. Ceteti, upakkamati, muccati, evaṃ aṅgattaye puṇṇe garukaṃ vuttaṃ. Dvaṅge ceteti,
analyzed: ceteti upakkamati muccati evam aṅga ttaye puṇṇe garukam vuttam dvi aṅge ceteti

original: upakkamati yadi na muccati, evaṃ aṅgadvaye thullaccayanti yojanā. Payogeti payojetvā
analyzed: upakkamati yadi na muccati evam aṅga dvaye yojanā payogeti payojetvā

original: upakkamituṃ aṅgajātāmasanaṃ, parassa āṇāpananti evarūpe sāhatthikāṇattikapayoge.
analyzed: upakkamitum aṅga jāta āmasanam parassa evarūpe sāhatthika āṇattika payoge

original: 14. Vuttanayeneva uparūpari pañhāpucchanaṃ ñātuṃ sakkāti taṃ avattukāmo āha “ito paṭṭhāyā”tiādi. Mayampi yadettha pubbe avuttamanuttānatthañca, tadeva vaṇṇayissāma.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva upari upari pañhāpucchanam ñātum sakkā iti tam a vattu kāmaḥ āha itas paṭṭhāya atiādi mayam pi yat ettha pubbe avuttam anutta anattham ca tat eva vaṇṇayissāma

original: 15. Kāyenāti attano kāyena. Kāyanti itthiyā kāyaṃ. Esa nayo “kāyabaddha”nti etthāpi.
analyzed: kāyena ati attano kāyena itthiyā kāyam esa nayo kāya baddhanti ettha api

original: 16. Attano kāyena paṭibaddhena itthiyā kāyapaṭibaddhe phuṭṭhe tu dukkaṭanti yojanā.
analyzed: kāyena paṭibaddhena itthiyā kāya paṭibaddhe phuṭṭhe tu dukkaṭa nti yojanā

original: 17. Tisso āpattiyo siyunti yojanā. Dvinnaṃ maggānanti vaccamaggapassāvamaggānaṃ.
analyzed: tissaḥ āpattiyaḥ siyunti yojanā dvinnam maggānam ti vaccamagga passāva maggānam

original: 18. Vaṇṇādibhaññeti vaṇṇādinā bhaṇane. Kāyapaṭibaddhe vaṇṇādinā bhaññe dukkaṭanti yojanā.
analyzed: vaṇṇa ādi bhaññā iti vaṇṇa ādinā bhaṇane kāya paṭibaddhe vaṇṇa ādinā bhaññe dukkaṭam ti yojanā

original: 19. Attakāmacariyāyāti attakāmapāricariyāya.
analyzed: atta kāma cariyāya ati atta kāma pāricariyāya

original: 20. Paṇḍakassa santikepi attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ vadato tassa bhikkhunoti yojanā. Tiracchānagatassāpi santiketi etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: paṇḍakassa santike pi atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam vadataḥ tassa bhikkhuno ti yojanā tiracchāna gatassa api santikā iti ettha api esā iva nayo

original: 21. Itthipurisānamantare sañcarittaṃ sañcaraṇabhāvaṃ samāpanne bhikkhumhi paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsāpaccāharaṇakattike sampanne tassa budho garukaṃ niddiseti yojanā.
analyzed: itthi purisānam antare sañcarittam sañcaraṇa bhāvam samāpanne bhikkhumhi paṭiggaṇhana vīmaṃsā paccāharaṇa kattike sampanne tassa budhaḥ garukam niddiseti yojanā

original: 22. Dvaṅgasamāyogeti tīsvetesu dvinnaṃ aṅgānaṃ yathākathañci samāyoge. Aṅge sati panekasminti tiṇṇamekasmiṃ pana aṅge sati.
analyzed: dvi aṅga samāyoga iti tīsu etesu dvinnam samāyoge aṅge sati samāyoge aṅge sati

original: 24. Payogeti “adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ kuṭiṃ, adesitavatthukaṃ mahallakavihārañca
analyzed: payoga iti a desita vatthukam pamāṇa atikkantam kuṭim a desita vatthukam mahallaka vihāram ca

original: kāressāmī”ti upakaraṇatthaṃ araññagamanato paṭṭhāya sabbapayoge. Ekapiṇḍe anāgateti
analyzed: kāressāmi iti upakaraṇa attham arañña gamanataḥ paṭṭhāya sabba payoge eka piṇḍe anāgata iti

original: sabbapariyantimaṃ piṇḍaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: piṇḍam sandhāya vuttam

original: 25. Idha yo bhikkhu amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsetīti yojanā.
analyzed: idha yaḥ bhikkhu amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseti iti yojanā

original: 26. Okāsaṃ na ca kāretvāti “karotu me, āyasmā, okāsaṃ, ahaṃ te vattukāmo”ti evaṃ tena bhikkhunā okāsaṃ akārāpetvā.
analyzed: okāsam na ca kāretvā ati karotu me āyasmai okāsam aham te vattu kāmaḥ iti evam tena bhikkhunā okāsam a kārāpetvā

original: 28. Aññabhāgiyeti aññabhāgiyapadena upalakkhitasikkhāpade. Evaṃ aññatrapi īdisesu ṭhānesu attho veditabbo.
analyzed: aññabhāgiya iti aññabhāgiya padena upalakkhita sikkhāpade evam aññatra api īdisesu ṭhānesu atthaḥ veditabbo

original: 29. “Samanubhāsanāya evā”ti padacchedo. Na paṭinissajanti appaṭinissajanto.
analyzed: samanubhāsanāya eva ati padacchedaḥ na paṭinissajanti appaṭinissajantaḥ

original: 30. Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ āpanno siyā, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullataṃ āpanno siyā, kammavācāya osāne garukaṃ āpanno siyāti yojanā. “Thullata”nti idaṃ thullaccayāpattiupalakkhaṇavacanaṃ.
analyzed: ñattiyā dukkaṭam āpanno siyā dvīhi kammavācāhi thullatam āpanno siyā kammavācāyaḥ osāne garukam āpanno siyāti yojanā thullatam ti idam thullaccaya āpatti upalakkhaṇa vacanam

original: 31. Catūsu yāvatatiyakesu paṭhame āpattiparicchedaṃ dassetvā itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tenapi ekaparicchedattā tattha vuttanayameva tesu atidisanto āha “bhedānuvattake”tiādi.
analyzed: catūsu yāvatatiyakesu paṭhame āpatti paricchedam dassetvā itaresam tiṇṇam tena api eka pariccheda ttā tattha vutta nayam eva tesu atidisantaḥ āha bheda anuvattaka itiādi

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Saṅghādisesakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: saṅgha ādi sesa kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 32. Atirekacīvaranti anadhiṭṭhitaṃ, avikappitaṃ vikappanupagapamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ laddhā
analyzed: atireka cīvaranti anadhiṭṭhitam a vikappitam vikappana upagapamāṇam cīvaram laddhā

original: dasāhaṃ atikkamanto ekameva nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ āpajjati. Ticīvarena ekarattimpi
analyzed: dasa aham atikkamantaḥ ekam eva nissaggiyam pācittiyam āpajjati ti cīvarena eka rattim pi

original: vinā vasanto ekameva nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ āpajjati. Idañca jātivasena ekattaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: vinā vasantaḥ ekam eva nissaggiyam pācittiyam āpajjati idam ca jāti vasena ekattam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ vatthugaṇanāya āpattīnaṃ paricchinditabbattā.
analyzed: vuttam vatthu gaṇanāya āpattīnam paricchinditabba ttā

original: 33. Gahetvākālacīvaranti akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā. Māsanti satiyā paccāsāya nikkhipituṃ
analyzed: gahetvā akāla cīvaram ti akāla cīvaram paṭiggahetvā māsanti satiyā paccāsāya nikkhipitum

analyzed: anuññātam māsam atikkamanto ti satiyā api paccāsāya vītikkamantaḥ antomāse an adhiṭṭhahitvā

original: avikappetvā vā tiṃsadivasāni atikkamanto, cīvaruppādadivasaṃ aruṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekatiṃsamaṃ
analyzed: a vikappetvā vā tiṃsa divasāni atikkamantaḥ cīvara uppāda divasam aruṇam ādim katvā ekatiṃsamam

original: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpentoti attho. Ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjatīti udīritanti yojanā.

original: 34. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā. Yaṃkiñci purāṇacīvaranti ekavārampi paribhuttaṃ saṅghāṭiādīnamaññataraṃ cīvaraṃ.
analyzed: aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā yaṃkiñci purāṇa cīvaranti eka vāram pi paribhuttam saṅghāṭi ādīnam aññataram cīvaram

original: 35. Payogasminti “dhovā”tiādike bhikkhuno āṇattikapayoge, evaṃ āṇattāya ca bhikkhuniyā
analyzed: payogasmin ti dhovāti ādike bhikkhuno āṇattika payoge evam āṇattāya ca bhikkhuniyā

original: uddhanādike sabbasmiṃ payoge ca. “Nissaggiyāva pācitti hotīti nissaggiyā pācitti ca hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: uddhana ādike sabbasmim payoge ca nissaggiyā ava pācitti hoti iti nissaggiyā pācitti ca hoti iti yojanā

original: 36. Paṭigaṇhatoti ettha “aññatra pārivattakā”ti yojanā.
analyzed: paṭigaṇhato ti ettha aññatra pārivattakā ati yojanā

original: 38. Payogasminti viññāpanapayoge. Viññāpiteti viññāpitacīvare paṭiladdhe.
analyzed: payogasmin ti viññāpana payoge viññāpitā iti viññāpita cīvare paṭiladdhe

original: 39. Bhikkhūti acchinnacīvaro vā naṭṭhacīvaro vā bhikkhu. Taduttarinti santaruttaraparamato uttariṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhu iti acchinna cīvaraḥ vā naṭṭha cīvaraḥ vā bhikkhu tad uttarin ti santar uttara paramatas uttariṃ

original: 41. Payogeti vikappanāpajjanapayoge.
analyzed: payoge iti vikappana āpajjana payoge

original: 42. Duveti dukkaṭapācittiyavasena duve āpattiyo phuseti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: duve iti dukkaṭa pācittiya vasena duve āpattiyaḥ phusa iti yojetabbam

original: 44. Payogeti anuññātapayogato atirekābhinipphādanapayoge. Lābheti cīvarassa paṭilābhe.
analyzed: payoge iti anuññāta payogataḥ atireka abhinipphādana payoge lābhe iti cīvarassa paṭilābhe

original: Kathinavaggavaṇṇanā paṭhamā.
analyzed: kathina vagga vaṇṇanā paṭhamā

original: 45. Kosiyavaggassa ādīsu pañcasu sikkhāpadesu dve dve āpattiyoti yojanā. Payogeti karaṇakārāpanapayoge. Lābheti katvā vā kāretvā vā pariniṭṭhāpane.
analyzed: kosiya vaggassa ādīsu pañcasu sikkhāpadesu dve dve āpattiyaḥ ti yojanā payoge iti karaṇa kārāpana payoge lābhe iti katvā vā kāretvā vā pariniṭṭhāpane

original: 46. “Gahetvā eḷakalomānī”ti padacchedo. Atikkamanti atikkamanto.
analyzed: gahetvā eḷaka lomāni iti pada chedaḥ atikkamanti

original: 47. Aññāyāti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā. “Dhovāpeti eḷalomaka”nti padacchedo. Eḷalomakanti eḷakalomāni. Niruttinayena ka-kārassa vipariyāyo. Payogeti dhovāpanapayoge.
analyzed: aññāyā ati aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpeti eḷalomakanti padacchedaḥ eḷalomakanti eḷaka lomāni nirutti nayena kakārassa vipariyāyaḥ payoge ti dhovāpana payoge

original: 48. Payogeti paṭiggaṇhanapayoge.
analyzed: payoge iti paṭiggaṇhana payoge

original: 49. Nānākāranti nānappakāraṃ. Samāpajjanti samāpajjanto bhikkhu. Samāpanneti saṃvohāre samāpanne sati. Payogeti samāpajjanapayoge.
analyzed: nānākāram ti nānappakāram samāpajjanti samāpajjantaḥ bhikkhu samāpanne iti saṃvohāre samāpanne sati payoge iti samāpajjana payoge

original: 50. Payogeti kayavikkayāpajjanapayoge. Tasmiṃ kateti tasmiṃ bhaṇḍe attano santakabhāvaṃ nīte.
analyzed: payoge iti tasmin kata iti tasmin bhaṇḍe santaka bhāvam nīte

original: Kosiyavaggavaṇṇanā dutiyā.
analyzed: kosiya vagga vaṇṇanā dutiyā

original: 51. Atirekakanti anadhiṭṭhitaṃ, avikappitaṃ vā pattaṃ. Dasāhaṃ atikkamentassa tassa bhikkhuno ekāva nissaggiyāpatti hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: atirekakam ti anadhiṭṭhitam avikappitam vā pattam dasa aham atikkamentassa tassa bhikkhuno ekā ava nissaggiya āpatti hoti iti yojanā

original: 52-3. Natthi etassa pañca bandhanānīti apañcabandhano, tasmiṃ, ūnapañcabandhane patteti attho. Payogeti viññāpanapayoge. Tassa pattassa lābhe paṭilābhe.
analyzed: na atthi etassa pañca bandhanāni iti a pañca bandhanaḥ tasmin ūna pañca bandhane patte iti attho payoge ti viññāpana payoge tassa pattassa lābhe paṭilābhe

original: 54. Bhesajjanti sappiādikaṃ.
analyzed: bhesajjanti sappi ādikam

original: 55. Payogeti pariyesanapayoge.
analyzed: payoga iti pariyesana payoge

original: 57. Dve panāpattiyo phuseti vāyāpanapayoge dukkaṭaṃ, vikappanupagapacchimacīvarapamāṇena vīte nissaggiyanti dve āpattiyo āpajjatīti attho.
analyzed: dve pana āpattiyaḥ phuseti vā āyāpana payoge dukkaṭam vikappana upaga pacchima cīvara pamāṇena vīte nissaggiyanti dve āpattiyaḥ āpajjati iti attho

analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu a pavāritaḥ aññātakassa iva tantavāye samecca upasaṅkamitvā cīvare

analyzed: payoge iti vikappa āpajjana payoge

analyzed: acceka saññitam cīvaram paṭiggahetvā ati yojanā kālanti cīvara kālam

original: 61. Tiṇṇamaññataraṃ vatthanti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ. Ghareti antaraghare.
analyzed: tiṇṇam aññataram vatthanti tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññataram cīvaram ghareti antaraghare

original: Nidahitvāti nikkhipitvā. Tena cīvarena vinā chārattato adhikaṃ divasaṃ yassa āraññakassa

analyzed: vihārassa gocara gāme tam cīvaram nikkhittam tamhā vihārā aññatra vasantaḥ nissaggiyam phusa iti yojanā

original: 62. Saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ jānaṃ jānanto.
analyzed: saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam jānam jānantaḥ

analyzed: payoge ti pariṇāmana payoge sabbattha ati pārājika ādīsu sabba sikkhāpadesu

analyzed: parivāre paṭhamam vutta kattha paññatti vārassa parihāpanam idha avacanan ti attho

analyzed: pacchā gaṇhitu kāmena mayā tam ṭhapetvā paṭhamam āpatti dassana attham tad anantaraḥ kata āpattivāro

analyzed: paṭhamam vuttaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

analyzed: patta vagga vaṇṇanā tatiyā

analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

analyzed: yojanā pariyāya vacanā iti te vihāre vasati iti ādinā pariyāyena kathane

analyzed: ñātā iti yassa kathā iti tasmin vacana anantaram eva ñāte

original: 67. Omasato bhikkhussa duve āpattiyo vuttā. Upasampannaṃ omasato pācitti siyā. Itaraṃ anupasampannaṃ omasato dukkaṭaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: omasataḥ bhikkhussa duve āpattiyaḥ vuttāḥ upasampannam omasataḥ pācitti siyā itaram anupasampannam omasataḥ dukkaṭam siyā ti yojanā

analyzed: payoge ti dhammam vācentassa vacana kiriyā ārambhataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva pada ādīnam parisamāpanam etthantare akkhara uccāraṇa payoge dukkaṭam padānam parisamattiyam pācittiyam

original: 70. “Tirattā anupasampannasahaseyyāyā”ti padacchedo. Anupasampannena sahaseyyā anupasampannasahaseyyā,
analyzed: tirattā anupasampanna sahaseyyāya ati padacchedaḥ anupasampannena sahaseyyā anupasampanna sahaseyyā

original: tāya. Tirattā uttariṃ anupasampannasahaseyyāyāti yojanā. Payogeti sayanatthāya seyyāpaññāpanakāyāvajjanādipubbapayoge.
analyzed: tāya tirattā uttarim an upasampanna saha seyyāya ati yojanā payoge ti sayana atthāya seyyā paññāpana kāya āvajjana ādi pubba payoge

original: 72. Payogeti yathāvuttalakkhaṇapayoge.
analyzed: payoge iti yathā vutta lakkhaṇa payoge

analyzed: anupasampanna iti samīpa atthe ca itam bhummam anupasampannassa santike bhūtam uttari manussa dhammam

analyzed: santike vadam vadanto ti yojanā payoge iti ārambhato paṭṭhāya pubba payoge dukkaṭam

analyzed: āgacchati dukkaṭam āpajjati ārocite pācitti siyā ati yojanā

original: 75. Payogeti “akappiyapathaviṃ khaṇissāmī”ti kudāla pariyesanādisabbapayogeti.

analyzed: musāvāda vagga vaṇṇanā paṭhamā

analyzed: pātento ti vikopento tassa ati bhūta gāmassa vikopane

analyzed: aññavādaka vihesakānam eka yoga niddiṭṭha ttā tattha vutta nayena iva vihesake ca ñātum sakkā iti tattha visum āpatti bhedaḥ na vuttaḥ

original: 78. Paranti aññaṃ saṅghena sammatasenāsanapaññāpakādikaṃ upasampannaṃ. Ujjhāpentoti
analyzed: param ti aññam saṅghena sammata senāsana paññāpaka ādikam upasampannam ujjhāpento ti

analyzed: tassa ayasam uppādetu kāma tāya bhikkhūhi avajānāpetum chandāya itthannāmaḥ idam nāma

analyzed: karoti itiādīni vatvā avaññāya olokāpentaḥ lāmakataḥ vā cintāpentaḥ payoge iti ujjhāpana tthāya

original: tassa avaṇṇabhaṇanādike pubbapayoge.
analyzed: tassa a vaṇṇa bhaṇana ādike pubba payoge
