original: 90. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā aññatra pārivattakā cīvaraṃ dento bhikkhu duve āpattiyo phuseti yojanā. Payogeti dānapayoge.
analyzed: aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā aññatra pārivattakā cīvaram dentaḥ bhikkhu duve āpattiyo phusa iti yojanā payoge iti dāna payoge

original: 93. “Nāvaṃ eka”nti padacchedo. Payogeti abhiruhaṇapayoge. Dukkaṭādayoti ādi-saddena abhiruḷhe pācittiyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: nāvam ekam ti padacchedaḥ payoge iti abhiruhaṇa payoge dukkaṭa ādayo ti ādi saddena abhiruḷhe pācittiyam saṅgaṇhāti

original: 94. “Duvidhaṃ āpatti”nti padacchedo.
analyzed: duvidham

original: 96. Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappento bhikkhu payogedukkaṭādayo dvepi āpattiyo phuseti yojanā.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyā saddhim rahaḥ nisajjam kappentaḥ bhikkhu dve api āpattiyaḥ phusa iti yojanā

original: Ovādavaggavaṇṇanā tatiyā.
analyzed: ovāda vagga vaṇṇanā tatiyā

original: 97. Taduttarinti tato bhuñjituṃ anuññātaekadivasato uttariṃ dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya. Anantarassa vaggassāti ovādavaggassa. Navamenāti bhikkhuniyā paripācitapiṇḍapātasikkhāpadena.
analyzed: tad uttarim ti tatas bhuñjitum anuññāta eka divasataḥ uttarim dutiya divasataḥ paṭṭhāya anantarassa vaggassa ati ovāda vaggassa navamena ati bhikkhuniyā paripācita piṇḍapāta sikkhāpadena

original: 99. Dvattipatteti dvattipattapūre. Taduttarinti dvattipattapūrato uttariṃ. Payogeti paṭiggahaṇapayoge.
analyzed: dvatti patta iti dvatti patta pūre tad uttarin ti dvatti patta pūrataḥ uttarim payoge iti paṭiggahaṇa payoge

original: 101. Abhihaṭṭhunti abhiharitvā.
analyzed: abhihaṭṭhunti abhiharitvā

original: 102. Tassāti abhiharantassa. Piṭaketi vinayapiṭake.
analyzed: tassa ati abhiharantassa piṭaka iti vinaya piṭake

original: 103. Dasamepīti ettha “dasame apī”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: dasame api iti ettha dasame api iti padacchedaḥ

original: Bhojanavaggavaṇṇanā catutthā.
analyzed: bhojana vagga vaṇṇanā catutthā

original: 104. Acelakādinoti ādi-saddena “paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā”ti vutte saṅgaṇhāti. Bhojanādikanti ādi-saddena khādanīyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Payogeti sahatthā dānapayoge.
analyzed: acelaka ādino ti ādi saddena paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā ati vutte saṅgaṇhāti bhojana ādikam ti ādi saddena khādanīyam saṅgaṇhāti payoge iti sahatthā dāna payoge

original: 105. Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā kiñci āmisaṃ. Payogeti uyyojanapayoge. Tasminti tasmiṃ bhikkhumhi. Uyyojite pācitti siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: dāpetvā vā a dāpetvā vā kiñci āmisam payoge iti uyyojana payoge tasmin ti tasmin bhikkhumhi uyyojite pācitti siyā ati yojanā

original: 109. Ummārātikkameti indakhīlātikkame.
analyzed: ummāra atikkame iti indakhīlā atikkame

original: 110. Taduttarinti tato paricchinnarattipariyantato vā paricchinnabhesajjapariyantato vā uttariṃ.
analyzed: tad uttarin ti tatas paricchinna ratti pariyantataḥ vā paricchinna bhesajja pariyantataḥ vā uttarin

original: 111. Uyyuttaṃ dassanatthāya gacchanto dve āpattiyo phuseti yojanā.
analyzed: uyyuttam dassana atthāya gacchantaḥ dve āpattiyaḥ phusa iti yojanā

original: Acelakavaggavaṇṇanā pañcamā.
analyzed: acelaka vagga vaṇṇanā pañcamā

original: 114. Mereyyanti merayaṃ. Niruttinayena a-kārassa e-kāro, ya-kārassa ca dvittaṃ. Meraya-saddapariyāyo vā mereyya-saddo. Munīti bhikkhu.
analyzed: mereyyanti merayam nirutti nayena akārassa ekāraḥ yakārassa ca dvittam meraya sadda pariyāyaḥ vā mereyya saddaḥ munī iti bhikkhu

original: 115. “Bhikkhu aṅgulipatodenā”ti padacchedo. Payogeti hāsāpanapayoge. Tassāti hāsāpentassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu aṅguli patodena ati padacchedaḥ payoge iti hāsāpana payoge tassa ati hāsāpentassa

original: 116. Gopphakā heṭṭhā udake dukkaṭaṃ. Gopphakato upari uparigopphakaṃ, udakaṃ, tasmiṃ, gopphakato adhikappamāṇe udaketi attho.
analyzed: gopphakāḥ heṭṭhā udake dukkaṭam gopphakataḥ upari upari gopphakam udakam tasmin gopphakataḥ adhikappamāṇe udaka iti atthaḥ

original: 117. Anādariyanti puggalānādariyaṃ, dhammānādariyaṃ vā. Payogeti anādariyavasena pavatte kāyapayoge vā vacīpayoge vā. Kate anādariye.
analyzed: anādariyanti puggala anādariyam dhamma anādariyam vā payoge iti anādariya vasena pavatte kāya payoge vā vacī payoge vā kate anādariye

original: 118. Payogeti bhiṃsāpanapayoge.
analyzed: payoga iti bhiṃsāpana payoge

original: 119. Jotinti aggiṃ. Samādahitvānāti jāletvā. “Visibbento”ti iminā phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: aggim jotinti aggim iminā phala upacārena kāraṇam

original: vuttaṃ. Visibbanakiriyā hi samādahanakiriyāya phalanti visibbanakiriyāvohārena samādahanakiriyāva.
analyzed: vuttam visibbana kiriyā hi samādahana kiriyāya phalanti visibbana kiriyā avohārena samādahana kiriyā ava

original: Tasmā visibbentoti ettha samādahantoti attho. Payogeti samādahanasamādahāpanapayoge.
analyzed: tasmā visibbento ti ettha samādahanto ti attho payoge ti samādahana samādahāpana payoge

original: Visīviteti vuttanayena samādahiteti attho.
analyzed: visīvitā iti vutta nayena samādahitā iti attho

original: 120. Payogeti cuṇṇamattikābhisaṅkharaṇādisabbapayoge. Itaranti pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: payoge iti cuṇṇa mattikā abhisaṅkharaṇa ādi sabba payoge itaran ti pācittiyam

original: 121. Tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānanti kaṃsanīlapattanīlakaddamasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ. Ekaṃ aññataraṃ anādiya adatvā. Cīvaranti navacīvaraṃ.
analyzed: tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānanti kaṃsa nīla patta nīla kaddama saṅkhātānam tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānam ekam aññataram an ādiya a datvā cīvaranti nava cīvaram

original: 122. Natthi etassa uddhāranti anuddhāro, taṃ anuddhāranti vattabbe gāthābandhavasena rassattaṃ, akatapaccuddhāranti attho.
analyzed: na atthi etassa uddhāra nti anuddhāraḥ tam anuddhāra nti vattabbe gāthābandha vasena a kata paccuddhāra nti attho

original: 123. Apanidhentoti apanetvā nidhento nikkhipento. Pattādikanti ādi-saddena cīvaranisīdanasūcigharakāyabandhanānaṃ
analyzed: apanidhento ti apanetvā nidhentaḥ nikkhipentaḥ patta ādikam ti ādi saddena cīvara nisīdana sūci ghara kāyabandhanānam

original: gahaṇaṃ. Payogeti apanidhānapayoge. Tasmiṃ pattādike pañcavidhe parikkhāre. Apanihite
analyzed: gahaṇam payoga iti apanidhāna payoge tasmin patta ādike pañcavidhe parikkhāre apanihite

original: sesā pācittiyāpatti siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: sesā pācittiya āpatti siyā ti yojanā

original: Surāpānavaggavaṇṇanā chaṭṭhā.
analyzed: surā pāna vagga vaṇṇanā chaṭṭhā

original: 124. Tapodhanoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlasaṅkhātaṃ tapodhanamassāti tapodhano, bhikkhu.
analyzed: tapodhanaḥ ti pātimokkha saṃvara sīla saṅkhātam tapodhanam assa ati tapodhanaḥ bhikkhu

original: 125. Tasmiṃ opāte.
analyzed: tasmin opāte

original: 126. Manussaviggaho manussasarīro. Tiracchānagato nāgo vā supaṇṇo vā. Tassa opātakhaṇakassa.
analyzed: manussa viggahaḥ manussa sarīro tiracchāna gataḥ nāgaḥ vā supaṇṇaḥ vā tassa opātakhaṇakassa

original: 127. Paṭubuddhināti sabbesu ñeyyadhammesu nipunañāṇena bhagavatā.
analyzed: paṭu buddhinā ati sabbesu ñeyya dhammesu nipuna ñāṇena bhagavatā

original: 128. Payogeti paribhogatthāya gahaṇādike payoge. Tassāti bhikkhussa.
analyzed: payoge ti paribhoga atthāya gahaṇa ādike payoge tassa ti bhikkhussa

original: 129. Ukkoṭentoti uccālento yathāṭhāne ṭhātuṃ adento. Payogeti ukkoṭanapayoge. Ukkoṭite pācittiyaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: ukkoṭentaḥ iti uccālentaḥ yathāṭhāne ṭhātum payoge iti ukkoṭana payoge ukkoṭite pācittiyam siyā iti yojanā

original: 130. Duṭṭhullaṃ vajjakanti saṅghādisesādike. Ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati iti dīpitanti yojanā.
analyzed: duṭṭhullam vajjakam ti saṅgha ādisesa ādike ekam pācittiyam āpattim āpajjati iti dīpitam iti yojanā

original: 131. Payogeti gaṇapariyesanādipayoge. Dukkaṭaṃ patto siyā dukkaṭāpattiṃ āpanno bhaveyyāti attho. Sesāti pācittiyāpatti upasampādite siyā. Gāthābandhavasena upasaggalopo.
analyzed: payoge iti gaṇa pariyesana ādi payoge dukkaṭam pattaḥ siyā dukkaṭa āpattim āpanno bhaveyya ati attho sesā ti pācittiya āpatti upasampādite siyā gāthābandha vasena upasagga lopo

original: 132-3. Jānaṃ theyyasatthena saha saṃvidhāya maggaṃ paṭipajjato ca tatheva mātugāmena
analyzed: jānam theyyasatthena saha saṃvidhāya maggam paṭipajjato ca tathā iva mātugāmena

original: saha saṃvidhāya maggaṃ paṭipajjato cāti yojanā. Payogeti saṃvidhāya gantuṃ paṭipucchādikaraṇapayoge.
analyzed: saha saṃvidhāya maggam paṭipajjataḥ ca ati yojanā payoge iti saṃvidhāya gantum paṭi puccha ādi karaṇa payoge

original: Paṭipanneti maggapaṭipanne. Anantaranti addhayojanagāmantarātikkamanānantaraṃ.
analyzed: paṭipanneti magga paṭipanne anantaram ti addha yojana gāmantara atikkamana anantaram

original: 134. Ñattiyā osāne dukkaṭaṃ phuseti yojanā.
analyzed: ñattiyāḥ osāne dukkaṭam phusa iti yojanā

original: 135. Akatānudhammenāti anudhammo vuccati āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā pāpikāya
analyzed: a kata anudhammena ati anudhammaḥ vuccati āpattiyāḥ adassane vā appaṭikamme vā pāpikāya

original: diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge vā dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena ukkhittakassa anulomavattaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhiyāḥ appaṭinissagge vā dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena ukkhittakassa anuloma vattam

original: disvā katvā osāraṇā, so osāraṇasaṅkhāto anudhammo yassa na kato, ayaṃ akatānudhammo
analyzed: disvā katvā osāraṇā so osāraṇa saṅkhāto anudhammo yassa na kataḥ ayam akata anudhammo

original: nāma, tādisena bhikkhunā saddhinti attho. Sambhuñjantoti āmisasambhogaṃ karonto bhikkhu.
analyzed: nāma tādisena bhikkhunā saddhinti attho sambhuñjanto ti āmisa sambhogam karontaḥ bhikkhu

original: Payogeti bhuñjituṃ āmisapaṭiggahaṇādipayoge. Bhutteti sambhutte, ubhayasambhoge,
analyzed: payoge iti bhuñjitum āmisa paṭiggahaṇa ādi payoge bhutta iti sambhutte ubhaya sambhoge

original: tadaññatare vā kateti attho.
analyzed: tad aññatare vā kata iti attho

original: 136. Upalāpentoti pattacīvarauddesaparipucchanādivasena saṅgaṇhanto. Payogeti upalāpanapayoge.
analyzed: upalāpento ti patta cīvara auddesa paripucchana ādi vasena saṅgaṇhantaḥ payoge iti upalāpana payoge

original: Sappāṇakavaggavaṇṇanā sattamā.
analyzed: sappāṇaka vagga vaṇṇanā sattamā

original: 137. Sahadhammikanti karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ, pañcahi sahadhammikehi sikkhitabbattā,
analyzed: sahadhammikanti karaṇa atthe upayoga vacanam pañcahi sahadhammikehi sikkhitabba ttā

original: tesaṃ vā santakattā “sahadhammika”nti laddhanāmena buddhapaññattena sikkhāpadena
analyzed: tesam vā santakattā sahadhammikanti laddha nāmena buddha paññattena sikkhāpadena

original: vuccamānassāti attho. Bhaṇatoti “bhikkhussā”ti iminā samānādhikaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: vuccamānassa ati atthaḥ bhaṇato ti bhikkhussa ati iminā samāna adhikaraṇam

original: 138. Vivaṇṇentoti “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehī”tiādinā garahanto. Payogeti “kiṃ imehī”tiādinā garahaṇavasena pavatte vacīpayoge. Vivaṇṇite garahite.
analyzed: vivaṇṇentaḥ ti kim panimehi khudda anukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi itiādinā garahantaḥ payoge ti kim imehi itiādinā garahaṇa vasena pavatte vacī payoge vivaṇṇite garahite

original: 139. Mohentoti “idāneva kho ahaṃ, āvuso, jānāmī”tiādinā attano ajānanattena āpannabhāvaṃ dīpetvā bhikkhuṃ mohento, vañcentoti attho. Moheti mohāropanakamme. Aropite kate.
analyzed: mohento iti idānā iva kho aham āvuso jānāmi iti ādinā attanaḥ a jānana ttena āpanna bhāvam dīpetvā bhikkhum mohento vañcento ti atthaḥ mohe ti moha āropana kamme aropite kate

original: 140. Bhikkhussa kupito pahāraṃ dento phuseti yojanā. Payogeti daṇḍādānādipayoge.
analyzed: bhikkhussa kupito pahāram dentaḥ phusa iti yojanā payoge iti daṇḍa ādāna ādi payoge

original: 141. Payogeti uggiraṇapayoge. Uggiriteti uccārite.
analyzed: payoga iti uggiraṇa payoge uccārite

original: 142. Amūlenevāti diṭṭhādimūlavirahiteneva. Yogeti okāsakārāpanādipayoge. Uddhaṃsiteti codite.
analyzed: amūlena iva ati diṭṭha ādi mūla virahitena iva yoga iti uddhaṃsitā iti ca udite

original: 143. Kukkuccaṃ janayantoti “ūnavīsativasso tvaṃ maññe upasampanno”tiādinā kukkuccaṃ upadahanto. Yogeti kukkuccuppādanapayoge. Uppāditeti kukkucce uppādite.
analyzed: kukkuccam janayantaḥ iti ūnavīsati vassaḥ tvam maññe upasampannaḥ iti ādinā kukkuccam upadahantaḥ yoge iti kukkucca uppādana payoge uppāditā iti kukkucce uppādite

original: 144. “Tiṭṭhanto upassuti”nti padacchedo. Sutiyā samīpaṃ upassuti, savanūpacāreti attho.
analyzed: tiṭṭhantaḥ upassutinti padacchedaḥ sutiyā samīpam upassuti savana upacārā iti attho

original: 145. Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānanti dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena katānaṃ apalokanādīnaṃ
analyzed: dhammikānam tu kammānam ti dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena katānam apalokana ādīnam

original: catunnaṃ kammānaṃ. Tato punāti chandadānato pacchā. Khīyanadhammanti attano adhippetabhāvavibhāvanamantanaṃ.
analyzed: catunnam kammānam tatas punāti chanda dānato pacchā attanaḥ adhippeta bhāva vibhāvana mantanam

original: Dve phuse dukkaṭādayoti khīyanadhammāpajjanapayoge dukkaṭaṃ, khīyanadhamme āpanne
analyzed: dve phuse dukkaṭa ādayaḥ ti khīyana dhamma āpajjana payoge dukkaṭam khīyana dhamme āpanne

original: pācittiyanti evaṃ dukkaṭādayo dve āpattiyo āpajjeyyāti attho.
analyzed: pācittiyam ti evam dukkaṭa ādayaḥ dve āpattiyaḥ āpajjeyya iti attho

original: 146. Saṅghe saṅghamajjhe. Vinicchayeti vatthuto otiṇṇavinicchaye. Niṭṭhaṃ agateti vatthumhi avinicchite, ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kammavācāya vā apariyositāya.
analyzed: saṅghe saṅgha majjhe vinicchaye iti vatthutaḥ otiṇṇa vinicchaye niṭṭham a gata iti vatthumhi a vinicchite ñattim ṭhapetvā kamma vācāya vā a pariyositāya

original: 148. Samaggena saṅghenāti samānasaṃvāsakena samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitena saṅghena.
analyzed: samaggena saṅghena ati samāna saṃvāsakena samāna sīmāyam ṭhitena saṅghena

original: Sahadhammikavaggavaṇṇanā aṭṭhamā.
analyzed: sahadhammika vagga vaṇṇanā aṭṭhamā

original: 150. Avidito hutvāti rañño aviditāgamano hutvā.
analyzed: a viditaḥ hutvā ati raññaḥ a vidita āgamanaḥ hutvā

original: 152. Ratananti muttādidasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ. Payogeti ratanaggahaṇapayoge.
analyzed: ratanam ti mutta ādi dasavidham ratanam payoge iti ratana ggahaṇa payoge

original: 153. Vikāleti majjhantikātikkamato paṭṭhāya aruṇe.
analyzed: vikāleti majjhantikā atikkamataḥ paṭṭhāya aruṇe

original: 155. Aṭṭhidantavisāṇābhinibbattanti aṭṭhidantavisāṇamayaṃ. Payogeti kārāpanapayoge.
analyzed: aṭṭhi danta visāṇa abhinibbattanti aṭṭhi danta visāṇa mayam payoge iti kārāpana payoge

original: 156. Tasmiṃ mañcādimhi kārāpite sesā pācittiyāpatti siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: tasmin mañca ādimhi kārāpite sesā pācittiya āpatti siyā iti yojanā

original: Ratanavaggavaṇṇanā navamā.
analyzed: ratana vagga vaṇṇanā navamā

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Pācittiyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pācittiya kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 159. Catūsu pāṭidesanīyesupi avisesena ādiccabandhunā buddhena dvidhā āpatti niddiṭṭhāti yojanā.
analyzed: catūsu pāṭidesanīyesu pi avisesena ādiccabandhunā buddhena dvidhā āpatti niddiṭṭhā ati yojanā

original: 160. Sabbatthāti sabbesu catūsu.
analyzed: sabbattha ati sabbesu catūsu

original: Pāṭidesanīyakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: pāṭidesanīya kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 161. Sekhiyakathā uttānatthāyeva.
analyzed: sekhiya kathā uttāna tthāya eva

original: Sekhiyakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: sekhiya kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 162. Parivāre paṭhamaṃ dassitasoḷasavārappabhede mahāvibhaṅge “paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ
analyzed: parivāre paṭhamam dassita soḷasa vāra ppabhede mahā vibhaṅge paṭhamam pārājikam

original: kattha paññatta”ntiādippabhedo katthapaññattivāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto
analyzed: kattha methunam dhammam paṭisevantaḥ

original: kati āpattiyo āpajjatī”tiādippabhedo katāpattivāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa
analyzed: kati āpattiyaḥ āpajjati iti ādi ppabhedaḥ kata āpatti vāraḥ methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa

original: āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajantī”tiādippabhedo vipattivāro, “methunaṃ
analyzed: āpattiyaḥ catunnam vipattīnam kati vipattiyaḥ bhajanti iti ādi ppabhedaḥ vipatti vāraḥ methunam

original: dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi
analyzed: dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti khandhānam katihi āpatti khandhehi

original: saṅgahitā”tiādippabhedo saṅgahavāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo channaṃ
analyzed: saṅgahita ati ādi ppabhedaḥ saṅgaha vāraḥ methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ channam

original: āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhahantī”tiādippabhedo samuṭṭhānavāro,
analyzed: āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhahanti iti ādi ppabhedaḥ samuṭṭhāna vāro

original: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇa”ntiādippabhedo
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ catunnam adhikaraṇānam katamam adhikaraṇa nti ādi ppabhedaḥ

original: adhikaraṇavāro, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi
analyzed: adhikaraṇa vāraḥ methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ sattannam samathānam katihi

original: samathehi sammantī”tiādippabhedo samathavāro, tadanantaro imehi sattahi vārehi misso
analyzed: samathehi sammantī iti ādi ppabhedo samatha vāraḥ tad anantaraḥ imehi sattahi vārehi missaḥ

original: aṭṭhamo samuccayavāroti imesu aṭṭhasu vāresu ādibhūte katthapaññattināmadheyye appanāvāre
analyzed: aṭṭhamo samuccaya vāro ti imesu aṭṭhasu vāresu ādi bhūte kattha paññatti nāmadheyye appanā vāre

original: saṅgahetabbānaṃ nidānādisattarasalakkhaṇānaṃ ubhayavibhaṅgasādhāraṇato upari vakkhamānattā
analyzed: saṅgahetabbānam nidāna ādi satta rasa lakkhaṇānam ubhaya vibhaṅga sādhāraṇataḥ upari vakkhamāna ttā

original: taṃ vāraṃ ṭhapetvā tadanantaraṃ asādhāraṇaṃ katāpattivāraṃ sekhiyāvasānaṃ pāḷikkamānurūpaṃ
analyzed: tam vāram ṭhapetvā tad anantaram asādhāraṇam kata āpatti vāram sekhiya avasānam pāḷikkama anurūpam

original: dassetvā tadanantarā vipattivārādayo cha vārā ubhayavibhaṅgasādhāraṇato vakkhamānāti
analyzed: dassetvā tad anantarāḥ vipatti vāra ādayaḥ cha vārāḥ ubhaya vibhaṅga sādhāraṇataḥ vakkhamānā ti

original: katvā tepi ṭhapetvā ime paccayasaddena ayojetvā dassitā aṭṭheva vārā, puna “methunaṃ
analyzed: katvā te pi ṭhapetvā ime paccaya saddena a yojetvā dassitāḥ aṭṭhā iva vārā puna methunam

original: dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”ntiādinā paccaya-saddaṃ yojetvā
analyzed: dhammam paṭisevana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññatta nti ādinā paccaya saddam yojetvā

original: dassitā apare aṭṭha vārā yojitāti tatthāpi dutiyaṃ katāpattipaccayavāraṃ iminā katāpattivārena
analyzed: dassitāḥ apare aṭṭha vārāḥ yojitā ati tattha api dutiyam kata āpatti paccaya vāram iminā kata āpatti vārena

original: ekaparicchedaṃ katvā dassetumāha “paññattā”tiādi. Paṭisevanapaccayāti paṭisevanahetunā.
analyzed: eka paricchedam katvā dassetum āha paññattā tiādi paṭisevana paccayā ti paṭisevana hetunā

original: 163. Allokāsappavesaneti jīvamānasarīre tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ magge allokāsappavesane.
analyzed: al lokāsa ppavesane iti jīvamāna sarīre tiṇṇam maggānam aññatarasmim magge al lokāsa ppavesane

original: Mate akkhāyite vā pi-saddena yebhuyyaakkhāyite pavesane pavesananimittaṃ methunaṃ
analyzed: mate akkhāyite vā pisaddena yebhuyya akkhāyite pavesane pavesana nimittam methunam

original: dhammaṃ paṭisevanto bhikkhu pārājikaṃ phuseti sambandho.
analyzed: dhammam paṭisevantaḥ bhikkhu pārājikam phusa iti sambandho

original: 164. Tathā yebhuyyakkhāyite, upaḍḍhakkhāyite ca methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto bhikkhu
analyzed: tathā yebhuyyakkhāyite upaḍḍhakkhāyite ca methunam dhammam paṭisevantaḥ bhikkhu

original: thullaccayaṃ phuseti yojanā. Vaṭṭakate mukhe dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti sambandho. Jatumaṭṭhaketi
analyzed: thullaccayam phusa iti yojanā mukhe dukkaṭam vuttan ti sambandhaḥ jatumaṭṭhaka iti

original: bhikkhuniyā jatumaṭṭhake dinne pācitti vuttāti sambandho.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyā jatumaṭṭhake dinne pācitti vuttā iti sambandhaḥ

original: 166. Avassutassāti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena tintassa. Posassāti gahaṇakiriyāsambandhe sāmivacanaṃ.
analyzed: avassutassa ati kāya saṃsagga rāgena tintassa posassa ati gahaṇa kiriyā sambandhe sāmi vacanam

original: Bhikkhuniyāti attasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ. “Attano”ti seso. Avassutena posena attano
analyzed: bhikkhuniyā iti atta sambandhe sāmi vacanam attano ti sesaḥ avassutena posena attano

original: adhakkhakādigahaṇaṃ sādiyantiyā tathā avassutāya bhikkhuniyā pārājikanti yojanā.
analyzed: adhakkhaka ādi gahaṇam sādiyantiyā tathā avassutāya bhikkhuniyā pārājikanti yojanā

original: 167. Kāyenāti attano kāyena. Kāyanti mātugāmassa kāyaṃ. Phusatoti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena phusato. Kāyena kāyabaddhanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: kāyena ati attano kāyena kāyanti mātu gāmassa kāyam phusato ti kāya saṃsagga rāgena phusato kāyena kāya baddhanti ettha api esa eva nayo

original: 168. Kāyena paṭibaddhenāti attano kāyapaṭibaddhena. Paṭibaddhanti itthiyā kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ phusantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Tassa bhikkhussa.
analyzed: kāyena paṭibaddhena ati attano kāya paṭibaddhena paṭibaddham ti itthiyā kāya paṭibaddham phusantassa dukkaṭam tassa bhikkhussa

original: “Mahāvibhaṅgasaṅgaho niṭṭhito”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu soḷasavārasaṅgahe mahāvibhaṅge
analyzed: mahāvibhaṅga saṅgahaḥ niṭṭhito ti kasmā vuttam nanu soḷasa vāra saṅgahe mahāvibhaṅge

original: katāpattivāroyevettha vutto, na itare vārāti? Saccaṃ, avayave pana samudāyopacārena
analyzed: kata āpatti vāraḥ yā iva ittha vuttaḥ na itare vārā ti saccam avayave pana samudāya upacārena

original: vuttaṃ. Sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇānaṃ mahāvibhaṅge gatānaṃ sabbāpattipabhedānaṃ dassanopacārabhūto
analyzed: vuttam sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇānam mahāvibhaṅge gatānam sabba āpatti pabhedānam dassana upacāra bhūtaḥ

original: katāpattivāro dassitoti taṃdassanena appadhānā itarepi vārā upacārato dassitā hontīti
analyzed: kata āpatti vāraḥ dassito ti tad dassanena appadhānāḥ itare pi vārāḥ upacārataḥ dassitāḥ honti iti

original: ca tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca tathā vuttan ti veditabbam

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Mahāvibhaṅgasaṅgahavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: mahā vibhaṅga saṅgaha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Bhikkhunivibhaṅgo
analyzed: bhikkhuni vibhaṅgaḥ

original: 170. Vinayassa vinicchaye bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāyāti bhikkhunīnaṃ pāṭavassāpi tadadhīnattā
analyzed: vinayassa vinicchaye bhikkhūnam pāṭava atthāya ati bhikkhunīnam pāṭavassa api tad adhīna ttā

original: padhānadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Atha vā dassanaliṅgantarasādhāraṇatte icchite pulliṅgena,
analyzed: padhāna dassana vasena vuttam atha vā dassana liṅga antara sādhāraṇa tte icchite pulliṅgena

original: napuṃsakaliṅgena vā niddeso saddasatthānuyogatoti “bhikkhūna”nti pulliṅgena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: napuṃsaka liṅgena vā niddesaḥ sadda sattha anuyogato ti bhikkhūnam ti pulliṅgena vuttam

original: 171. Nandantī sādiyantī.
analyzed: nandantī sā adiyantī

original: 172. Tisso āpattiyo phuseti yojanā. Jāṇussa uddhaṃ, akkhakassa adho gahaṇaṃ sādiyantiyā tassā pārājikanti yojanā.
analyzed: tissaḥ āpattiyaḥ phusā iti yojanā jāṇussa uddham akkhakassa adhas gahaṇam sādiyantiyā tassā pārājikam ti yojanā

original: 173. Kāyapaṭibaddhe vā gahaṇaṃ sādiyantiyā dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: kāya paṭibaddhe vā gahaṇam sādiyantiyā dukkaṭam

original: 174. Vajjanti aññissā bhikkhuniyā pārājikāpattiṃ.
analyzed: vajjanti aññissā bhikkhuniyā pārājika āpattim

original: 176. Taṃ laddhinti ukkhittassa yaṃ laddhiṃ attano rocesi, taṃ laddhiṃ na nissajjantīti yojanā.
analyzed: tam laddhim ti ukkhittassa yam laddhim attanaḥ rocesi tam laddhim na nissajjanti iti yojanā

original: 178. “Idha āgacchā”ti padacchedo. “Vuttā āgacchatī”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: idha āgacchāti padacchedaḥ vuttā āgacchati iti padacchedaḥ

original: 179. Hatthapāsappavesaneti hatthapāsūpagamane. “Hatthagatappavesane”ti vā pāṭho, soyeva attho.
analyzed: hattha pāsa pavesanā iti hattha pāsu upagamane hattha gata ppavesanā iti vā pāṭhaḥ attho

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā bhikkhunivibhaṅge
analyzed: iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā bhikkhuni vibhaṅge

original: Pārājikakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pārājika kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 180. Ekassāti attano attano aṭṭakārassa vā. Ārocaneti vattabbassa vohārikānaṃ nivedane.
analyzed: ekassa ati attanaḥ attanaḥ aṭṭa kārassa vā ārocane iti vattabbassa vohārikānam nivedane

original: 181. Dutiyārocaneti dutiyassa, dutiyaṃ evaṃ ārocane.
analyzed: dutiya ārocanā iti dutiyassa dutiyam evam ārocane

original: 182. Dvīhīti dvīhi kammavācāhi. Kammavācosāneti kammavācāosāne.
analyzed: dvīhi iti dvīhi kamma vācāhi kamma vācā usāne iti kamma vācā osāne

original: 183. Parikkhepe atikkanteti attano gāmato gantvā itaraṃ gāmaṃ pavisantiyā paṭhamena
analyzed: parikkhepe atikkantā iti attanaḥ gāmataḥ gantvā itaram gāmam pavisantiyā paṭhamena

original: pādena tassa gāmassa parikkhepe atikkante, paṭhamapāde parikkhepaṃ atikkametvā antogāmasaṅkhepaṃ gateti attho.
analyzed: pādena tassa gāmassa parikkhepe atikkante paṭhama pāde parikkhepam atikkametvā antogāma saṅkhepam gatā iti atthaḥ

original: 184. Dutiyenāti gāmaparikkhepato bahi ṭhitena dutiyapādena. Atikkanteti tasmiṃ gāmaparikkhepe atikkante, tasmiṃ pāde antogāmaṃ pavesiteti attho. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
analyzed: dutiyena ati gāma parikkhepataḥ bahi ṭhitena dutiya pādena atikkantā iti tasmin gāma parikkhepe atikkante tasmin pāde antogāmam pavesitā iti attho sesam uttānattham eva

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā bhikkhunivibhaṅge
analyzed: iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā bhikkhuni vibhaṅge

original: Saṅghādisesakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: saṅgha ādi sesa kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 193. Iha bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṃ karontī hoti, sā ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃyeva phuseti yojanā.
analyzed: iha bhikkhunī patta sannicayam karontī hoti sā ekam nissaggiyam pācittiyam yeva phusa iti yojanā

original: 194. Akālacīvaraṃ kālacīvaraṃ katvā bhājāpentiyāti yojanā. Payogeti bhājanapayoge.
analyzed: akāla cīvaram kāla cīvaram katvā yojanā payogeti bhājana payoge

original: 195. Chinneti acchinne.
analyzed: chinna iti acchinne

original: 196. Tato paranti tato paṭhamato aññaṃ.
analyzed: tatas paranti tatas paṭhamatas aññam

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā bhikkhunivibhaṅge
analyzed: iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā bhikkhuni vibhaṅge

original: Nissaggiyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nissaggiya kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 199. Lasuṇaṃ khādati ce, dve āpattiyo phuṭāti yojanā.
analyzed: laśuṇam khādati ce dve yojanā

original: 200. Payogeti saṃhārāpanapayoge. Saṃhaṭeti attanā saṃhaṭe, parena saṃharāpite ca āpatti pācitti hoti.
analyzed: payoge iti saṃhāra āpana payoge saṃhaṭa iti attanā saṃhaṭe parena saṃharāpite ca āpatti pācitti hoti

original: 201. Kateti talaghāte kate.
analyzed: kata iti talaghāte kate

original: 202. Jatunā maṭṭhakanti jatunā kataṃ maṭṭhadaṇḍakaṃ. “Dukkaṭaṃ ādinne”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: jatunā maṭṭhakam ti jatunā katam maṭṭha daṇḍakam dukkaṭam ādinnā iti padacchedaḥ

original: 204. Bhuñjamānassa bhikkhussa hatthapāseti yojanā. Hitvā hatthapāsaṃ.
analyzed: bhuñjamānassa bhikkhussa hattha pāse iti yojanā hitvā hattha pāsam

original: 205. Viññāpetvāti antamaso mātarampi yācitvā. Ajjhohāre pācittiṃ dīpayeti yojanā.
analyzed: viññāpetvā ti antamasaḥ mātaram pi yācitvā ajjhohāre pācittim dīpaya iti yojanā

original: 206. Uccārādinti ādi-saddena vighāsasaṅkāramuttānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: uccāra ādin ti ādi saddena vighāsa saṅkāram uttānam gahaṇam

original: Lasuṇavaggavaṇṇanā paṭhamā.
analyzed: lasuṇa vagga vaṇṇanā paṭhamā

original: 209. Idha imasmiṃ rattandhakāravagge. Paṭhame, dutiye, tatiye, catutthepi vinicchayo lasuṇavaggassa chaṭṭhena sikkhāpadena tulyo sadisoti yojanā.
analyzed: idha imasmin ratta ndhakāra vagge paṭhame dutiye tatiye catutthe api vinicchayaḥ lasuṇa vaggassa chaṭṭhena sikkhāpadena tulyaḥ sadisaḥ iti yojanā

original: 210. Āsaneti pallaṅke tassokāsabhūte. Sāmike anāpucchāti tasmiṃ kule yaṃ kiñci viññumanussaṃ anāpucchā.
analyzed: āsane iti pallaṅke tassa ukāsa bhūte sāmike tasmin kule yam kiñci viññu manussam an āpucchā

original: 211. Anovassanti bhittiyā bahi nibbakosabbhantaraṃ. Dutiyātikkameti dutiyena pādena nibbakosassa udakapātaṭṭhānātikkame.
analyzed: anovassanti bhittiyāḥ bahi nibba kosa abbhantaram dutiya atikkame ti dutiyena pādena nibba kosassa udakapāta ṭṭhāna atikkame

original: 212. Nisīditeti nisinne.
analyzed: nisīditā iti nisinne

original: 213. Payogeti ujjhāpanapayoge.
analyzed: payoge iti ujjhāpana payoge

original: 214. Nirayādinā attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā abhisappentī sapathaṃ karontī dve phuseti yojanā. Abhisappiteti abhisapite.
analyzed: niraya ādinā attānam vā param vā abhisappentī sa patham karontī dve phusā iti yojanā abhisappitā iti abhisapite

original: 215. Vadhitvāti hatthādīhi paharitvā. “Karoti eka”nti padacchedo.
analyzed: vadhitvā iti hattha ādīhi paharitvā karoti ekam ti padacchedaḥ

original: Rattandhakāravaggavaṇṇanā dutiyā.
analyzed: ratta ndhakāra vagga vaṇṇanā dutiyā

original: 216. Naggāti anivatthā vā apārutā vā. Payogeti cuṇṇamattikāabhisaṅkharaṇādipayoge.
analyzed: naggā ati anivatthā vā apārutā vā payoge iti cuṇṇa mattikā abhisaṅkharaṇa ādi payoge

original: 217. Pamāṇātikkantanti “dīghasocatasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo”ti vuttapamāṇamatikkantaṃ. Payogeti kārāpanapayoge.
analyzed: pamāṇa atikkantam ti vidatthiyaḥ sugata vidatthiyā tiriyam dve vidatthiyaḥ ti vutta pamāṇam atikkantam payoge iti kārāpana payoge

original: 218. Visibbetvāti dussibbitaṃ puna sibbanatthāya visibbetvā.
analyzed: visibbetvā ati dussibbitam puna sibbana tthāya visibbetvā

original: 219. Pañca ahāni pañcāhaṃ, pañcāhameva pañcāhikaṃ. Saṅghāṭīnaṃ cāro saṅghāṭicāro,
analyzed: pañca ahāni pañca aham pañca aham eva pañcāhikam saṅghāṭīnam cāraḥ saṅghāṭi cāraḥ

original: paribhogavasena vā otāpanavasena vā saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena “saṅghāṭī”ti laddhanāmānaṃ “ticīvaraṃ,
analyzed: paribhoga vasena vā otāpana vasena vā saṅghaṭita ṭṭhena saṅghāṭī iti laddha nāmānam ti cīvaram

original: udakasāṭikā, saṃkaccikā”ti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ parivattanaṃ. Atikkameti bhikkhunī
analyzed: udaka sāṭikā saṃkaccikā ati imesam pañcannam cīvarānam parivattanam atikkameti bhikkhunī

original: atikkameyya. Assā pana ekāva pācitti paridīpitāti yojanā.
analyzed: atikkameyya assā pana ekā ava pācitti paridīpitā ati yojanā

original: 220. Saṅkamanīyanti saṅkametabbaṃ. Aññissā santakaṃ anāpucchā gahitaṃ puna dātabbaṃ pañcannaṃ aññataraṃ.
analyzed: saṅkamanīyanti saṅkametabbam aññissā santakam anāpucchā gahitam puna dātabbam pañcannam aññataram

original: 221. Gaṇacīvaralābhassāti bhikkhunisaṅghena labhitabbacīvarassa. Antarāyaṃ karotīti yathā te dātukāmā na denti, evaṃ parakkamati.
analyzed: gaṇa cīvara lābhassa ati bhikkhuni saṅghena labhitabba cīvarassa antarāyam karoti iti yathā te dātu kāmāḥ na denti evam parakkamati

original: 222. Dhammikanti samaggena saṅghena sannipatitvā kariyamānaṃ. Paṭibāhantīti paṭisedhentī. Paṭibāhite paṭisedhite.
analyzed: dhammikam ti samaggena saṅghena sannipatitvā kariyamānam paṭibāhanti iti paṭisedhentī paṭibāhite paṭisedhite

original: 223. Agārikādinoti ādi-saddena “paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā”ti vutte saṅgaṇhāti. Samaṇacīvaranti kappakataṃ nivāsanapārupanupagaṃ. Payogeti dānapayoge.
analyzed: agārika ādinaḥ ti ādi saddena paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā ati vutte saṅgaṇhāti samaṇa cīvaram ti kappa katam nivāsana pārupana upagam payoge iti dāna payoge

original: 224. Cīvare dubbalāsāyāti dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya “sace sakkoma, dassāmā”ti ettakamattaṃ
analyzed: cīvare dubbalāsāya ati dubbala cīvara paccāsāya sace sakkoma dassāma ati ettakamattam

original: sutvā uppāditāya āsāyāti attho. Kālanti cīvarakālasamayaṃ. Samatikkameti bhikkhunīhi
analyzed: sutvā uppāditāya āsāya ati attho kālanti cīvara kāla samayam samatikkameti bhikkhunīhi

original: kālacīvare bhājiyamāne “āgametha, ayye, atthi saṅghassa cīvarapaccāsā”ti vatvā taṃ
analyzed: kāla cīvare bhājiyamāne āgametha ayye atthi saṅghassa cīvara paccāsā ati vatvā taṃ

original: cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ samatikkameyya.
analyzed: cīvara vibhaṅgam samatikkameyya

original: 225. Dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāranti samaggena saṅghena kariyamānaṃ kathinassa antarubbhāraṃ. Paṭibāhantiyāti nivārentiyā.
analyzed: dhammikam kathin uddhāram ti samaggena saṅghena kariyamānam kathinassa antar ubbhāram paṭibāhantiyā ati nivārentiyā

original: Nhānavaggavaṇṇanā tatiyā.
analyzed: nhāna vagga vaṇṇanā tatiyā

original: 226. Tuvaṭṭeyyunti nipajjeyyuṃ. Itaraṃ pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: nipajjeyyum itaram pācittiyam

original: 227. Payogeti bhikkhuniyā aphāsukakaraṇapayoge kariyamāne.
analyzed: payoge ti bhikkhuniyāḥ a phāsuka karaṇa payoge kariyamāne

original: 228. Dukkhitanti gilānaṃ. Nupaṭṭhāpentiyā vāpīti tassā upaṭṭhānaṃ parehi akārāpentiyā, sayaṃ vā akarontiyā.
analyzed: dukkhitanti gilānam nu upaṭṭhāpentiyā vāpī iti tassāḥ upaṭṭhānam parehi a kārāpentiyā sayam vā a karontiyā

original: 229. Upassayaṃ datvāti kavāṭabandhaṃ attano puggalikavihāraṃ datvā. Kaḍḍhiteti nikkaḍḍhite.
analyzed: upassayam da tvā ati kavāṭa bandham attanaḥ puggalika vihāram da tvā kaḍḍhiteti nikkaḍḍhite

original: 230. Saṃsaṭṭhāti gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā saṃsaṭṭhavihārī bhikkhunī saṅghena
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭhāti gahapatinā vā gahapati puttena vā saṃsaṭṭha vihārī bhikkhunī saṅghena

original: saṃsaṭṭhavihārato nivattiyamānā. Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuseti samanubhāsanakammañattiyā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjeyya.
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭha vihārataḥ nivattiyamānā ñattiyā dukkaṭam phuseti samanubhāsana kamma ñattiyā dukkaṭam āpajjeyya

original: 231. Antoraṭṭheti yassa vijite viharati, tassa raṭṭhe. Paṭipannāyāti cārikaṃ kappentiyā. Sesakanti pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: antoraṭṭheti yassa vijite viharati tassa raṭṭhe paṭipannāya ati cārikam kappentiyā sesakam ti pācittiyam

original: Tuvaṭṭavaggavaṇṇanā catutthā.
analyzed: tuvaṭṭa vagga vaṇṇanā catutthā

original: 233. Rājāgārādikanti ādi-saddena cittāgārādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: rāja āgāra ādikanti ādi saddena cittāgāra ādīnam gahaṇam

original: 235. Payogeti kappāsavicāraṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbapayoge. Ujjavujjavaneti yattakaṃ hatthena añchitaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite.
analyzed: payoge iti kappāsa vicāraṇam ādim katvā sabba payoge ujjavujjavana iti yattakam hatthena añchitam hoti tasmin takkamhi veṭhite

original: 237. Payogeti agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyādīnaṃ dānapayoge.
analyzed: payoge ti agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīya ādīnam dāna payoge

original: 238. “Samaṃ āpattipabhedato”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: samam padacchedaḥ

original: 239. Tiracchānagataṃ vijjanti yaṃ kiñci bāhirakaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ parūpaghātakaraṃ
analyzed: tiracchāna gatam vijjanti yam kiñci bāhirakam anattha saṃhitam para upaghāta karam

original: hatthisikkhādisippaṃ. Paṭhantiyāti sikkhantiyā. Payogeti durupasaṅkamanādipayoge.
analyzed: hatthi sikkhā ādi sippam paṭhantiyā ati sikkhantiyā payoge iti durupasaṅkamana ādi payoge

original: Pade padeti padādivasena pariyāpuṇantiyā pade pade akkharapadānaṃ vasena.
analyzed: pade pada iti pada ādi vasena pariyāpuṇantiyā pade pade akkhara padānam vasena

original: 240. Navame “pariyāpuṇātī”ti padaṃ, dasame “vācetī”ti padanti evaṃ padamattameva ubhinnaṃ visesakaṃ bhedakaṃ.
analyzed: navame pariyāpuṇāti iti padam dasame vācā iti iti padanti evam pada mattam eva ubhinnam visesakam bhedakam

original: Cittāgāravaggavaṇṇanā pañcamā.
analyzed: cittāgāra vagga vaṇṇanā pañcamā

original: 241. Tamārāmanti yattha bhikkhū rukkhamūlepi vasanti, taṃ sabhikkhukaṃ padesaṃ.
analyzed: tam ārāmanti yattha bhikkhū rukkha mūle pi vasanti tam sa bhikkhukam padesam

original: 243. Akkosatīti dasannaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena sammukhā vā parammukhā vā akkosati. Paribhāsatīti bhayadassanena tajjeti. “Pācitti akkosite”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: akkosati iti dasannam akkosa vatthūnam aññatarena sammukhā vā parammukhā vā akkosati paribhāsati iti bhaya dassanena tajjā iti pācitti akkositā iti padacchedo

original: 244. Caṇḍikabhāvenāti kodhena. Gaṇanti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ. Paribhāsatīti “bālā etā”tiādīhi vacanehi akkosati. Payogeti paribhāsanapayoge. Paribhaṭṭheti akkosite. Itaraṃ pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: caṇḍika bhāvena ati kodhena gaṇanti bhikkhuni saṅgham paribhāsati iti bālā etā ati ādīhi vacanehi akkosati payoge iti paribhāsana payoge paribhaṭṭhā iti akkosite itaram pācittiyam

original: 245. Nimantitāti gaṇabhojane vuttanayena nimantitā. Pavāritāti pavāraṇasikkhāpade
analyzed: nimantitā ati gaṇa bhojane vutta nayena nimantitā pavāritā ati pavāraṇa sikkhāpade

original: vuttanayena vāritā. Khādanaṃ bhojanampi vāti yāgupūvakhajjakaṃ, yāvakālikaṃ mūlakhādanīyādikhādanīyaṃ,
analyzed: vutta nayena vāritā khādanam bhojanam pi vāti yāgu pūvakhajjakam yāva kālikam mūlakhādanīya ādi khādanīyam

original: odanādibhojanampi vā yā bhikkhunī bhuñjantī hoti, sā pana dveyeva āpattiyo phuseti yojanā.
analyzed: odana ādi bhojanam pi vā yā bhikkhunī bhuñjantī hoti sā pana dveyā iva āpattiyaḥ phusa iti yojanā

original: 247. Maccharāyantīti maccharaṃ karontī, attano paccayadāyakakulassa aññehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ
analyzed: maccharāyantī iti maccharam karontī attano paccaya dāyaka kulassa aññehi sādhāraṇa bhāvam

original: asahantīti attho. Payogeti tadanurūpe kāyavacīpayoge. Macchariteti maccharavasena
analyzed: asahanti iti tad anurūpe kāya vacī payoge mad śaritā iti mad śara vasena

original: katapayoge nipphanne.
analyzed: kata payoge nipphanne

original: 248. Abhikkhuke panāvāseti yato bhikkhunupassayato addhayojanabbhantare ovādadāyakā
analyzed: abhikkhuke pana āvāse ti yatas addha yojana abbhantare ovāda dāyakā

original: bhikkhū na vasanti, maggo vā akhemo hoti, na sakkā anantarāyena gantuṃ, evarūpe āvāse.
analyzed: bhikkhū na vasanti maggaḥ vā a khemaḥ hoti na sakkā anantarāyena gantum evarūpe āvāse

original: Pubbakiccesūti “vassaṃ vasissāmī”ti senāsanapaññāpanapānīyaupaṭṭhāpanādipubbakicce
analyzed: pubba kiccesu uti vassam vasissāmi iti senāsana paññāpana pānīya upaṭṭhāpana ādi pubba kicce

original: pana kariyamāne dukkaṭaṃ bhaveti yojanā.
analyzed: pana kariyamāne dukkaṭam bhava iti yojanā

original: 249. Vassaṃvutthāti purimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ vutthā. Ubhatosaṅgheti bhikkhunisaṅghe, bhikkhusaṅghe ca. Tīhipi ṭhānehīti “diṭṭhena vā”tiādinā vuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi.
analyzed: vassaṃvuttha ati purimam vā pacchimam vā temāsam vuttha ubhato saṅgheti bhikkhuni saṅghe bhikkhu saṅghe ca tīhi pi ṭhānehi iti diṭṭhena vā ati ādinā vuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi

original: 250. Ovādatthāyāti garudhammovādanatthāya. Saṃvāsatthāyāti uposathapucchanatthāya ceva pavāraṇatthāya ca. Na gacchatīti bhikkhuṃ na upagacchati.
analyzed: ovāda tthāya ati garu dhamma uvādana tthāya saṃvāsa tthāya ati uposatha pucchana tthāya ca iva pavāraṇa tthāya ca na gacchati iti bhikkhum na upagacchati

original: 251. Ovādampi na yācantīti uposathādivasena ovādūpasaṅkamanaṃ bhikkhuṃ na yācantī
analyzed: ovādam pi na yācantī iti uposatha ādi vasena ovāda upasaṅkamanam bhikkhum na yācantī

original: na pucchantī. Uposathanti uposathadivasato purimadivase terasiyaṃ vā cātuddasiyaṃ
analyzed: na pucchantī uposatha divasataḥ purima divase terasiyam vā cātuddasiyam

original: vā uposathaṃ na pucchantī.
analyzed: vai uposatham na pucchantī

original: 252. Apucchitvāva saṅghaṃ vāti saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā anapaloketvāva. “Bhedāpetī”ti
analyzed: a pucchitvā ava saṅgham vā ati saṅgham vā gaṇam vā an apaloketvā ava bhedāpeti iti

original: idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ “phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya
analyzed: idam nidassana mattam phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya

original: vā”ti imesampi kiriyāvikappānaṃ saṅgahetabbattā. Pasākhajanti nābhiyā heṭṭhā, jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ
analyzed: vā ti imesam pi kiriyā vikappānam saṅgahetabba ttā pasākhajanti nābhiyā heṭṭhā jāṇu maṇḍalānam

original: upari padese jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā rudhitaṃ vā. Payogeti bhedāpanādipayoge.
analyzed: upari jātam gaṇḍam vā rudhitam vā

original: Ārāmavaggavaṇṇanā chaṭṭhā.
analyzed: ārāma vagga vaṇṇanā chaṭṭhā

original: 253. Gabbhininti āpannasattaṃ sikkhamānaṃ. Vuṭṭhāpentīti upajjhāyā hutvā upasampādentī. Payogeti gaṇapariyesanādipayoge. Vuṭṭhāpiteti upasampādite, kammavācāpariyosāneti attho.
analyzed: gabbhinim ti āpannasattam sikkhamānam vuṭṭhāpenti iti upajjhāyā hutvā upasampādentī payoge iti gaṇa pariyesana ādi payoge vuṭṭhāpitā iti upasampādite kamma vācā pariyosānā iti attho

original: 255. Sahajīvininti saddhivihāriniṃ. Nānuggaṇhantīti uddesadānādīhi na saṅgaṇhantī.
analyzed: sahajīvinim ti saddhivihārinim na anuggaṇhanti iti uddesa dāna ādīhi na saṅgaṇhantī

original: Gabbhinivaggavaṇṇanā sattamā.
analyzed: gabbhini vagga vaṇṇanā sattamā

original: 258. “Alaṃ vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti vuccamānā bhikkhunīhi nivāriyamānā. Khīyatīti aññāsaṃ
analyzed: alam vuṭṭhāpitena ati vuccamānā bhikkhunīhi nivāriyamānā khīyati iti aññāsam

original: byattānaṃ lajjīnaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dīyamānaṃ disvā “ahameva nūna bālā”tiādinā bhaṇamānā
analyzed: byattānam vuṭṭhāna sammutim dīyamānam disvā aham eva nūna bālā ati ādinā bhaṇamānā

original: khīyati. Payogeti khīyamānapayoge. Khīyiteti khīyanapayoge niṭṭhite.
analyzed: khīyati payoge iti khīyamāna payoge khīyita iti khīyana payoge niṭṭhite

original: Kumāribhūtavaggavaṇṇanā aṭṭhamā.
analyzed: kumāri bhūta vagga vaṇṇanā aṭṭhamā

original: 260. Chattupāhananti vuttalakkhaṇaṃ chattañca upāhanāyo ca. Payogeti dhāraṇapayoge.
analyzed: chattupāhananti vutta lakkhaṇam chattam ca upāhanāyo ca payoge iti dhāraṇa payoge

original: 261. Yānenāti vayhādinā. Yāyantīti sace yānena gatā hoti.
analyzed: yānena ati vayha ādinā yāyanti iti sace yānena gatāḥ ha iti

original: 262. Saṅghāṇinti yaṃ kiñci kaṭūpagaṃ. Dhārentiyāti kaṭiyaṃ paṭimuccantiyā.
analyzed: yam kiñci kaṭu upagam dhārentiyā ati kaṭiyam paṭimuccantiyā

original: 263. Gandhavaṇṇenāti yena kenaci vaṇṇena ca yena kenaci gandhena ca. Gandho nāma candanālepādi. Vaṇṇo nāma kuṅkumahaliddādi. Payogeti gandhādipayoge racanato paṭṭhāya pubbapayoge.
analyzed: gandha vaṇṇena ati yena kenacid vaṇṇena ca yena kenacid gandhena ca gandhaḥ nāma candana ālepa ādi vaṇṇaḥ nāma kuṅkuma halidda ādi payoge iti gandha ādi payoge racanataḥ paṭṭhāya pubba payoge

original: 266. Anāpucchāti “nisīdāmi, ayyā”ti anāpucchitvā. Nisīdite bhikkhussa upacāre antamaso chamāya nisinne.
analyzed: an āpuccha ati nisīdāmi ayyā iti an āpucchitvā nisīdite bhikkhussa upacāre antamasaḥ chamāya nisinne

original: 267. Anokāsakatanti “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchissāmī”ti evaṃ akataokāsaṃ.
analyzed: anokāsakatam ti asukasmin nāma ṭhāne pucchissāmi iti evam a kata okāsam

original: 268. Pavisantiyāti vinicchayaṃ ārāmavaggassa paṭhameneva sikkhāpadena sadisaṃ katvā vadeyyāti yojanā.
analyzed: pavisantiyā iti vinicchayam ārāma vaggassa paṭhamena iva sikkhāpadena sadisam katvā vadeyya ati yojanā

original: Chattupāhanavaggavaṇṇanā navamā.
analyzed: chattupāhana vagga vaṇṇanā navamā

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā bhikkhunivibhaṅge
analyzed: iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā bhikkhuni vibhaṅge

original: Pācittiyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pācittiya kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 269-70. Aṭṭhasu pāṭidesanīyasikkhāpadesupi dvidhā āpatti hotīti yojanā. Tatoti gahaṇahetu. Sabbesūti pāṭidesanīyasikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: aṭṭhasu pāṭidesanīya sikkhāpadesu pi dvidhā āpatti hoti iti yojanā tatas ti gahaṇa hetu sabbesu iti pāṭidesanīya sikkhāpadesu

original: Pāṭidesanīyakathāvaṇṇanā.
analyzed: pāṭidesanīya kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 271-2. Imaṃ paramaṃ uttamaṃ niruttaraṃ kenaci vā vattabbena uttarena rahitaṃ niddosaṃ
analyzed: imam paramam uttamam niruttaram kenacid vā vattabbena uttarena rahitam niddosam

original: uttaraṃ evaṃnāmakaṃ dhīro paññavā bhikkhu atthavasena viditvā duruttaraṃ kicchena
analyzed: uttaram evaṃnāmakam dhīro paññavā bhikkhu attha vasena viditvā duruttaram kicchena

original: uttaritabbaṃ paññattamahāsamuddaṃ vinayamahāsāgaraṃ sukheneva yasmā uttarati, tasmā
analyzed: uttaritabbam paññatta mahā samuddam vinaya mahā sāgaram sukhena iva yasmai uttarati tasmai

original: kaṅkhacchede vinayavicikicchāya chindane satthe satthasadise asmiṃ satthe imasmiṃ
analyzed: kaṅkha chede vinaya vicikicchāya chindane satthe sattha sadise asmin satthe imasmin

original: uttarapakaraṇe usmāyutto kammajatejodhātuyā samannāgato jīvamāno bhikkhu niccaṃ nirantaraṃ
analyzed: uttara pakaraṇe usmā yuttaḥ kamma ja tejodhātuyā samannāgataḥ jīvamānaḥ bhikkhu niccam nirantaram

original: satto abhirato niccaṃ yogaṃ satatābhiyogaṃ kātuṃ yutto anurūpoti yojanā.
analyzed: sattaḥ abhirataḥ niccam yogam satata abhiyogam kātum yuttaḥ anurūpaḥ iti yojanā

original: Bhikkhunivibhaṅgo niṭṭhitoti etthāpi uppatti vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
analyzed: bhikkhuni vibhaṅgaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ ti ettha api uppatti vutta nayena iva veditabbā

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Bhikkhunivibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: bhikkhuni vibhaṅga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Catuvipattikathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: catu vipatti kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 273. Idāni ubhayasādhāraṇaṃ katvā vipattivārādīnaṃ visiṭṭhavārānaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātumāha “kati āpattiyo”tiādi.
analyzed: idāni ubhaya sādhāraṇam katvā vipatti vāra ādīnam saṅgaham kātum āha kati

original: 274. Bhikkhunī sace chādeti, cutā hoti. Sace vematikā chādeti, thullaccayaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: bhikkhunī sace chādeti cutā hoti sace vematikā chādeti thullaccayam siyā ati yojanā

original: 275. Saṅghādisesanti parassa saṅghādisesaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgha ādisesam ti parassa saṅgha ādisesam

original: 276. “Kati ācāravipattipaccayā”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: kati ācāra vipatti paccayā ati padacchedo

original: 277. Ācāravipattinti attano vā parassa vā ācāravipattiṃ.
analyzed: ācāra vipattim ti attanaḥ vā parassa vā ācāra vipattim

original: 279. Pāpikaṃ diṭṭhinti ahetukaakiriyanatthikadiṭṭhiādiṃ lāmikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ.
analyzed: pāpikam diṭṭhim ti ahetuka akiriya natthika diṭṭhi ādim lāmikam diṭṭhim

original: 281. Manussuttaridhammanti uttarimanussadhammaṃ.
analyzed: manussuttaridhammanti uttari manussa dhammam

original: 282. Ājīvahetu sañcarittaṃ samāpannoti yojanā. Pariyāyavacaneti “yo te vihāre vasati,
analyzed: ājīva hetu sañcarittam samāpannoti yojanā te vihāre vasati

original: so bhikkhu arahā”tiādike lesavacane. Ñāteti yaṃ uddissa vadati, tasmiṃ manussajātike
analyzed: so bhikkhu arahā ati ādike lesa vacane ñātā iti yam uddissa vadati tasmim manussa jātike

original: vacanasamanantarameva ñāte.
analyzed: vacana samanantaram eva ñāte

original: 283. Vatvāti agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā. Bhikkhunī pana sace evaṃ hoti, bhikkhunī
analyzed: vatvā ti agilānaḥ attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhikkhunī pana sace evam hoti bhikkhunī

original: agilānā attano atthāya paṇītabhojanaṃ viññāpetvā bhuttāvinī sace hotīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: a gilānā attanaḥ atthāya paṇīta bhojanam viññāpetvā bhuttāvinī sace hoti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Tassā pāṭidesanīyaṃ siyāti yojanā.
analyzed: pāṭidesanīyam siyā iti yojanā

original: 284. “Attano atthāya viññāpetvānā”ti iminā parassa ñātakapavārite tassevatthāya viññāpetvā
analyzed: attanaḥ atthāya iminā parassa ñātaka pavārite tassa iva atthāya viññāpetvā

original: tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena vā paribhuñjantassa tesaṃ attano aññātakaappavārite
analyzed: tena dinnam vā tassa vissāsena vā paribhuñjantassa tesam attanaḥ aññātaka a pavārite

original: suddhacittatāya anāpattīti dīpeti.
analyzed: suddha citta tāya anāpatti iti dīpeti

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Catuvipattikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: catu vipatti kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Adhikaraṇapaccayakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: adhikaraṇa paccaya kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 285. Vivādādhikaraṇamhāti “adhammaṃ ‘dhammo’ti dīpetī”tiādinayappavattā aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthunissitā vivādādhikaraṇamhā.

original: 287. Anuvādādhikaraṇapaccayāti codanāparanāmadheyyaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇameva paccayo, tasmā, anuvādanādhikaraṇahetūti attho.

analyzed: pakāra antara abhāvā adhippāyo

original: 336. Sabbā āpattiyo samuṭṭhānavisesato evaṃ terasadhā ṭhitānaṃ samuṭṭhānabhedānaṃ
analyzed: sabbāḥ āpattiyo samuṭṭhāna visesataḥ evam terasadhā ṭhitānam samuṭṭhāna bhedānam

original: nānattato tehi samuṭṭhitānaṃ paṭhamaṃ paññattattā sīsabhūtānaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vasena
analyzed: nānattataḥ tehi samuṭṭhitānam paṭhamam paññatta ttā sīsa bhūtānam sikkhāpadānam vasena

original: teraseva nāmāni labhanti, tāni ito paraṃ vakkhāmīti yojanā.
analyzed: terasa iva nāmāni labhanti tāni itas param vakkhāmi iti yojanā

original: 337. Paṭhamantimavatthuñcāti paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Dutiyanti adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhama antima vatthuṃ ca ati paṭhama pārājika samuṭṭhānam dutiya nti adinnādāna samuṭṭhānam

original: Sañcarittakanti sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Samanubhāsananti samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: sañcarittakanti sañcaritta samuṭṭhānam samanubhāsanam ti samanubhāsana samuṭṭhānam

original: “Kathinaṃ eḷakalomaka”nti padacchedo, kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānañca.
analyzed: kathinam eḷaka lomakam ti padacchedaḥ kathina samuṭṭhānam eḷaka loma samuṭṭhānam ca

original: 338. Padasodhammanti padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Addhānaṃ theyyasatthanti addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: padasodhammanti padasodhamma samuṭṭhānam addhānam theyyasatthanti addhāna samuṭṭhānam

original: theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Desanāti dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānaṃ. Bhūtārocanakanti bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: theyyasattha samuṭṭhānam desanā ati dhamma desanā samuṭṭhānam bhūtārocanakanti bhūta ārocana samuṭṭhānam

original: Corivuṭṭhāpananti corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: cori vuṭṭhāpanan ti cori vuṭṭhāpana samuṭṭhānam

original: 339. Ananuññātakañcāti ananuññātakasamuṭṭhānañcāti etāni terasa tehi samuṭṭhānehi
analyzed: ananuññātakam ca ati ananuññātaka samuṭṭhānam ca ati etāni terasa tehi samuṭṭhānehi

original: samuṭṭhitānaṃ tesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭhamaṃ niddiṭṭhānaṃ paṭhamapārājikādisikkhāpadasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
analyzed: samuṭṭhitānam tesam sikkhāpadānam paṭhamam paṭhamam niddiṭṭhānam paṭhama pārājika ādi sikkhāpada samuṭṭhānānam

original: itaresaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvato “sīsānī”ti vuttāni. Yathāha parivāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paṭhamapārājikaṃ
analyzed: itaresam pubbaṅgama bhāvato sīsāni iti vuttāni yathā āha parivāraṭṭhakathā ayam paṭhama pārājikam

original: nāma ekaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsaṃ, sesāni tena sadisānī”tiādi. Terasete samuṭṭhānanayāti
analyzed: nāma ekam samuṭṭhāna sīsam sesāni tena sadisāni itiādi terasā ite samuṭṭhānanayā ati

original: ete sīsavasena dassitā terasa samuṭṭhānanayā. Viññūhi upālittherādīhi.
analyzed: ete sīsa vasena dassitā terasa samuṭṭhāna nayāḥ viññūhi upāli tthera ādīhi

original: 340. Tattha terasasu samuṭṭhānasīsesu. Yāti yā pana āpatti. Ādipārājikuṭṭhānāti paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānā.
analyzed: tattha terasasu samuṭṭhāna sīsesu yā ati yā pana āpatti ādi pārājika uṭṭhānā ti paṭhama pārājika samuṭṭhānā

original: 341. Adinnādāna-saddo pubbako paṭhamo etissā taṃsamuṭṭhānāpattiyāti adinnādānapubbakā, adinnādānasamuṭṭhānāti uddiṭṭhāti yojanā.
analyzed: adinnādāna saddo pubbakaḥ paṭhamaḥ etissā tad samuṭṭhāna āpattiyā ati adinnādāna pubbakā adinnādāna samuṭṭhānā iti uddiṭṭhā iti yojanā

original: 342. Jātūti ekaṃsena.
analyzed: jātūti ekaṃsena

original: 343. Ayaṃ samuṭṭhānavasena “samanubhāsanāsamuṭṭhānā”ti vuttāti yojanā.
analyzed: ayam samuṭṭhāna vasena samanubhāsanā samuṭṭhānā iti vuttā iti yojanā

original: 344. Kathina-saddo upapado yassā taṃsamuṭṭhānāya āpattiyā sā kathinupapadā, kathinasamuṭṭhānāti matā ñātā, ayaṃ samuṭṭhānavasena “kathinasamuṭṭhānā”ti ñātāti attho.
analyzed: kathina saddo upapadaḥ yassā tad samuṭṭhānāya āpattiyā sā kathin upapadā kathina samuṭṭhānā ati matā ñātā ayam samuṭṭhāna vasena kathina samuṭṭhānā ati ñātā ati atthaḥ

original: 345. Eḷakaloma-saddo ādi yassā taṃsamuṭṭhānāpattiyā sā eḷakalomādisamuṭṭhānāti attho.
analyzed: eḷaka loma saddo ādi yassā tad samuṭṭhāna āpattiyā sā eḷaka loma ādi samuṭṭhānā ti atthaḥ

original: 349. Ettha samuṭṭhānesu.
analyzed: ettha samuṭṭhānesu

original: 350. Bhūtārocana-saddo pubbabhāgo etissā taṃsamuṭṭhānāya āpattiyāti bhūtārocanapubbakā, bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānāti attho.
analyzed: bhūta ārocana saddaḥ pubba bhāgaḥ etissā tad samuṭṭhānāya āpattiyā ati bhūta ārocana pubbakā bhūta ārocana samuṭṭhānā iti atthaḥ

original: 351. Samuṭṭhānaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ, corivuṭṭhāpanaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ yassā sā corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhitā, corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānāti attho.
analyzed: samuṭṭhānam samuṭṭhitam cori vuṭṭhāpanam samuṭṭhitam yassā sā cori vuṭṭhāpana samuṭṭhitā cori vuṭṭhāpana samuṭṭhānā ati atthaḥ

original: 353. Tatthāti terasasamuṭṭhānasīsesu, “samuṭṭhānaṃ sacittaka”nti idaṃ “paṭhama”ntiādīhi
analyzed: tattha āti terasa samuṭṭhāna sīsesu samuṭṭhānam sa cittakam ti idam paṭhama nti ādīhi

original: paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ samuṭṭhānanti paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Dutiyaṃ samuṭṭhānanti
analyzed: paccekam yojetabbam paṭhamam samuṭṭhānanti paṭhama pārājika samuṭṭhānam dutiyam samuṭṭhānanti

original: adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Catutthaṃ samuṭṭhānanti samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Navamaṃ
analyzed: adinnādāna samuṭṭhānam catuttham samuṭṭhānam ti samanubhāsana samuṭṭhānam navamam

original: samuṭṭhānanti theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Dasamaṃ samuṭṭhānanti dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: samuṭṭhānanti theyyasattha samuṭṭhānam dasamam samuṭṭhānanti dhamma desanā samuṭṭhānam

original: Dvādasamaṃ samuṭṭhānanti corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: dvādasamam samuṭṭhānan ti cori vuṭṭhāpana samuṭṭhānam

original: 354. Samuṭṭhāneti samuṭṭhānasīse. Sadisāti tena tena samuṭṭhānasīsena samuṭṭhānā
analyzed: samuṭṭhānā iti samuṭṭhāna sīse sadisā ati tena tena samuṭṭhāna sīsena samuṭṭhānā

original: āpattiyo. Idhāti imasmiṃ samuṭṭhānavinicchaye. Dissareti dissante, dissantīti attho.
analyzed: āpattiyaḥ idha ati imasmin samuṭṭhāna vinicchaye dissarā iti dissante dissanti iti attho

original: Atha vā idha dissareti idha ubhatovibhaṅge etesu terasasamuṭṭhānesu ekekasmiṃ aññānipi
analyzed: atha vā idha iti ubhatas vibhaṅge etesu terasa samuṭṭhānesu ekekasmin aññāni pi

original: sadisāni samuṭṭhānāni dissantīti attho. Idāni tāni sarūpato nidassetumāha “sukkañcā”tiādi.
analyzed: sadisāni samuṭṭhānāni dissanti iti atthaḥ idāni tāni sarūpataḥ nidassetum āha sukkam ca atiādi

original: Tattha sukkanti sukkavissaṭṭhisikkhāpadaṃ. Esa nayo “kāyasaṃsaggo”tiādīsupi. Yadettha
analyzed: tattha sukkam ti sukka vissaṭṭhi sikkhāpadam esa nayaḥ kāya saṃsaggaḥ ti ādīsu pi yat ettha

original: duviññeyyaṃ, taṃ vakkhāma.
analyzed: du viññeyyam tam vakkhāma

original: 355. Pubbupaparipāko cāti “jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhu”nti sikkhāpadañca “bhikkhuniparipācita”nti
analyzed: pubbupa paripāko ca ati jānam pubbupagatam bhikkhunti sikkhāpadam ca bhikkhuni paripācitanti

original: piṇḍapātasikkhāpadañca. Raho bhikkhuniyāsahāti bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ raho nisajjasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: piṇḍapāta sikkhāpadam ca rahaḥ bhikkhuniyā sahā ati bhikkhuniyā saddhim rahaḥ nisajja sikkhāpadam ca

original: Sabhojane, raho dve cāti sabhojane kule anupakhajjasikkhāpadañca dve rahonisajjasikkhāpadāni
analyzed: sa bhojane rahaḥ dve ca ati sa bhojane kule an upakhajja sikkhāpadam ca dve rahaḥ nisajja sikkhāpadāni

original: ca. Aṅgulī udake hasanti aṅgulipatodañca udakahasadhammasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: ca aṅgulī udake hasanti aṅguli patodam ca udaka hasa dhamma sikkhāpadam ca

original: 356. Pahāre uggire cevāti pahāradānasikkhāpadañca talasattiuggiraṇasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: pahāre uggire ca iva ati pahāra dāna sikkhāpadam ca talasatti uggiraṇa sikkhāpadam ca

original: Tepaññāsā ca sekhiyāti pañcasattatisekhiyāsu vakkhamānāni ujjagghikādīni samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānāni
analyzed: ca sekhiyā ti pañca sattati sekhiyāsu vakkhamānāni ujjagghika ādīni samanubhāsana samuṭṭhānāni

original: dasa, chattapāṇiādīni dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānāni ekādasa, theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: dasa chatta pāṇi ādīni dhamma desanā samuṭṭhānāni ekādasa theyyasattha samuṭṭhānam

original: sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadañcāti bāvīsati sikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā parimaṇḍalanivāsanādīni
analyzed: sūpodana viññatti sikkhāpadam ca ati bāvīsati sikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā parimaṇḍala nivāsana ādīni

original: itarāni tepaññāsa sekhiyasikkhāpadāni ca. Adhakkhakubbhajāṇuñcāti bhikkhunīnaṃ adhakkhakaubbhajāṇusikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: itarāni tepaññāsa sekhiya sikkhāpadāni ca adhakkha kubbhajāṇum ca ati bhikkhunīnam adhakkha kaubbhajāṇu sikkhāpadam ca

original: Gāmantaramavassutāti gāmantaragamanaṃ, avassutassa hatthato khādanīyaggahaṇasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: gām antaram avassutā ati gām antara gamanam avassutassa hatthato khādanīya ggahaṇa sikkhāpadam ca

original: 357-8. Talamaṭṭhudasuddhi cāti talaghātaṃ, jatumaṭṭhaṃ, udakasuddhikādiyanañca. Vassaṃvutthāti
analyzed: ca ati talaghātam jatumaṭṭham udakasuddhika ādiyanam ca

original: “vassaṃvutthā…pe… chappañcayojanānī”ti sikkhāpadañca. Ovādāya na gacchantīti ovādāya
analyzed: chappañcayojanāni iti sikkhāpadam ca ovādāya na gacchanti iti ovādāya

original: agamanasikkhāpadañca. Nānubandhe pavattininti “vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni
analyzed: agamana sikkhāpadam ca na anubandhe pavattinim ti vuṭṭhāpitam pavattinim dve vassāni

original: nānubandheyyā”ti sikkhāpadañcāti ubhatovibhaṅge niddiṭṭhā ime pañcasattati dhammā
analyzed: na anubandheyya ati sikkhāpadam ca ati ubhatas vibhaṅge niddiṭṭhāḥ ime pañcasattati dhammā

original: kāyacittasamuṭṭhitā methunena samā ekasamuṭṭhānā matāti yojanā.
analyzed: kāya citta samuṭṭhitā methunena samā eka samuṭṭhānā matā ati yojanā

original: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ “chasattatī”ti gaṇanaparicchedo samuṭṭhānasikkhāpadena saha dassito.
analyzed: ettha ca pāḷiyam cha sattati iti gaṇana paricchedaḥ samuṭṭhāna sikkhāpadena saha dassito

original: Idha pana taṃ vinā taṃsadisānameva gaṇanā dassitā. Teneva paṭhamaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsaṃ
analyzed: idha pana tam vinā taṃsadisānam eva gaṇanā dassitā tena iva paṭhamam samuṭṭhāna sīsam

original: pāḷiyaṃ gaṇanāyapi dassitaṃ, idheva na dassitaṃ. Upari katthaci samuṭṭhānasīsassa
analyzed: dassitam idhā iva na dassitam upari katthaci samuṭṭhāna sīsassa

original: dassanaṃ panettha vakkhamānānaṃ taṃsadisabhāvadassanatthaṃ, gaṇanāya vakkhamānāya
analyzed: dassanam pana ittha vakkhamānānam tad sadisa bhāva dassana attham gaṇanāya vakkhamānāya

original: antogadhabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Teneva tatthapi taṃ vinā gaṇanaṃ vakkhati.
analyzed: antogadha bhāva dassana attham tena iva tattha api tam vinā gaṇanam vakkhati

original: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: paṭhama pārājika samuṭṭhāna vaṇṇanā

original: 359. Viggahanti manussaviggahasikkhāpadaṃ. Uttari cevāti uttarimanussadhammasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: viggahanti manussa viggaha sikkhāpadam uttari ca iva ati uttari manussa dhamma sikkhāpadam ca

original: Duṭṭhullanti duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpadaṃ. Attakāmatāti attakāmapāricariyasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: duṭṭhullanti duṭṭhulla vācā sikkhāpadam atta kāma tā ati atta kāma pāricariya sikkhāpadam ca

original: Duṭṭhadosā duve cevāti dve duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadāni ca. Dutiyāniyatopi cāti dutiyaaniyatasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: duṭṭha dosā duve ca iva ati dve duṭṭha dosa sikkhāpadāni ca dutiya aniyataḥ upi ca ati dutiya aniyata sikkhāpadam ca

original: 360. Acchindanañcāti sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā acchindanañca. Pariṇāmoti saṅghikalābhassa
analyzed: acchindanam ca ati sāmam cīvaram da tvā acchindanam ca pariṇāmaḥ ti saṅghika lābhassa

original: attano pariṇāmanañca. Musāomasapesuṇāti musāvādo ca omasavādo ca bhikkhupesuññañca.
analyzed: attano pariṇāmanañca musā omasa pesuṇā ti musāvādo ca omasa vādo ca bhikkhu pesuññañca

original: Duṭṭhullārocanañcevāti duṭṭhullāpattiārocanasikkhāpadañca. Pathavīkhaṇanampi cāti
analyzed: duṭṭhulla ārocanam ca iva ati duṭṭhulla āpatti ārocana sikkhāpadam ca pathavī khaṇanam pi ca ati

original: pathavīkhaṇanasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: pathavī khaṇana sikkhāpadam ca

original: 361. Bhūtagāmañca vādo cāti bhūtagāmasikkhāpadaṃ, aññavādakasikkhāpadañca. Ujjhāpanakameva
analyzed: bhūtagāmaṃ ca vādo ca ati bhūtagāma sikkhāpadam aññavādaka sikkhāpadam ca ujjhāpanakam eva

original: cāti ujjhāpanakasikkhāpadañca. Nikkaḍḍho siñcanañcevāti vihārato nikkaḍḍhanañca udake
analyzed: ca ati ujjhāpanaka sikkhāpadam ca nikkaḍḍhaḥ siñcanam ca iva ati vihārataḥ nikkaḍḍhanañca udake

original: tiṇādisiñcanañca. Āmisahetu cāti āmisahetu bhikkhuniyo ovādasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: tiṇa ādi siñcanam ca āmisa hetu ca ati āmisa hetu bhikkhuniyo ovāda sikkhāpadañca

original: 362. Bhuttāvinti bhuttāviṃ anatirittena khādanīyādinā pavāraṇasikkhāpadañca. Ehanādarinti
analyzed: bhuttāvinti bhuttāvim an atirittena khādanīya ādinā pavāraṇa sikkhāpadam ca

original: “ehāvuso, gāmaṃ vā”ti vuttasikkhāpadañca anādariyasikkhāpadañca. Bhiṃsāpanameva cāti
analyzed: ehi āvuso gāmam vā ati vutta sikkhāpadam ca anādariya sikkhāpadam ca bhiṃsāpanam eva ca ati

original: bhikkhubhiṃsanakañca. Apanidheyyāti pattādiapanidhānasikkhāpadañca. Sañcicca pāṇanti
analyzed: bhikkhu bhiṃsanakam ca apanidheyyā ti patta ādi apanidhāna sikkhāpadam ca sañcid ca pāṇanti

original: sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitāvoropanañca. Sappāṇakampi cāti jānaṃ sappāṇakaudakasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: sañcit ca pāṇam jīvita avoropanam ca sappāṇakam pi ca ati jānam sappāṇaka audaka sikkhāpadam ca

original: 363. Ukkoṭanañcāti punakammāya ukkoṭanañca. Ūnoti ūnavīsativassasikkhāpadañca. Saṃvāsoti
analyzed: ukkoṭanam ca ati puna kammāya ukkoṭanam ca ūnaḥ ūna vīsati vassa sikkhāpadam ca saṃvāso ti

original: ukkhittakena saddhiṃ saṃvāsasikkhāpadañca. Nāsane cāti nāsitakasāmaṇerasambhogasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: ukkhittakena saddhim saṃvāsa sikkhāpadam ca na āsane ca ati nāsitaka sāmaṇera sambhoga sikkhāpadam ca

original: Sahadhammikanti sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānasikkhāpadañca. Vilekhā cāti “vilekhāya saṃvattantī”ti
analyzed: sahadhammikanti sahadhammikam vuccamāna sikkhāpadam ca vilekhā ca ati vilekhāya saṃvattanti iti

original: āgatasikkhāpadañca. Mohanāti mohanasikkhāpadañca. Amūlakena cāti amūlakena saṅghādisesena
analyzed: āgata sikkhāpadam ca mohanā ati mohana sikkhāpadam ca amūlakena ca ati amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena

original: anuddhaṃsanasikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: an uddhaṃsana sikkhāpadam ca

original: 364. Kukkuccaṃ khīyanaṃ datvāti kukkuccauppādanañca dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ
analyzed: kukkuccam khīyanam da tvā ati kukkucca uppādanam ca dhammikānam kammānam chandam

original: datvā khīyanañca cīvaraṃ datvā khīyanañca. Pariṇāmeyya puggaleti saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ
analyzed: da tvā khīyanam ca cīvaram da tvā khīyanam ca pariṇāmeyya puggala iti saṅghikam lābham

original: puggalassa pariṇāmanasikkhāpadañca. Kiṃ te, akālaṃ, acchindeti “kiṃ te, ayye, eso
analyzed: puggalassa pariṇāmana sikkhāpadam ca kim te akālam a chinda iti kim te ayye

original: purisapuggalo karissatī”ti āgatasikkhāpadañca akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā

analyzed: addhāna sikkhāpadena samāḥ honti iti matā ati yojanā

original: Addhānasamuṭṭhānavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: addhāna samuṭṭhāna vaṇṇanā

original: 400-1. Sutinti upassutitiṭṭhanasikkhāpadañca. Sūpādiviññattinti sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadañca.
analyzed: sutinti upassuti tiṭṭhana sikkhāpadam ca sūpa ādi viññattinti su upodana viññatti sikkhāpadam ca

analyzed: andhakāra iti ratta ndhakāre appadīpā iti vutta sikkhāpadam ca tathā iva ca paṭicchannā iti

analyzed: paṭicchanne okāse iti vutta sikkhāpadam ca okāse iti ajjhokāse purisena saddhinti

analyzed: vā purisena saddhinti āgata sikkhāpadam ca ati ime sabbe pi ādiccabandhunā desitā cha

original: theyyasatthasikkhāpadena samānasamuṭṭhānā siyunti yojanā.
analyzed: theyyasattha sikkhāpadena samāna samuṭṭhānā siyun ti yojanā

original: Theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānavaṇṇanā.

analyzed: seyyā pallatthikāya ca ati na sayana gatassa na pallatthikāya nisinnassa ati vutta sikkhāpada dvayam ca

analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

analyzed: dukkaṭam ekam piṇḍam anāgate āpatti thullaccayassa tasmin piṇḍe āgate āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa ati

original: 408. Dutiyenāti vācāsaṅkhātena samuṭṭhānena.
analyzed: dutiyena ati vācā saṅkhātena samuṭṭhānena

analyzed: tatiyena samuṭṭhānena ati kāya vācā saṅkhātena samuṭṭhānena

analyzed: vatvā ti attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhikkhuninti bhikkhūnam bhuñjana ṭhāne ṭhatvā

original: Na nivāretvāti “apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti anapasādetvā bhuñjatoti yojanā.
analyzed: na nivāretvā ti apasakka tāva bhagini yāva bhikkhū bhuñjanti iti an apasādetvā bhuñjato ti yojanā

original: 417. Pañcamenāti vācācittasamuṭṭhānena. Vadanti vadanto samudācaranto.
analyzed: pañcamena ati vācā citta samuṭṭhānena vadanti vadanto samudācaranto

original: 418. Kuṭinti nidassanamattaṃ, adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ senāsanampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: kuṭinti nidassana mattam a desita vatthukam pamāṇa atikkantam sa ārambham a parikkamanam senāsanam pi gahaṇam veditabbam

analyzed: vācā iti padasaḥ dhamman ti ettha anupasampannam ti sesaḥ yathā āha bhikkhu akappiya saññī

original: anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vācetī”ti. Davakamyatā vadantassāti jātiādīhi akkosavatthūhi
analyzed: an upasampannam padasaḥ dhammam vācā iti iti dava kamya tā vadantassa ati jāti ādīhi akkosa vatthūhi

original: kīḷādhippāyena vadantassa. Davakamyatāti ca “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso”tiādīsu viya ya-kāralopena niddeso.

analyzed: chaṭṭhena kāya vācā citta samuṭṭhānena saṃvidahitvā anāti saṃvidhāya tvañca aham ca

original: ekato avaharissāmā”ti sammantanaṃ katvā. Bhaṇḍaṃ haratīti “bhāriyaṃ tvaṃ ekaṃ passaṃ

original: gaṇha, ahaṃ ima”nti vatvā tena saha ṭhānā cāveti ce.
analyzed: gaṇha aham imanti vatvā tena saha ce

original: 423. Idha imasmiṃ sāsane. Vimatūparamaṃ paramanti ettha “kappiyaṃ nu kho, akappiya”nti
analyzed: idha imasmin sāsane paramanti ettha kappiyam nu kho a kappiyanti

original: vā “āpatti nu kho, anāpattī”ti vā “dhammo nu kho, adhammo”ti vā evamādinā nayena
analyzed: vā āpatti nu kho anāpatti iti vā dhammo nu kho adhammaḥ iti vā evamādinā nayena

original: vividhenākārena pavattā vimati vicikicchā vimati. Vimatiṃ uparameti vināsetīti vimatūparamaṃ.
analyzed: vividhena ākārena vimati vicikicchā vimati vimatim uparameti vināsā iti iti

original: Paramaṃ uttamaṃ. Uttaranti vibhaṅgakhandhakāgatānaṃ nidānādivinicchayānaṃ pañhauttarabhāvena
analyzed: paramam uttamam uttaranti nidāna ādi vinicchayānam pañha auttara bhāvena

original: Idha “uttaraṃ uttara”nti padadvaye ekaṃ guṇanidassanaṃ, ekaṃ satthanidassananti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: idha uttaram uttaranti pada dvaye ekam guṇa nidassanam ekam sattha nidassananti gahetabbam

original: Sunayena yuto so puggalo vinayaṃ piṭakaṃ uttaratīti sambandho. Kiṃ visiṭṭhanti āha
analyzed: su nayena yutaḥ saḥ puggalaḥ vinayam piṭakam uttarati iti sambandhaḥ kim āha

original: “sunaya”ntiādi. Suṭṭhu cārittavārittadaḷhīkaraṇasithilakaraṇabhedā paññattianaupaññattādinayā
analyzed: sunayanti ādi suṭṭhu cāritta vāritta daḷhīkaraṇa sithilakaraṇa bhedā paññatti anaupaññatta ādi nayā

analyzed: ettha ati su nayo tam suṭṭhu nīyati vinicchayaḥ etena ati su nayaḥ uttara vinicchayaḥ tena

original: Vinicchayāvabodhena saṃyutto samannāgato. Dukkhena uttarīyatīti duttaraṃ. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīladīpakattena
analyzed: vinicchaya avabodhena saṃyuttaḥ samannāgataḥ dukkhena uttarīyati iti duttaram pātimokkha saṃvara sīla dīpaka ttena

original: samādhipaññānibbānasaṅkhātauttarappattiyā patiṭṭhābhāvato uttaraṃ uttarati ogāhetvā
analyzed: samādhi paññā nibbāna saṅkhāta auttarappattiyā patiṭṭhā bhāvataḥ uttaram uttarati ogāhetvā

original: pariyosānaṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.
analyzed: pariyosānam pāpuṇāti iti attho

original: Idha yo vimatūparamaṃ paramaṃ uttaraṃ uttaraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ uttarati, sunayena yuto
analyzed: idha yaḥ vimatūparamam paramam uttaram uttaram nāma pakaraṇam uttarati su nayena yutaḥ

analyzed: imam attham dīpeti sa iyyathā idam idha yaḥ su nayam duttaram uttaram vinayam uttarati

original: sunayena yuto so puggalo vimatūparamaṃ paramaṃ uttaraṃ uttaraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ uttaratīti.
analyzed: su nayena yutaḥ saḥ puggalaḥ vimatūparamam paramam uttaram uttaram nāma pakaraṇam uttarati iti

original: Iminā yo uttaraṃ jānāti, so vinayaṃ jānāti. Yo vinayaṃ jānāti, so uttaraṃ jānātīti
analyzed: iminā yaḥ uttaram jānāti saḥ vinayam jānāti yaḥ vinayam jānāti saḥ uttaram jānāti iti

original: uttarapakaraṇassa vinayapiṭakajānane accantūpakāritā vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: uttara pakaraṇassa vinaya piṭaka jānane accantu upakāri tā vibhāvitā ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Āpattisamuṭṭhānakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: āpatti samuṭṭhāna kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Ekuttaranayakathāvaṇṇanā
424. Ito paranti ito samuṭṭhānavinicchayakathāya paraṃ. Paranti uttamaṃ. Ekuttaraṃ nayanti ekekaaṅgātirekatāya ekuttarasaṅkhātaṃ ekakadukādinayaṃ.
analyzed: itas paranti itas samuṭṭhāna vinicchaya kathāya param paranti uttamam ekuttaram nayanti eka eka aṅga atirekatāya ekuttara saṅkhātam

original: 425-7. Ke āpattikarā dhammā…pe… kā cādesanagāminīti ekekapañhavasena uttānatthoyeva.
analyzed: ke āpatti karā dhamma āpe kā ca ādesana gāminī iti ekeka pañha vasena uttāna tthaḥ yeva

original: 428. Samuṭṭhānānīti ādiko vissajjanasaṅkhāto uttaravādo. Tattha samuṭṭhānāni…pe… dīpitāti yasmā etesaṃ vasena puggalo āpattiṃ karoti āpajjati, tasmā “āpattikarā”ti vuttā.
analyzed: samuṭṭhānāni iti ādikaḥ vissajjana saṅkhātaḥ uttaravādaḥ tattha dīpitā ati yasmai etesam vasena puggalaḥ āpattim karoti āpajjati tasmai āpatti karā ati vuttā

original: 429. Tatthāti tāsu āpattīsu. Lahukāti lahukena vinayakammena visujjhanato lahukā.
analyzed: tattha ati tāsu āpattīsu lahukā ati lahukena vinaya kammena visujjhanataḥ lahukā

original: Garukena vinayakammena visujjhanato saṅghādisesāpatti, kenaci ākārena anāpattibhāvaṃ
analyzed: garukena vinaya kammena visujjhanataḥ saṅgha ādi sesa āpatti kenaci ākārena anāpatti bhāvam

original: upanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyato pārājikāpatti ca garukāpatti nāma, tā pana lahukāsu vuttāsu
analyzed: upanetum a sakkuṇeyyato pārājika āpatti ca garuka āpatti nāma tā pana lahukāsu vuttāsu

original: tabbipariyāyato ñātuṃ sakkāti vissajjane visuṃ na vuttā.
analyzed: tad bipariyāyataḥ ñātum sakkā ati vissajjane visum na vuttā

original: 431. Duṭṭhuṃ kucchitabhāvaṃ paramajegucchaṃ nindanīyabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti duṭṭhullaṃ, pārājikasaṅghādisesaṃ. Tenāha “duvidhāpatti ādito”ti.
analyzed: duṭṭhum kucchita bhāvam parama jeguccham nindanīya bhāvam ulati gacchati iti duṭṭhullam pārājika saṅgha ādi sesam tena āha duvidha āpatti āditas ti

original: 432. Pañcānantariyasaṃyuttāti mātughātakapitughātakaarahantaghātakehi āpannā manussaviggahapārājikāpatti

original: 436. Haveti ekaṃsatthe nipāto. Laddhasamāpattissa bhikkhuno dīpitā āpatti atthi have attheva. No laddhasamāpattissāti aladdhasamāpattissa dīpitā āpatti atthevāti yojanā.

original: 437. Bhūtassāti attani santassa uttarimanussadhammassa. Abhūtārocanāpattīti catutthapārājikāpatti. Asamāpattilābhino niddiseti yojanā.

original: 447. Vikopetunti vaggakaraṇena vikopetuṃ. Hatthapāsaṃ jahanti antosīmāya eva hatthapāsaṃ jahanto, hatthapāsaṃ jahitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdantoti attho. Phuseti bhūmigato phuseyya.

analyzed: yam nissaṭṭha pattam ayam te bhikkhu pattaḥ yāvabhedanāya dhāretabbaḥ iti dinnam

original: 481. Kathaṃ kāleyeva āpatti siyā, na vikāle. Kathaṃ vikāleyeva āpatti siyā, kāle na siyā. Kathaṃ kāle ceva vikāle cāti ubhayattha siyāti pañhe.
analyzed: katham kāleya iva āpatti siyā na vikāle katham vikāleya iva āpatti siyā kāle na siyā katham kāle ca iva vikāle ca ati ubhayattha siyā ati pañhe

original: 482. Yathākkamaṃ vissajjento āha “bhuñjato”tiādi.

original: 483. Avasesaṃ pana sabbaṃ āpattiṃ kālavikālesu sabbadā āpajjati, tattha ca saṃsayo natthīti yojanā.
analyzed: avasesam pana sabbam āpattim kāla vikālesu sabbadā āpajjati tattha ca saṃsayaḥ natthi iti yojanā

original: 484. “Atthāpatti rattiṃ āpajjati, no divā, atthāpatti divā āpajjati, no rattiṃ, atthāpatti rattiñceva āpajjati divā cā”ti vuttaṃ tikaṃ dassetumāha “rattimevā”tiādi.

original: 486. Atthāpatti dasavasso āpajjati, no ūnadasavasso, sā kathaṃ siyā. Atthāpatti ūnadasavasso
analyzed: attha āpatti dasa vassaḥ āpajjati no ūna dasa vassaḥ sā katham siyā attha āpatti ūna dasa vassaḥ

original: ubhayatthapi āpatti kathaṃ hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: ubhayattha api āpatti katham hoti iti yojanā

original: 487. Tattha vissajjanamāha “upaṭṭhāpetī”tiādi. “Bālo”ti etassa hi atthapadaṃ “abyatto”ti.

original: 489. Kathaṃ kāḷe āpattiṃ āpajjati, na juṇhe, kathaṃ juṇhe āpattiṃ āpajjati, na kāḷasmiṃ, kathaṃ kāḷe ca juṇhe cāti ubhayatthapi āpajjatīti yojanā.

original: 490. Vissajjanamāha “vassa”ntiādi. “Āpajjate appavārento”ti padacchedo. Juṇheti purimapakkhe. Kāḷaketi aparapakkhe.
analyzed: vissajjanam āha vassanti ādi āpajjate appavārento ti padacchedaḥ juṇhā iti purima pakkhe kāḷakā iti apara pakkhe

original: 491. Avipattināti catubbidhavipattirahitattā avipattinā bhagavatā paññattaṃ. Avasesanti vassaṃ anupagamanāpattiyā ca pavāraṇāpattiyā ca avasesaṃ sabbaṃ āpattiṃ.
analyzed: avipattinā ti catubbidha vipatti rahita ttā avipattinā bhagavatā paññattam avasesam ti vassam anupagamana āpattiyā ca pavāraṇa āpattiyā ca avasesam sabbam āpattim

original: 492. Vassūpagamanaṃ kāḷe kappati, juṇhe no kappati, pavāraṇā juṇhe kappati, kāḷe no kappati, sesaṃ anuññātaṃ sabbaṃ saṅghakiccaṃ kāḷe ca juṇhe cāti ubhayatthapi kappatīti yojanā.
analyzed: vassūpagamanam kāḷe kappati juṇhe no kappati pavāraṇā juṇhe kappati kāḷe no kappati sesam anuññātam sabbam saṅgha kiccam kāḷe ca juṇhe ca ati ubhayattha api kappati iti yojanā

analyzed: atireka māsaḥ kālaḥ sesaḥ ti vattabbe kāle pariyesanto ti aññātika appavārita ṭṭhānato satuppāda karaṇena

analyzed: vassika sāṭikam pariyesanto ca atireka māso sesaḥ ti katvā nivāsento ca gimhe āpattim

original: 498. Idha pana imasmiṃ sāsane yo bhikkhu vassikasāṭikacīvare vijjamāne naggo kāyaṃ ovassāpeti, so have ekaṃsena vasse vassānautumhi āpajjatīti yojanā.

original: āpajjitabbāpattidassanassa adhippetattā, attakaraṇadosassa visuṃ visuṃ vakkhamānattā
analyzed: āpajjitabba āpatti dassanassa adhippeta ttā atta karaṇa dosassa visum visum vakkhamāna ttā

original: 503. Kathaṃ pana gilānova āpattiṃ āpajjati, na agilāno, kathaṃ agilānova āpattiṃ āpajjati, no gilāno, kathaṃ gilāno ca agilāno ca ubhopi āpajjantīti yojanā.

original: 504. Yo pana akallako gilāno aññena pana bhesajjena atthe sati tadaññaṃ tato aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti, so āpajjati pācittiyāpattinti yojanā.
analyzed: yaḥ pana a kallakaḥ gilānaḥ aññena pana bhesajjena atthe sati tad aññam tatas aññam bhesajjam viññāpeti so āpajjati pācittiya āpattim ti yojanā

original: 505. Bhesajjena atthe avijjamānepi sace bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti, agilānova viññattipaccayā āpattiṃ āpajjati. Sesaṃ pana āpattiṃ gilānaagilānā ubhopi āpajjanti.
analyzed: bhesajjena atthe a vijjamāne pi sace bhesajjam viññāpeti agilānaḥ va viññatti paccayā āpattim āpajjati sesam pana āpattim gilāna agilānāḥ ubho pi āpajjanti

original: 506. Atthāpatti antova āpajjati, na bahiddhā, tathā atthāpatti bahi eva āpajjati, na anto, atthāpatti anto, bahiddhāti ubhayatthapi āpajjatīti yojanā.
analyzed: atthāpatti antar iva āpajjati na bahiddhā tathā atthāpatti bahi eva āpajjati na antaḥ atthāpatti antar bahiddhā ati ubhayattha api āpajjati iti yojanā

original: 507. Kevalaṃ antoyeva āpajjatīti yojanā.
analyzed: kevalam antoyā iva āpajjati iti yojanā

analyzed: mañca ādin ti saṅghika mañca ādim

original: 510. Sachattupāhano bhikkhūti chattupāhanasahito āgantuko bhikkhu. Pavisanto tapodhanoti āgantukavattaṃ adassetvā saṅghārāmaṃ pavisanto.
analyzed: sa chattupāhanaḥ bhikkhu iti chattupāhana sahitaḥ āgantukaḥ bhikkhu pavisantaḥ tapodhano ti āgantuka vattam a dassetvā saṅgha ārāmam pavisantaḥ

original: 511. “Upacārassa atikkame”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: upacārassa atikkame ti padacchedaḥ

original: kiñcāpi vassacchedāpattiṃ bahisīmāgato āpajjati, bhikkhunīārāmapavesanāpattiṃ antosīmāya

original: Tikakathāvaṇṇanā.

original: 515. Vacīdvārikamāpattinti musāvādapesuññaharaṇādivasena vacīdvāre āpajjitabbāpattiṃ. Paravācāya sujjhatīti saṅghamajjhe ekavācikāya tiṇavatthārakakammavācāya sujjhati.

original: 526. Yo sutto āpattiṃ āpajjati, so kathaṃ paṭibuddho visujjhati. Yo paṭibuddhova āpanno, so kathaṃ sutto sujjhatīti yojanā.

original: 528. Sagāraseyyakādinti mātugāmena sahaseyyādiāpattiṃ.

analyzed: pacchimam tu

original: Padadvayaṃ. Amissetvāti acittasacittapadehi evameva missaṃ akatvā. Etthāti purimapadadvaye. Vuttānusārenāti vuttanayānusārena.

original: 551. “Acittakacatukkaṃ ajānantacatukka”nti kusalattikaphassapañcakādivohāro viya ādipadavasena vutto.

original: 555. Itaroti āvāsiko. Āvāsavattanti āvāsikena āgantukassa kātabbavattaṃ. Āvāsīti āvāsiko.
