analyzed: manussuttarike dhamme ti uttari manussa dhamma visaye katikam evam nisinne

original: evaṃ ṭhite evaṃ gamane atthaṃ āvikarotī”tiādiṃ katvā. Sambhāvanādhippāyoti “arahā”ti
analyzed: evam ṭhite evam gamane attham āvikaroti itiādim katvā sambhāvanā adhippāyo ti arahāti

original: gahetvā mahāsambhāvanaṃ karotīti adhippāyo hutvā. Atikkamati ceti tathā kataṃ katikaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā mahā sambhāvanam karoti iti adhippāyaḥ hutvā atikkamati ca iti tathā katam katikam

original: atikkamati ce, tathārūpaṃ nisajjaṃ vā ṭhānaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā karotīti attho. Cutoti
analyzed: atikkamati ce tathārūpam nisajjam vā ṭhānam vā gamanam vā karoti iti attho cuto ti

original: tathārūpaṃ nisajjādiṃ disvā kenaci manussajātikena “arahā”ti taṅkhaṇe ñāte so puggalo pārājikaṃ āpajjati.
analyzed: tathārūpam nisajja ādim disvā kenaci manussa jātikena taṅkhaṇe ñāte saḥ puggalo pārājikam āpajjati

original: 693. Ekavatthukā kathaṃ bhaveyyunti yojanā.
analyzed: eka vatthukā katham yojanā

original: 694. Itthiyāti ekissā itthiyā. Paṭipajjantoti ekakkhaṇe aññena purisena vuttasāsanaṃ
analyzed: itthiyā ati ekissā itthiyā paṭipajjanto ti eka khaṇe aññena purisena vutta sāsanam

original: vatvā, iminā ca “paṭiggaṇhāti, vīmaṃsatī”ti aṅgadvayassa purimasiddhataṃ dīpeti imassa
analyzed: vatvā iminā ca paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati iti aṅga dvayassa dīpeti imassa

original: paccāharaṇakatañca. Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjitvā duṭṭhullaṃ vatvā attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇanto.
analyzed: paccāharaṇa katam ca kāya saṃsaggam samāpajjitvā duṭṭhullam vatvā atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhaṇanto

original: 695. Yathāvuttaṃ vattaṃ acaritvāti bhagavatā vuttaṃ parivāsādivattaṃ acaritvā.
analyzed: yathāvuttam vattam a caritvā iti bhagavatā vuttam parivāsa ādi vattam a caritvā

original: 696. Bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇasikkhāpadattā āha “natthi saṅghādisesatā”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇa sikkhā padattā āha natthi saṅgha ādisesa tā ti

original: 697. Yena kuddho pasaṃsitoti ettha “nindito cā”ti seso.
analyzed: yena kuddhaḥ pasaṃsito ti ettha ninditaḥ ca ati seso

original: 698. Titthiyānaṃ vaṇṇamhi bhaññamāne yo kujjhati, so ārādhakoti yojanā, paritosito
analyzed: titthiyānam vaṇṇamhi bhaññamāne yaḥ kujjhati saḥ ārādhako ti yojanā paritositaḥ

original: pasaṃsitoti adhippāyo. Titthiyapubbo imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajjaṃ labhitvā titthiyānaṃ
analyzed: pasaṃsito ti adhippāyaḥ titthiya pubbaḥ imasmin sāsane pabbajjam labhitvā titthiyānam

original: vaṇṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne sutvā sace kuppati anattamanaṃ karoti, ārādhako saṅghārādhako
analyzed: vaṇṇasmim bhaññamāne sutvā sace kuppati anattamanam karoti ārādhako saṅgha ārādhako

original: saṅghaṃ paritosento hoti, sambuddhassa vaṇṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne yadi kujjhati, ninditoti
analyzed: saṅgham paritosentaḥ hoti sambuddhassa vaṇṇasmim bhaññamāne yadi kujjhati nindito ti

original: yojanā. Ettha sambuddhassāti upalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yojanā ettha sambuddhassa ati upalakkhaṇam

original: 701. Gahetvāti paṭiggahetvā.
analyzed: gahetvā iti paṭiggahetvā

original: 751. “Na rattacitto”tiādinā purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pārājikānaṃ vītikkamacittuppādamattassāpi
analyzed: na ratta citta uti ādinā purimānam tiṇṇam pārājikānam vītikkama cittuppāda mattassa api

original: abhāvaṃ dīpeti. Maraṇāyāti ettha “manussajātikassā”ti idaṃ pārājikapakaraṇatova labbhati.
analyzed: abhāvam dīpeti maraṇāya ati ettha manussa jātikassa ati idam pārājika pakaraṇataḥ va labbhati

original: Tassāti kiñci dentassa. Tanti tathā dīyamānaṃ.
analyzed: tassa ati kiñci dentassa tanti tathā dīyamānam

original: 752. “Parājayo”ti idaṃ abhabbapuggalesu saṅghabhedakassa antogadhattā vuttaṃ. Salākaggāhenāpi saṅghaṃ bhindanto saṅghabhedakova hoti.
analyzed: parājayaḥ ti idam abhabba puggalesu saṅgha bhedakassa vuttam salāka ggāhena api saṅgham bhindantaḥ saṅgha bhedakaḥ va hoti

original: 753. Addhayojane yaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ ekaṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvānāti yojanā.
analyzed: addha yojane yam tiṇṇam cīvarānam aññataram ekam cīvaram nikkhipitvā nāti yojanā

original: 754. Suppatiṭṭhitanigrodhasadise rukkhamūlake ticīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā addhayojane aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpentassāti yojanā.
analyzed: su patiṭṭhita nigrodha sadise rukkha mūlake ti cīvaram nikkhipitvā addha yojane aruṇam uṭṭhāpentassa ati yojanā

original: 755. Kāyikā nānāvatthukāyo sambahulā āpattiyo apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇe kathaṃ phuseti yojanā.
analyzed: kāyikā nānā vatthu kāyo sambahulāḥ āpattiyaḥ apubbam acarimam eka khaṇe katham phusa iti yojanā

original: 757. Vācasikā na kāyikā nānāvatthukāyo sambahulā āpattiyo apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇe kathaṃ phuseti yojanā.
analyzed: vācasikā na kāyikā nānā vatthu kāyo sambahulāḥ āpattiyaḥ apubbam acarimam eka khaṇe katham phusa iti yojanā

original: 758. Vinayanasattheti vinayapiṭake. Tassa bhikkhussa.
analyzed: vinayana satthe ti vinaya piṭake tassa bhikkhussa

original: 759. “Itthiyā”tiādīsu sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Itthiyā vā purisena vā paṇḍakena vā nimittake methunaṃ na sevanto na paṭisevanto methunapaccayā cutoti yojanā.
analyzed: itthiyā ti ādīsu sahatthe karaṇavacanam itthiyāḥ vā purisena vā paṇḍakena vā nimittake methunam na sevantaḥ na paṭisevantaḥ methuna paccayā cuto ti yojanā

original: 760. Kāyasaṃsaggoyeva kāyasaṃsaggatā, taṃ āpannā. Aṭṭhavatthukaṃ chejjanti evaṃnāmakaṃ pārājikaṃ.
analyzed: kāya saṃsaggoyā iva kāya saṃsagga tā tam āpannā aṭṭhavatthukam chejjanti evaṃnāmakam pārājikam

original: 762. Samaye piṭṭhisaññiteti gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa paṭhamadivasato yāva hemantassa
analyzed: samaye piṭṭhi saññitā iti gimhānam pacchima māsassa paṭhama divasataḥ yāva hemantassa

original: paṭhamadivaso, etthantare sattamāsamatte piṭṭhisaññite samaye. “Mātuyāpi cā”ti vattabbe
analyzed: paṭhama divasaḥ etthantare satta māsa matte piṭṭhi saññite samaye mātuyā api ca ati vattabbe

original: “mātarampi cā”ti vuttaṃ. Soyeva vā pāṭho.
analyzed: mātaram pi ca ati vuttam vā pāṭhaḥ

original: 764. “Avassutahatthato hi piṇḍaṃ gahetvā”ti iminā saṅghādisesassa vatthumāha, lasuṇanti
analyzed: avassuta hatthataḥ hi piṇḍam gahetvā iti iminā saṅgha ādisesassa vatthum āha lasuṇanti

original: pācittiyassa vatthuṃ, manussamaṃsanti thullaccayavatthuṃ, akappamaññanti dukkaṭavatthuṃ.
analyzed: pācittiyassa vatthum manussamaṃsanti thullaccaya vatthum akappam aññanti dukkaṭa vatthum

original: Akappamaññanti ettha “maṃsa”nti seso. “Sabbe ekato”ti padacchedo. Ekatoti ettha “madditvā”ti
analyzed: akappam aññanti ettha maṃsanti sesaḥ sabbe ekatas ti padacchedaḥ ekatas ti ettha madditvā ati

original: seso, akappiyamaṃsehi saddhiṃ ekato madditvā khādatīti attho. Sabbametaṃ “gahetvā,
analyzed: sesaḥ akappiya maṃsehi saddhim ekatas madditvā khādati iti attho sabbam etam gahetvā

original: madditvā, khādatī”ti kiriyānaṃ kammavacanaṃ. Manussamaṃsañcāti ettha ca-saddo paccekaṃ
analyzed: madditvā khādati iti kammavacanam manussa maṃsam ca iti ettha ca saddo paccekam

original: yojetabbo hoti. Tassāti bhikkhuniyā. Saṅghādisesapācittiyadukkaṭapāṭidesanīyathullaccayāni ekakkhaṇe honti.
analyzed: yojetabbaḥ hoti tassa ati bhikkhuniyā saṅgha ādisesa pācittiya dukkaṭa pāṭidesanīya thullaccayāni eka khaṇe honti

original: 765. “Puggalo eko”ti padacchedo. Dvepi ca puṇṇavassāti paripuṇṇavīsativassā ca dve
analyzed: puggalaḥ ekaḥ iti padacchedaḥ dve api ca puṇṇa vassā ati paripuṇṇa vīsati vassā ca dve

original: sāmaṇerā. Ekāva tesaṃ pana kammavācāti tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ ekena ācariyena
analyzed: sāmaṇerāḥ ekā ava tesam pana kamma vācā ati tesam ubhinnam sāmaṇerānam ekena ācariyena

original: ekāva upasampadakammavācā katā. Ekassāti ekassāpi sāmaṇerassa. Kammanti upasampadakammaṃ.
analyzed: ekā ava upasampada kamma vācā katā ekassa ati ekassa api sāmaṇerassa kammanti upasampada kammaṃ

original: Na rūhateti na sampajjati, kimettha kāraṇaṃ, vada bhaddamukhāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: na rūhata iti na sampajjati kim ettha kāraṇam vada bhadda mukha ati adhippāyaḥ

original: 766. Mahiddhikesūti dvīsu sāmaṇeresu. Sace pana eko kesaggamattampi ākāsago ākāsaṭṭho
analyzed: mahiddhikesu iti dvīsu sāmaṇeresu sace pana ekaḥ kesagga mattam pi ākāsagaḥ ākāsaṭṭhaḥ

original: hoti, ākāsagatasseva kataṃ taṃ upasampadakammaṃ neva rūhati neva sampajjati, bhūmigatassa rūhatīti yojanā.
analyzed: hoti ākāsa gatassa iva katam tam upasampada kammam na iva rūhati na iva sampajjati bhūmi gatassa rūhati iti yojanā

original: 767. Iddhiyā ākāse ṭhitena saṅghena bhūmigatassa sāmaṇerassa upasampadakammaṃ na
analyzed: iddhiyā ākāse ṭhitena saṅghena bhūmi gatassa sāmaṇerassa upasampada kammam na

original: kātabbaṃ. Yadi karoti, kuppatīti yojanā. Idañca sabbakammānaṃ sādhāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: kātabbam yadi karoti kuppati iti yojanā idam ca sabba kammānam sādhāraṇa lakkhaṇam

original: Yathāha – “saṅghenāpi ākāse nisīditvā bhūmigatassa kammaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Sace karoti, kuppatī”ti.
analyzed: yathā āha saṅghena api ākāse nisīditvā bhūmi gatassa kammam na kātabbam sace karoti kuppati iti

original: 768. Vatthaṃ kappakatañca na hoti, rattañca na hoti, kesakambalādi akappiyañca hoti,
analyzed: vattham kappa katam ca na hoti rattam ca na hoti kesa kambala ādi a kappiyam ca hoti

original: nivatthassa panāpatti taṃ pana nivatthassa bhikkhuno āpatti hoti. Anāpatti kathaṃ
analyzed: nivatthassa pana āpatti tam pana nivatthassa bhikkhuno āpatti hoti anāpatti katham

original: siyā, vada bhaddamukhāti yojanā.
analyzed: siyā vada bhaddamukhā ati yojanā

original: 769. Ettha etasmiṃ akappiyavatthudhāraṇe tannimittaṃ. Acchinnacīvarassa bhikkhuno
analyzed: ettha etasmin akappiya vatthu dhāraṇe tad nimittam acchinna cīvarassa bhikkhuno

original: anāpatti siyāti yojanā. “Kiñcipī”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ samattheti. Assa acchinnacīvarassa
analyzed: anāpatti siyā iti yojanā kiñcipi iti ādinā vuttam eva attham samatthā iti assa acchinna cīvarassa

original: bhikkhussa akappiyaṃ nāma kiñcipi cīvaraṃ na vijjati, tasmā anāpattīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: bhikkhussa akappiyam nāma kiñcipi cīvaram na vijjati tasmai anāpatti iti adhippāyaḥ

original: 770. Kutopi ca purisassa hatthato bhojanassa kiñci na gaṇhati, bhojanato kiñcipi
analyzed: kutas api ca purisassa hatthataḥ bhojanassa kiñci na gaṇhati bhojanato kiñcipi

original: sayampi kassaci purisassa na deti, tathāpi garukaṃ vajjaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ upeti
analyzed: sayam pi kassaci purisassa na deti tathā api garukam vajjam saṅgha ādi sesa āpattim upeti

original: āpajjati, taṃ kathamāpajjati, tvaṃ yadi vinaye kusalo asi, me mayhaṃ vada etaṃ kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: āpajjati tam katham āpajjati tvam yadi vinaye kusalaḥ asi me vada etam kāraṇam

original: kathehīti yojanā. Haveti nipātamattaṃ.
analyzed: kathehi iti yojanā hava iti nipāta mattam

original: 771. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññāya bhikkhuniyā “iṅgha, ayye, yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī aññāya bhikkhuniyā ayye yam te eso purisa puggalo

original: deti khādanīyaṃ vā”tiādinā saṅghādisesamātikāya vuttanayena uyyojitā avassutamhā
analyzed: deti khādanīyam vāti ādinā saṅgha ādi sesa mātikāya vutta nayena uyyojitā avassutamhā

original: purisapuggalā yaṃ kiñci bhojanaṃ ādāya paṭiggahetvā sace bhuñjati, sā tathā bhuñjantī
analyzed: purisa puggalāḥ yam kiñci bhojanam ādāya paṭiggahetvā sace bhuñjati sā tathā bhuñjantī

original: yāya uyyojitā bhuñjati, tassā uyyojikāya dhīrā vinayadharā paṇḍitā saṅghādisesaṃ
analyzed: yāya uyyojitā bhuñjati tassai uyyojikāya dhīrā vinaya dharā paṇḍitā saṅgha ādisesam

original: kathayanti tassā uyyojitāya bhojanapariyosāne uyyojikāya saṅghādisesaṃ vadantīti
analyzed: kathayanti tassai uyyojitāya bhojana pariyosāne uyyojikāya saṅgha ādisesam vadanti iti

original: yojanā. Yathāha – “tassā hi bhojanapariyosāne uyyojikāya saṅghādiseso hotī”ti.
analyzed: yojanā yathā āha tassāḥ hi bhojana pariyosāne uyyojikāya saṅgha ādisesaḥ hoti iti

original: 772. Taṃ kathaṃ yadi bujjhasi jānāsi, sādhukaṃ brūhi kathehīti yojanā.
analyzed: tam katham yadi bujjhasi jānāsi sādhukam brūhi kathehi iti yojanā

original: 773. Niseviteti tāya uyyojitāya bhikkhuniyā tassa purisapuggalassa hatthato paṭiggahite tasmiṃ dantapone paribhutte uyyojikā lahuvajjaṃ āpajjatīti attho.
analyzed: nisevitā iti tāya uyyojitāya bhikkhuniyā tassa purisa puggalassa hatthato paṭiggahite tasmin danta pone paribhutte uyyojikā lahu vajjam āpajjati iti attho

original: 775. “Ukkhittako”ti iminā āpattivajjamāha. Yathāha – “tena hi saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ natthi, tasmā so saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjitvā chādento vajjaṃ na phusatī”ti.
analyzed: ukkhittakaḥ ti iminā āpatti vajjam āha yathā āha tena hi saddhim vinaya kammam na atthi tasmā saḥ saṅgha ādisesam āpajjitvā chādentaḥ vajjam na phusati iti

original: 776. Sappāṇappāṇajanti sappāṇake ca appāṇake ca jātaṃ. Neva jaṅgamanti pādehi bhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: sappāṇa pāṇajanti sappāṇake ca appāṇake ca jātam na iva jaṅgamanti pādehi

original: neva carantaṃ. Na vihaṅgamanti ākāse pakkhaṃ pasāretvā na carantaṃ. Dvijanti dvīhi
analyzed: na iva carantam na vihaṅgamanti ākāse pakkham pasāretvā na carantam dvijanti dvīhi

original: paccayehi, dvikkhattuṃ vā jātattā dvijaṃ. Kantanti manoharaṃ. Akantanti amanoharaṃ.
analyzed: paccayehi dvi kkhattum vā jāta ttā dvijam kantanti manoharam a kantanti a manoharam

original: 777. Sappāṇajo saddo cittajo vutto, appāṇajo utujo saddo vutto, so pana dvīheva paccayehi jātattā “dvijo”ti matoti yojanā.
analyzed: sappāṇa jaḥ saddo citta jaḥ vutto appāṇa jaḥ utu jaḥ saddo vutto so pana dvīhā iva paccayehi jāta ttā dvijaḥ iti mataḥ iti yojanā

original: 778. “Vinaye”tiādigāthā vaṇṇitatthāyeva.
analyzed: vinaya iti ādi gāthā vaṇṇita tthāya iva

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Sedamocanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sā idam mocana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 779-80. Sabbasikkhāpadānanti ubhatovibhaṅgāgatānaṃ sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ. Bhikkhūhi
analyzed: sabba sikkhāpadānam ti ubhatas vibhaṅga āgatānam sabba sikkhāpadānam bhikkhūhi

original: bhikkhunīhīti ubhayattha sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnañca, bhikkhunīhi
analyzed: bhikkhunīhi iti ubhayattha sahatthe karaṇa vacanam bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnam ca bhikkhunīhi

original: bhikkhūnañcāti ubhayattha asādhāraṇapaññattañca, tathā bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnañca,
analyzed: bhikkhūnam ca ati ubhayattha asādhāraṇa paññattam ca tathā bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnam ca

original: bhikkhunīhi bhikkhūnañcāti ubhayattha sādhāraṇasikkhāpadañca ahaṃ vakkhāmīti yojanā.
analyzed: bhikkhunīhi bhikkhūnam ca ati ubhayattha sādhāraṇa sikkhāpadam ca aham vakkhāmi iti yojanā

original: Samāhitāti ekaggacittā. Taṃ mayā vuccamānaṃ nidānādinayaṃ. Suṇāthāti sotujanaṃ sakkaccasavane niyojeti.
analyzed: samāhitā ati ekagga cittā tam mayā vuccamānam nidāna ādi nayam suṇātha iti sotu janam sakkaccasavane niyoja iti

original: 781. “Nidāna”ntiādigāthā vuttatthāva.
analyzed: nidāna nti ādi gāthā

original: 782-3. “Kati vesāliyā”tiādi pucchāgāthā uttānatthāyeva.
analyzed: kati vesāliya atiādi pucchā gāthā uttāna tthāya eva

original: 786. “Dasa vesāliyā”tiādivissajjanagāthānaṃ “methuna”ntiādayo niddesavasena vuttā.
analyzed: dasa vesāliyā ati ādi vissajjana gāthānam methuna nti ādayaḥ niddesa vasena vuttā

original: Viggahoti manussaviggahaṃ pārājikaṃ. Catutthantimavatthukanti uttarimanussadhammapārājikaṃ.
analyzed: viggahaḥ ti manussa viggaham pārājikam catuttha antima vatthukam ti uttari manussa dhamma pārājikam

original: Atirekacīvaranti paṭhamakathinaṃ. Suddhakāḷakeḷakalomakanti eḷakalomavagge dutiyaṃ.
analyzed: atireka cīvaranti paṭhama kathinam suddha kāḷaka iḷaka lomakanti eḷaka loma vagge dutiyam

original: 787. Bhūtanti paṭhame musāvādavagge aṭṭhamaṃ. Paramparañcevāti paramparabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhame musāvāda vagge aṭṭhamam paramparam ca eva ati parampara bhojana sikkhāpadam

original: Mukhadvāranti catutthe bhojanavagge dasamaṃ. Bhikkhunīsu ca akkosoti bhikkhunipātimokkhe
analyzed: mukha dvāran ti catutthe bhojana vagge dasamam bhikkhunīsu ca akkoso ti bhikkhuni pātimokkhe

original: chaṭṭhe ārāmavagge dutiyaṃ.
analyzed: chaṭṭhe ārāma vagge dutiyam

original: 788. Dve anuddhaṃsanānīti aṭṭhamanavamasaṅghādisesā. Cīvarassa paṭiggahoti cīvaravagge pañcamaṃ.
analyzed: dve an uddhaṃsanāni iti aṭṭhama navama saṅgha ādi sesā cīvarassa paṭiggaho ti cīvara vagge pañcamam

original: 789. Rūpiyanti eḷakalomavagge aṭṭhamaṃ. Suttaviññattīti pattavagge chaṭṭhaṃ. Ujjhāpananti
analyzed: rūpiyanti eḷaka loma vagge aṭṭhamam sutta viññattī iti patta vagge chaṭṭham ujjhāpananti

original: dutiye bhūtagāmavagge tatiyaṃ. Paripācitapiṇḍoti tatiye ovādavagge navamaṃ. Tatheva
analyzed: dutiye bhūta gāma vagge tatiyam tatiye ovāda vagge navamam tathā iva

original: gaṇabhojananti catutthe bhojanavagge dutiyaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇa bhojanan ti catutthe bhojana vagge dutiyam

original: 790. Vikāle bhojanañcevāti tattheva sattamaṃ. Cārittanti acelakavagge pañcame chaṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: vikāle bhojanam ca iva ati tattha iva sattamam cārittam ti acelaka vagge pañcame chaṭṭham

original: Nhānanti surāpānavagge chaṭṭhe sattamaṃ. Ūnavīsativassanti sattame sappāṇakavagge
analyzed: surā pāna vagge chaṭṭhe sattamam ūnavīsati vassanti sattame sappāṇaka vagge

original: pañcamaṃ. Datvā saṅghena cīvaranti aṭṭhame sahadhammikavagge navamaṃ.
analyzed: pañcamam da tvā saṅghena aṭṭhame sahadhammika vagge navamam

original: 791. Vosāsantīti dutiyaṃ bhikkhupāṭidesanīyaṃ. Naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vāti paṭhame lasuṇavagge
analyzed: vosāsanti iti dutiyam bhikkhu pāṭidesanīyam naccam vā gītam vā ati paṭhame lasuṇa vagge

original: dasamaṃ. Cārikadvayanti catutthe tuvaṭṭavagge sattamaṭṭhamāni. Chandadānenāti aṭṭhame
analyzed: dasamam cārika dvayanti catutthe tuvaṭṭa vagge sattama ṭṭhamāni chanda dānena ati aṭṭhame

original: kumāribhūtavagge ekādasamaṃ. “Chandadānetī”ti vā pāṭho. “Chandadānaṃ iti ime”ti padacchedo.
analyzed: kumāri bhūta vagge ekādasamam chanda dāna iti iti vā pāṭhaḥ chanda dānam iti ime iti padacchedaḥ

original: 792. Kuṭīti chaṭṭho saṅghādiseso. Kosiyanti nissaggiyesu dutiye eḷakalomavagge paṭhamaṃ.
analyzed: kuṭī iti chaṭṭho saṅgha ādiseso nissaggiyesu dutiye eḷaka loma vagge paṭhamam

original: Seyyanti musāvādavagge pañcamaṃ. Pathavīti musāvādavagge dasamaṃ. Bhūtagāmakanti
analyzed: seyyanti musāvāda vagge pañcamam pathavī iti musāvāda vagge dasamam bhūtagāmakam ti

original: bhūtagāmavagge dutiye paṭhamaṃ. Sappāṇakañca siñcantīti bhūtagāmavagge dasamaṃ.
analyzed: bhūta gāma vagge dutiye paṭhamam sappāṇakam ca siñcanti iti bhūta gāma vagge dasamam

original: 800. Chaūnāni tīṇeva satānīti chahi ūnāni tīṇeva satāni, catunavutādhikāni dvisatānīti attho. Samacetasāti –
analyzed: cha ūnāni tīṇi iva satāni iti chahi ūnāni tīṇi iva satāni catunavuta adhikāni dvi satāni iti attho sama cetasā ati

original: “Vadhake devadattamhi, core aṅgulimālake;
analyzed: vadhake core aṅguli mālake

original: Dhanapāle rāhule ca, sabbattha samamānaso”ti. –
analyzed: dhanapāle rāhule ca sabbattha sama mānasaḥ ti

original: Vacanato sabbesu hitāhitesu, lābhālābhādīsu ca aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu nibbikāratāya ca samānacittena tathāgatena.
analyzed: vacanato sabbesu hita ahitesu lābha alābha ādīsu ca aṭṭhasu loka dhammesu nibbikāratāya ca samāna cittena tathāgatena

original: Vuttāvasesāti vesāliyādīsu chasu nagaresu vuttehi avasiṭṭhāni. Ime sabbe imāni sabbāni sikkhāpadāni sāvatthiyaṃ katāni bhavanti, paññattāni hontīti attho.
analyzed: vutta avasesā ti vesāliya ādīsu chasu nagaresu vuttehi avasiṭṭhāni ime sabbe imāni sabbāni sikkhāpadāni sāvatthiyam katāni bhavanti paññattāni honti iti attho

original: 801. Pārājikāni cattārīti vesāliyaṃ vuttaṃ methunamanussaviggahauttarimanussadhammaṃ,
analyzed: pārājikāni cattāri iti vesāliyam vuttam methuna manussa viggaha uttari manussa dhammam

original: rājagahe adinnādānanti cattāri. Satta saṅghādisesakāti rājagahe vuttā dve anuddhaṃsanā,
analyzed: rāja gahe adinnādānanti cattāri satta saṅgha ādisesakā ati rāja gahe vuttā dve anuddhaṃsanā

original: dve ca bhedā, āḷaviyaṃ kuṭikāro, kosambiyaṃ mahallakavihāro, dovacassanti satta.
analyzed: dve ca bhedāḥ āḷaviyam kuṭi kāraḥ kosambiyam mahallaka vihāro satta

original: Nissaggiyāni aṭṭhevāti vesāliyaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ, kāḷakaeḷakalomaṃ, rājagahe cīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: nissaggiyāni aṭṭha eva ati vesāliyam atireka cīvaram kāḷaka eḷaka lomam rājagahe cīvara paṭiggahaṇam

original: rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇaṃ, suttaviññatti, āḷaviyaṃ kosiyamissakaṃ, kapilavatthumhi eḷakalomadhovanaṃ,
analyzed: rūpiya paṭiggahaṇam sutta viññatti āḷaviyam kosiya missakam kapilavatthumhi eḷaka loma dhovanam

original: ūnapañcabandhananti aṭṭha.
analyzed: ūna pañca bandhananti aṭṭha

original: Dvattiṃseva ca khuddakāti vesāliyaṃ bhūtārocanaṃ, paramparabhojanaṃ, appaṭiggahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: dvattiṃsā iva ca khuddakā ati vesāliyam bhūta ārocanam parampara bhojanam a paṭiggahaṇam

original: acelakaṃ, “yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuṃ akkoseyyā”ti pañca, rājagahe ujjhāpanakaṃ,
analyzed: acelakam yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhum akkoseyya ati pañca rājagahe ujjhāpanakam

original: bhikkhuniparipācitapiṇḍo, gaṇabhojanaṃ, vikālabhojanaṃ, “yo pana bhikkhu nimantito”tiādi
analyzed: bhikkhuni paripācita piṇḍaḥ gaṇa bhojanam vikāla bhojanam yaḥ pana bhikkhu nimantito tiādi

original: ca, “orenaḍḍhamāsaṃ nahāyeyyā”ti, ūnavīsativassaṃ, “samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā”ti
analyzed: ca orenaḍḍha māsam nahāyeyya ati ūnavīsati vassam samaggena saṅghena cīvaram da tvā ati

original: bhikkhūnaṃ aṭṭha, bhikkhunīnaṃ pana “naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā”tiādi ca, “yā pana bhikkhunī
analyzed: bhikkhūnam aṭṭha bhikkhunīnam pana naccam vā gītam vā ati ādi ca yā pana bhikkhunī

original: antovassa”ntiādi ca, “yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvutthā”tiādi cāti dvayaṃ, “yā pana
analyzed: antovassanti ādi ca yā pana bhikkhunī ca ati dvayam yā pana

original: bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānenā”tiādi cāti cattāri, āḷaviyaṃ anupasampannena uttari
analyzed: bhikkhunī pārivāsika chanda dānena atiādi ca ati cattāri āḷaviyam an upasampannena uttari

original: dirattatirattaṃ, “pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā”tiādi, bhūtagāmapātabyatāya, “jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ
analyzed: dirattatirattam pathavim khaṇeyya vātiādi bhūta gāma pātabyatāya jānam sappāṇakam

original: udaka”nti cattāri, kosambiyaṃ aññavādake vihesake, yāvadvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya,
analyzed: udakan ti cattāri kosambiyam aññavādake vihesake yāvadvārakosāḥ aggaḷa ṭṭhapanāya

original: surāmerayapāne, anādariye, “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammika”ntiādi cāti pañca,
analyzed: surā meraya pāne anādariye yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi ca ati pañca

original: kapilavatthumhi “bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā”tiādi, “agilānena bhikkhunā cātumāsa”ntiādi,
analyzed: kapilavatthumhi bhikkhun upassayam gantvā atiādi agilānena bhikkhunā

original: “aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā”tiādi tīṇi bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhunīnaṃ pana “udakasuddhikaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhi mayam vā danta mayam vā ati ādi tīṇi bhikkhūnam bhikkhunīnam pana udaka suddhikam

original: panā”tiādi, “ovādāya vā”tiādīti dve, bhaggesu “agilāno visibbanāpekkho”tiādi ekanti
analyzed: pana atiādi ovādāya vā iti ādi iti dve bhaggesu agilānaḥ visibbana apekkhaḥ itiādi ekam ti

original: etāni bāttiṃseva pācittiyāni.
analyzed: etāni bāttiṃsa iva pācittiyāni

original: 802. Dve gārayhāti “bhikkhu paneva kulesū”tiādi, “yāni kho pana tāni āraññakānī”tiādi
analyzed: dve gārayhāti bhikkhu pana iva kulesu utiādi yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni itiādi

original: cāti dve pāṭidesanīyā. Tayo sekhāti kosambiyaṃ na surusurukārakaṃ, bhaggesu na sāmisena
analyzed: ca ati dve pāṭidesanīyā tayo kosambiyam na surusurukārakam bhaggesu na sa āmisena

original: hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ, na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovananti tīṇi sekhiyāni. Chappaññāseva
analyzed: hatthena na sa sitthakam patta dhovananti tīṇi sekhiyāni chappaññāsā iva

original: sikkhāpadāni piṇḍitāni vesāliyādīsu chasu nagaresu paññattāni bhavantīti yojanā.
analyzed: sikkhāpadāni piṇḍitāni vesāliya ādīsu chasu nagaresu paññattāni bhavanti iti yojanā

original: 803. Sattasu nagaresu paññattāni etāni sabbāneva sikkhāpadāni pana aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāneva
analyzed: sattasu nagaresu paññattāni etāni sabbāna eva sikkhāpadāni pana aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāna eva

original: bhavanti. Sāvatthiyaṃ paññattehi catunavutādhikadvisatasikkhāpadehi saddhiṃ chasu
analyzed: bhavanti sāvatthiyam paññattehi catunavuta adhika dvisata sikkhāpadehi saddhim chasu

original: nagaresu paññattāni chapaññāsa sikkhāpadāni paññāsādhikāni tīṇi satāni bhavantīti
analyzed: nagaresu paññattāni chapaññāsa sikkhāpadāni paññāsa adhikāni tīṇi satāni bhavanti iti

original: attho. Aḍḍhena catutthaṃ yesaṃ tāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni.
analyzed: atthaḥ aḍḍhena catuttham yesam tāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni

original: 804-10. Evaṃ nidānavasena nagaraṃ dassetvā idāni nidānamaññamasesetvā ubhatovibhaṅgāgatānaṃ
analyzed: evam nidāna vasena nagaram dassetvā idāni nidānam aññam asesetvā ubhatas vibhaṅga āgatānam

original: sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ kevalaṃ piṇḍavasena gaṇanaṃ dassetumāha “sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūna”ntiādi.
analyzed: sabbesam sikkhāpadānam kevalam piṇḍa vasena gaṇanam dassetum āha sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ tiādi

original: 811. Evaṃ sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ nidānañca gaṇanañca dassetvā idāni asādhāraṇāni dassetumāha
analyzed: evam sabba sikkhāpadānam nidānam ca gaṇanam ca dassetvā idāni asādhāraṇāni dassetum āha

original: “chacattālīsā”tiādi. Bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇabhāvaṃ mahesinā gamitāni sikkhāpadāni
analyzed: bhikkhūnam bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇa bhāvam mahesinā gamitāni sikkhāpadāni

original: chacattālīseva hontīti yojanā. Iminā uddesamāha.
analyzed: chacattālīsā iva honti iti yojanā iminā uddesam āha

original: 814. “Cha ca saṅghādisesā”tiādīhi dvīhi gāthāhi niddesaṃ dassetvā “vissaṭṭhī”tiādinā paṭiniddesamāha.
analyzed: cha ca saṅgha ādi sesā tiādīhi dvīhi gāthāhi niddesam dassetvā vissaṭṭhī iti ādinā paṭiniddesam āha

original: 815. “Nissaggiye ādivaggasmi”nti padacchedo. Dhovananti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaradhovanaṃ. Paṭiggahoti tassāyeva hatthato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: nissaggiye ādi vaggasmin ti pada chedaḥ dhovananti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvara dhovanam paṭiggahoti tassāya iva hatthato cīvara paṭiggahaṇam

original: 816. Āraññanti ekūnatiṃsatimaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: āraññanti ekūnatiṃsatimam sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 817. Bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhunīnañca vuttāni sabbāni pācittiyāni gaṇanāvasā aṭṭhāsītisataṃ
analyzed: bhikkhūnam bhikkhunīnam ca vuttāni sabbāni pācittiyāni gaṇanā vasā aṭṭhāsīti satam

original: bhavantīti yojanā. Aṭṭhāsītisatanti bhikkhunipātimokkhāgataṃ chasaṭṭhisatapācittiyaṃ
analyzed: bhavanti iti yojanā aṭṭhāsīti satam ti bhikkhuni pātimokkha āgatam cha saṭṭhi sata pācittiyam

original: vakkhamānehi bhikkhuniyatehi bāvīsatipācittiyehi saddhiṃ aṭṭhāsītisataṃ hoti. Tatoti
analyzed: vakkhamānehi bhikkhuniyatehi bāvīsati pācittiyehi saddhim aṭṭhāsīti satam hoti tatoti

original: aṭṭhāsītādhikasatapācittiyato niddhāritāni etāni dvāvīsati khuddakāni bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhāsīta adhika sata pācittiyataḥ niddhāritāni etāni dvāvīsati khuddakāni bhikkhūnam

original: pātimokkhake bhavantīti yojanā.
analyzed: pātimokkhake bhavanti iti yojanā

original: 818. Bhikkhunivaggoti bhikkhunīnaṃ ovādavaggo. Paramparabhojane paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ, paramparabhojanena saha vattatīti saparamparabhojano.
analyzed: bhikkhuni vaggo ti bhikkhunīnam ovāda vaggo parampara bhojane paññattam sikkhāpadam parampara bhojanam parampara bhojanena saha vattati iti sa parampara bhojanaḥ

original: 822. “Ekato pana paññattā”tiādi nigamanaṃ. Bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇataṃ gatā ekatova paññattā ime imāni sikkhāpadāni piṇḍitāni chacattālīsa hontīti yojanā.
analyzed: ekatas pana paññattā ati ādi nigamanam bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇa tam gatā ekatas va paññattā ime imāni sikkhāpadāni piṇḍitāni cha cattālīsa honti iti yojanā

original: 823. Mahesinā bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇabhāvaṃ gamitāni bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadāni paripiṇḍitāni sataṃ, tiṃsa ca bhavantīti yojanā.
analyzed: mahesinā bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇa bhāvam gamitāni bhikkhunīnam sikkhāpadāni paripiṇḍitāni satam tiṃsa ca bhavanti iti yojanā

original: 824. Evaṃ uddiṭṭhānaṃ niddesamāha “pārājikānī”tiādinā. Pārājikāni cattārīti ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikavajjapaṭicchādikaukkhittānuvattikaaṭṭhavatthukasaṅkhātāni cattāri pārājikāni.
analyzed: evam niddesam āha pārājikāni iti ādinā pārājikāni cattāri iti ubbhaja aṇumaṇḍalika vajja paṭicchādika okkhitta anuvattika aṭṭhavatthuka saṅkhātāni cattāri pārājikāni

original: 826. Dvīhi gāthāhi niddiṭṭhānaṃ paṭiniddeso “bhikkhunīnaṃ tu saṅghādisesehī”tiādi.
analyzed: dvīhi gāthāhi niddiṭṭhānam paṭiniddesaḥ bhikkhunīnam tu saṅgha ādisesehi itiādi

original: Catunnaṃ pārājikānaṃ uddesavaseneva pākaṭattā paṭiniddese aggahaṇaṃ. Ādito chāti
analyzed: catunnam pārājikānam uddesa vasena iva pākaṭa ttā paṭiniddese aggahaṇam āditas

original: ussayavādikādayo cha saṅghādisesā. “Ādito”ti idaṃ “yāvatatiyakā”ti imināpi yojetabbaṃ,
analyzed: ussaya vādika ādayaḥ cha saṅgha ādi sesāḥ āditaḥ ti idam iminā api yojetabbam

original: aṭṭhasu yāvatatiyakesu purimāni cattāri sikkhāpadānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: aṭṭhasu yāvatatiyakesu purimāni cattāri sikkhāpadāni iti vuttam hoti

original: 827. Sattaññadatthikādīnīti ādi-saddena aññadatthikasikkhāpadato pacchimāni cattāri,
analyzed: satta ññadatthika ādīni iti ādi saddena aññadatthika sikkhāpadato pacchimāni cattāri

original: purimāni “aññaṃ viññāpeyya, aññaṃ cetāpeyyā”ti dve ca gahitāni. Patto cevāti paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: purimāni aññam viññāpeyya aññam cetāpeyya ati dve ca gahitāni patto ca iva ati paṭhamam

original: pattasannicayasikkhāpadamāha. Dutiyavagge purimasikkhāpadadvayaṃ “garuṃ lahu”nti iminā gahitaṃ.
analyzed: patta sannicaya sikkhāpadam āha dutiya vagge purima sikkhāpada dvayam iminā gahitam

original: 828. Idha bhikkhunipātimokkhe etāni pana dvādaseva nissaggiyāni satthārā bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena ekato paññattānīti yojanā.
analyzed: idha bhikkhuni pātimokkhe etāni pana dvādasa iva nissaggiyāni satthārā bhikkhunīnam vasena ekatas paññattāni iti yojanā

original: 829-30. “Sabbeva gaṇanāvasā”tiādi nigamanaṃ. Bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇataṃ gatā bhikkhunīnaṃ ekato paññattā sataṃ, tiṃsa bhavantīti yojanā.
analyzed: sabbā iva gaṇanā avasā ati ādi nigamanam bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇatam gatā bhikkhunīnam ekatas paññattā satam tiṃsa bhavanti iti yojanā

original: 831-3. “Asādhāraṇā ubhinna”nti padacchedo. Ubhinnaṃ asādhāraṇasikkhāpadāni satañca
analyzed: asādhāraṇāḥ pada chedaḥ asādhāraṇa sikkhāpadāni

original: sattati ca cha ca bhavanti. Evamuddiṭṭhānaṃ niddeso “pārājikāni cattārī”tiādi. Bhikkhūhi
analyzed: sattati ca cha ca bhavanti evam uddiṭṭhānam niddeso pārājikāni cattāri iti ādi bhikkhūhi

original: asādhāraṇāni bhikkhunīnaṃ cattāri pārājikāni. Dasaccha cāti bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni
analyzed: asādhāraṇāni bhikkhunīnam cattāri pārājikāni dasaccha ca ati bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni

original: bhikkhunīnaṃ saṅghādisesā dasa, bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnaṃ vissaṭṭhiādikā
analyzed: bhikkhunīnam saṅgha adisesāḥ dasa bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnam vissaṭṭhi ādikā

original: saṅghādisesā cha cāti saṅghādisesā soḷasa.
analyzed: saṅgha ādisesā cha ca ati saṅgha ādisesā soḷasa

original: Aniyatā duve cevāti bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnaṃ aniyatā dve ca. Nissaggā
analyzed: aniyatā duve ca iva ati bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnam aniyatā dve ca nissaggā

original: catuvīsatīti bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnaṃ dvādasa, bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni
analyzed: catuvīsati iti bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnam dvādasa bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni

original: bhikkhunīnaṃ dvādasāti evaṃ nissaggiyā catuvīsati ca. Sataṃ aṭṭhārasa khuddakāti
analyzed: bhikkhunīnam dvādasa ati evam nissaggiyā catuvīsati ca satam aṭṭhārasa khuddakā ati

original: bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnaṃ bāvīsati, bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhunīnaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnam bāvīsati bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhunīnam

original: channavutīti aṭṭhārasādhikasataṃ khuddakāni ca. Etthāti imasmiṃ asādhāraṇasaṅgahe.
analyzed: channavuti iti aṭṭhārasa adhika satam khuddakāni ca ettha iti imasmin asādhāraṇa saṅgahe

original: Dvādaseva ca gārayhāti bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri, bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni
analyzed: dvādasa iva ca bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāni bhikkhūnam cattāri bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni

original: bhikkhunīnaṃ aṭṭhāti ete pāṭidesanīyā cāti ime chasattatiadhikāni satasikkhāpadāni
analyzed: bhikkhunīnam aṭṭha ati ete pāṭidesanīyā ca ati ime cha sattati adhikāni sata sikkhāpadāni

original: ubhinnampi asādhāraṇānīti yojanā.
analyzed: asādhāraṇāni iti yojanā

original: 834. Ubhinnampi sādhāraṇāni satthunā paññattāni sikkhāpadāni satañca sattati ca cattāri ca bhavantīti pakāsitāti yojanā.
analyzed: ubhinnam pi sādhāraṇāni satthunā paññattāni sikkhāpadāni satam ca sattati ca cattāri ca bhavanti iti pakāsitā ati yojanā

original: 835-6. Pārājikāni cattārīti methunaadinnādānamanussaviggahauttarimanussadhammapārājikāni
analyzed: pārājikāni cattāri iti methuna a dinnādāna manussa viggaha auttari manussa dhamma pārājikāni

original: cattāri ca. Satta saṅghādisesakāti sañcarittaamūlakaaññabhāgiyā, cattāro yāvatatiyakā
analyzed: cattāri ca satta saṅgha ādisesakā ati cattāraḥ yāvatatiyakā

original: cāti saṅghādisesā satta ca. Aṭṭhārasa ca nissaggāti nissaggiyesu paṭhame cīvaravagge
analyzed: ca ati saṅgha ādi sesā satta ca aṭṭhārasa ca nissaggā ati nissaggiyesu paṭhame cīvara vagge

original: dhovanapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadadvayavajjitāni aṭṭha, eḷakalomavagge aṭṭhamanavamadasamānīti
analyzed: dhovana paṭiggahaṇa sikkhāpada dvaya vajjitāni aṭṭha eḷaka loma vagge aṭṭhama navama dasamāni iti

original: tayo, pattavagge paṭhamapattavassikasāṭikaāraññakasikkhāpadattayassa vajjitāni satta
analyzed: tayo patta vagge paṭhama patta vassika sāṭika āraññaka sikkhāpadattayassa vajjitāni satta

original: cāti imāni aṭṭhārasa nissaggiyasikkhāpadāni ca. Samasattati khuddakāti –
analyzed: ca ati imāni aṭṭhārasa nissaggiya sikkhāpadāni ca sama sattati khuddakā ati

original: “Sabbo bhikkhunivaggopi…pe… dvāvīsati bhavanti hī”ti. –
analyzed: sabbaḥ bhikkhuni vaggo pipe dvāvīsati bhavanti hi iti

original: Vuttā bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇāti imehi bāvīsatipācittiyehi vajjitāni avasesāni
analyzed: vuttā bhikkhūnam bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā ati imehi bāvīsati pācittiyehi vajjitāni avasesāni

original: sattati pācittiyāni ca ubhayasādhāraṇavasena paññattāni. Pañcasattati sekhiyāpi cāti
analyzed: sattati pācittiyāni ca ubhaya sādhāraṇa vasena paññattāni pañca sattati sekhiyā api ca ati

original: ubhinnaṃ bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṃ samasikkhatā sādhāraṇasikkhāpadāni sabbaso sataṃ, sattati,
analyzed: ubhinnam bhikkhu bhikkhunīnam samasikkhatā sādhāraṇa sikkhāpadāni sabbaso satam sattati

original: cattāri ca hontīti yojanā.
analyzed: cattāri ca honti iti yojanā

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇa kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Lakkhaṇakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: lakkhaṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 837. Itoti sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇakathāya paraṃ. Sabbaganti sabbasikkhāpadasādhāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: itas ti sādhāraṇa asādhāraṇa kathāya param sabbagam ti sabba sikkhāpada sādhāraṇam

original: Vadato meti vadato mama vacanaṃ. Nibodhathāti nisāmetha, ekaggacittā hutvā sakkaccaṃ suṇāthāti attho.
analyzed: vadataḥ mā iti vadataḥ mama vacanam nibodhatha ati nisāmetha ekagga cittā hutvā sakkaccam suṇātha ati attho

original: 838-9. “Vipatti āpatti anāpattī”ti padacchedo. “Āṇatti aṅga”nti padacchedo. Vajjakammapabhedakanti
analyzed: vipatti āpatti anāpatti iti padacchedaḥ āṇatti aṅga nti padacchedaḥ

original: vajjapabhedakaṃ kammapabhedakaṃ. Tikadvayanti kusalattikavedanāttikadvayaṃ. Sabbatthāti
analyzed: vajja pabhedakam kamma pabhedakam tika dvayanti kusala ttika vedanā ttika dvayam sabbattha ati

original: idaṃ pana sattarasavidhasabbasādhāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Sabbattha sabbesu sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: idam pana satta rasavidha sabba sādhāraṇa lakkhaṇam sabbattha sabbesu sikkhāpadesu

original: 840. Idha imasmiṃ sattarasavidhe yaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pubbe vuttanayaṃ, yañca uttānaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ vajjetvā atthajotanaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ karissāmīti yojanā.
analyzed: idha imasmin sattarasavidhe yam lakkhaṇam pubbe vutta nayam yam ca uttānam tam sabbam vajjetvā attha jotanam attha ppakāsanam karissāmi iti yojanā

original: 841. Nidānaṃ nāma rājagahādisikkhāpadapaññattiṭṭhānabhūtāni satta nagarāni, taṃ pubbe
analyzed: nidānam nāma rājagaha ādi sikkhāpada paññatti ṭṭhāna bhūtāni satta nagarāni tam pubbe

original: dassitanti avasiṭṭhāni dassetumāha “puggalo”tiādi. Puggalo nāma katamo? Yaṃ yaṃ bhikkhuniṃ,
analyzed: dassitam ti avasiṭṭhāni dassetum āha puggala itiādi puggalaḥ nāma katamaḥ yam yam bhikkhunim

original: bhikkhuñca ārabbha sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, ayaṃ bhikkhunī ca bhikkhu ca sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
analyzed: bhikkhuñca ārabbha sikkhāpadam paññattam ayam bhikkhunī ca bhikkhu ca sikkhāpada paññattiyā

original: ādikammiko puggaloti vuccatīti yojanā.
analyzed: ādikammiko puggalo ti vuccati iti yojanā

original: 842. Dhaniyādayoti ādi-saddena sambahulā bhikkhū, vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū, seyyasako,
analyzed: dhaniya ādayaḥ ti ādi saddena sambahalāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhū

original: udāyī, āḷavakā bhikkhū, channo, mettiyabhūmajakā, devadatto, assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū,
analyzed: udāyī āḷavakā bhikkhū channaḥ mettiya bhūmajakā devadatto assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū

original: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū, upanando sakyaputto, aññataro bhikkhu, hatthako sakyaputto,
analyzed: chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū upanandaḥ sakyaputto aññataraḥ bhikkhu hatthakaḥ sakyaputto

original: anuruddho, sattarasavaggiyā bhikkhū, cūḷapanthako, belaṭṭhasīso, āyasmā ānando, sāgatatthero,
analyzed: anuruddhaḥ satta rasa vaggiyāḥ bhikkhū cūḷapanthako belaṭṭhasīsaḥ āyasmā ānandaḥ sāgata thero

original: ariṭṭho bhikkhu, āyasmā ānandoti ime ekavīsati saṅgahitā.
analyzed: ariṭṭhaḥ bhikkhu āyasmai ānando ti ime ekavīsati saṅgahitā

original: 843. Thullanandādayoti ādi-saddena sundarīnandā, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo, aññatarā
analyzed: thullananda ādayo ti ādi saddena sundarīnandā chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ aññatarā

original: bhikkhunī, caṇḍakāḷī, sambahulā bhikkhuniyo, dve bhikkhuniyoti chayime saṅgahitā.
analyzed: bhikkhunī caṇḍakāḷī sambahulāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ dve bhikkhuniyaḥ ti chayime saṅgahitā

original: Sabbeti ubhayapātimokkhe ādikammikā sabbe puggalā.
analyzed: sabbe ti ubhaya pātimokkhe ādikammikā sabbe puggalā

original: 844. Vatthūti vatthu nāma sudinnādino tassa tasseva puggalassa methunādikassa ca vatthuno sabbappakārena ajjhācāro vītikkamo pavuccatīti yojanā.
analyzed: vatthu uti vatthu nāma sudinna ādinaḥ tassa tassa iva puggalassa methuna ādikassa ca vatthuno sabba ppakārena ajjhācāraḥ vītikkamaḥ pavuccati iti yojanā

original: 845-6. Kevalā mūlabhūtā paññatti. Anu ca anuppanno ca sabbattha ca padeso ca anvanuppannasabbatthapadesā,
analyzed: kevalā mūla bhūtā paññatti anu ca anuppannaḥ ca sabbattha ca padeso ca anu anuppanna sabbattha padesā

original: teyeva padāni anvanuppannasabbatthapadesapadāni, tāni pubbakāni yāsaṃ paññattīnaṃ
analyzed: teyeva padāni anvanuppanna sabbattha padesa padāni tāni pubbakāni yāsam paññattīnam

original: tā anvanuppannasabbatthapadesapadapubbikā. Tatheva sā paññattīti yojanā. Anupaññatti
analyzed: tāḥ anu anuppanna sabba ttha padesa pada pubbikā tathā iva sā pañatti iti yojanā anupaññatti

original: anuppannapaññatti sabbatthapaññatti padesapaññatti hoti. Ekato ubhato pubbā katheva
analyzed: anuppanna paññatti sabbattha paññatti padesa paññatti hoti ekatas ubhatas pubbā kathā iva

original: sā paññattīti yojanā. Ekatopadaṃ ubhatopadañca pubbamassāti ekatoubhatopubbā, ekatopaññatti
analyzed: sā paññatti iti yojanā ekatas padam ubhatas padam ca pubbam assa ati ekatas ubhatas pubbā ekatas paññatti

original: ubhatopaññattīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ubhatas paññattī iti vuttam hoti

original: 847. Tattha navadhāsu paññattīsu. Paññatti nāma katamāti āha “yo methuna”ntiādi.
analyzed: tattha navadhāsu paññattīsu paññatti nāma katamā iti āha yaḥ methuna ntiādi

original: “Yo bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti ca “yo bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyeyyā”ti ca
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu methunam dhammam paṭiseveyya ati ca yaḥ bhikkhu adinnam ādiyeyya ati ca

original: evamādikā sikkhāpadassa mūlabhūtā paññatti hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: evamādikā sikkhāpadassa mūla bhūtā paññatti hoti iti yojanā

original: 848. Iccevamādikāti ādi-saddena “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti ca “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti ca evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
analyzed: icca evamādikā iti ādi saddena sikkham a paccakkhāya dubbalyam anāvika tvā iti ca gāmā vā araññā vā iti ca evamādīnam saṅgahaḥ

original: 849. Vajjake anuppanneyeva paññattā anuppannapaññatti, sā anuppannapaññatti.
analyzed: vajjake an uppannā iya eva paññattā an uppanna paññatti sā an uppanna paññatti

original: 850-1. Guṇaṅguṇupāhanasikkhāpadena saha cammattharaṇasikkhāpadañca dhuvanhānaṃ dhuvanahānasikkhāpadaṃ,
analyzed: guṇaṅguṇupāhana sikkhāpadena saha cammattharaṇa sikkhāpadam ca dhuvan hānam dhuvana hāna sikkhāpadam

original: pañcavaggena upasampādanasikkhāpadañcāti esā catubbidhā paññatti padesapaññatti nāmāti
analyzed: pañca vaggena upasampādana sikkhāpadam ca ati esā catubbidhā paññatti padesapaññatti nāma ati

original: vuttāti yojanā. Majjhimadesasmiṃyeva hotīti majjhimadesasmiṃyeva āpattikarā hoti.
analyzed: vuttā iti yojanā majjhima desasmiṃ yeva hoti iti majjhima desasmiṃ yeva āpatti karā hoti

original: Na aññatoti na aññatra paccantimesu janapadesu desantare ṭhāne.
analyzed: na aññatoti na aññatra paccantimesu janapadesu desantare ṭhāne

original: 852. Itoti catubbidhapadesapaññattito. Etthāti imasmiṃ paññattibhede. Sādhāraṇadukādikanti
analyzed: itas ti catubbidha padesa paññattitaḥ ettha ati imasmin paññatti bhede sādhāraṇa duka ādikam ti

original: sādhāraṇapaññatti asādhāraṇapaññatti, ekatopaññatti ubhatopaññattīti dukadvayaṃ.
analyzed: sādhāraṇa paññatti asādhāraṇa paññatti ekatas paññatti ubhatas paññatti iti duka dvayam

original: Atthato ekamevāti atthato aññamaññasamānameva. Vipattāpattānāpattivinicchayo vitthāritoti
analyzed: atthataḥ ekam eva ati atthataḥ aññam añña samānam eva vipatta āpatta anāpatti vinicchayaḥ vitthāritaḥ ti

original: idha na dassito. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – vipattīti sīlaācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattīnaṃ
analyzed: idha na dassitaḥ ayam pana ittha saṅkhepaḥ vipatti iti sīla ācāra diṭṭhi ājīva vipattīnam

original: aññatarā. Āpattīti pubbapayogādivasena āpattibhedo. Anāpattīti ajānanādivasena anāpatti.
analyzed: aññatarā āpattī ti pubba payoga ādi vasena āpatti bhedaḥ anāpattī iti ajānana ādi vasena anāpatti

original: 853. Āpatti pana sāṇattikāpi hoti, anāṇattikāpi hotīti yojanā. “Āṇattīti ca nāmesā āṇāpanā”ti iminā āṇatti-saddassa sabhāvasādhāraṇattāti idhāha.
analyzed: āpatti pana sa āṇattikā api hoti an āṇattikā api hoti iti yojanā āṇatti iti ca nāma isā āṇāpanā ti iminā āṇatti saddassa sabhāva sādhāraṇa ttā ti idha āha

original: 854. Sabbasikkhāpadesupi sabbāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ sabbo pana aṅgabhedopi vibhāvinā ñātabboti yojanā.
analyzed: sabba sikkhāpadesu pi sabbāsam āpattīnam sabbaḥ pana aṅga bhedaḥ api vibhāvinā ñātabbaḥ iti yojanā

original: 856. “Sā ca akriyasamuṭṭhānā”ti padacchedo. Kāyena, vācāya vā dasāhabbhantare atirekacīvarassa anadhiṭṭhānena nissaggiyapācittiyaṃ hotīti “paṭhame kathine viyā”ti udāharaṇaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: sā ca akriya samuṭṭhānā iti pada chedaḥ kāyena vācāya vā atireka cīvarassa anadhiṭṭhānena nissaggiya pācittiyam hoti iti paṭhame udāharaṇam katam

original: 857. Kriyākriyato hotīti kiriyato ca akiriyato ca hoti. Tattha udāharaṇamāha “cīvaraggahaṇe
analyzed: kriyā akriyataḥ hoti iti kiriyataḥ ca akiriyataḥ ca hoti tattha udāharaṇam āha cīvara ggahaṇe

original: viyā”ti. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraggahaṇaṃ kriyā, pārivattakassa adānaṃ
analyzed: viyāti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyāḥ hatthataḥ cīvara ggahaṇam kriyā pārivattakassa adānam

original: akriyāti evaṃ kiriyāya ceva akiriyāya ca imaṃ āpajjati.
analyzed: evam kiriyāya ca iva a kiriyāya ca imam āpajjati

original: 858. Siyā pana karontassa akarontassāti yā pana āpatti siyā karontassa, siyā akarontassa
analyzed: siyā pana karontassa a karontassa ati yā pana āpatti siyā karontassa siyā a karontassa

original: hoti, ayaṃ siyā kiriyato, siyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti. Siyāti ca kadāci-saddatthe nipāto.
analyzed: hoti ayam siyā kiriyataḥ siyā a kiriyataḥ samuṭṭhāti siyā iti ca kadācisadda atthe nipātaḥ

original: Atrodāharaṇamāha “rūpiyoggahaṇe viyā”ti. Rūpiyassa uggahaṇe, uggaṇhāpane siyā kadāci
analyzed: atra udāharaṇam āha rūpiya uggahaṇe viyā ati rūpiyassa uggahaṇe uggaṇhāpane siyā kadāci

original: kiriyato samuṭṭhāti, upanikkhittassa sādiyane kāyavācāhi kātabbassa akaraṇena kadāci akarontassa hotīti.
analyzed: kiriyataḥ samuṭṭhāti upanikkhittassa sādiyane kāya vācāhi kātabbassa a karaṇena kadāci a karontassa hoti iti

original: 859. Yā karoto akubbato, kadāci karontassa ca hoti, sā āpatti siyā kiriyākiriyato,
analyzed: yā karotaḥ a kubbataḥ kadāci karontassa ca hoti sā āpatti siyā kiriyā a kiriyato

original: siyā kiriyatopi ca hotīti yojanā. “Kuṭikārāpatti viyā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sā hi vatthuṃ
analyzed: siyā kiriyataḥ api ca hoti iti yojanā kuṭi kārā āpatti viya iti vattabbam sā hi vatthum

original: desāpetvā pamāṇātikkantaṃ karoto kiriyato samuṭṭhāti, adesāpetvā pamāṇātikkantaṃ,
analyzed: desāpetvā pamāṇa atikkantam karotaḥ kiriyato samuṭṭhāti a desāpetvā pamāṇa atikkantam

original: pamāṇayuttaṃ vā karoto kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: pamāṇa yuttam vā karotaḥ kiriyā a kiriyato samuṭṭhāti

original: 861. Yato āpattito. Ayaṃ āpatti. Saññāya karaṇabhūtāya vimokkho etāyāti saññāvimokkhā.
analyzed: yatas āpattitaḥ ayam āpatti saññāya karaṇa bhūtāya vimokkhaḥ etāya ati saññā vimokkhā

original: Ettha ca vītikkamasaññā avijjamānāpi āpattiyā vimuccanassa sādhakatamaṭṭhena gahitā.
analyzed: ettha ca vītikkama saññā a vijjamānā api āpattiyāḥ vimuccanassa sādhakatama aṭṭhena gahitā

original: Yathā vuṭṭhiyā abhāvena jātaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ “vuṭṭhikata”nti vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ
analyzed: yathā vuṭṭhiyāḥ abhāvena jātam dubbhikkham vuṭṭhikatanti vuccati evaṃsampadam idam

original: veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ sacittakāpatti.
analyzed: veditabbam ayam sa cittaka āpatti

original: 862-4. Itarā pana acittakāpatti. Vītikkamasaññāya abhāvena natthi vimokkho etāyāti
analyzed: itarā pana acittaka āpatti vītikkama saññāya abhāvena natthi vimokkhaḥ etāya ati

original: nosaññāvimokkhā. Sucittena savāsanakilesappahānena, sakalalokiyalokuttarakusalasampayogena
analyzed: no saññā vimokkhā su cittena sa vāsana kilesa ppahānena sakala lokiya lokuttara kusala sampayogena

original: ca sundaracittena bhagavatā pakāsitā sabbāva āpatti cittassa vasena duvidhā siyunti
analyzed: ca sundara cittena bhagavatā pakāsitā sabbā ava āpatti cittassa vasena duvidhā siyunti

original: yojanā. Sacittakasamuṭṭhānavasena panāti sacittakasamuṭṭhānavaseneva. Sacittakamissakavivajjanatthāya
analyzed: yojanā sa cittaka samuṭṭhāna vasena pana ati sa cittaka samuṭṭhāna vasena iva sa cittaka missaka vivajjana tthāya

original: pana-saddo evakārattho vutto.
analyzed: pana saddaḥ eva kāra atthaḥ vuttaḥ

original: Yā sacittakehi vā acittakamissakasamuṭṭhānavasena vā samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ acittakā.
analyzed: yā sa cittakehi vā acittaka missaka samuṭṭhāna vasena vā samuṭṭhāti ayam acittakā

original: 865. Suvijjenāti sobhamānāhi tīhi vijjāhi vā aṭṭhahi vā vijjāhi samannāgatattā suvijjena.
analyzed: su vijjena ati sobhamānāhi tīhi vijjāhi vā aṭṭhahi vā vijjāhi samannāgata ttā su vijjena

original: Anavajjenāti savāsanakilesāvajjarahitattā anavajjena bhagavatā. Lokapaṇṇattivajjato
analyzed: anavajjena ati anavajjena bhagavatā loka paṇṇatti vajjataḥ

original: lokapaṇṇattivajjavasena sabbāva āpattiyo vajjavasena duvidhā dukā vuttāti yojanā.
analyzed: loka paṇṇatti vajja vasena sabbāva āpattiyaḥ vajja vasena duvidhā dukā vuttā iti yojanā

original: 866. Yassā sacittake pakkhe, cittaṃ akusalaṃ siyāti yassā sacittakācittakasamuṭṭhānāya
analyzed: yassā sa cittake pakkhe cittam akusalam siyāti yassā sa cittaka acittaka samuṭṭhānāya

original: acittakāya surāpānādiāpattiyā sacittakasamuṭṭhānapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
analyzed: acittakāya surā pāna ādi āpattiyā sacittaka samuṭṭhāna pakkhe cittam akusalam eva hoti

original: ayaṃ lokavajjā nāmāti attho. Yassā pana sacittakasamuṭṭhānāya paṭhamapārājikādiāpattiyā
analyzed: ayam lokavajjā nāma ati atthaḥ yassā pana sa cittaka samuṭṭhānāya paṭhama pārājika ādi āpattiyā

original: cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, tassā lokavajjatāya vattabbameva natthi. Acittakāpi vā āpatti
analyzed: cittam akusalam eva hoti tassāḥ loka vajja tāya vattabbam eva natthi acittakā api vā āpatti

original: sacittakapakkhe kusalacitte sati lokavajjatāya siddhāya acittakapakkhepi lokavajjo
analyzed: sacittaka pakkhe kusala citte sati lokavajja tāya siddhāya acittaka pakkhe pi lokavajjo

original: hoti, kimaṅgaṃ pana akusalacitteneva āpajjitabbāya āpattiyā lokavajjatāti sā visuṃ na vuttā.
analyzed: hoti kim aṅgam pana akusala cittena iva āpajjitabbāya āpattiyāḥ loka vajja tā ti sā visum na vuttā

original: Yasmā pana paṇṇattivajjāya vatthuvītikkamavajjā siyā kusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ, tasmā
analyzed: yasmā pana paṇṇatti vajjāya vatthu vītikkama vajjā siyā kusalam siyā abyākatam tasmā

original: tassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ kusalamevāti ayaṃ niyamo natthīti āha “sesā paṇṇattivajjakā”ti.
analyzed: tassāḥ sacittaka pakkhe cittam kusalam eva ti ayam niyamaḥ natthi iti āha sesā paṇṇatti vajjakā ti

original: “Paṇṇattivajjakā”ti iminā ca lakkhaṇena vatthuvijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ
analyzed: paṇṇatti vajjakā ti iminā ca lakkhaṇena vatthu vijānana cittena sacittaka pakkhe cittam

original: siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ, tasmā tassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevāti
analyzed: siyā kusalam siyā akusalam siyā abyākatam tasmā tassā sa cittaka pakkhe cittam akusalam eva ati

original: ayaṃ niyamo natthīti āha.
analyzed: ayam niyamaḥ na atthi iti āha

original: 867. Kāyadvārena āpajjitabbā kāyakammaṃ. Ubhayattha āpajjitabbā tadubhayaṃ kāyakammaṃ
analyzed: kāya dvārena āpajjitabbā kāya kammam ubhayattha āpajjitabbā tad ubhayam kāya kammam

original: vacīkammaṃ. Manodvāre āpatti nāma natthīti manokammaṃ na vuttaṃ. “Manodvāre āpatti
analyzed: vacī kammam manaḥ dvāre āpatti nāma natthi iti manaḥ kammam na vuttam manaḥ dvāre āpatti

original: nāma natthīti ca idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ upanikkhittasādiyanādīsu manodvārepi
analyzed: nāma natthi iti ca idam yebhuyya vasena vuttam upanikkhitta sādiyana ādīsu manaḥ dvāre pi

original: āpattisambhavato”ti ācariyā.
analyzed: āpatti sambhavato ti ācariyā

original: 868-9. Kusalāditikadvayanti kusalattikañceva vedanāttikañca. Āpattiṃ āpajjanto kusalākusalacitto, tathā abyākatacitto vā hutvā āpajjatīti yojanā.
analyzed: kusala ādi tika dvayanti kusala ttikam ca iva vedanā ttikam ca āpattim āpajjantaḥ kusala akusala cittaḥ tathā abyākata cittaḥ vā hutvā āpajjati iti yojanā

original: Dukkhādisaṃyutoti ādi-saddena upekkhāvedanāsamaṅgino saṅgaho. Evaṃ santepi sabbasikkhāpadesu
analyzed: dukkha ādi saṃyutaḥ ti ādi saddena upekkhā vedanā samaṅgino saṅgahaḥ evam sante api sabba sikkhāpadesu

original: akusalacittavasena ekaṃ cittaṃ, kusalābyākatavasena dve cittāni, sabbesaṃ vasena
analyzed: akusala citta vasena ekam cittam kusala abyākata vasena dve cittāni sabbesam vasena

original: tīṇi cittāni. Dukkhavedanāvasena ekā vedanā, sukhaupekkhāvasena dve, sabbāsaṃ vasena
analyzed: tīṇi cittāni dukkha vedanā vasena ekā vedanā sukha aupekkhā vasena dve sabbāsam vasena

original: tisso vedanāti ayameva bhedo labbhati, na añño bhedo.
analyzed: tissaḥ vedanā ti ayam eva bhedaḥ labbhati na aññaḥ bhedaḥ

original: Kusalattikaṃ sacepi gahitaṃ, na pana sabbesameva cittānaṃ vasena labbhati, atha kho
analyzed: kusala ttikam sace pi gahitam na pana sabbesam eva cittānam vasena labbhati atha kho

analyzed: āpatti samuṭṭhāpakānam bāttiṃsa cittānam eva vasena labbhati bāttiṃsa iva hi cittāni

original: āpattisamuṭṭhāpakāni. Dvādasa akusalāni, aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalāni, dasa kāmāvacarakiriyacittāni,
analyzed: āpatti samuṭṭhāpakāni dvādasa akusalāni aṭṭha kāmāvacara kusalāni dasa kāmāvacara kiriya cittāni

original: kusalato, kiriyato ca dve abhiññācittāni cāti evaṃ bāttiṃsacittehi samuṭṭhitāpi āpatti
analyzed: kusalataḥ kiriyataḥ ca dve abhiññā cittāni ca ati evam bāttiṃsa cittehi samuṭṭhitā api āpatti

original: akusalā vā hoti abyākatā vā, natthi āpatti kusalaṃ. Yathāha samathakkhandhake “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: akusalā vā hoti abyākatā vā natthi āpatti kusalam yathā āha samatha khandhake āpatta adhikaraṇam

original: siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ, natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti. Ayaṃ pana pāṭho
analyzed: siyā akusalam siyā abyākatam natthi āpatti adhikaraṇam kusalanti ayam pana pāṭhaḥ

original: paṇṇattivajjaṃyeva sandhāya vutto, na lokavajjaṃ. Yasmiñhi pathavikhaṇanabhūtagāmapātabyatādike
analyzed: paṇṇatti vajjam yā iva sandhāya vuttaḥ na loka vajjam yasmin hi pathavi khaṇana bhūta gāma pātabya tā ādike

original: āpattādhikaraṇe kusalacittaṃ aṅgaṃ hoti, tasmiñca sati na sakkā vattuṃ “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: āpatta adhikaraṇe kusala cittam aṅgam hoti tasmin ca sati na sakkā vattum na atthi āpatta adhikaraṇam

original: kusala”nti. Tasmā nayidaṃ aṅgapahonakacittaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ tāva āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: tasmai aṅga pahonaka cittam sandhāya vuttam yam tāva āpatta adhikaraṇam

original: lokavajjaṃ, taṃ ekantato akusalameva. Tattha “siyā akusala”nti vikappo natthi. Yaṃ
analyzed: loka vajjam tam ekantataḥ akusalam eva tattha siyā akusalam ti vikappo natthi yam

original: pana paṇṇattivajjaṃ, taṃ yasmā sañcicca “imaṃ āpattiṃ vītikkamāmī”ti vītikkamantasseva
analyzed: pana paṇṇatti vajjam tam yasmai sañcicca imam āpattim vītikkamāmi iti vītikkamantassa iva

original: akusalaṃ hoti, asañcicca pana kiñci ajānantassa sahaseyyādivasena āpajjanato abyākataṃ
analyzed: akusalam hoti asañcit ca pana kiñci a jānantassa sahaseyya ādi vasena āpajjanataḥ abyākatam

original: hoti, tasmā tattha sañciccāsañciccavasena imaṃ vikappabhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: hoti tasmā tattha sañcicca asañcicca vasena imam vikappa bhāvam sandhāya idam vuttam

original: “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ, natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti.
analyzed: āpatti adhikaraṇam siyā akusalam siyā abyākatam natthi āpatti adhikaraṇam kusalanti

original: Sace pana “yaṃ kusalacitto āpajjati, idaṃ vuccati āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala”nti vadeyya,
analyzed: sace pana yam kusala cittaḥ āpajjati idam vuccati āpatta adhikaraṇam kusalanti vadeyya

original: acittakānaṃ eḷakalomapadasodhammādisamuṭṭhānānampi kusalacittaṃ āpajjeyya, na ca
analyzed: acittakānam eḷaka lomapada sodhamma ādi samuṭṭhānānam pi kusala cittam āpajjeyya na ca

original: tattha vijjamānampi kusalacittaṃ āpattiyā aṅgaṃ, kāyavacīviññattivasena pana calitapavattānaṃ
analyzed: tattha vijjamānam api kusala cittam āpattiyāḥ aṅgam kāya vacī viññatti vasena pana calita pavattānam

original: kāyavācānaṃ aññatarameva aṅgaṃ, tañca rūpakkhandhapariyāpannattā abyākatanti.
analyzed: kāya vācānam aññataram eva aṅgam tat ca rūpa kkhandha pariyāpanna ttā a byākatanti

original: 870. Idaṃ tu lakkhaṇanti idaṃ nidānādisādhāraṇavinicchayalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: idam tu lakkhaṇanti idam nidāna ādi sādhāraṇa vinicchaya lakkhaṇam

original: 871. “Taru”ntiādigāthā pubbe vuttatthāva. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha “dvayaṅkura”nti
analyzed: tarunti ādi gāthā pubbe vutta tthā va ayam pana visesaḥ tattha dvayaṅkuranti

original: vuttaṃ, idha “catussikha”nti. Tattha “dvayaṅkura”nti lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjānaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
analyzed: vuttam idha tattha dvayaṅkuranti lokavajja paṇṇatti vajjānam gahaṇam

original: idha catussikhanti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ. Cattāro sīkhā aṅkurā etassāti viggaho. Tattha
analyzed: idha catur sikhanti catunnam vipattīnam cattāro sīkhāḥ aṅkurāḥ etassa ti viggahaḥ tattha

original: vipatti “sattaphala”nti sattaphalesu antogadhā, idha vipattiṭṭhāne vajjaṃ gahetvā sattaphalāni.
analyzed: vipatti satta phalanti satta phalesu antogadhāḥ idha vipatti ṭṭhāne vajjam gahetvā satta phalāni

original: 872. Anuttarataṃ gataṃ attanā uttarassa uttamassa kassaci avijjamānattā imaṃ uttaraṃ
analyzed: anuttaratam gatam attanā uttarassa uttamassa kassaci a vijjamāna ttā imam uttaram

original: uttaraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ yo theranavamajjhimesu aññataro pariyāpuṇāti pāṭhassa paguṇavācuggatakaraṇena

original: adhīyati, paripucchati atthañca atthavaṇṇanaṃ sutvā sakkaccaṃ uggahetvā manasā pekkhitvā
analyzed: adhīyati paripucchati atthañca attha vaṇṇanam sutvā sakkaccam uggahetvā manasā pekkhitvā

original: paññāya suppaṭivijjhitvā dhāreti, so ca bhikkhu ca-saddena evameva vinayavinicchaye
analyzed: paññāya su paṭivijjhitvā dhāreti so ca bhikkhu ca saddena evam eva vinaya vinicchaye

original: yo bhikkhu yutto, so ca kāyavācavinaye kāyavācāvītikkamānaṃ vinayane saṃvaraṇe vinaye

original: vinayapiṭake anuttarataṃ upayāti attano uttaritarassa avijjamānataṃ upagacchati.
analyzed: vinayapiṭake anuttara tam upayāti attanaḥ uttaritarassa a vijjamāna tam upagacchati

original: Ettha kāraṇamāha “uttarato”ti, paguṇavācuggatakaraṇena adhītena atthavaṇṇanaṃ sutvā
analyzed: ettha kāraṇam āha uttaratas iti adhītena attha vaṇṇanam sutvā

original: dhāraṇena suṭṭhu dhāritena iminā uttarapakaraṇena hetubhūtenāti attho.
analyzed: dhāraṇena suṭṭhu dhāritena iminā uttara pakaraṇena hetu bhūtena ati attho

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Lakkhaṇakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Sabbasaṅkalananayakathāvaṇṇanā
873. Parivāre mukhāgatā katthapaññattivārādayo aṭṭha vārā, teyeva paccaya-saddena
analyzed: parivāre mukha āgatā kattha paññatti vāra ādayaḥ aṭṭha vārā teyeva paccaya saddena

original: yojetvā vuttā aṭṭhapaccayavārāti vibhaṅgadvaye visuṃ visuṃ dassitā soḷasa parivārā

original: assāti soḷasaparivāro, tassa soḷasaparivārassa. Sabbaṃ saṅkalanaṃ nayanti sabbesaṃ
analyzed: tassa soḷasa parivārassa sabbam saṅkalanam nayanti sabbesam

original: vuttānaṃ saṅkalananayānaṃ saṅgahetabbato sabbaṃ saṅkalabhedanaṃ nayaṃ.
analyzed: vuttānam saṅkalana nayānam saṅgahetabbataḥ sabbam saṅkala bhedanam nayam

original: 875. Kāyikā chabbidhāti paṭhamapārājikāpatti, kuṭikaraṇe payoge dukkaṭāpatti, ekaṃ
analyzed: kāyikā chabbidhā ati paṭhama pārājika āpatti kuṭi karaṇe payoge dukkaṭa āpatti ekam

original: piṇḍaṃ anāgate thullaccayāpatti, tasmiṃ āgate saṅghādisesāpatti, vikālabhojane pācittiyāpatti,
analyzed: piṇḍam anāgate thullaccaya āpatti tasmin āgate saṅgha ādi sesa āpatti vikāla bhojane pācittiya āpatti

original: paṭhamapāṭidesanīyāpattīti chabbidhā.
Tathā vācasikāpi cāti catutthapārājikā, kuṭiyā kārāpane pubbagatiyo, padasodhammapācittiyaṃ, davakamyatāya hīnena khuṃsanaṃ, tassa dubbhāsitanti tathā chabbidhā.
analyzed: tathā vācasikā api ca ati catuttha pārājikā kuṭiyā kārāpane pubbagatiyo pada sodhamma pācittiyam dava kamya tāya hīnena khuṃsanam tassa dubbhāsitan ti tathā chabbidhā

original: Chādentassa ca tissoti bhikkhuniyā vajjapaṭicchādikāya pārājikaṃ, bhikkhuno saṅghādisesachādane pācittiyaṃ, attano duṭṭhullacchādane dukkaṭanti tisso ca.
analyzed: chādentassa ca tisso ti bhikkhuniyā vajja paṭicchādikāya pārājikam bhikkhuno saṅgha ādisesa chādane pācittiyam attanaḥ duṭṭhulla chādane dukkaṭanti tisso ca

original: Pañca saṃsaggapaccayāti kāyasaṃsagge bhikkhuniyā pārājikaṃ, bhikkhuno saṅghādiseso,
analyzed: pañca saṃsagga paccayā ti kāya saṃsagge bhikkhuniyā pārājikam bhikkhuno saṅgha ādiseso

original: kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhe thullaccayaṃ, nissaggiyena kāyapaṭibaddhe dukkaṭaṃ, aṅgulipatodake
analyzed: kāyena kāya paṭibaddhe thullaccayam nissaggiyena kāya paṭibaddhe dukkaṭam aṅguli patodake

original: pācittiyanti kāyasaṃsaggapaccayā pañca āpattiyo.
analyzed: pācittiyanti kāya saṃsagga paccayā pañca āpattiyaḥ

original: 877. Bhikkhuniyā vajjapaṭicchādikāya pārājikaṃ, bhikkhussa saṅghādisesapaṭicchādakassa pācittiyanti duṭṭhullacchādane duve.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyāḥ vajja paṭicchādikāya pārājikam bhikkhussa saṅgha ādi sesa paṭicchādakassa pācittiyanti duṭṭhulla chādane duve

original: 879. “Gāmantare catassovā”tiādi paṭiniddesato ca viññāyati.
analyzed: gām antare paṭiniddesato ca viññāyati

original: 881. Vajantiyāti gacchantiyā.
analyzed: vajantiyā ati gacchantiyā

original: 885. Yā pana bhikkhunī rattandhakāre appadīpe hatthapāse purisena saddhiṃ yadi sallapeyya, tassā pācitti. Dūre ṭhitā hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitā vadeyya ce, dukkaṭamevāti yojanā.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī ratta ndhakāre appa dīpe hattha pāse purisena saddhim yadi sallapeyya tassā pācitti dūre ṭhitā hattha pāsam vijahitvā ṭhitā vadeyya ce dukkaṭam eva ati yojanā

original: 886. Yā pana bhikkhunī channe paṭicchannaṭṭhāne divā purisena saddhiṃ assa purisassa
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī channe paṭicchanna ṭṭhāne divā purisena saddhim assa purisassa

original: hatthapāse ṭhitā vadeyya sallapeyya, tassā pācitti. Hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā vadeyya
analyzed: hattha pāse ṭhitā vadeyya sallapeyya tassā pācitti hattha pāsam vijahitvā vadeyya

original: ce, dukkaṭamevāti yojanā.
analyzed: ce dukkaṭam evā ati yojanā

original: 891. Sanissaggā ca pācittīti nissajjanavinayakammasahitāyeva pācitti.
analyzed: sa nissaggā ca pācitti iti nissajjana vinaya kamma sahitāya iva pācitti

original: 893. Idha imasmiṃ sāsane.
analyzed: idhe imasmin sāsane

original: 896. Duvinnanti dvinnaṃ.
analyzed: duvinnanti dvinnam

original: 898. Samānasaṃvāsakabhūmi nāma pakatattassa bhikkhuno samānaladdhikassa ekasīmāyaṃ
analyzed: samānasaṃvāsaka bhūmi nāma pakatattassa bhikkhuno samāna laddhikassa eka sīmāyam

original: ṭhitabhāvo. Nānāpadaṃ pubbaṃ etissāti nānāpadapubbikā, nānāsaṃvāsakabhūmīti attho.
analyzed: ṭhita bhāvaḥ nānā padam pubbam etissa ati nānā pada pubbikā nānā saṃvāsaka bhūmi iti atthaḥ

original: Ukkhittanānāladdhikanānāsīmagatā nānāsaṃvāsakabhūmi. Imā dveyeva saṃvāsakabhūmiyo
analyzed: ukkhitta nānā laddhika nānā sīma gatā nānā saṃvāsaka bhūmi imāḥ dveyā iva saṃvāsaka bhūmiyaḥ

original: hi mahesinā kāruṇikena vuttāti yojanā.
analyzed: hi mahesinā kāruṇikena vuttā iti yojanā

original: 899. Duvinnanti pārivāsikamānattacārīnaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ. Dvayātītenāti kāmasukhallikānuyogaattakilamathānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: duvinna ti pārivāsika mānatta cārīnam dvinnam puggalānam dvaya atītena ati

original: antadvayaṃ atikkamma majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhitena. Atha vā sassatucchedadvayaṃ atikkantena.
analyzed: anta dvayam atikkamma majjhimāya paṭipadāya ṭhitena atha vā atikkantena

original: 900. “Dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabba”nti ca tatheva “dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā”ti ca dvaṅgulā duve paññattāti yojanā.

analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu sa uttaram uttara pakaraṇena sahitam vinayassavinicchayam nāma pakaraṇam

original: jānāti dhammato ceva atthato ca vinicchayato ca sabbathā avabujjhati, so bhikkhu
analyzed: jānāti dhammato ca iva atthato ca vinicchayato ca sabbathā avabujjhati so bhikkhu

original: attanā sikkhitabbāya sikkhāya sabbaso viññātattā sikkhāpakena ācariyena vināpi sikkhituṃ
analyzed: attanā sikkhitabbāya sikkhāya sabbasas viññāta ttā sikkhāpakena ācariyena vinā api sikkhitum

original: samatthoti. Nissayaṃ vimuñcitvāti ācariyupajjhāye nissāya vāsaṃ muñcitvā. Yathākāmaṅgato
analyzed: samatthaḥ ti nissayam vimuñcitvā ti ācariya upajjhāye nissāya vāsam muñcitvā yathākāmaṅgato

original: siyāti yādisā yādisā attanā gāmitā, tattha tattha gamanāraho bhaveyyāti attho.
analyzed: siyā ati yādisā yādisā attanā gāmitā tattha tattha gamana arahaḥ bhaveyya ati

original: 955. Nissayaṃ dātukāmena. Saha vibhaṅgena savibhaṅgaṃ. Saha mātikāya samātikaṃ. Idaṃ
analyzed: nissayam dātu kāmena saha vibhaṅgena sa vibhaṅgam saha mātikāya sa mātikam idam

original: sauttaraṃ vinayavinicchayapakaraṇaṃ suṭṭhu vācuggataṃ katvā ganthato suṭṭhu paguṇaṃ
analyzed: sauttaram vinaya vinicchaya pakaraṇam suṭṭhu vācuggatam katvā ganthataḥ suṭṭhu paguṇam

original: vācuggataṃ katvā atthato, vinicchayato ca sammā jānitvā evaṃ dātabbanti yojanā.
analyzed: vācuggatam katvā atthataḥ vinicchayato ca sammā jānitvā evam dātabbanti yojanā

original: 956-7. Yo bhikkhu imaṃ sauttaraṃ vinayavinicchayapakaraṇaṃ vācāya paṭhati, manasā
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhu imam sauttaram vinaya vinicchaya pakaraṇam vācāya paṭhati manasā

original: cinteti, aññehi vuccamānaṃ suṇāti, atthaṃ paripucchati, paraṃ vāceti, niccaṃ atthaṃ
analyzed: cinteti aññehi vuccamānam suṇāti attham paripucchati param vācā iti niccam attham

original: upaparikkhati yathāparipucchitamatthaṃ hetuudāharaṇapavattivasena upagantvā samantato
analyzed: upaparikkhati yathā paripucchitam attham hetu udāharaṇa pavatti vasena upagantvā samantataḥ

original: ikkhati paññāya niyameti vavatthapeti, tassa pana bhikkhussa vinayanissitā sabbeva
analyzed: ikkhati paññāya niyameti vavatthapeti tassa pana bhikkhussa vinaya nissitā sabbā eva

original: atthā āpattānāpattikappiyākappiyādipabhedā sabbe atthā hatthe āmalakaṃ viya karatale
analyzed: atthāḥ āpatta anāpatti kappiya akappiya ādi pabhedā sabbe atthāḥ hatthe āmalakam viya kara tale

original: amalamaṇiratanaṃ viya upaṭṭhahanti pākaṭā bhavantīti yojanā. Natthi etassa malanti
analyzed: amala maṇi ratanam viya upaṭṭhahanti pākaṭāḥ bhavanti iti yojanā natthi etassa malanti

original: amalaṃ, amalameva āmalakanti maṇiratanaṃ vuccati.
analyzed: amalam amalam eva āmalakanti maṇi ratanam vuccati

original: 958. Natthi etesaṃ buddhīti abuddhī, abuddhī ca te janā cāti abuddhijanā, abuddhijanānaṃ
analyzed: na atthi etesam buddhi iti abuddhī abuddhī ca te janā ca ati abuddhi janāḥ abuddhi janānam

original: sāraṃ avasāraṃ osīdanaṃ dadāti ādadāti karotīti abuddhijanasāradaṃ, buddhivirahitānaṃ
analyzed: sāram avasāram osīdanam dadāti ādadāti karoti iti abuddhi jana sāra dam

original: agādhaṃ gambhīraṃ. Tehi aladdhapatiṭṭhaṃ amatasāgaraṃ saddattharasāmatassa, nibbānāmatassa
analyzed: agādham gambhīram tehi a laddha patiṭṭham amata sāgaram saddattha rasa amatassa nibbāna amatassa

original: vā paṭilābhakāraṇattā sāgarasadisaṃ paramaṃ uttamaṃ imaṃ uttaraṃ sāgaraṃ āsannapaccakkhaṃ
analyzed: vā sāgara sadisam paramam uttamam imam uttaram sāgaram āsanna paccakkham

original: uttarapakaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ samuddasāgaraṃ sārado hutvā uttaraṃ uttaranto pariyosāpento
analyzed: uttara pakaraṇa saṅkhātam samudda sāgaram sāradaḥ hutvā uttaram uttarantaḥ pariyosāpentaḥ

original: naro bhikkhu hi yasmā vinayapārago vinayapiṭakassa pariyantaṃ gato hutvā pārago pāraṃ
analyzed: naraḥ bhikkhu hi yasmai vinaya pāragaḥ vinaya piṭakassa pariyantam gataḥ hutvā pārago pāram

original: saṃsārassa pārasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchanto siyā bhaveyyāti yojanā.
analyzed: saṃsārassa pāra saṅkhātam nibbānam gacchanto siyā bhaveyya ati yojanā

original: 959. Atoti tasmādeva kāraṇā avapūratorato pāpapūrato nirāsaṅkatāya orato nivatto
analyzed: tasmāt eva kāraṇā pāpa pūrataḥ nirāsaṅka tāyai orataḥ

original: pāpabhīruko naro tamaṃ vidhūya pāpabhīrukatāya eva cittapariyuṭṭhānavasena uppajjanakaṃ
analyzed: pāpa bhīrukaḥ tamam vidhūya pāpa bhīruka tāyai eva citta pariyuṭṭhāna vasena uppajjanakam

original: mohandhakāraṃ tadaṅgapahānavasena vidhametvā. Sabbaṅgaṇakammadaṃ sabbesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ

original: aṅgaṇānaṃ kammaṃ tadaṅgādipahānaṃ dadāti āvahatīti “sabbaṅgaṇakammada”nti laddhanāmaṃ

original: sukhassa padaṃ lokiyalokuttarassa sukhassa kāraṇaṃ guṇasaṃhitaṃ sīlādīhi atthabhūtehi
analyzed: sukhassa padam lokiya lokuttarassa sukhassa kāraṇam guṇa saṃhitam sīla ādīhi attha bhūtehi

original: guṇehi saṃhitaṃ yuttaṃ guṇappakāsakaṃ hitaṃ amatosadhaṃ viya sabbadosasabbabyādhirahitatāya
analyzed: guṇehi saṃhitam yuttam guṇa ppakāsakam hitam viya sabba dosa sabba byādhi rahita tāya

original: ajarāamatādiguṇāvahattā hitaṃ imaṃ uttaraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ sakkaccaṃ ādaro hutvā niccaṃ
analyzed: hitam imam uttaram nāma pakaraṇam sakkaccam ādaraḥ hutvā niccam

original: satataṃ sikkhe “evaṃ paricayantaṃ karomī”ti cintetvā ekantena yathāvuttapayojanasādhanayoggaṃ
analyzed: satatam sikkhe evam paricayantam karomi iti cintetvā ekantena yathā vutta payojana sādhana yoggam

original: katvā ajjhenādivasena sikkheyya eva, na ajjhupekkhako bhaveyyāti yojanā.
analyzed: katvā ajjhena ādi vasena sikkheyya eva na ajjhupekkhakaḥ bhaveyya ati yojanā

original: 960. Paṭubhāvakare pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlapūraṇe, sāsanapaccatthikābhibhavane ca paṭubhāvaṃ
analyzed: paṭu bhāva kare pātimokkha saṃvara sīla pūraṇe sāsana paccatthika abhibhavane ca paṭu bhāvam

original: chekattaṃ vesārajjaṃ karoti attānaṃ dhārentānaṃ lajjipuggalānanti paṭubhāvakare parame
analyzed: chekattam vesārajjam karoti attānam dhārentānam paṭu bhāva kare parame

original: tatoyeva uttame piṭake vinayapiṭake paṭutaṃ pāṭavaṃ paññākosallaṃ abhipatthayantena
analyzed: tatas yeva uttame piṭake vinaya piṭake paṭutam pāṭavam paññākosallam abhipatthayantena

original: paṭunā yatinā nimmalappavattikena paṭunā vidhinā chekena sārena vidhānena idaṃ sauttaraṃ
analyzed: paṭunā yatinā nimmala ppavattikena paṭunā vidhinā chekena sārena vidhānena idam sauttaram

original: vinayavinicchayapakaraṇaṃ satataṃ nirantaraṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇaparipucchācintanādivasena

original: sikkhitabbanti yojanā.
analyzed: sikkhitabbanti yojanā

original: Iti uttare līnatthapakāsaniyā
analyzed: iti uttare līna attha pakāsaniyā

original: Sabbasaṅkalananayakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 961-3. Mahesino tividhassāpi sāsanassa suciraṭṭhitikāmena aticirakālappavattiṃ icchantena
analyzed: mahesinaḥ tividhassa api sāsanassa su cira ṭṭhiti kāmena ati cira kāla ppavattim icchantena

original: dhīmatā pasatthatarañāṇena suddhacittena lābhasakkāranirapekkhatāya parisuddhajjhāsayena
analyzed: dhīmatā pasatthatara ñāṇena suddha cittena lābha sakkāra nirapekkha tāya parisuddha jjhāsayena

original: buddhadattena buddhadattābhidhānena ācariyavarena racito.
analyzed: buddhadattena buddhadatta abhidhānena ācariya varena racitaḥ

original: Pajjavasena ganthato, atthato ceva paramuttaro uttaro vinicchayo antarāyaṃ antarena
analyzed: pajja vasena ganthataḥ atthataḥ ca iva param uttaraḥ uttaraḥ vinicchayaḥ antarāyam antarena

original: ajjhattikaṃ, bāhiraṃ vā antarāyaṃ vinā yathā siddhiṃ upāgato pariniṭṭhānaṃ patto,
analyzed: ajjhattikam bāhiram vā antarāyam vinā yathā siddhim upāgato pariniṭṭhānam patto

original: tathā sattānaṃ dhammasaṃyutā kusalūpasaṃhitā saṅkappā manorathā sijjhantu antarāyaṃ
analyzed: tathā sattānam dhamma saṃyutā kusala upasaṃhitā saṅkappāḥ manorathā sijjhantu antarāyam

original: vinā nippajjantu, etena uttaravinicchayaracanāmayena mahatā puññodayena catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
analyzed: vinā nippajjantu etena uttara vinicchaya racanā mayena mahatā puñña udayena catūhi saṅgaha vatthūhi

original: janaṃ rañjetīti “rājā”ti saṅkhaṃ gato mahīpālo mahiṃ pathavisannissitaṃ janakāyaṃ
analyzed: janam rañjeti iti rājā ati saṅkham gataḥ mahīpālaḥ mahim pathavi sannissitam jana kāyam

original: sammā ñāyena dasa rājadhamme akopento pāletu. Devo pajjunno kāle thāvarajaṅgamānaṃ
analyzed: sammā ñāyena dasa rājadhamme a kopento pāletu devaḥ pajjunnaḥ kāle thāvara jaṅgamānam

original: upayogārahakāle sammā pavassatu avuṭṭhiativuṭṭhikaṃ akatvā sammā pavacchatu.
analyzed: upayoga araha kāle sammā pavassatu avuṭṭhi ativuṭṭhikam a katvā sammā pavacchatu

original: 964. Selindo sinerupabbatarājā yāva tiṭṭhati yāva loke pavattati, cando sakalajanapadanayanasāyano
analyzed: selindaḥ sineru pabbata rājā yāva tiṭṭhati yāva loke pavattati cando sakala janapada nayana sāyano

analyzed: yāva virocati yāva attanaḥ sabhāvam joteti tāva yasassinaḥ gotamassa arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: saddhammo pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhavasena tividho saddhammo tiṭṭhatu pavattatu.
analyzed: saddhammo pariyatti paṭipatti paṭivedha vasena tividhaḥ saddhammo tiṭṭhatu pavattatu

original: 965. Sīhādīnaṃ, dāhādīnañca bāhirajjhattikānaṃ parissayānaṃ khamanaṃ sahanaṃ abhibhavitvā
analyzed: sīha ādīnam dāha ādīnam ca bāhirajjhattikānam parissayānam khamanam sahanam abhibhavitvā

original: pavattanaṃ khanti. Soraccanti sobhane ratoti surato, suratassa bhāvo soraccaṃ. Sundaraṃ
analyzed: pavattanam khanti soraccanti sobhane ratoti surato suratassa bhāvo soraccam sundaram

original: akhaṇḍatādiguṇasamannāgataṃ sīlaṃ assāti susīlo. Susīlassa bhāvo.
analyzed: akhaṇḍa tā ādi guṇa samannāgatam sīlam assa ati su sīlaḥ su sīlassa bhāvo

original: Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Uttaravinicchayaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: uttara vinicchaya ṭīkā niṭṭhitā

original: Iti vinayatthasārasandīpanī nāma vinayavinicchayavaṇṇanā,
analyzed: iti vinayatthasārasandīpanī nāma vinaya vinicchaya vaṇṇanā

original: Līnatthapakāsanī nāma uttaravinicchayavaṇṇanā ca
analyzed: līnatthapakāsanī nāma uttara vinicchaya vaṇṇanā ca

original: Samattā.
analyzed: samattā

original: Pacchā ṭhapitagāthāyo
analyzed: pacchā ṭhapita gāthāyo

original: Therena thiracittena, sāsanujjotanatthinā;
analyzed: therena thira cittena

original: Puññavā ñāṇavā sīlī, suhajjo muduko tathā.
analyzed: puññavā ñāṇavā sīlī suhajjaḥ mudukaḥ tathā

original: Yo sīhaḷārimaddesu, candimā sūriyo viya;
analyzed: yaḥ sūriyaḥ

original: Pākaṭo sīvalitthero, mahātejo mahāyaso.
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ sīvalittheraḥ mahā tejaḥ mahāyasaḥ

original: Tena nītā sīhaḷā yā, idha pattā sudhīmatā;
analyzed: tena nītā sīhaḷā yā su dhīmatā

original: Esā saṃvaṇṇanā sīha-ḷakkharena sulikkhitā.
analyzed: esā saṃvaṇṇanā sīhaḷakkharena su likkhitā

original: Revato iti nāmena, therena thiracetasā;
analyzed: iti nāmena therena thira cetasā

original: Arimaddike rakkhantena, parivattetvāna sādhukaṃ.
analyzed: arimaddike rakkhantena sādhukam

original: Likhāpitā hitatthāya, bhikkhūnaṃ arimaddike;
analyzed: likhāpitā hita atthāya bhikkhūnam arimaddike

original: Esā saṃvaṇṇanā suṭṭhu, sanniṭṭhānamupāgatā;
analyzed: esā saṃvaṇṇanā suṭṭhu sanniṭṭhānam upāgatā

original: Tatheva sabbasattānaṃ, sabbattho ca samijjhatūti.
analyzed: tathā iva sabba sattānam sabbatthas ca samijjhatu uti
